concept: a lunar eclipse over calm waters
description: Draw a large dark blue rectangle for the water. Above it, create a large circle in dark red (#8B0000) for the eclipsed moon, with a thin black outline. Add small white circles for stars surrounding it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Water background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <!-- Eclipsed moon -->
  <circle cx='400' cy='80' r='40' fill='#8B0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Stars -->
  <circle cx='100' cy='50' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='30' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='70' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='40' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a vintage compass with brass details
description: Create a circle in #CD853F for the compass base. Add a smaller inner circle in white for the face. Draw thin black lines indicating directions and place a small triangular pointer in #B87333 at the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Compass base -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='100' fill='#CD853F'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='60' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Direction lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='150' x2='350' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Triangular pointer -->
  <polygon points='250,100 240,130 260,130' fill='#B87333'/>
</svg>

concept: emerald velvet curtains with gold tassels
description: Draw two tall rectangles in #00563F for the curtains, slightly curved at the bottom. Add small yellow (#FFD700) ovals with thin lines beneath them along the bottom edge to represent tassels.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Curtains -->
  <rect x='50' y='20' width='80' height='260' fill='#00563F' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='370' y='20' width='80' height='260' fill='#00563F' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <!-- Tassels -->
  <ellipse cx='90' cy='280' rx='5' ry='10' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='410' cy='280' rx='5' ry='10' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a paper airplane soaring through clouds
description: Use several overlapping white ellipses for the clouds. Place a simple triangular shape in light blue (#ADD8E6) in the foreground to represent the paper airplane, with a fold line down the middle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Clouds -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='80' rx='50' ry='20' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='180' cy='90' rx='60' ry='25' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='70' rx='40' ry='15' fill='white' opacity='0.9'/>
  <!-- Paper airplane -->
  <polygon points='300,200 350,220 300,240' fill='#ADD8E6'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='200' x2='300' y2='240' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: cobalt blue ceramic vase with daisies
description: Draw a rounded rectangle with curved sides in #0047AB for the vase. Add several thin lines in green for stems, topped with white circles surrounded by small white ovals for daisy petals.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Vase -->
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='150' rx='30' ry='30' fill='#0047AB'/>
  <!-- Stems and daisy -->
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='40' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='245' cy='35' rx='3' ry='6' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='255' cy='35' rx='3' ry='6' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a rustic wooden door with iron hinges
description: Create a tall rectangle in #8B4513 for the door. Add thin horizontal lines for wood planks and place three small black rectangles on one side to represent the iron hinges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Door -->
  <rect x='200' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <!-- Wood planks -->
  <line x1='200' y1='100' x2='300' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='300' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='200' x2='300' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Hinges -->
  <rect x='290' y='70' width='5' height='20' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='290' y='120' width='5' height='20' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='290' y='170' width='5' height='20' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Form an angular bird shape using connected triangles and rhomboids in #DC143C, with a small triangle for the head and larger triangular shapes for the wings and tail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Angular bird shape -->
  <polygon points='150,150 200,100 250,150 220,140 200,180 180,140' fill='#DC143C'/>
  <!-- Bird head -->
  <polygon points='150,150 140,140 140,160' fill='#DC143C'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a glass container using a transparent ellipse with a thin black outline. Inside, place several small overlapping circles in various green shades (#90EE90, #32CD32) to create the succulents.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Glass container -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='60' ry='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Succulents -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='190' r='8' fill='#90EE90'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='190' r='8' fill='#32CD32'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='8' fill='#90EE90'/>
</svg>

concept: forest green beret with a silver pin
description: Create a flat oval in #228B22 slightly tilted for the beret. Add a small silver circle on one side with a thin rectangular pin attached to it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Beret -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='70' ry='30' fill='#228B22' transform='rotate(-10 250 150)'/>
  <!-- Silver circle and pin -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='140' r='5' fill='silver'/>
  <rect x='325' y='138' width='10' height='2' fill='silver'/>
</svg>

concept: a robot holding a red balloon
description: Form the robot with a gray rectangle for the torso, a square for the head, and thin rectangles for limbs. Place a small circle in red above a thin line as the balloon held by one arm.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Robot torso -->
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='100' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <rect x='230' y='50' width='40' height='40' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Limbs -->
  <rect x='200' y='110' width='20' height='60' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='280' y='110' width='20' height='60' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Balloon held by one arm -->
  <line x1='290' y1='90' x2='290' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='40' r='5' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: a miniature sailboat on turquoise waters
description: Draw a rectangle in turquoise for the water. Use a small polygon for the boat hull and a triangle on top for the sail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Water -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='turquoise'/>
  <!-- Boat hull -->
  <polygon points='240,220 260,220 270,240 230,240' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Sail -->
  <polygon points='250,220 250,150 280,220' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: stacked neon squares in shifting alignment
description: Place multiple squares in bright neon colors—pink, green, yellow—slightly rotated and overlapped. Vary their positions to create a dynamic layered effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Neon squares -->
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='50' height='50' fill='pink' transform='rotate(10 125 125)'/>
  <rect x='130' y='120' width='50' height='50' fill='green' transform='rotate(-5 155 145)'/>
  <rect x='160' y='90' width='50' height='50' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(15 185 115)'/>
</svg>

concept: a cluster of white daisies on a grass-green backdrop
description: Use a large rectangle in grass green for the background. Draw several small circles in yellow for the daisy centers, each surrounded by white oval petals arranged in a circle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Grass background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Daisy -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='135' rx='8' ry='3' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='165' cy='150' rx='8' ry='3' fill='white' transform='rotate(90 165 150)'/>
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='165' rx='8' ry='3' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='135' cy='150' rx='8' ry='3' fill='white' transform='rotate(90 135 150)'/>
</svg>

concept: three gray pigeons perched on a wire
description: Draw a horizontal black line near the upper third of the canvas for the wire. Place three small gray ovals for the pigeons’ bodies with tiny circles for heads, spaced evenly across the line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wire -->
  <line x1='50' y1='100' x2='450' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Pigeons -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='90' rx='15' ry='10' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='80' r='3' fill='gray'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='90' rx='15' ry='10' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='3' fill='gray'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='90' rx='15' ry='10' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='80' r='3' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

concept: a sunset sky with silhouetted palm trees
description: Create a rectangle filling the background with a gradient from orange to pink at the top. Overlay tall black polygon shapes for palm tree trunks and fan-like leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad14' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='orange'/>
      <stop offset='50%' stop-color='pink'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='white'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Gradient background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#grad14)'/>
  <!-- Palm tree trunk -->
  <polygon points='100,300 110,200 120,300' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Palm leaves -->
  <polygon points='110,200 80,170 110,190' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='110,200 140,170 110,190' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a stack of colorfully wrapped gift boxes
description: Use multiple squares and rectangles in various bright colors, stacked with slight offsets. Add thin rectangles as ribbons on each box.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stacked boxes -->
  <rect x='50' y='150' width='80' height='80' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='50' y='145' width='80' height='5' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='70' y='130' width='80' height='80' fill='blue'/>
  <rect x='70' y='125' width='80' height='5' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='90' y='110' width='80' height='80' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='90' y='105' width='80' height='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a green frog on a lily pad
description: Draw a large ellipse in dark green for the lily pad. Place a smaller, lighter green ellipse on top for the frog’s body, with two small circles for eyes at the front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Lily pad -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='100' ry='40' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <!-- Frog body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='20' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <!-- Eyes -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='170' r='4' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='170' r='4' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: rainbow stripes forming a diagonal band
description: Fill the canvas with diagonal rectangles or a wide diagonal shape. Assign each stripe a color of the rainbow, ensuring they align closely in a slanted band.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Diagonal rainbow stripes -->
  <polygon points='0,0 500,0 500,50 0,100' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='0,100 500,50 500,100 0,150' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='0,150 500,100 500,150 0,200' fill='yellow'/>
  <polygon points='0,200 500,150 500,200 0,250' fill='green'/>
  <polygon points='0,250 500,200 500,250 0,300' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

concept: a black and white checkered racing flag
description: Draw a rectangular flag shape. Fill it with alternating black and white squares, arranged in a checkered pattern.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Checkered flag -->
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='200' height='100' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='50' height='50' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='50' height='50' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='200' y='50' width='50' height='50' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='250' y='100' width='50' height='50' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a pink flamingo standing in shallow water
description: Use a tall pink oval for the body, a smaller oval for the head, and a thin curved line for the neck. Indicate the water with a light blue rectangle at the bottom, overlapping the flamingo’s legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Water -->
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Flamingo body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='30' ry='60' fill='pink'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='100' rx='15' ry='15' fill='pink'/>
  <!-- Neck -->
  <path d='M250,140 Q240,120 250,110' stroke='pink' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a spaceship orbiting a ringed planet
description: Place a large circle near the center for the planet, adding an elliptical ring around it. Draw a small rocket-like polygon or path nearby, partially overlapping the planet to show orbit.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Planet -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='60' fill='blue'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='30' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Rocket -->
  <polygon points='320,130 330,150 320,170 310,150' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Use two elongated rectangles in white for the leggings. Overlay irregular black stripes in horizontal bands to mimic a zebra pattern.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Leggings -->
  <rect x='220' y='50' width='40' height='200' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='260' y='50' width='40' height='200' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Zebra stripes -->
  <line x1='220' y1='100' x2='300' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='150' x2='300' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='200' x2='300' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a stack of pancakes with a pat of butter
description: Draw multiple overlapping ovals in golden brown for the pancake stack. Add a small yellow rectangle on top for a butter pat, with a lighter outline to highlight it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pancake stack -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='50' ry='15' fill='#CD853F'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='160' rx='50' ry='15' fill='#CD853F'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='140' rx='50' ry='15' fill='#CD853F'/>
  <!-- Butter pat -->
  <rect x='240' y='120' width='20' height='10' fill='yellow' stroke='lightyellow' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: red and gold lanterns hanging from a string
description: Stretch a horizontal black line near the top as the string. Place multiple circular or oval shapes in red, each with gold highlights, suspended beneath the line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- String -->
  <line x1='50' y1='50' x2='450' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Red shapes with gold highlights -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='80' rx='10' ry='6' fill='red' stroke='gold' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='80' rx='10' ry='6' fill='red' stroke='gold' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='80' rx='10' ry='6' fill='red' stroke='gold' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a tall giraffe with splotches of brown
description: Form the giraffe’s body and neck using a tall yellow rectangle, with a small oval for the head. Add irregular brown patches across the body to suggest spots.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Giraffe body and neck -->
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='20' height='150' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='70' rx='10' ry='10' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Spots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='3' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='3' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='3' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

concept: turquoise waves against a sandy beach
description: Use a wide beige rectangle at the bottom for sand. Above it, layer several wavy turquoise shapes, decreasing in size, to represent overlapping waves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sand -->
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='beige'/>
  <!-- Waves -->
  <path d='M0,240 Q250,200 500,240 L500,250 L0,250 Z' fill='turquoise' opacity='0.6'/>
  <path d='M0,230 Q250,190 500,230 L500,240 L0,240 Z' fill='turquoise' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a violin and a bow resting on a table
description: Draw a horizontal rectangle in brown for the table. Place a violin silhouette (an elongated oval with curved cutouts) and a thin, long rectangle for the bow, slightly overlapping the violin.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Table -->
  <rect y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Violin silhouette -->
  <path d='M200,180 Q210,160 230,160 Q250,160 260,180 Q250,200 230,200 Q210,200 200,180 Z' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <!-- Bow -->
  <rect x='270' y='170' width='100' height='3' fill='sienna'/>
</svg>

concept: a giant cookie with chocolate chips
description: Use a large light brown circle. Scatter smaller dark brown circles on top for chocolate chips.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cookie -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='#D2B48C'/>
  <!-- Chocolate chips -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='130' r='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='160' r='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
</svg>

concept: teal geometric mountains with triangular peaks
description: Form multiple teal triangles of varying sizes, layered from largest at the back to smallest at the front. Align their bases so they appear as a mountain range.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Mountain range -->
  <polygon points='50,250 150,100 250,250' fill='teal'/>
  <polygon points='150,250 250,150 350,250' fill='teal' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='250,250 350,120 450,250' fill='teal' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

concept: four differently colored footprints in a row
description: Draw four simple foot shapes in a row, each a different color (e.g. red, blue, green, yellow). Space them evenly to form a sequence.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Foot shapes -->
  <path d='M50,250 Q60,230 70,250' fill='red'/>
  <path d='M150,250 Q160,230 170,250' fill='blue'/>
  <path d='M250,250 Q260,230 270,250' fill='green'/>
  <path d='M350,250 Q360,230 370,250' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a black cat silhouette under a full moon
description: Use a large dark blue rectangle for the sky and a big white circle at the top for the moon. Near the bottom, draw a black cat shape (a circle for the head, an oval for the body) with pointed ears.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Night sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <!-- Moon -->
  <circle cx='400' cy='80' r='40' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Cat -->
  <circle cx='100' cy='240' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <ellipse cx='100' cy='270' rx='30' ry='15' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='90,230 100,210 110,230' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: brightly colored balloons tied together with ribbons
description: Use multiple circles in vibrant hues for the balloon tops. Draw thin, wavy lines as ribbons hanging from each circle, converging at a central knot.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Balloon tops in vibrant colors -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='80' r='20' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='70' r='20' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='80' r='20' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Ribbons -->
  <path d='M150,100 C150,130 170,130 170,160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,90 C250,120 270,120 270,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M350,100 C350,130 370,130 370,160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Central knot -->
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Place a large yellow circle with thin rectangular petals radiating out for the sunflower. Overlay a small oval shape with black and yellow stripes for the bee, adding tiny white wings on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sunflower center and petals -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(0 250 150)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(45 250 150)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(90 250 150)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(135 250 150)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(180 250 150)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(225 250 150)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(270 250 150)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(315 250 150)'/>
  <!-- Bee with striped face and tiny wings -->
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='100' rx='10' ry='6' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='100' rx='6' ry='3' fill='black'/>
  <ellipse cx='345' cy='90' rx='4' ry='2' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/>
  <ellipse cx='355' cy='90' rx='4' ry='2' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a polaroid photograph pinned to a cork board
description: Draw a brown rectangle for the cork board background. Place a smaller white rectangle with a square center region as the polaroid, and add a small circle on one corner for the pin.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cork board background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <!-- Polaroid frame -->
  <rect x='150' y='70' width='200' height='200' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='210' y='130' width='80' height='80' fill='#CCCCCC'/>
  <!-- Pin -->
  <circle cx='140' cy='60' r='5' fill='red'/>
</svg>

description: Fill the background with a light color. Scatter small rectangles and circles of various bright shades in a falling pattern across the canvas.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Light background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#F0F8FF'/>
  <!-- Scattered shapes -->
  <rect x='50' y='20' width='20' height='20' fill='magenta'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='50' r='10' fill='lime'/>
  <rect x='350' y='30' width='15' height='15' fill='cyan'/>
  <circle cx='120' cy='100' r='8' fill='orange'/>
  <rect x='300' y='150' width='25' height='25' fill='purple'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='80' r='12' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a pirate ship with a skull and crossbones sail
description: Draw a boat hull with a long brown rectangle and a tall vertical mast. Place a large black rectangle or polygon for the sail, with a white skull-and-crossbones shape on it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Boat hull -->
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='200' height='30' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Mast -->
  <rect x='245' y='100' width='10' height='100' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Sail with skull-and-crossbones -->
  <polygon points='255,100 255,200 350,200' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <line x1='290' y1='145' x2='310' y2='155' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='145' x2='290' y2='155' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a peacock with a fully fanned tail
description: Use a dark blue oval for the body and small circle for the head. Draw multiple teardrop shapes in green and blue radiating behind it, each with a smaller circle at the tip for the eyespots.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark blue body and small head -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='darkblue'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='140' r='10' fill='darkblue'/>
  <!-- Teardrop shapes with eyespots -->
  <path d='M300,150 Q320,140 310,130 L305,135 Z' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='130' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M320,160 Q340,150 330,140 L325,145 Z' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='330' cy='140' r='2' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: silver headphones on a wooden table
description: Draw a wide brown rectangle for the table. Place two connected circles in gray or silver to form the headphone earpieces, linked by a curved rectangle for the headband.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Table -->
  <rect y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Headphones -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='30' fill='silver'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='30' fill='silver'/>
  <path d='M230,150 Q250,120 270,150' stroke='silver' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a treasure map with an X marking the spot
description: Use a tan rectangle with tattered edges. Add dotted lines meandering around, and place a bold red X where the route ends.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tan background with rough edges -->
  <polygon points='10,10 490,10 480,290 20,290' fill='tan'/>
  <!-- Dotted route -->
  <path d='M50,50 Q250,150 450,250' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='4,4' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Bold red X -->
  <line x1='450' y1='250' x2='470' y2='270' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='470' y1='250' x2='450' y2='270' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: orange koi fish swimming in a pond
description: Draw a large blue rectangle for the water. Place several orange fish silhouettes (ellipses with small triangular fins), overlapping near the center in varying sizes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Water background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Fish silhouettes -->
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='150' rx='30' ry='10' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='230,150 250,140 250,160' fill='orange'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='20' ry='8' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='270,180 285,170 285,190' fill='orange'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='130' rx='25' ry='10' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='325,130 345,120 345,140' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

concept: a violin clef floating above a rainbow staff
description: Draw parallel lines in rainbow colors as the staff. Use a single flowing path for the treble clef in black, overlapping the staff lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rainbow staff lines -->
  <line x1='50' y1='100' x2='450' y2='100' stroke='red' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='120' x2='450' y2='120' stroke='orange' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='140' x2='450' y2='140' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='160' x2='450' y2='160' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='180' x2='450' y2='180' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='200' x2='450' y2='200' stroke='indigo' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='220' x2='450' y2='220' stroke='violet' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Treble clef -->
  <path d='M100,220 C90,180 130,140 100,100' stroke='black' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: neon triangles forming a futuristic pattern
description: Place multiple glowing triangles in bright neon colors (hot pink, lime green, electric blue) on a black background. Overlap some triangles and vary their sizes for a dynamic layout.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Black background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Glowing neon triangles -->
  <polygon points='100,50 120,100 80,100' fill='hotpink' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='200,70 230,120 170,120' fill='limegreen' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='300,40 330,90 270,90' fill='electricblue' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='400,80 420,130 380,130' fill='hotpink' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

description: Use a circle for the head and lines for the body, arms, and legs. Position the limbs angled to suggest a running motion.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Running stick figure -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='95' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='110' x2='220' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='110' x2='280' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a large chocolate bar with a bite taken out
description: Draw a rectangle in dark brown. On one corner, add a curved shape missing to show a bite mark, revealing a lighter brown edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cookie -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <!-- Bite mark -->
  <path d='M150,100 Q130,120 150,140' fill='#A0522D'/>
</svg>

concept: a bouquet of roses in a clear vase
description: Use a tall transparent ellipse for the vase. Place multiple red circles or layered petals for the roses above green stems, which extend into the vase.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Transparent vase -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='40' ry='15' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Green stems -->
  <line x1='250' y1='250' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='250' x2='260' y2='160' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Roses -->
  <circle cx='245' cy='140' r='8' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='130' r='8' fill='red'/>
</svg>

description: Draw four puzzle piece shapes in bold hues—blue, red, green, yellow—slightly overlapping. Align their edges so each piece fits into the next.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Puzzle pieces -->
  <polygon points='50,150 90,150 90,190 70,210 50,190' fill='blue'/>
  <polygon points='80,150 120,150 120,190 100,210 80,190' fill='red' opacity='0.9'/>
  <polygon points='110,150 150,150 150,190 130,210 110,190' fill='green' opacity='0.9'/>
  <polygon points='140,150 180,150 180,190 160,210 140,190' fill='yellow' opacity='0.9'/>
</svg>

concept: a chessboard with scattered chess pieces
description: First draw an 8x8 grid of alternating black and white squares. Then place a few simplified piece silhouettes (pawns, rook, knight) in various positions on the board.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <pattern id='checker' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse' width='40' height='40'>
      <rect width='40' height='40' fill='white'/>
      <rect width='20' height='20' fill='black'/>
      <rect x='20' y='20' width='20' height='20' fill='black'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <!-- 8x8 grid -->
  <rect width='320' height='320' fill='url(#checker)' transform='translate(90, -10)'/>
  <!-- Chess pieces (simplified) -->
  <circle cx='110' cy='30' r='10' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='30' r='10' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='190' y='20' width='20' height='20' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

concept: clouds shaped like fluffy sheep in a blue sky
description: Use a light blue rectangle for the sky. Draw several puffy white shapes resembling sheep silhouettes, spaced apart like clouds.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Puffy shapes (sheep/clouds) -->
  <ellipse cx='100' cy='80' rx='40' ry='20' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='100' rx='40' ry='20' fill='white' opacity='0.9'/>
  <ellipse cx='400' cy='70' rx='40' ry='20' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a bubble tea cup with tapioca pearls
description: Sketch a transparent cup shape. Fill the lower portion with small black circles for pearls, and add a straw poking out of the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Transparent cup shape -->
  <path d='M200,100 Q250,80 300,100 L300,250 Q250,270 200,250 Z' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Pearls -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='220' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='230' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Straw -->
  <rect x='290' y='70' width='5' height='30' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

concept: a single oak leaf turning from green to brown
description: Draw an elongated leaf shape with lobed edges. Color the left portion green, transitioning into a brown shade on the right side to show seasonal change.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Leaf with gradient color -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='leafGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='green'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='brown'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d='M100,150 C150,100 250,100 300,150 C250,200 150,200 100,150 Z' fill='url(#leafGradient)'/>
</svg>

concept: a picnic blanket covered in foods
description: Use a checkered red and white rectangle for the blanket. Place simple shapes for food items, such as circular sandwiches and triangular slices of pie, scattered across it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Checkered blanket -->
  <defs>
    <pattern id='checkered' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse' width='40' height='40'>
      <rect width='40' height='40' fill='red'/>
      <rect width='20' height='20' fill='white'/>
      <rect x='20' y='20' width='20' height='20' fill='white'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#checkered)'/>
  <!-- Food items -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='20' fill='brown'/>
  <polygon points='300,150 320,190 280,190' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a flock of paper cranes in midair
description: Draw multiple origami crane outlines as polygonal shapes in pastel colors. Stagger them at varying heights to suggest they’re floating or flying.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Origami cranes -->
  <polygon points='100,200 120,180 140,200 120,210' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='200,150 220,130 240,150 220,160' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='300,220 320,200 340,220 320,230' fill='lavender' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a tall glass skyscraper reflecting the sunset
description: Use a narrow, tall rectangle for the building in a light blue-gray. Overlay a gradient of orange and pink near the edges to suggest sunset reflections.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Building with sunset gradient overlay -->
  <rect x='230' y='50' width='40' height='200' fill='lightbluegray'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='sunset' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='orange'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='pink'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x='230' y='50' width='40' height='200' fill='url(#sunset)' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a gold pocket watch with roman numerals
description: Draw a circular outline in #FFD700 for the watch, with a smaller circle inside for the face. Add roman numerals around the edge and a small ring at the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Watch outline and face -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='none' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Roman numeral markers -->
  <text x='245' y='100' font-size='10' fill='black'>XII</text>
  <text x='300' y='155' font-size='10' fill='black'>III</text>
  <text x='245' y='210' font-size='10' fill='black'>VI</text>
  <text x='190' y='155' font-size='10' fill='black'>IX</text>
  <!-- Small ring -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a spool of red thread unwinding
description: Place a small cylinder shape in brown for the spool. Add a winding red line emerging from it, coiling slightly away from the cylinder.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Spool -->
  <rect x='220' y='120' width='60' height='80' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Winding red line -->
  <path d='M250,120 Q260,100 270,120 Q280,140 290,120' stroke='red' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a palette of paint with a brush
description: Draw a flat oval in light brown for the palette. Add small circular dabs of different colors on it, and place a thin rectangle with a pointed tip next to it for the brush.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Palette -->
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='150' rx='70' ry='40' fill='lightbrown'/>
  <!-- Color dabs -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='140' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='160' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='5' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Brush -->
  <rect x='300' y='140' width='5' height='40' fill='brown'/>
  <polygon points='305,140 310,130 310,150' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

concept: a silhouette of city buildings at dusk
description: Use a rectangle with a soft purple-to-orange gradient for the sky. Overlay black rectangles in varying heights at the bottom to form the city skyline.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='skyGrad' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='purple'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='orange'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Sky with gradient -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#skyGrad)'/>
  <!-- City skyline -->
  <rect x='50' y='200' width='40' height='100' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='120' y='220' width='40' height='80' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='190' y='210' width='40' height='90' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='260' y='230' width='40' height='70' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='330' y='215' width='40' height='85' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='400' y='225' width='40' height='75' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a dragonfly perched on a reed
description: Draw a vertical green rectangle or line for the reed. Place a small insect shape with an elongated body and two pairs of thin, translucent wings on it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Reed -->
  <rect x='250' y='50' width='5' height='200' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Insect -->
  <ellipse cx='253' cy='100' rx='5' ry='2' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M253,100 L270,90' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.6'/>
  <path d='M253,100 L270,110' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.6'/>
  <path d='M253,100 L236,90' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.6'/>
  <path d='M253,100 L236,110' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

description: Use a hand shape outline filled with a gradient passing through all rainbow hues. Ensure each finger is clearly visible.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='handGrad' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='red'/>
      <stop offset='20%' stop-color='orange'/>
      <stop offset='40%' stop-color='yellow'/>
      <stop offset='60%' stop-color='green'/>
      <stop offset='80%' stop-color='blue'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='violet'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Hand outline -->
  <path d='M150,200 L160,150 L170,130 L180,120 L190,130 L200,150 L210,200 L200,210 L190,220 L180,210 L170,190 L160,180 Z' fill='url(#handGrad)' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a hammock strung between two palm trees
description: Draw two tall green palm silhouettes on opposite sides. Connect them with a curved shape in a lighter color to form the hammock, slightly sagging in the middle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Palm trees -->
  <rect x='50' y='100' width='20' height='150' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='430' y='100' width='20' height='150' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Hammock -->
  <path d='M70,120 Q250,250 430,120' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a potted cactus with bright flowers
description: Use a round or rectangular pot shape at the bottom. Place one or two green oval cacti above it, with small pink or red flower shapes on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pot -->
  <rect x='220' y='200' width='60' height='50' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <!-- Cactus -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='15' ry='30' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='3' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

concept: a silver car with tinted windows
description: Shape the car profile with a low rectangle and two arcs for the roof. Color it silver and fill the windows with a darker gray.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Car body -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='50' fill='silver'/>
  <!-- Roof arcs -->
  <path d='M180,150 Q250,120 320,150' stroke='silver' stroke-width='50' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Windows -->
  <rect x='190' y='155' width='50' height='30' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='260' y='155' width='50' height='30' fill='darkgray'/>
</svg>

concept: marshmallows roasting over a small campfire
description: Draw a few layered triangles or polygons in shades of red and orange for the fire. Place sticks (thin brown rectangles) with small white circles on their ends above the flames.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Flames -->
  <polygon points='240,220 250,180 260,220' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='245,220 250,170 255,220' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Sticks -->
  <rect x='230' y='100' width='5' height='60' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='232' cy='100' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='265' y='100' width='5' height='60' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='267' cy='100' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cluster of grapes on a vine
description: Use multiple small purple circles clustered together. Add a green curly line at the top to represent the vine, with one or two leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cluster of purple circles -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='8' fill='purple'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='155' r='8' fill='purple'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='160' r='8' fill='purple'/>
  <!-- Vine -->
  <path d='M250,140 C245,130 255,120 250,110' stroke='green' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='110' rx='4' ry='2' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: crimson rectangles forming a chaotic grid
description: Scatter rectangular shapes in varying shades of crimson. Rotate them at random angles, ensuring they overlap to form a jumbled grid.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='60' height='30' fill='crimson' transform='rotate(10 80 65)'/>
  <rect x='120' y='70' width='60' height='30' fill='firebrick' transform='rotate(-15 150 85)'/>
  <rect x='200' y='60' width='60' height='30' fill='darkred' transform='rotate(20 230 75)'/>
  <rect x='300' y='80' width='60' height='30' fill='crimson' transform='rotate(-5 330 95)'/>
</svg>

concept: a violinist silhouette against stage lights
description: Use a black outline of a person holding a violin under bright circular spotlights in yellow or white. The lights can be drawn as large cones or circles from above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stick figure holding violin -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='230' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='270' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='220' x2='230' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='220' x2='270' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Violin -->
  <rect x='260' y='160' width='15' height='40' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Spotlights -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='0' r='60' fill='yellow' opacity='0.3'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='0' r='60' fill='yellow' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

concept: a treasure chest overflowing with coins
description: Draw a wooden box shape with an open lid. Inside, place many small yellow circles to suggest gold coins spilling out.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wooden box with open lid -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='100' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <polygon points='150,150 350,150 340,130 160,130' fill='#A0522D'/>
  <!-- Gold coins -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='200' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='210' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='205' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='215' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='210' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a deer with large antlers in a forest clearing
description: Use a brown oval for the deer body and branching lines for the antlers. Place green vertical rectangles for trees in the background, leaving a small open space around the deer.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deer body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='50' ry='30' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <!-- Antlers -->
  <line x1='220' y1='170' x2='200' y2='140' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='170' x2='300' y2='140' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Trees in background -->
  <rect x='50' y='100' width='20' height='150' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='430' y='100' width='20' height='150' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a slice of watermelon with seeds
description: Draw a triangular wedge shape with red at the center and green along the outer rind. Add small black teardrops inside for the seeds.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Watermelon wedge -->
  <polygon points='250,50 350,250 150,250' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='250,50 345,245 155,245' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Seeds -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='170' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='170' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a bright pink flamingo float in a pool
description: Use a large blue rectangle for water. Place an inflatable flamingo shape (an oval ring with a stylized head) in pink, floating near the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Water background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Inflatable flamingo -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='20' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,130 Q240,120 250,110' stroke='pink' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: multilayered ice cream scoops in a cone
description: Stack several circles in pastel ice cream colors (pink, mint, yellow) on a triangular cone shape. Add small details like sprinkles on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cone -->
  <polygon points='250,220 220,300 280,300' fill='peru'/>
  <!-- Ice cream scoops -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='30' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='150' r='30' fill='mintcream'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='150' r='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Sprinkles -->
  <rect x='240' y='140' width='3' height='8' fill='purple'/>
  <rect x='260' y='160' width='3' height='8' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic swirl of purple and blue galaxies
description: Fill the background with dark purple. Overlay swirling shapes of lighter purple and blue, with small white dots scattered around as stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark purple background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='indigo'/>
  <!-- Swirling shapes -->
  <path d='M100,150 C150,100 350,200 400,150' fill='none' stroke='plum' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M200,200 C250,150 300,250 350,200' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='5'/>
  <!-- Stars -->
  <circle cx='120' cy='50' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='30' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a snail with a spiral shell on a leaf
description: Use a green oval for the leaf. Draw a small snail body and a spiral shape in brown for the shell, positioned on top of the leaf.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Leaf -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='40' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <!-- Snail body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Snail shell -->
  <path d='M280,130 A20,20 0 1,1 260,150' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: two hands forming a heart shape
description: Draw two symmetrical hand outlines curving inward, meeting at the fingertips to form a heart space in the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two hand outlines forming a heart shape -->
  <path d='M200,150 C180,100 150,100 170,150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M300,150 C320,100 350,100 330,150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: an old-fashioned telephone with a rotary dial
description: Use a rectangular base with a semicircle on top for the handset cradle. Add a circular shape for the rotary dial with small holes around its perimeter.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Handset cradle -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='80' fill='#D3D3D3'/>
  <path d='M200,150 A50,40 0 0,1 300,150' fill='#D3D3D3'/>
  <!-- Rotary dial -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Dial holes -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='265' cy='165' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='235' cy='165' r='2' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a puzzle piece missing from a heart shape
description: Draw a red heart with a chunk shaped like a puzzle piece removed. Place that missing puzzle piece to one side, in the same color.

concept: green apples stacked in a wooden crate
description: Draw a rectangular crate in brown. Fill it with overlapping green circles or ovals to represent the apples.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Crate -->
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='140' height='100' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Apples -->
  <circle cx='210' cy='150' r='15' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='15' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='150' r='15' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: rain boots splashing in a puddle
description: Place a shallow blue ellipse for the puddle. Draw two tall boots in yellow or red stepping in the center, with small splash droplets around them.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Puddle -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='100' ry='30' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Boots -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='30' height='70' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='270' y='150' width='30' height='70' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Splash droplets -->
  <circle cx='215' cy='140' r='3' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='285' cy='140' r='3' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

concept: a steaming cup of coffee with latte art
description: Use a simple cup shape in white and a brown oval inside for the coffee. Add lighter brown or white swirls on top to mimic latte art, plus wavy lines above for steam.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cup -->
  <path d='M200,100 Q250,80 300,100 L300,250 Q250,270 200,250 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Coffee -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='230' rx='50' ry='10' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Latte art swirl -->
  <path d='M240,220 Q250,210 260,220' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Steam -->
  <path d='M250,100 Q245,80 250,60' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

concept: metallic robots dancing under disco lights
description: Draw two simple robot figures in gray with blocky limbs. Place colorful circular lights overhead, each in a different vibrant color, and tilt the robots as if dancing.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Robot 1 -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='50' height='70' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='110' y='120' width='30' height='30' fill='gray'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='160' x2='80' y2='180' stroke='gray' stroke-width='5'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='160' x2='170' y2='180' stroke='gray' stroke-width='5'/>
  <!-- Robot 2 (tilted) -->
  <rect x='300' y='140' width='50' height='70' fill='gray' transform='rotate(-10 325 175)'/>
  <rect x='310' y='110' width='30' height='30' fill='gray' transform='rotate(-10 325 125)'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='150' x2='280' y2='170' stroke='gray' stroke-width='5' transform='rotate(-10 325 175)'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='150' x2='370' y2='170' stroke='gray' stroke-width='5' transform='rotate(-10 325 175)'/>
  <!-- Colorful lights -->
  <circle cx='125' cy='100' r='8' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='325' cy='100' r='8' fill='lime'/>
  <circle cx='225' cy='90' r='8' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

concept: a scenic waterfall flowing into a blue pool
description: Use a vertical white or light blue rectangle for the waterfall, cascading into a larger blue ellipse below. Surround it with green polygonal shapes for rocks or foliage.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Waterfall -->
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='150' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Cascade -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='210' rx='50' ry='20' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Rocks -->
  <polygon points='200,250 250,220 300,250' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a lotus flower floating on a pond
description: Draw a wide ellipse in a muted blue for the water. Place layered pink or white petal shapes in a circular arrangement for the lotus at the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Water background -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='200' ry='100' fill='lightslategray'/>
  <!-- Lotus petals arranged in circle -->
  <polygon points='250,150 230,100 270,100' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 270,100 310,130' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 310,130 290,190' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 290,190 210,190' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 210,190 190,130' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 190,130 230,100' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: bright orange basketball with black lines
description: Draw a circle in orange. Add curved black lines to denote the basketball’s seams, dividing it into segments.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Basketball -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M200,150 A50,50 0 0,1 300,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a thick novel opened on a table
description: Place a horizontal rectangle in brown for the tabletop. Above it, draw an open book shape with two white rectangles for pages and a darker cover behind them.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tabletop -->
  <rect x='100' y='180' width='300' height='20' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Open book -->
  <polygon points='150,180 250,140 350,180 250,220' fill='#654321'/>
  <rect x='160' y='150' width='80' height='40' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='260' y='150' width='80' height='40' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: ornate stained-glass window in church hues
description: Use an arched polygonal shape. Fill it with smaller geometric sections in blues, reds, and yellows to suggest stained-glass panels.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stained-glass window -->
  <polygon points='200,50 300,50 350,150 300,250 200,250 150,150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='200,50 300,50 250,150' fill='blue'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 300,50 350,150' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 350,150 300,250' fill='yellow'/>
  <polygon points='200,50 150,150 250,150' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: a starfish on a sandy shore with shells
description: Draw a light tan rectangle for sand, a blue rectangle for water at the top. Place a starfish shape in orange, and scatter a few small shell shapes around it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sand and water -->
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='lighttan'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='150' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Starfish -->
  <polygon points='250,180 260,200 280,200 265,215 270,235 250,225 230,235 235,215 220,200 240,200' fill='orange'/>
  <!-- Shells -->
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='170' rx='10' ry='5' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='170' rx='10' ry='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a coral reef teeming with fish
description: Use a blue background for the ocean. Add coral shapes in pink and orange, with several small fish silhouettes (diamond shapes) swimming around.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ocean background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Coral shapes -->
  <polygon points='100,250 110,230 120,250' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='400,250 410,230 420,250' fill='orange'/>
  <!-- Fish silhouettes -->
  <polygon points='250,150 260,140 270,150 260,160' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='350,200 360,190 370,200 360,210' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a ferris wheel on a pier at sunset
description: Draw a horizontal brown rectangle for the pier. Place a large circular outline with evenly spaced lines for the ferris wheel, against a gradient sky transitioning from orange to purple.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='skyGrad87' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='orange'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='purple'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Gradient sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='250' fill='url(#skyGrad87)'/>
  <!-- Pier -->
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Ferris wheel -->
  <circle cx='400' cy='200' r='50' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='400' y1='150' x2='400' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='200' x2='450' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='370' y1='170' x2='430' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='430' y1='170' x2='370' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a rainbow ribbon twisting in the air
description: Draw a winding path shape that loops gracefully. Color each section of the path in consecutive rainbow hues.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Winding path with rainbow colors -->
  <path d='M100,250 C150,200 200,200 250,250 S350,300 400,250' stroke='red' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M100,250 C150,210 200,210 250,250 S350,290 400,250' stroke='orange' stroke-width='8' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M100,250 C150,220 200,220 250,250 S350,280 400,250' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='6' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M100,250 C150,230 200,230 250,250 S350,270 400,250' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M100,250 C150,240 200,240 250,250 S350,260 400,250' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: colorful feathers fanned out like a headdress
description: Position multiple elongated shapes in vivid colors (red, green, blue, yellow) arranged in a semicircle. Overlap them slightly to create a fanned effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Fanned elongated shapes -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='20' height='80' fill='red' transform='rotate(-20 210 140)'/>
  <rect x='220' y='90' width='20' height='80' fill='green' transform='rotate(-10 230 130)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='20' height='80' fill='blue' transform='rotate(0 250 120)'/>
  <rect x='260' y='90' width='20' height='80' fill='yellow' transform='rotate(10 270 130)'/>
</svg>

concept: a pale yellow moon surrounded by bats
description: Use a large light-yellow circle for the moon near the top. Scatter several black bat silhouettes (small wings with a pointed shape) around the moon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Moon -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='40' fill='lightyellow'/>
  <!-- Bats -->
  <path d='M230,60 L220,50 L240,55 Z' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M270,60 L260,50 L280,55 Z' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M250,40 L240,30 L260,30 Z' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a rocket blasting off with fiery exhaust
description: Draw a tall rocket shape with a pointed cone. Below it, use layered triangles or paths in red, orange, and yellow to depict fire and smoke.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rocket -->
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='150' fill='silver'/>
  <polygon points='240,50 260,50 250,20' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Fire and smoke -->
  <polygon points='240,200 250,250 260,200' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='245,200 250,240 255,200' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='248,200 250,230 252,200' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: pumpkins of different sizes on hay bales
description: Place rectangular hay bales in pale yellow at varying heights. Add overlapping orange circles or ovals on top for pumpkins, some larger than others.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Hay bales -->
  <rect x='50' y='200' width='60' height='30' fill='#FFFFE0'/>
  <rect x='120' y='210' width='60' height='30' fill='#FFFFE0'/>
  <rect x='190' y='205' width='60' height='30' fill='#FFFFE0'/>
  <!-- Pumpkins -->
  <circle cx='80' cy='190' r='15' fill='orange'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='195' r='20' fill='orange'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='190' r='10' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

description: Draw two pairs of wings as mirrored polygons or paths in vibrant hues (blue, yellow, red). Add a small body with antennae in the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Left wings -->
  <polygon points='240,150 200,100 240,100' fill='blue'/>
  <polygon points='240,150 200,200 240,200' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Right wings -->
  <polygon points='260,150 300,100 260,100' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='260,150 300,200 260,200' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Body and antennae -->
  <rect x='245' y='130' width='10' height='40' fill='gray'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='130' x2='240' y2='110' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='130' x2='260' y2='110' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of ruby slippers with bows
description: Draw two shoe shapes in a bright red tone. On each toe, add a small bow outline in matching red, with a slight highlight to indicate a ruby-like shine.

concept: an old barn under a cloudy sky
description: Use a large rectangle with a triangular top in red for the barn. Place gray overlapping cloud shapes above it, and a broad green field beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Green field -->
  <rect y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Barn -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='150,100 250,50 350,100' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Clouds -->
  <ellipse cx='100' cy='60' rx='30' ry='15' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
  <ellipse cx='400' cy='60' rx='30' ry='15' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a tall glass of lemonade with ice cubes
description: Draw a transparent glass shape with a pale yellow rectangle inside for the lemonade. Add small white squares or cubes for ice, and a thin line on the side for a straw.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Glass shape -->
  <rect x='180' y='80' width='140' height='180' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <!-- Lemonade inside -->
  <rect x='180' y='140' width='140' height='120' fill='#FFFACD'/>
  <!-- Ice cubes -->
  <rect x='200' y='160' width='20' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='240' y='180' width='20' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Straw -->
  <rect x='310' y='90' width='5' height='60' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

concept: a mosaic of triangles in pastel tones
description: Fill the entire space with small triangles in soft colors like pink, mint, and lavender. Randomly place them so they fit together in a tiled pattern.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tiled triangles in soft colors -->
  <polygon points='50,50 70,80 30,80' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='90,70 110,100 70,100' fill='mintcream'/>
  <polygon points='130,50 150,80 110,80' fill='lavender'/>
  <polygon points='170,70 190,100 150,100' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='210,50 230,80 190,80' fill='mintcream'/>
  <!-- More triangles as desired -->
</svg>

concept: a nurse’s cap on a clipboard
description: Place a vertical rectangle with a small clip at the top for the clipboard. Overlap it near the top with a simple nurse’s cap shape (a white half-oval) featuring a small red cross.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Clipboard -->
  <rect x='220' y='80' width='60' height='180' fill='#D3D3D3'/>
  <rect x='235' y='60' width='30' height='20' fill='#D3D3D3'/>
  <!-- Nurse's cap -->
  <path d='M230,60 A15,10 0 0,1 270,60 L265,50 Q250,40 235,50 Z' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='245' y='45' width='10' height='5' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: a steaming bowl of ramen with chopsticks
description: Use a round bowl shape in bright red. Fill it with curved lines for noodles, small circles or ovals for toppings, and two thin rectangles angled as chopsticks above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bowl -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='80' ry='30' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Noodles -->
  <path d='M210,190 Q250,170 290,190' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Toppings -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='5' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='210' r='5' fill='orange'/>
  <!-- Chopsticks -->
  <rect x='240' y='140' width='5' height='50' fill='sienna' transform='rotate(-10 242,140)'/>
  <rect x='260' y='140' width='5' height='50' fill='sienna' transform='rotate(10 262,140)'/>
</svg>

concept: a koi pond bridge painted red
description: Draw an arched red rectangle to form the bridge. Beneath, use a light blue rectangle for the water, adding fish silhouettes or lily pads.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bridge -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,50 400,150 L400,170 Q250,100 100,170 Z' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Water -->
  <rect y='170' width='500' height='130' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Fish -->
  <polygon points='150,190 160,180 170,190 160,200' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='300,200 310,190 320,200 310,210' fill='orange'/>
  <!-- Lily pad -->
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='220' rx='15' ry='8' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a meteor shower over distant mountains
description: Fill the background with a dark blue rectangle. Layer small glowing streaks in white or yellow diagonally for meteors, and add silhouetted mountain triangles at the bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <!-- Meteors -->
  <line x1='100' y1='0' x2='120' y2='30' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='0' x2='220' y2='30' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='0' x2='320' y2='30' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Mountain silhouettes -->
  <polygon points='0,300 150,150 300,300' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='200,300 350,130 500,300' fill='black' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Draw several small house shapes in different bright colors, each with a circular entrance. Align them in a row, slightly spaced apart.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Houses -->
  <rect x='20' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='red'/><circle cx='50' cy='190' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='blue'/><circle cx='130' cy='190' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='180' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='green'/><circle cx='210' cy='190' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='260' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='yellow'/><circle cx='290' cy='190' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='340' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='purple'/><circle cx='370' cy='190' r='10' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a goldfish in a round bowl
description: Use a circle or oval outline for the fishbowl, partially filled with blue water at the bottom. Place an orange fish shape with a triangular tail inside.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Fishbowl -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='120' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Water fill -->
  <path d='M150,210 Q250,250 350,210 L350,270 L150,270 Z' fill='blue' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Orange fish -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='10' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='270,150 290,145 290,155' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

concept: black ink brush strokes forming abstract shapes
description: On a white background, draw thick black brush stroke paths in varying lengths and curves. Let them overlap slightly to create an abstract composition.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='white'/>
  <path d='M50,100 Q150,20 250,100' stroke='black' stroke-width='8' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M100,200 Q200,120 300,200' stroke='black' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M150,50 Q250,130 350,50' stroke='black' stroke-width='6' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a silver fork and a golden spoon crossed
description: Draw two elongated rectangles with prongs for the fork in silver (#C0C0C0). Place a spoon shape in gold (#FFD700), crossing over the fork at an angle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Fork -->
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='15' height='150' fill='#C0C0C0'/>
  <rect x='130' y='50' width='15' height='150' fill='#C0C0C0'/>
  <!-- Fork prongs -->
  <rect x='100' y='40' width='5' height='10' fill='#C0C0C0'/>
  <rect x='130' y='40' width='5' height='10' fill='#C0C0C0'/>
  <!-- Spoon (angled) -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='150' rx='40' ry='15' fill='#FFD700' transform='rotate(30 150 150)'/>
  <rect x='180' y='140' width='5' height='50' fill='#FFD700' transform='rotate(30 182 165)'/>
</svg>

concept: a tiki mask with vibrant tribal patterns
description: Form a tall wooden-like face with geometric shapes in bright reds, yellows, and greens. Exaggerate the eyes and mouth shapes for a bold tribal style.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='200' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='#DEB887'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='120' r='15' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='120' r='15' fill='red'/>
  <path d='M210,200 Q250,250 290,200' stroke='green' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <polygon points='250,50 240,80 260,80' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a red heart shape. Use a diagonal line with a triangle tip and fletching on the opposite end, overlapping through the heart’s center.

concept: a fluffy sheep standing on green hills
description: Use a white cloud-like oval for the sheep’s body, with a small black oval for the head. Position it on a large green rectangle or curved shape representing rolling hills.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='140' rx='15' ry='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a row of domino tiles toppling over
description: Draw multiple narrow rectangles in black, aligned in a slight diagonal line. Each has white dots to represent numbers, with one tile leaning against the next.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='50' height='30' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='70' cy='65' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='110' y='80' width='50' height='30' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='130' cy='95' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='170' y='110' width='50' height='30' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='190' cy='125' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a simple paper airplane in mid-flight
description: Use a folded triangular shape in white. Position it diagonally, possibly adding a dashed line behind it to suggest motion.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='200,100 250,150 200,200' fill='white'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='80' x2='260' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>
</svg>

description: Stack three circular donut shapes (light brown ring) each with a different icing color—pink, chocolate, white—and add small sprinkles on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='#D2B48C' stroke-width='15'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='20' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='#D2B48C' stroke-width='15'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='#D2B48C' stroke-width='15'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='20' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: an abstract spiral staircase fading into the distance
description: Draw a series of rectangular steps arranged in a spiral pattern. Decrease their size progressively to suggest distance or a vortex-like effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='220' y='130' width='60' height='10' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='230' y='140' width='50' height='10' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='240' y='150' width='40' height='10' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='250' y='160' width='30' height='10' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='260' y='170' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

concept: a dragon’s eye with a slit pupil
description: Use an almond-shaped outline in a dark color. Fill it with a vivid iris, adding a vertical black slit in the center for the pupil.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,120 300,150 Q250,180 200,150 Z' fill='purple'/>
  <rect x='245' y='130' width='10' height='40' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a ladybug on a leaf edge
description: Draw a green leaf shape with a curved edge. Place a small red oval with black spots near the tip for the ladybug, and tiny black antennae.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M100,150 Q150,100 200,150 Q150,200 100,150 Z' fill='green'/>

  <circle cx='175' cy='130' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='185' cy='130' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='175' y1='125' x2='170' y2='115' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='185' y1='125' x2='190' y2='115' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a countryside windmill with spinning blades
description: Use a tall rectangular tower in beige or light brown. Add four thin rectangular blades crossing at the top, and a green rectangle at the base for the field.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='150' fill='#F5DEB3'/>
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='5' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='240' y='70' width='20' height='5' fill='black'/>

  <rect y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: purple lightning bolts across a stormy sky
description: Fill the background with dark gray clouds. Draw jagged purple polyline shapes branching downwards to represent lightning.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkgray'/>

  <polyline points='300,60 290,110 310,130 300,180' fill='none' stroke='purple' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: three cartoon ghosts floating in a haunted house hallway
description: Draw a dark corridor as a long rectangle in gray. Place three translucent white ghost silhouettes, each with a wavy bottom edge and two circular eyes.
svg:

    <circle cx='165' cy='90' r='3' fill='black'/>

  <g opacity='0.7'>

  <g opacity='0.7'>

concept: a red kite flying against white clouds
description: Place a few white cloud shapes on a light blue background. Draw a diamond-shaped kite in red, with a thin line trailing behind as the string.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>

  <ellipse cx='200' cy='80' rx='30' ry='15' fill='white'/>

concept: a camera lens with a reflective glare
description: Use a circle in dark gray or black for the lens. Add concentric circles inside, and a small white ellipse near one edge to suggest a glare.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='darkgray'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='35' fill='gray'/>

  <ellipse cx='280' cy='130' rx='10' ry='5' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/>

description: Draw a wavy blue rectangle for water. Place a wooden chest shape partly open, with small yellow circles inside for coins, and a few bubbles around it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <rect x='210' y='180' width='80' height='30' fill='#A0522D'/>

  <circle cx='270' cy='230' r='3' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a soccer ball on grassy turf
description: Use a green rectangle for the grass. Draw a white circle with black pentagon patches for the soccer ball, placed near the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='green'/>

  <polygon points='250,120 260,135 245,135' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='250,180 260,165 245,165' fill='black'/>

concept: a futuristic cityscape with hovering vehicles
description: Stack tall, sleek building shapes in metallic grays. Draw small oval or rectangular silhouettes above them to represent hovering transports.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='50' y='100' width='50' height='150' fill='lightgray'/>
  <rect x='120' y='80' width='40' height='170' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='50' height='130' fill='silver'/>
