  <ellipse cx='205' cy='100' rx='10' ry='5' fill='darkgray'/>
</svg>

concept: a bumblebee hovering over a blue flower
description: Draw a flower with layered blue petals and a yellow center. Near it, add an oval bee shape with black stripes, small wings, and a thin stinger.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='15' fill='blue' transform='rotate(0 250 150)'/>

  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='15' fill='blue' transform='rotate(135 250 150)'/>

concept: a black and white checkered dance floor
description: Fill a rectangular area with an alternating pattern of black and white squares, forming a classic checkered floor.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <pattern id='checkered' width='20' height='20' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'>
      <rect width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
      <rect x='10' y='10' width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
      <rect x='10' y='0' width='10' height='10' fill='white'/>
      <rect x='0' y='10' width='10' height='10' fill='white'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#checkered)'/>
</svg>

concept: a red cardinal perched on a branch in winter
description: Use a small red oval for the bird’s body and a tiny triangle for the beak. Draw a brown branch with white circles or patches for snow, and place the cardinal on it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <line x1='50' y1='150' x2='450' y2='150' stroke='brown' stroke-width='5'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='130' rx='10' ry='15' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='260,130 275,135 260,140' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large silver circle for the watch face with smaller tick marks for hours. Attach a thin curved line leading off one side to represent the chain.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='silver'/>

  <line x1='250' y1='190' x2='250' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M300,150 Q320,160 310,170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>

concept: a pair of ballet slippers tied with ribbons
description: Use two elongated oval shapes in pink for the slippers, slightly overlapping. Extend thin curved lines above to form the tied ribbons.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='200' rx='40' ry='20' fill='pink'/>
  <ellipse cx='240' cy='200' rx='40' ry='20' fill='pink' opacity='0.9'/>
  <path d='M180,190 Q200,170 220,190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M220,190 Q240,170 260,190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>

concept: a submarine peeking out of the ocean surface
description: Draw a blue rectangle for water. Near the top, place a rounded yellow or gray submarine shape with a small periscope extending upward.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='blue'/>

  <rect x='245' y='30' width='10' height='50' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='5' fill='darkgray'/>

concept: a chess knight piece in profile
description: Use a horse-head silhouette in black or white with a thick rectangular base. Slightly curve the edges to give it a carved look.
svg:

  <polygon points='150,150 180,120 210,130 200,160 170,170' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='150' y='170' width='60' height='20' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a garden of tulips in different colors
description: Draw several thin green rectangles for stems. Add simple tulip shapes in red, yellow, and pink at the tops, slightly staggered.
svg:

  <rect x='160' y='150' width='5' height='50' fill='green'/>

concept: a steaming bowl of miso soup
description: Use a deep red bowl shape with a curved rim. Inside, place floating small white circles for tofu cubes and green rectangles for scallions, with wavy steam lines above.
svg:

description: Draw a horizontal thin black line for the tightrope. Add a small stick figure in the middle, arms outstretched, with rectangles for city buildings in the background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <line x1='0' y1='150' x2='500' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

concept: a moonlit beach with gentle waves
description: Use a dark blue gradient for the sky with a pale yellow circle as the moon. Below, draw a wavy light blue shoreline meeting the sand.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad133' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='darkblue'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='blue'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#grad133)'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='80' r='30' fill='palegoldenrod' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M0,250 Q250,240 500,250 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect y='300' width='500' height='20' fill='sandybrown'/>

concept: a red dragon curled around a golden egg

svg:

svg:

</svg>

concept: a red apple with a bite missing
description: Draw a circular red shape with a small brown stem. On one side, remove a crescent section and fill that region with pale yellow to indicate the bitten interior.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Create a bite by overlaying a pale yellow crescent shape on the right -->
  <path d='M250,70 A80,80 0 0,1 330,150 A80,80 0 0,1 250,230 L250,150 Z' fill='palegoldenrod'/>

  <rect x='245' y='50' width='10' height='20' fill='saddlebrown'/>
</svg>

concept: a city sidewalk cafe with a small table and chairs
description: Use a gray rectangle for the sidewalk. Draw a round table with two chairs facing each other, and maybe a small umbrella overhead.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <rect x='0' y='220' width='500' height='80' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Round table -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='30' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

  <rect x='200' y='180' width='30' height='20' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='270' y='180' width='30' height='20' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Small umbrella overhead -->
  <polygon points='240,120 260,120 250,80' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a carnival carousel with painted horses
description: Draw a circular platform with striped canopy above. Arrange a few horse outlines on vertical poles around the platform, each in a bright color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular platform -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='50' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Striped canopy above (using alternating colored arcs) -->
  <path d='M200,100 A50,50 0 0,1 300,100 L300,130 A30,30 0 0,0 200,130 Z' fill='url(#striped203)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='striped203' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='red'/>
      <stop offset='33%' stop-color='white'/>
      <stop offset='66%' stop-color='blue'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='white'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Vertical poles with horse outlines (simplified as stick figures) -->
  <line x1='150' y1='200' x2='150' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M140,140 Q150,120 160,140' stroke='magenta' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='200' x2='350' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M340,140 Q350,120 360,140' stroke='lime' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of orange koi fish circling each other
description: Draw two stylized fish shapes in orange, mirrored so they appear to swim in a circle. Add small fins and delicate lines for scales.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two stylized orange fish, mirrored -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q220,130 240,150 Q220,170 200,150 Z' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M300,150 Q280,130 260,150 Q280,170 300,150 Z' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Fins and scale lines -->
  <line x1='240' y1='150' x2='250' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='150' x2='250' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a snail shell spiral in rainbow colors
description: Use a single spiral path starting at the center. Gradually change the fill color along the spiral to create a rainbow effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Single spiral path with a rainbow gradient fill -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='rainbow205' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='red'/>
      <stop offset='20%' stop-color='orange'/>
      <stop offset='40%' stop-color='yellow'/>
      <stop offset='60%' stop-color='green'/>
      <stop offset='80%' stop-color='blue'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='violet'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d='M250,150 
           m0,0 
           a50,50 0 1,1 1,0
           a40,40 0 1,0 -1,0' fill='url(#rainbow205)'/>
</svg>

concept: a boxing glove striking a punching bag
description: Draw a vertical red cylinder at the right as the punching bag. On the left, place a rounded glove shape in a slightly darker red, angled to show impact.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Vertical red cylinder punching bag on the right -->
  <rect x='400' y='100' width='40' height='150' fill='red' rx='5' ry='5'/>
  <!-- Rounded glove shape on the left, angled -->
  <ellipse cx='100' cy='180' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#8B0000'/>
  <path d='M80,180 Q100,160 120,180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a goat standing on a rocky cliff edge
description: Sketch a gray polygon for the cliff with jagged edges. Place a small goat silhouette in brown or white, balanced near the edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Jagged gray cliff polygon -->
  <polygon points='50,250 100,180 150,220 200,160 250,200 300,150 350,190 400,130 450,250' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Small goat silhouette (simplified as a small polygon) near the edge -->
  <polygon points='400,130 410,120 420,130 415,140 405,140' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

concept: a big oak tree with a swing hanging from a branch
description: Use a sturdy trunk in brown and a large canopy of green circles. Attach two thin lines under one branch, supporting a small rectangular swing seat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sturdy brown trunk with large green circular canopy -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='150' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='40' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <!-- Two thin lines under one branch supporting a swing seat -->
  <line x1='250' y1='70' x2='230' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='70' x2='270' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='40' width='40' height='10' fill='sienna'/>
</svg>

concept: three helium balloons lifting a small basket
description: Draw a small square basket at the bottom. Above it, attach three circles in bright colors with thin lines connecting down to the basket.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small square basket at the bottom -->
  <rect x='230' y='240' width='40' height='30' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Three bright colored circles above connected by thin lines -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='10' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='160' r='10' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='160' r='10' fill='green'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='220' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='280' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a quaint cottage with smoke curling from the chimney
description: Form a small house shape with a steep roof and a tiny chimney. Curl a thin gray line from the top for rising smoke.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small house with steep roof and tiny chimney -->
  <polygon points='220,200 280,200 250,150' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='200' width='20' height='20' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Chimney -->
  <rect x='265' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Smoke -->
  <path d='M267,140 C270,130 260,120 265,110' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a jester’s hat with bells at the tips
description: Use a three-pointed hat shape in bright primary colors. Place small circle shapes at each tip to represent the bells.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Three-pointed hat in bright primary colors -->
  <polygon points='250,50 220,110 250,90 280,110' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bells at each tip -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='110' r='5' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='5' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='110' r='5' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a whimsical mushroom house with a door and windows
description: Draw a large mushroom cap in red with white spots. Below it, use a beige oval stem shape and add a small door and circular windows on its surface.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large mushroom cap in red with white spots -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='120' rx='80' ry='40' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='120' r='8' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='8' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='120' r='8' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Beige oval stem -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='30' ry='15' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Small door and windows on cap -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='15' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='130' r='3' fill='lightblue'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='130' r='3' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of binoculars focusing on distant mountains
description: In the foreground, draw overlapping circles for the binocular lenses. In the background, depict triangular mountains in gray, partially visible through the lenses.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Overlapping circles for binocular lenses in foreground -->
  <circle cx='210' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Triangular mountains in background (partially visible) -->
  <polygon points='50,250 150,150 250,250' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
  <polygon points='250,250 350,150 450,250' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a row of sweet cupcakes with toppings
description: Arrange multiple cupcake silhouettes in a line. Each has a differently colored swirl on top (pink, green, yellow) and small decorative details like cherries or sprinkles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Row of cupcake silhouettes -->
  <g transform='translate(50,150)'>
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='50' height='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <path d='M5,0 Q25,-20 45,0' fill='pink'/>
    <circle cx='25' cy='-20' r='3' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(120,150)'>
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='50' height='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <path d='M5,0 Q25,-20 45,0' fill='green'/>
    <circle cx='25' cy='-20' r='3' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(190,150)'>
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='50' height='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <path d='M5,0 Q25,-20 45,0' fill='yellow'/>
    <circle cx='25' cy='-20' r='3' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(260,150)'>
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='50' height='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <path d='M5,0 Q25,-20 45,0' fill='purple'/>
    <circle cx='25' cy='-20' r='3' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(330,150)'>
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='50' height='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <path d='M5,0 Q25,-20 45,0' fill='orange'/>
    <circle cx='25' cy='-20' r='3' fill='red'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a snow globe with a tiny winter village inside
description: Use a sphere outline on a circular base. Inside the sphere, draw small house shapes, a few pine trees, and white dots for falling snow.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sphere outline on a circular base -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='60' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='270' r='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Inside sphere: small houses, pine trees, and falling snow dots -->
  <rect x='230' y='170' width='10' height='10' fill='brown'/>
  <polygon points='240,170 245,160 250,170' fill='green'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='190' x2='245' y2='180' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='160' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='140' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a green dragon silhouette breathing fire
description: Draw a spiky dragon outline in green. At the mouth, add an orange and red flame shape curving outward.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Spiky dragon outline in green -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q250,50 350,150 Q300,180 250,160 Q200,180 150,150 Z' fill='none' stroke='green' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Flame at mouth -->
  <path d='M350,150 Q360,140 370,150 Q360,160 350,150 Z' fill='orange' stroke='red' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a cluster of shiny pearls on a velvet cushion
description: Use a plush square or oval in a deep purple tone for the cushion. Scatter small white circles, some overlapping, to represent pearls.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Plush cushion in deep purple with pearl details -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='50' fill='rebeccapurple'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='140' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='140' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='170' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='170' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a stylized caravan rolling through a desert
description: Draw a long, simple RV shape with one or two windows. Place it on a brownish-yellow rectangle for the desert, adding a cactus silhouette in the background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Long, simple RV shape -->
  <rect x='150' y='180' width='200' height='60' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='190' width='50' height='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='270' y='190' width='50' height='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Desert background -->
  <rect y='240' width='500' height='60' fill='burlywood'/>
  <!-- Cactus silhouette -->
  <rect x='50' y='200' width='10' height='40' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='45' y='210' width='20' height='5' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a flamenco dancer with a ruffled red dress
description: Sketch a figure in a dramatic pose, arms raised. Indicate layers of ruffles using curved shapes in bright red, with a slight swish to the dress.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Figure in dramatic pose with ruffled dress -->
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M250,100 Q240,120 230,140' stroke='red' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,100 Q260,120 270,140' stroke='red' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Ruffled dress layers -->
  <path d='M230,140 Q250,160 270,140' stroke='red' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a diamond ring in a small velvet box
description: Draw a hinged box shape in dark red or blue, partially open. Inside, place a ring silhouette with a prominent diamond gem at the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Hinged box partially open with a ring silhouette and diamond gem -->
  <rect x='200' y='130' width='100' height='80' fill='darkred' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <path d='M200,130 L190,140 L200,150' fill='darkred'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='15' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='5' fill='cyan'/>
</svg>

concept: a stopwatch showing the final seconds
description: Use a circular outline with a small knob on top. Inside, mark the final seconds near the 12 o’clock position in a bold color, with a short hand pointing there.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular outline with knob and clock hand -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <rect x='245' y='110' width='10' height='5' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='110' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide, curved blue shape for the wave. Place two stick-figure surfers on small rectangular boards, angled to ride along the crest.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wide curved blue wave -->
  <path d='M50,150 Q250,50 450,150 Q250,250 50,150 Z' fill='blue' opacity='0.6'/>
  <!-- Two stick-figure surfers on small boards -->
  <g transform='translate(150,120)'>
    <circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='black'/>
    <rect x='-10' y='5' width='20' height='5' fill='black'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(350,120)'>
    <circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='black'/>
    <rect x='-10' y='5' width='20' height='5' fill='black'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a swirling black hole pulling in stars
description: Use a large dark circle in the center. Around it, place small white or yellow star shapes that curve inward in a spiral pattern.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large dark circle with inward spiraling stars -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='black'/>
  <g fill='yellow'>
    <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='280' cy='100' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='300' cy='130' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='280' cy='180' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='180' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='200' cy='130' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='100' r='3'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a raccoon rummaging through a trash can
description: Draw a tall cylindrical shape for the can in gray. Next to or partially inside it, place a small raccoon silhouette with a masked face pattern.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall cylindrical can in gray -->
  <rect x='420' y='80' width='40' height='140' fill='gray' rx='5' ry='5'/>
  <!-- Raccoon silhouette (simplified) partly inside -->
  <path d='M410,130 Q420,120 430,130 Q420,140 410,130 Z' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='420' cy='125' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a bright pink donut floating in mid-air
description: Use a ring shape in light brown for the base. Top it with a bright pink circle covering most of it as icing, and add rainbow sprinkles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ring shape base in light brown -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='40' fill='none' stroke='sandybrown' stroke-width='8'/>
  <!-- Bright pink icing circle with rainbow sprinkles -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='35' fill='pink'/>
  <g>
    <circle cx='230' cy='210' r='3' fill='red'/>
    <circle cx='270' cy='210' r='3' fill='blue'/>
    <circle cx='250' cy='230' r='3' fill='green'/>
    <circle cx='240' cy='225' r='3' fill='orange'/>
    <circle cx='260' cy='215' r='3' fill='purple'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a roadside diner with a neon sign
description: Draw a simple rectangular building shape in pastel. Above it, place a tall sign with glowing outlines in bright pink or blue to mimic neon tubing.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Simple pastel rectangular building -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='100' fill='lavender'/>
  <!-- Tall neon sign above -->
  <rect x='210' y='60' width='80' height='40' fill='black' stroke='deepskyblue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <text x='250' y='85' font-size='16' fill='deepskyblue' text-anchor='middle'>OPEN</text>
</svg>

concept: a black silhouette of a wolf pack howling under the stars
description: Place small white dots on a dark blue background for stars. Draw multiple wolf shapes in black silhouette, heads tilted upward at varying heights.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark blue sky with stars -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <circle cx='80' cy='50' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='120' cy='80' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='200' cy='40' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='300' cy='60' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='400' cy='90' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='450' cy='70' r='2'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Multiple wolf silhouettes (simplified as triangles) -->
  <polygon points='100,200 120,170 140,200' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='220,210 240,180 260,210' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='340,200 360,170 380,200' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Use a gold cup shape with a wide bowl and a narrow stem. Add small colorful ovals and circles around its surface for gems.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gold cup shape -->
  <path d='M230,100 A20,20 0 0,1 270,100 L265,160 L235,160 Z' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Small colorful gem decorations -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='110' r='3' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='110' r='3' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='3' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a cheerful clown juggling three balls
description: Draw a clown silhouette or simple figure in bright clothes. Above the figure, place three colored circles in an arc, indicating the juggling pattern.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Clown silhouette in bright clothes (simplified) -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='40' height='60' fill='lime'/>
  <!-- Juggling pattern above: three colored circles in an arc -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='60' r='8' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='8' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='60' r='8' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a pencil sketch of a face, partially erased
description: Use thin gray lines for the outline of a face. Leave one section with a lighter, smudged area to suggest partial erasure.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Face outline with a smudged section -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='80' fill='none' stroke='gray' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Smudged area (lighter stroke) on the right cheek -->
  <path d='M300,150 Q310,160 300,170' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a row of classical columns under a twilight sky
description: Draw tall, fluted column shapes in white across the bottom. Above them, use a purplish gradient rectangle for the twilight sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall fluted columns across the bottom -->
  <rect x='50' y='200' width='20' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='100' y='200' width='20' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='20' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='200' y='200' width='20' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='250' y='200' width='20' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='300' y='200' width='20' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='350' y='200' width='20' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='400' y='200' width='20' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Twilight sky gradient above -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad231' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='purple'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='black'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='200' fill='url(#grad231)'/>
</svg>

concept: a ufo beaming light onto a field
description: Form a saucer shape in gray hovering above. Draw a cone of bright yellow or green light shining down onto a grassy green rectangle below.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Saucer shape in gray -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='100' rx='60' ry='20' fill='gray' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Cone of light -->
  <polygon points='250,100 220,180 280,180' fill='yellow' opacity='0.6'/>
  <!-- Grassy rectangle below -->
  <rect y='180' width='500' height='120' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a winged heart with feathered details
description: Draw a red heart shape in the center. Attach white feather-like shapes extending on both sides to form wings.

concept: a garden gnome beside a row of blooming tulips
description: Use a small bearded figure with a conical hat in red. Next to it, draw several tall green stems topped with bright tulip shapes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small bearded figure with conical red hat -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='130' r='15' fill='peachpuff'/>
  <path d='M210,130 L220,110 L230,130 Z' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Several tall green stems with bright tulip shapes -->
  <line x1='300' y1='150' x2='300' y2='80' stroke='green' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='70' r='5' fill='pink'/>
  <line x1='330' y1='150' x2='330' y2='80' stroke='green' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='330' cy='70' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a set of drums and cymbals on a stage
description: Draw a circular bass drum in front, two smaller toms on top, and a thin vertical stand holding the cymbals. Place them on a basic rectangular stage area.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular bass drum with two smaller toms on top -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='50' ry='30' fill='darkslategray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='160' rx='20' ry='12' fill='slategray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='160' rx='20' ry='12' fill='slategray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Thin vertical stand for cymbals -->
  <line x1='250' y1='130' x2='250' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a tear dropping from an eye
description: Draw an outline of an eye in profile, including eyelid and lashes. Below it, place a single tear-shaped drop in a light blue.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Eye outline in profile with tear drop -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q250,100 350,150 Q250,200 150,150 Z' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M250,200 Q260,210 250,220 Q240,210 250,200 Z' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a beehive hanging from a tree branch
description: Use a horizontal brown line at the top for the branch. Below it, draw an oval layered shape in yellow-brown for the hive, and a few small flying bee shapes nearby.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Horizontal branch with hive and flying bees -->
  <line x1='50' y1='80' x2='450' y2='80' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='120' rx='30' ry='15' fill='sandybrown'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='100' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='100' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='100' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='100' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a small sailboat drifting in a foggy harbor
description: Draw a light gray rectangle for haze. The sailboat is a simple triangle for the sail and a narrow hull, partially faded in the fog.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Light gray haze background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightgray'/>
  <!-- Faded sailboat: simple triangle sail and narrow hull -->
  <polygon points='200,150 250,100 300,150' fill='white' opacity='0.7' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='150' width='80' height='20' fill='white' opacity='0.7' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of cherries with glossy highlights
description: Draw two overlapping red circles with a small shine near the top. Connect them with a thin brown stem, adding a green leaf on the stem.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two overlapping red circles with shine -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='30' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='30' fill='red' opacity='0.9'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='140' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Connecting thin brown stem with a green leaf -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='190' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,190 Q255,195 260,190' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a tomato vine with ripe red tomatoes
description: Use a series of green curved lines to form the vine. Attach several small red circles with a few leaves around them to represent the tomatoes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Green vine formed by curved lines -->
  <path d='M100,250 C150,200 200,220 250,180 C300,140 350,160 400,120' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Small red tomatoes with leaves -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='240' r='6' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='6' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='170' r='6' fill='red'/>
  <path d='M150,240 L145,230' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,200 L245,190' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M350,170 L345,160' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a polaroid photo of a beach pinned to a corkboard
description: Draw a brown rectangle for the corkboard. Place a smaller white rectangle with a beach scene (blue water, yellow sand) inside it, pinned at one corner with a small circle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Brown corkboard -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <!-- Smaller white rectangle with beach scene inside -->
  <rect x='150' y='80' width='200' height='150' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Simple blue water and yellow sand in the white rectangle -->
  <rect x='160' y='120' width='180' height='60' fill='skyblue'/>
  <rect x='160' y='180' width='180' height='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Pin at one corner -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='80' r='5' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: a mother duck and ducklings crossing a path
description: Create a simple duck silhouette in yellow at the front. Follow it with smaller versions in a line, each spaced a short distance apart.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Simple duck silhouette in yellow at the front, followed by smaller duck silhouettes in a line -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q120,130 140,150 Q120,170 100,150 Z' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M160,150 Q175,140 190,150 Q175,160 160,150 Z' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,150 Q225,140 240,150 Q225,160 210,150 Z' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M260,150 Q275,140 290,150 Q275,160 260,150 Z' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a half-eaten slice of pizza with pepperoni
description: Draw a triangular wedge in orange-brown for the crust. Add red circular toppings for pepperoni, with a bite missing from the tip.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Triangular wedge for the pizza crust in orange-brown -->
  <polygon points='250,100 180,220 320,220' fill='#CD853F' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Red pepperoni toppings -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='160' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='160' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Bite missing from the tip (a white crescent shape) -->
  <path d='M320,220 A70,70 0 0,0 290,150 L320,150 Z' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a phoenix feather bursting into flame
description: Use a stylized feather shape with layered curves. Start with red at the tip, transitioning to orange and yellow near the base, adding small flame-like flicks.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stylized feather shape with layered curves -->
  <path d='M250,100 C245,120 250,140 255,160' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,100 C248,120 250,140 252,160' fill='none' stroke='orange' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M250,100 C246,120 250,140 254,160' fill='none' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Small flame-like flick at the tip -->
  <path d='M255,160 L260,155 L265,160 L260,165 Z' fill='orange' stroke='red' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a portrait silhouette with a question mark inside
description: Outline a head-and-shoulders profile in black. Within the head area, draw a large white question mark to symbolize thought or mystery.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Head-and-shoulders profile outline in black -->
  <path d='M200,120 Q250,60 300,120 Q280,140 220,140 Q200,130 200,120 Z' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Large white question mark inside the head -->
  <text x='250' y='100' font-size='48' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'>?</text>
</svg>

concept: a black cat curled up in a wicker basket
description: Use a circular shape with a textured brown outline for the basket. Place a black ellipse for the cat's body, with a small circular head snuggled in.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular basket with textured brown outline -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='40' fill='none' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Black cat silhouette inside: ellipse body with a small circular head -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='210' rx='20' ry='10' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a blueprint-style drawing of a house
description: Fill the background with a deep blue rectangle. Sketch the house using thin white lines, including basic geometry for walls, roof, and windows.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deep blue background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <!-- House sketched with thin white lines -->
  <polygon points='200,200 300,200 275,150 225,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='225' y1='150' x2='225' y2='200' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='275' y1='150' x2='275' y2='200' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='170' width='20' height='30' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a bright comet streaking across the night sky
description: Use a dark blue background dotted with small white stars. Add a glowing ball with a trailing tail in yellow or white, angled diagonally.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark blue background with white stars -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <circle cx='80' cy='50' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='150' cy='80' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='40' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='300' cy='60' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='400' cy='90' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='450' cy='70' r='2'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Glowing ball with trailing tail -->
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='10' fill='yellow'/>
  <path d='M350,150 L380,140 L400,145' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a wizard’s spell book on a wooden lectern
description: Draw a tall rectangular stand in brown for the lectern. On top, open a thick book shape, with arcane symbols lightly sketched on the pages.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall rectangular lectern stand in brown -->
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='60' height='100' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Thick open book with arcane symbols -->
  <rect x='200' y='80' width='100' height='70' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='250' y='120' font-size='16' fill='gray' text-anchor='middle'>ϞϞ</text>
</svg>

concept: a giraffe reaching for leaves on a tall tree
description: Draw a tall, spotted giraffe shape with its neck extended upward. Next to it, place a tree silhouette, making sure the leaves are just within reach.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall spotted giraffe shape -->
  <path d='M250,50 L260,200 Q250,210 240,200 Z' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Spots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='5' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='140' r='5' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='170' r='5' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Tree silhouette nearby -->
  <rect x='350' y='140' width='20' height='60' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <circle cx='360' cy='130' r='15' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a cluster of pastel balloons released into the sky
description: Use a pale blue background. Group multiple circle or oval balloons in pastel pink, yellow, and lavender, with thin lines trailing downward as strings.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pale blue background for balloons -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Group of balloons in pastel pink, yellow, and lavender with strings -->
  <g>
    <circle cx='150' cy='100' r='20' fill='pink'/>
    <line x1='150' y1='120' x2='150' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <g>
    <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='yellow'/>
    <line x1='250' y1='110' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <g>
    <circle cx='350' cy='100' r='20' fill='lavender'/>
    <line x1='350' y1='120' x2='350' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a steampunk top hat adorned with gears
description: Sketch a tall top hat in brown or black. Attach small gear shapes in bronze or gold along the band, some overlapping for effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall top hat in brown -->
  <rect x='230' y='80' width='40' height='60' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='210' y='140' width='80' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Gear shapes along the hat band -->
  <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='140' r='3' fill='gold'/>
</svg>

concept: a single rose petal falling onto a handwritten letter
description: Draw a rectangular page with cursive lines for text. Above it, show a lone red petal drifting down, partially overlapping the letter.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rectangular page with cursive lines -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M160,130 C180,120 220,140 240,130 S280,140 350,130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Lone red petal drifting down -->
  <path d='M250,90 Q245,80 240,90 Q245,100 250,90 Z' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: an hourglass overshadowed by a skull
description: Place the hourglass in the foreground, sand half-drained. Behind it, outline a faint skull shape in gray, partially intersecting the glass.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Hourglass with half-drained sand -->
  <rect x='230' y='100' width='40' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='230,120 250,160 270,120' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='160' width='40' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Faint skull shape in gray behind -->
  <path d='M240,130 Q250,110 260,130 Q255,140 250,140 Q245,140 240,130 Z' fill='gray' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

concept: a line of ants carrying crumbs
description: Use small black oval shapes for ants in a curving path. Each ant holds a tiny brown crumb shape, forming a trail across the canvas.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ant trail made of small black ovals -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='160' cy='145' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='170' cy='140' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='135' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Each ant holding a tiny brown crumb (simulated by a small rectangle) -->
  <rect x='180' y='135' width='4' height='4' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <path d='M150,150 Q165,147 180,135' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a lizard on a sunlit rock
description: Draw a large grayish polygon for the rock and position a small green or brown lizard silhouette on top, angled toward a bright corner to suggest sunlight.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large grayish rock polygon -->
  <polygon points='100,250 150,200 200,240 250,190 300,230 350,180 400,240 450,250 350,280 250,270 150,280' fill='gray' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Small lizard silhouette on top (simplified as a small polygon) -->
  <polygon points='300,220 310,215 320,220 310,225' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

concept: a spool of film unrolling across the floor
description: Use a circular reel shape with a center hole. Extend a long black strip with square notches on the edges to indicate film, laid out across the floor.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular film reel with center hole -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='8' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Long black film strip with square notches -->
  <rect x='100' y='250' width='300' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='120' y1='250' x2='120' y2='260' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='250' x2='180' y2='260' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='250' x2='240' y2='260' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='250' x2='300' y2='260' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='360' y1='250' x2='360' y2='260' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of swans forming a heart with their necks
description: Draw two white swan bodies facing each other, necks curved inward. At the top, their heads nearly touch, creating a heart shape in the negative space.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two white swan bodies facing each other -->
  <path d='M220,150 Q250,130 280,150 Q250,170 220,150 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M280,150 Q310,130 340,150 Q310,170 280,150 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Their heads nearly touch to form a heart in negative space -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: an electric guitar in neon colors
description: Sketch a classic guitar outline in black. Fill it with bright neon pink or green, adding thin lines for the strings and a bold shape for the headstock.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Classic guitar outline in black with neon details -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 Q290,180 250,170 Q210,180 200,150 Z' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Neon strings -->
  <line x1='240' y1='130' x2='260' y2='130' stroke='lime' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='140' x2='260' y2='140' stroke='lime' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Headstock accent -->
  <rect x='300' y='140' width='20' height='10' fill='hotpink'/>
</svg>

concept: a satellite dish aimed at a distant star
description: Use a large concave dish shape in gray. Point it upwards toward a small bright star shape in a dark sky background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large concave dish shape in gray -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q250,100 350,200 Q250,300 150,200 Z' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Small bright star in dark sky -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a line of footprints in fresh snow
description: Fill the background with a white rectangle. Draw pairs of slightly indented ovals in a winding line, gradually decreasing in size as they move away.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- White background with pairs of indented ovals in a winding line -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='190' rx='60' ry='25' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='40' ry='20' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a hot air balloon festival in the sky
description: Draw multiple balloon shapes in bright hues, each with a small rectangular basket beneath. Scatter them across a light blue background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Multiple balloon shapes in bright hues with small baskets on light blue background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>
  <g>
    <circle cx='150' cy='100' r='20' fill='magenta'/>
    <rect x='140' y='120' width='20' height='15' fill='brown'/>
    <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='150' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <g>
    <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='lime'/>
    <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='15' fill='brown'/>
    <line x1='250' y1='90' x2='250' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <g>
    <circle cx='350' cy='100' r='20' fill='cyan'/>
    <rect x='340' y='120' width='20' height='15' fill='brown'/>
    <line x1='350' y1='100' x2='350' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a futuristic holographic display floating above a table
description: Sketch a sleek table in gray. Above it, show semi-transparent rectangular panels in blues and purples, slightly angled as a hologram.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sleek gray table with semi-transparent hologram panels above -->
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='200' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='180' y='150' width='140' height='40' fill='blue' opacity='0.5'/>
  <rect x='180' y='110' width='140' height='30' fill='purple' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a spool of thread and a needle with thread passing through the eye
description: Draw a small cylindrical spool in brown with red or blue thread wrapped around. Place a needle shape next to it, with the same thread going through its eye.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small cylindrical spool in brown with thread and needle -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='20' ry='10' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,180 Q250,150 270,180' stroke='red' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='180' x2='290' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='170' r='2' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: an erupting volcano with flowing lava
description: Use a triangular mountain shape in dark brown or gray. At the top, draw orange and red streams spilling over the edges, with small smoke clouds above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Triangular mountain shape in dark brown/gray -->
  <polygon points='250,80 150,250 350,250' fill='sienna'/>
  <!-- Orange and red streams spilling over the top -->
  <path d='M250,80 Q240,100 230,130' stroke='orange' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,80 Q260,100 270,130' stroke='red' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Small smoke clouds above -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='60' r='5' fill='lightgray' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a mermaid silhouette against a coral reef backdrop
description: Draw a gradient ocean background. In the foreground, place coral shapes in pink and orange, and overlay a black mermaid silhouette with a flowing tail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gradient ocean background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='ocean266' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='deepskyblue'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='blue'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#ocean266)'/>
  <!-- Coral shapes in pink and orange -->
  <polygon points='150,250 160,220 170,250' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='350,250 360,220 370,250' fill='orange'/>
  <!-- Black mermaid silhouette with flowing tail (simplified) -->
  <path d='M250,200 Q240,180 230,200 Q240,220 250,210 Q260,220 270,200 Q260,180 250,200 Z' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of peacocks facing each other with fanned tails
description: Use two mirrored peacock bodies in blue-green, each with an elaborate tail of teardrop shapes in purple, green, and gold. Position them to face inward.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two mirrored peacock bodies in blue-green -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,50 300,150 Q290,170 250,160 Q210,170 200,150 Z' fill='#20B2AA' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M300,150 Q250,50 200,150 Q210,170 250,160 Q290,170 300,150 Z' fill='#20B2AA' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Elaborate tail: teardrop shapes in purple, green, and gold -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='8' fill='purple'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='180' r='8' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='180' r='8' fill='gold'/>
</svg>

concept: a teapot pouring tea into a teacup
description: Draw a curved teapot shape on the left, tilted. Below its spout, show a thin stream leading into a small teacup on the right.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Curved teapot shape on the left -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q200,170 250,200 L250,230 Q200,210 150,230 Z' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tilted teacup on the right -->
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='230' rx='20' ry='10' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Thin stream from teapot spout to teacup -->
  <path d='M250,200 Q300,210 340,230' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: three rings interlocked in a chain
description: Draw three overlapping circular loops, each in a different color (e.g., silver, gold, bronze), arranged so each passes through the next.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Three overlapping circular loops in different colors -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='150' r='30' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='150' r='30' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a wizard’s staff with a glowing orb at the tip
description: Use a tall, gnarled shape in dark brown for the staff. At the top, place a bright orb in pale blue or white, encased by small wooden prongs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall, gnarled staff in dark brown -->
  <rect x='245' y='100' width='10' height='150' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <!-- Bright orb at the top -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='15' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Small wooden prongs -->
  <line x1='250' y1='90' x2='240' y2='80' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='90' x2='260' y2='80' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a mosaic of hexagons in varying earth tones
description: Fill the space with tightly packed hexagon shapes in browns, greens, and tans. No two adjacent hexagons should be the exact same color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tightly packed hexagons in browns, greens, and tans -->
  <defs>
    <pattern id='hex271' width='50' height='50' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'>
      <polygon points='25,0 50,15 50,35 25,50 0,35 0,15' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#hex271)'/>
  <!-- Overlay a couple of hexagons in different colors -->
  <polygon points='100,100 125,85 150,100 150,120 125,135 100,120' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='200,150 225,135 250,150 250,170 225,185 200,170' fill='olive' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a set of decorative masks on a wall
description: Draw a neutral background. Hang several mask shapes (human faces, animals, abstract) in different vibrant colors and patterns, spaced evenly.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Neutral background in light gray -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightgray'/>
  <!-- Various mask shapes in vibrant colors -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='30' fill='magenta'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='20' fill='cyan'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Decorative orange rectangle at bottom -->
  <rect x='200' y='220' width='100' height='30' fill='orange' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

concept: a symmetrical butterfly made of mechanical gears
description: Use two mirrored wings, each composed of overlapping gear shapes in metallic tones. Position a narrow body in the center to connect them.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two mirrored wings composed of overlapping gear shapes -->
  <g transform='translate(100,100)'>
    <circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <circle cx='-30' cy='0' r='10' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(400,100) scale(-1,1)'>
    <circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <circle cx='-30' cy='0' r='10' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Narrow body connecting the wings -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='60' fill='dimgray'/>
</svg>

concept: a simple map marking a treasure route with footprints
description: Draw a parchment-like rectangle with a dotted line leading to an X. Place small footprint icons along the path, with a compass rose in one corner.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Parchment-like rectangle with dotted line -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='300' height='140' fill='papayawhip' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='150' x2='400' y2='150' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='4,2'/>
  <!-- Footprint icons -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='170' r='4' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='170' cy='170' r='2' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='170' r='4' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='370' cy='170' r='2' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Compass rose at one corner -->
  <polygon points='100,80 110,60 120,80 110,70' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a giant whale breaching under a golden sunset
description: Use a wide horizontal gradient in gold and orange for the sky. Show a large whale silhouette emerging from blue water, splashing white droplets around it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wide horizontal gradient sky in gold to orange -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad275' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='gold'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='orange'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='150' fill='url(#grad275)'/>
  <!-- Blue water -->
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Large whale silhouette emerging -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 Q280,160 250,160 Q220,160 200,150 Z' fill='black'/>
  <!-- White droplets -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='145' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a spool of lace ribbon trailing off
description: Draw a circular spool in beige. Extend a long, intricate ribbon in white or cream with small repeating floral designs along its length.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular spool in beige -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='40' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Long intricate ribbon in white -->
  <path d='M250,200 Q260,150 300,150 Q340,150 350,200' stroke='white' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Tiny floral designs -->
  <circle cx='270' cy='145' r='3' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='330' cy='145' r='3' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

concept: a bright carnival mask with feathers
description: Sketch a half-face mask shape in bold colors. Add tall feather shapes in red, blue, and yellow sprouting from one side.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Half-face mask shape in bold orange -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 Q250,200 200,150 Z' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tall feather shapes sprouting from left side -->
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='170' y2='100' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='170' y2='200' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

concept: a lifebuoy ring floating on ocean waves
description: Use curved blue lines at the bottom to represent waves. Place a circular ring with red-and-white segments bobbing on the surface.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Curved blue lines at bottom for waves -->
  <path d='M50,250 Q250,230 450,250' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Circular ring with red-and-white segments -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='230' r='20' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='230' r='15' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a small cabin nestled between tall pine trees
description: Draw a wooden cabin shape with a triangular roof in the center. Surround it with multiple tall, narrow triangles in green for pine trees.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wooden cabin shape with triangular roof -->
  <rect x='210' y='160' width='80' height='60' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='210,160 250,120 290,160' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Pine trees (tall narrow triangles) -->
  <polygon points='150,250 160,200 170,250' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <polygon points='330,250 340,200 350,250' fill='darkgreen'/>
</svg>

concept: a turquoise shirt with white polka dots
description: Draw a simple T-shirt outline in turquoise. Scatter small white circles evenly across the fabric to form polka dots.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- T-shirt outline in turquoise with polka dots -->
  <path d='M200,100 L300,100 L320,150 L300,200 L200,200 L180,150 Z' fill='turquoise' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='130' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='130' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a skyline silhouette with bright fireworks overhead
description: Use a black rectangular band at the bottom for the city skyline. Above it, place multiple burst shapes in vibrant colors (red, yellow, blue) to depict fireworks.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Black rectangular band for city skyline -->
  <rect x='0' y='240' width='500' height='60' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Fireworks bursts in vibrant colors -->
  <circle cx='100' cy='100' r='10' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='80' r='10' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='90' r='10' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='70' r='10' fill='magenta'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='90' r='10' fill='orange'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='80' r='10' fill='lime'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='100' r='10' fill='cyan'/>
</svg>

concept: a medieval castle on a rocky cliff
description: Draw tall gray towers connected by walls, positioned atop jagged rocky polygons. Include narrow windows and flags for a fortress-like feel.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall gray towers connected by walls on rocky polygons -->
  <polygon points='100,250 140,150 180,250' fill='gray'/>
  <polygon points='220,250 260,140 300,250' fill='dimgray'/>
  <polygon points='320,250 360,160 400,250' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Narrow windows -->
  <rect x='120' y='170' width='10' height='20' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='240' y='160' width='10' height='20' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='340' y='170' width='10' height='20' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Flags -->
  <polygon points='180,150 185,130 190,150' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='300,140 305,120 310,140' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: a snail shell pattern in spiral stripes
description: Use a large spiral path. Alternate dark and light brown or green stripes along the curve to mimic a snail shell.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large spiral path with alternating stripes -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad283' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='darkbrown'/>
      <stop offset='50%' stop-color='sienna'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='lightgreen'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d='M250,150 m-70,0 a70,70 0 1,1 140,0 a70,70 0 1,1 -140,0' fill='url(#grad283)'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a stick figure with one arm raised, holding a thin line as the baton. Add slight motion lines around the baton’s ends.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stick figure with raised arm holding a baton -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='90' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='110' x2='230' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Baton with motion lines -->
  <line x1='230' y1='190' x2='220' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='200' x2='210' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a single dandelion seed blowing in the wind
description: Draw a small oval seed attached to thin, radiating lines in white. Let those lines taper outward, with a few short motion lines indicating a breeze.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small oval seed with radiating white lines -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='5' ry='8' fill='green'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='240' y2='140' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='260' y2='140' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='240' y2='160' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='260' y2='160' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: an abstract design of squares overlapping in neon hues
description: Place multiple translucent squares in bright colors like magenta, lime, and cyan. Overlap them at various angles on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Multiple translucent squares in bright colors on dark background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='80' height='80' fill='magenta' opacity='0.5'/>
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='80' height='80' fill='lime' opacity='0.5'/>
  <rect x='300' y='100' width='80' height='80' fill='cyan' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a bobsled racing down an icy track
description: Form a narrow, elongated oval for the sled in a bold color (red or blue). Draw two parallel curving lines beneath it in white or light gray to represent the icy path.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Narrow, elongated oval for the sled in bold red -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='80' ry='20' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Two parallel curving lines beneath representing icy path -->
  <path d='M170,260 Q250,280 330,260' stroke='white' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a toy robot holding a colorful balloon
description: Use a boxy gray torso with small rectangular limbs and a square head. Extend a thin line from its hand up to a bright balloon shape.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Boxy gray torso with rectangular limbs and square head -->
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='40' height='60' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='230' y='60' width='40' height='40' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='220' y='180' width='15' height='30' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='265' y='180' width='15' height='30' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Thin line from hand to balloon -->
  <line x1='230' y1='140' x2='200' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='80' r='15' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a desert scene with cacti and a blazing sun
description: Fill the background with warm orange. Place tall green cacti silhouettes and a large yellow circle at the top representing the hot sun.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Warm orange background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='orange'/>
  <!-- Tall green cacti silhouettes -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='20' height='100' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <rect x='400' y='150' width='20' height='100' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <!-- Large yellow sun at the top -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='30' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a picnic basket overflowing with fruits
description: Draw a woven rectangular shape for the basket. Fill it with simple circular and oval shapes in various bright colors for apples, oranges, and grapes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Woven rectangular basket -->
  <rect x='180' y='180' width='140' height='80' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Overlapping fruits represented as circles/ovals -->
  <circle cx='210' cy='210' r='10' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='210' r='10' fill='orange'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='210' r='10' fill='purple'/>
</svg>

concept: a pirate’s parrot on a wooden shoulder perch
description: Sketch a small wooden bar near the top. Attach a bright green and red parrot silhouette on it, angled slightly to mimic perched stance.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small wooden bar near the top -->
  <rect x='180' y='50' width='140' height='20' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bright green and red parrot silhouette on the bar (simplified) -->
  <polygon points='250,30 240,50 260,50' fill='limegreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='245,30 235,50 255,50' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of compasses: one for drawing circles, another for navigation
description: Place a drafting compass, shaped like two hinged legs with a point and pencil tip, alongside a circular navigation compass with directional markings.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Drafting compass with hinged legs and pencil tip -->
  <line x1='220' y1='150' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='280' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Circular navigation compass with markings -->
  <circle cx='350' cy='200' r='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='170' x2='350' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='320' y1='200' x2='380' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a hamster running inside a wheel
description: Draw a circular outline for the wheel’s outer rim, adding straight lines from the center to create spokes. Place a small round hamster shape running inside.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular outline for wheel's outer rim -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Spokes -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Small hamster inside (simplified as a small circle) -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='8' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

concept: a mosaic tile pattern in shades of blue and green
description: Cover the surface with small square or polygon tiles. Randomly assign each tile a hue from turquoise to navy, ensuring a cohesive gradient.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Surface with small tiles using gradient from turquoise to navy -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad294' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='turquoise'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='navy'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#grad294)'/>
  <!-- Overlaid small white tiles -->
  <g fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'>
    <rect x='100' y='100' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='160' y='100' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='220' y='100' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='280' y='100' width='50' height='50'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Form a large heart outline with interwoven vines. Place red rose shapes spaced evenly along the outline, each with green leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large heart outline with interwoven vines -->
  <path d='M250,130 C230,100 200,100 180,130 C160,160 250,220 250,220 C250,220 340,160 320,130 C300,100 270,100 250,130 Z' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Red rose shapes with green leaves -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='110' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='110' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='110' x2='215' y2='105' stroke='green' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='110' x2='285' y2='105' stroke='green' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a mountain bike leaning against a trail sign
description: Use two overlapping circles for the bike wheels, a simple triangular frame, and handlebars. Next to it, draw a tall post with a small rectangular sign.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bike: two overlapping circles for wheels, triangular frame, and handlebars -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='220' r='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='220' r='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polygon points='200,220 250,180 300,220' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Tall post with a small rectangular sign -->
  <rect x='320' y='150' width='10' height='70' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='315' y='140' width='20' height='10' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a simple star chart with constellations connected by lines
description: On a dark blue background, place small white circles for stars. Draw thin lines linking certain stars to form constellations.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark blue background with stars -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <circle cx='80' cy='50' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='120' cy='80' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='200' cy='40' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='300' cy='60' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='400' cy='90' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='450' cy='70' r='2'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Constellation: thin lines linking stars -->
  <line x1='80' y1='50' x2='120' y2='80' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='120' y1='80' x2='200' y2='40' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='40' x2='300' y2='60' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='60' x2='400' y2='90' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='400' y1='90' x2='450' y2='70' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirl of autumn leaves in the wind
description: Use curved lines to suggest a breeze. Scatter leaf shapes in red, orange, and yellow along the swirl path, varying sizes and angles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Curved lines to suggest a breeze -->
  <path d='M100,150 C150,100 200,100 250,150' stroke='orange' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C300,200 350,200 400,150' stroke='orange' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Scattered leaf shapes in red, orange, yellow -->
  <polygon points='120,140 130,130 140,140 130,145' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='280,160 290,150 300,160 290,165' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='350,140 360,130 370,140 360,145' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a honeycomb with golden hexagonal cells
description: Arrange a series of tightly packed hexagons in a warm golden color. Slightly offset rows to mimic a honeycomb pattern, with some shining highlights.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tightly packed hexagons in warm golden color -->
  <defs>
    <pattern id='hex299' width='50' height='50' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'>
      <polygon points='25,0 50,15 50,35 25,50 0,35 0,15' fill='goldenrod' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#hex299)'/>
  <!-- Some hexagons with shining highlights -->
  <polygon points='100,100 125,85 150,100 150,120 125,135 100,120' fill='goldenrod' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='200,150 225,135 250,150 250,170 225,185 200,170' fill='goldenrod' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a stack of suitcases in vintage style
description: Draw two or three rectangular luggage shapes, each with rounded corners and buckles. Stack them with slight offsets, using muted browns and greens.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two or three rectangular luggage shapes with rounded corners -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='100' height='80' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='270' y='130' width='100' height='80' fill='seagreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='190' y='220' width='100' height='60' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
</svg>

concept: a galloping horse silhouette across an open field
description: Use a dark horse shape with legs extended in a running motion. Place a wide green rectangle at the bottom for the field, and a lighter sky above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Lighter sky and green field -->
