  <rect width='500' height='150' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Dark horse silhouette (simplified) -->
  <path d='M100,200 L150,150 L200,180 L250,140 L300,180 L350,130 L400,160 L450,150 L450,200 Z' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a half moon with a sleeping face
description: Sketch a crescent moon in pale yellow. Add a closed eye and small mouth near the inner curve to suggest a peaceful sleeping expression.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Crescent moon in pale yellow -->
  <path d='M250,100 A50,50 0 1,1 240,50 A40,40 0 1,0 250,100 Z' fill='palegoldenrod'/>
  <!-- Closed eye and small mouth near inner curve -->
  <line x1='245' y1='80' x2='255' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='245' y1='90' x2='255' y2='90' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a row of colorful windmills turning in a breeze
description: Draw multiple pinwheel shapes in red, blue, and yellow. Each is attached to a thin stick, spaced evenly to form a line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Several pinwheels attached to thin sticks -->
  <g transform='translate(100,150)'>
    <line x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <polygon points='0,0 10,-10 10,10' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(200,150)'>
    <line x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <polygon points='0,0 10,-10 10,10' fill='blue'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(300,150)'>
    <line x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <polygon points='0,0 10,-10 10,10' fill='yellow'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(400,150)'>
    <line x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <polygon points='0,0 10,-10 10,10' fill='red'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: an open laptop displaying a pie chart
description: Use a rectangle with a hinged screen shape. On the screen, draw a circular pie chart in bright slices, each separated by thin lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Phone-like rectangle with hinged screen -->
  <rect x='150' y='80' width='200' height='140' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='80' x2='350' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Circular pie chart on screen -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L290,150 A40,40 0 0,1 250,190 Z' fill='red'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,190 A40,40 0 0,1 210,150 Z' fill='blue'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L210,150 A40,40 0 0,1 250,110 Z' fill='yellow'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,110 A40,40 0 0,1 290,150 Z' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a futuristic motorcycle with glowing wheel rims
description: Form a sleek bike silhouette with minimal lines. Outline the wheels in neon cyan or bright green, leaving the body in dark gray or black.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bike wheels in neon cyan -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='220' r='30' fill='none' stroke='#00FFFF' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='220' r='30' fill='none' stroke='#00FFFF' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Minimal bike frame in dark gray -->
  <line x1='200' y1='220' x2='250' y2='180' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='300' y2='220' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='200' y2='220' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: an old lantern hanging from a shepherd’s hook
description: Draw a tall metal hook with a curved top. Suspend a classic lantern shape from the tip, with a small yellow glow inside.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall metal hook with curved top -->
  <path d='M350,50 Q360,30 370,50 L370,150' stroke='gray' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Classic lantern suspended from hook tip -->
  <rect x='360' y='150' width='20' height='30' fill='black' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='370' cy='160' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a single puzzle piece with interlocking edges
description: Create a roughly square shape with protruding and indented tabs along each side, colored in a bright hue. Keep the background simple.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rough square with tabs -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='140' fill='hotpink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='40' height='20' fill='hotpink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='320' y='150' width='20' height='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='240' width='40' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='160' y='150' width='20' height='40' fill='hotpink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a walkway lined with lanterns at dusk
description: Place multiple lantern outlines along a winding path. Use a gradient sky from pink to purple at the top, and define the walkway with a darker strip.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gradient sky from pink to purple -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad308' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='pink'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='purple'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='150' fill='url(#grad308)'/>
  <!-- Dark walkway strip -->
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='30' fill='dimgray'/>
  <!-- Lantern outlines along a winding path -->
  <g stroke='black' fill='none' stroke-width='2'>
    <ellipse cx='100' cy='180' rx='10' ry='20'/>
    <ellipse cx='200' cy='170' rx='10' ry='20'/>
    <ellipse cx='300' cy='180' rx='10' ry='20'/>
    <ellipse cx='400' cy='175' rx='10' ry='20'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a fruit basket with bananas, apples, and grapes
description: Draw a round woven basket. Add a curved yellow shape for bananas, several red circles for apples, and a small cluster of purple circles for grapes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Round woven basket -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='60' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Curved yellow banana shape -->
  <path d='M220,180 Q250,160 280,180 Q250,200 220,180 Z' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Red apple circles -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='210' r='8' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='210' r='8' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Cluster of purple grapes -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='230' r='5' fill='purple'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='235' r='5' fill='purple'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='235' r='5' fill='purple'/>
</svg>

concept: a canary singing on a windowsill
description: Depict a window frame with a small horizontal sill at the bottom. Place a bright yellow bird shape, beak open, on the sill’s edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Window frame -->
  <rect x='150' y='80' width='200' height='150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Horizontal sill -->
  <rect x='150' y='220' width='200' height='10' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <!-- Bright yellow bird on sill -->
  <polygon points='240,215 260,215 250,200' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a spiral staircase viewed from above
description: Use a circular center point. Radiate rectangular steps outward in a spiral, decreasing in size as they move inwards to suggest depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular center point -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Spiral rectangular steps -->
  <g transform='translate(250,150)'>
    <rect x='0' y='-40' width='40' height='10' fill='gray'/>
    <rect x='0' y='-30' width='30' height='10' fill='gray' transform='rotate(45)'/>
    <rect x='0' y='-20' width='20' height='10' fill='gray' transform='rotate(90)'/>
    <rect x='0' y='-10' width='10' height='10' fill='gray' transform='rotate(135)'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a persian rug with intricate diamond motifs
description: Draw a rectangular shape in a deep red base. Fill the interior with repeated diamond patterns in gold and navy, plus ornate borders around the edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deep red rectangle with ornate border -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='300' height='140' fill='darkred' stroke='gold' stroke-width='4'/>
  <defs>
    <pattern id='diamond312' width='40' height='40' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'>
      <polygon points='20,0 40,20 20,40 0,20' fill='navy' stroke='gold' stroke-width='1'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect x='110' y='90' width='280' height='120' fill='url(#diamond312)'/>
</svg>

concept: a cluster of mushrooms of varying heights
description: Place several tall stalks with cap shapes on top. Use earthy tones like brown and beige, and ensure different sizes for variety.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall stalks with caps -->
  <line x1='150' y1='200' x2='150' y2='100' stroke='brown' stroke-width='5'/>
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='90' rx='10' ry='5' fill='beige'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='200' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='7'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='110' rx='12' ry='6' fill='burlywood'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='200' x2='350' y2='80' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='70' rx='8' ry='4' fill='tan'/>
</svg>

concept: a giraffe pattern abstracted into overlapping patches
description: Cover the area with irregular polygons in browns and yellows. Slightly vary their sizes to emulate giraffe spots in an abstract arrangement.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Irregular polygons emulating giraffe spots -->
  <polygon points='100,100 120,90 130,110 110,120' fill='sienna'/>
  <polygon points='200,150 220,140 230,160 210,170' fill='goldenrod'/>
  <polygon points='300,100 320,90 330,110 310,120' fill='peru'/>
  <polygon points='400,150 420,140 430,160 410,170' fill='saddlebrown'/>
</svg>

concept: a diver exploring a coral reef with fish
description: Draw a silhouette of a person in diving gear. Surround them with coral shapes in pink, orange, and purple, plus small fish silhouettes in the water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Diving figure silhouette -->
  <path d='M250,150 L260,200 L240,200 Z' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='8' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Coral shapes -->
  <polygon points='100,250 110,220 120,250' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='130,250 140,215 150,250' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='160,250 170,225 180,250' fill='purple'/>
  <!-- Small fish silhouettes -->
  <path d='M300,260 Q310,255 320,260 Q310,265 300,260 Z' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M350,260 Q360,255 370,260 Q360,265 350,260 Z' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a library bookshelf with a rolling ladder
description: Form tall wooden shelves filled with rectangular book spines. Add a narrow ladder leaning on a rail near the top, angled slightly.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wooden shelves -->
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='250' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Open books -->
  <polygon points='100,100 130,80 160,100 130,120' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='130' y1='80' x2='130' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Sparkles -->
  <circle cx='130' cy='70' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a starfruit sliced open to reveal the star shape
description: Use a golden-green oval shape with ridges. Draw a cross-section slice in front, forming a neat star pattern inside.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Golden-green oval with ridges -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='40' fill='#ADFF2F' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Cross-section slice with star pattern -->
  <polygon points='250,150 270,140 290,150 270,160' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 230,140 210,150 230,160' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a cat chasing a ball of yarn
description: Use a cat silhouette in mid-pounce. Place a small circle with trailing lines to show unraveled yarn rolling away.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cat silhouette in mid-pounce -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q220,130 240,150 Q230,170 210,160 Z' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Unraveled yarn -->
  <circle cx='300' cy='200' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <path d='M300,200 L320,210 L310,220' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a fire hydrant next to a small dog with raised ears
description: Draw a cylindrical hydrant with side caps. Beside it, form a small dog shape in brown, ears perked up, looking at the hydrant.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cylindrical hydrant with side caps -->
  <rect x='350' y='120' width='40' height='100' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='5' ry='5'/>
  <rect x='345' y='120' width='10' height='20' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='395' y='120' width='10' height='20' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Small dog silhouette -->
  <path d='M300,200 Q310,180 320,200 Q310,220 300,200 Z' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='315,180 320,170 325,180' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a wedding cake with three tiers and floral decorations
description: Stack three circular layers in white, each smaller than the one below. Add simple pink or yellow flower shapes around each tier.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Three circular layers in white -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='60' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Flower shapes around tiers -->
  <circle cx='190' cy='200' r='5' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='200' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='5' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='260' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a record player spinning a vinyl album
description: Draw a rectangular turntable with a circular disc in black at the center. Include a thin tonearm on one side, gently resting on the record.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rectangular turntable base -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Circular disc -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='50' fill='black' stroke='silver' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tonearm -->
  <line x1='250' y1='160' x2='300' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a stylized lotus pattern repeated in rows
description: Place multiple lotus shapes in symmetrical rows, each with layered petals. Use pastel shades of pink and purple on a light background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Light background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lavenderblush'/>
  <!-- Lotus shapes in symmetrical rows -->
  <g transform='translate(150,150)'>
    <ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='30' ry='10' fill='pink'/>
    <ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='20' ry='5' fill='purple' transform='rotate(45)'/>
    <ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='20' ry='5' fill='pink' transform='rotate(90)'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='translate(350,150)'>
    <ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='30' ry='10' fill='pink'/>
    <ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='20' ry='5' fill='purple' transform='rotate(45)'/>
    <ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='20' ry='5' fill='pink' transform='rotate(90)'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: an astronaut planting a flag on a planet’s surface
description: Sketch a spacesuit figure in white. They’re pressing a small rectangular flagpole into a gray, cratered ground with a sparse background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cratered gray ground -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightgray'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='50' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Spacesuit figure in white -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='140' width='20' height='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Flagpole -->
  <rect x='260' y='100' width='3' height='40' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='263' y='100' width='20' height='10' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirling vortex of rainbow lines
description: Use concentric arcs in each color of the rainbow. Twist them into a funnel shape, converging at a point in the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Concentric arcs in rainbow colors -->
  <path d='M250,150 A50,50 0 0,1 300,150' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A40,40 0 0,1 290,150' fill='none' stroke='orange' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A30,30 0 0,1 280,150' fill='none' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A20,20 0 0,1 270,150' fill='none' stroke='green' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A10,10 0 0,1 260,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='5'/>
  <!-- Funnel twist effect -->
  <path d='M250,150 L260,200 L250,250 L240,200 Z' fill='purple' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a chef’s hat and a whisk crossed like swords
description: Draw a tall white chef’s hat shape. Behind it, place two thin whisk outlines in a crisscross arrangement.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall white chef's hat -->
  <path d='M220,100 Q250,20 280,100 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Whisk outlines -->
  <line x1='240' y1='100' x2='240' y2='130' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='100' x2='260' y2='130' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='130' x2='260' y2='100' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a smartphone with an incoming call icon
description: Outline a phone rectangle. On its screen, show a small phone receiver symbol with green curved lines indicating ringing.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Phone rectangle -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Receiver symbol on screen -->
  <path d='M220,150 Q250,130 280,150' stroke='green' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M280,150 Q250,170 220,150' stroke='green' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: an elephant balancing on a circus ball
description: Use a large gray ellipse for the elephant’s body, with a trunk and ears. Place it carefully perched on a brightly colored spherical ball.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Elephant body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='80' ry='50' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Trunk -->
  <path d='M250,180 Q240,220 260,240' stroke='black' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <ellipse cx='180' cy='180' rx='20' ry='30' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='320' cy='180' rx='20' ry='30' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Brightly colored spherical ball -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='30' fill='magenta' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a street musician playing saxophone near an open case
description: Draw a figure in a casual stance holding a saxophone. At their feet, place a small rectangular case, opened, with coins inside.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Figure holding a saxophone (simplified stick figure) -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='115' x2='250' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='130' x2='280' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Saxophone -->
  <path d='M280,150 Q300,160 290,170' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Open case with coins -->
  <rect x='220' y='180' width='60' height='20' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='190' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='190' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='190' r='3' fill='gold'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirl of paint merging from two brushstrokes
description: Have two separate brush shapes, each with a different color at its tip. Where they meet, blend the colors in a swirling path.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two brush shapes -->
  <path d='M150,200 L250,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='200' r='8' fill='blue'/>
  <path d='M350,200 L250,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='200' r='8' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Swirling blend -->
  <path d='M250,150 C260,160 240,170 250,180' stroke='purple' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: an open treasure chest with an octopus tentacle emerging
description: Show a wooden chest shape, lid raised. From inside, draw a curling tentacle with suction cups, hinting at a hidden sea creature.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wooden chest with raised lid -->
  <rect x='180' y='150' width='140' height='80' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polygon points='180,150 320,150 300,130 160,130' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Curling tentacle -->
  <path d='M250,150 C260,160 270,170 260,180' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='265' cy='165' r='3' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='175' r='3' fill='darkgreen'/>
</svg>

concept: a reindeer with a bell collar in a snowy field
description: Form a brown reindeer silhouette with antlers. Around its neck, add a small collar of golden bells, and use a white rectangle at the bottom for snow.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Brown reindeer silhouette -->
  <path d='M250,100 L270,150 L260,180 L240,180 L230,150 Z' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Antlers -->
  <line x1='245' y1='100' x2='230' y2='70' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='255' y1='100' x2='270' y2='70' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Collar with golden bells -->
  <rect x='240' y='140' width='20' height='5' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='142' r='2' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='142' r='2' fill='gold'/>
  <!-- White snow rectangle -->
  <rect x='220' y='180' width='60' height='20' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a ring of mushrooms known as a fairy circle
description: Arrange mushrooms of similar size in a circular layout. Leave a clear space in the center, hinting at the folklore of a fairy ring.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular layout of mushrooms -->
  <g>
    <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='20' fill='saddlebrown'/>
    <ellipse cx='200' cy='140' rx='15' ry='8' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='rotate(45 250 150)'>
    <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='20' fill='saddlebrown'/>
    <ellipse cx='200' cy='140' rx='15' ry='8' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='rotate(90 250 150)'>
    <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='20' fill='saddlebrown'/>
    <ellipse cx='200' cy='140' rx='15' ry='8' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <g transform='rotate(135 250 150)'>
    <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='20' fill='saddlebrown'/>
    <ellipse cx='200' cy='140' rx='15' ry='8' fill='red'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Clear center -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-dasharray='4,2'/>
</svg>

concept: a figure skater performing a spin on ice
description: Draw a light blue rectangle for the rink. In the center, place a slender figure silhouette, arms extended, with leg slightly raised in a spinning pose.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Light blue rink background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Slender figure silhouette (stick figure) -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='110' x2='250' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='130' x2='230' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='130' x2='270' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='230' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='270' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a school building with a flag on top
description: Use a rectangular shape with a triangular roof. Add a small flag pole at the peak of the roof, and a simple entrance door in front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- House with triangular roof -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='80' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='200,150 250,100 300,150' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Flag pole -->
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='245,80 255,80 250,70' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Entrance door -->
  <rect x='235' y='190' width='30' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a goat’s skull with curved horns
description: Draw a skull outline in off-white with elongated curved horns in dark gray. Keep it centered on a plain background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M250,120 C230,90 270,90 250,120 C240,130 240,160 250,170 C260,160 260,130 250,120 Z' fill='#F8F8F8' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M230,90 Q220,70 210,90' fill='none' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M270,90 Q280,70 290,90' fill='none' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a fishing net scooping up tiny silver fish
description: Use a diamond-grid pattern for the net, partially submerged in blue water. Inside it, draw several small fish silhouettes with shiny accents.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Blue water background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Diamond grid net -->
  <defs>
    <pattern id='diamond336' width='30' height='30' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'>
      <polygon points='15,0 30,15 15,30 0,15' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='300' height='100' fill='url(#diamond336)' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Small fish silhouettes -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q160,140 170,150 Q160,160 150,150 Z' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M230,150 Q240,140 250,150 Q240,160 230,150 Z' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: an ancient scroll with torn edges
description: Sketch a rectangular parchment in yellowish-brown. Make the edges ragged or rolled, and add faint lines of text in the middle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='300' height='140' fill='papayawhip' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M100,80 L95,85 L100,90' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M400,80 L405,85 L400,90' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <line x1='120' y1='120' x2='380' y2='120' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.5'/>
  <line x1='120' y1='140' x2='380' y2='140' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.5'/>
  <line x1='120' y1='160' x2='380' y2='160' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a red fox running through tall grass
description: Use a low red-brown shape for the fox with a bushy tail. Draw thin green rectangles or lines behind it for grass, giving a sense of motion.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M200,200 Q220,180 240,200 Q230,210 210,210 Z' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,200 Q260,190 280,210' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='250' x2='185' y2='230' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='250' x2='225' y2='230' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='250' x2='265' y2='230' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a stylized fractal tree branching out
description: Start with a thick trunk, then split into smaller branches. Repeat the branching pattern as smaller segments in a symmetrical arrangement.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <line x1='250' y1='300' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='10'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='200' x2='220' y2='170' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='5'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='200' x2='280' y2='170' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='5'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='170' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='170' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a disco dancer silhouette under a mirror ball
description: Draw a black figure pointing upward in a classic disco pose. Above, place a circle with a grid pattern in silver to represent the disco ball.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='250' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='230' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='270' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='230' x2='230' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='230' x2='270' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='30' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='80' x2='280' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a silhouette of a child with a kite shaped like a butterfly
description: Use a small figure holding a thin line. At the end of the line, place a kite resembling butterfly wings in bright colors.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='100' cy='200' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='210' x2='150' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='150,170 160,150 170,170 160,160' fill='magenta' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a cello leaning against a tall stool
description: Form the cello outline as a curvy body with F-holes. Next to it, draw a simple wooden stool shape, with the cello angled slightly.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M200,100 C220,50 280,50 300,100 C310,150 290,200 250,200 C210,200 190,150 200,100 Z' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='130' x2='240' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='130' x2='260' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='320' y='180' width='40' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a coral reef pattern viewed from above
description: Fill the space with branching coral-like shapes in pink, orange, and purple. Let them overlap slightly, forming an abstract top-down reef pattern.

concept: a diamond pattern repeated in tessellation
description: Cover the canvas with evenly spaced diamond shapes, each in a different shade of the same color family. Align them so their edges match precisely.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <pattern id='diamond344' width='50' height='50' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'>
      <polygon points='25,0 50,25 25,50 0,25' fill='#ADD8E6' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#diamond344)'/>
</svg>

concept: a candelabra with multiple lit candles
description: Draw a central stem with branching arms in gold. On each arm, place a small candle shape with a yellow flame.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <line x1='250' y1='250' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='gold' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='220' y2='130' stroke='gold' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='280' y2='130' stroke='gold' stroke-width='4'/>
  <rect x='215' y='120' width='10' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='115' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='275' y='120' width='10' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='115' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a line of ornamental shields in medieval style
description: Sketch multiple shield outlines in a row, each decorated with different simple patterns or crests (stripes, crosses, animals).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='50' y='100' width='50' height='70' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='135' x2='100' y2='135' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='120' y='100' width='50' height='70' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='145' y1='100' x2='145' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='190' y='100' width='50' height='70' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='215' cy='135' r='10' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a rowboat on a still lake at sunrise
description: Use a wide rectangle in gradient blues for the water. Place a small wooden boat silhouette at center, with a warm orange circle near the horizon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad347' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='deepskyblue'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='blue'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#grad347)'/>
  <polygon points='230,220 270,220 260,240 240,240' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='20' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

concept: a tangram puzzle arranged into a bird shape
description: Use seven polygons (triangles, square, parallelogram) combined to form a stylized bird silhouette. Each polygon can have a different bright color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='250,100 230,140 270,140' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,100 240,130 260,130' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='230,140 220,160 240,160' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='270,140 280,160 260,160' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='240,160 260,160 250,180' fill='purple' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a comic-style explosion bubble with the word “Boom!”
description: Draw an irregular starburst shape in bright yellow or orange. Inside, place bold text reading “Boom!” in uppercase.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M250,150 L260,100 L270,150 L320,160 L270,170 L260,220 L250,170 L200,160 Z' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <text x='250' y='160' font-size='20' fill='black' text-anchor='middle' font-weight='bold'>BOOM!</text>
</svg>

concept: a stylized silhouette of a hawk with spread wings
description: Use a strong black or dark brown shape for the body and outstretched wings. Keep the head and beak outlines sharp and distinct.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M200,150 L250,100 L300,150 L250,200 Z' fill='black' stroke='darkbrown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polygon points='200,150 190,140 200,130' fill='black' stroke='darkbrown' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a keyboard piano with highlighted black and white keys
description: Draw a horizontal rectangle for the casing. Inside, alternate narrow white rectangles with shorter black ones raised above them.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='150' y='130' width='200' height='40' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='160' y='135' width='20' height='30' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='190' y='130' width='20' height='35' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='220' y='135' width='20' height='30' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='250' y='130' width='20' height='35' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='280' y='135' width='20' height='30' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a passenger train passing over a small bridge
description: Sketch a low arched bridge with a thin river beneath. Above, use multiple connected rectangular cars and a front locomotive silhouette.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,100 400,150' fill='none' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='300' height='20' fill='blue' opacity='0.5'/>
  <rect x='120' y='70' width='50' height='30' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='70' width='50' height='30' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='70' width='50' height='30' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='300,70 320,50 340,70' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a neon open sign in a shop window
description: Form a rectangular window frame. Within it, draw the word “OPEN” in brightly glowing letters, each a contrasting color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <text x='250' y='180' font-size='48' fill='lime' text-anchor='middle' font-weight='bold'>OPEN</text>
</svg>

concept: an umbrella hat on a cartoonish character
description: Draw a small figure with an umbrella contraption attached to the head. Use arc segments in red, blue, and yellow forming the miniature canopy.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='160' x2='250' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,140 A10,10 0 0,1 260,140' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,140 A10,10 0 0,1 260,140' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(30 250 140)'/>
  <path d='M240,140 A10,10 0 0,1 260,140' fill='none' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(-30 250 140)'/>
</svg>

concept: a pomegranate split open showing seeds
description: Draw a round shape in deep red. Cut it in half to reveal dense clusters of red seeds, each as a small circle or ellipse.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='darkred' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <rect x='250' y='100' width='50' height='100' fill='white'/>
  <g fill='red'>
    <circle cx='230' cy='130' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='170' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='260' cy='160' r='3'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a policeman directing traffic at an intersection
description: Use an intersection of two perpendicular lines for roads. A stick-figure officer stands in the center, arms out, with a small badge shape on the chest.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <line x1='0' y1='150' x2='500' y2='150' stroke='gray' stroke-width='10'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='0' x2='250' y2='300' stroke='gray' stroke-width='10'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='230' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='270' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='3' fill='gold'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of house slippers shaped like rabbits
description: Sketch two slipper silhouettes side by side. On the fronts, add small rabbit ears and a simple face with round eyes and a nose.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M150,200 L180,200 L190,240 L160,240 Z' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='155' y='180' width='5' height='15' fill='pink'/>
  <rect x='165' y='180' width='5' height='15' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='165' cy='210' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='175' cy='210' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='170' cy='215' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M250,200 L280,200 L270,230 L250,230 Z' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='255' y='180' width='5' height='15' fill='pink'/>
  <rect x='265' y='180' width='5' height='15' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='265' cy='210' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='275' cy='210' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='215' r='2' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a neon sign shaped like a flamingo
description: Draw a single-line flamingo outline, with a glowing pink effect. Attach a small rectangular base at the bottom to complete the neon look.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M250,100 Q260,140 270,200' fill='none' stroke='pink' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M250,100 Q240,140 230,200' fill='none' stroke='pink' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M250,100 Q260,140 270,200' fill='none' stroke='pink' stroke-width='6' opacity='0.3'/>
  <rect x='245' y='200' width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a polar bear mother and cub walking across ice floes
description: Use white bear silhouettes of different sizes on separated ice polygons in pale blue. Align them so the cub follows the mother.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='100,250 150,220 200,250 150,270' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='300,250 350,220 400,250 350,270' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='130' cy='240' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='370' cy='240' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='260' r='10' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: an ivy vine creeping up a brick wall
description: Place a grid of red-brown rectangles for bricks. Over it, overlay a winding green vine with small leaf shapes at intervals.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <pattern id='bricks360' width='50' height='30' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'>
      <rect width='50' height='30' fill='#8B4513'/>
      <line x1='0' y1='0' x2='50' y2='0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
      <line x1='0' y1='15' x2='50' y2='15' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
      <line x1='0' y1='30' x2='50' y2='30' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
      <line x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='30' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
      <line x1='50' y1='0' x2='50' y2='30' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#bricks360)'/>
  <path d='M50,250 C150,200 350,200 450,250' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <polygon points='100,240 110,230 120,240 110,235' fill='green'/>
  <polygon points='280,160 290,150 300,160 290,165' fill='green'/>
  <polygon points='350,140 360,130 370,140 360,145' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a coffee bean plant with ripe red cherries
description: Draw a few slender branches with elliptical green leaves. Place clusters of small round red fruits along each branch to represent coffee cherries.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <line x1='100' y1='200' x2='150' y2='180' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='220' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <ellipse cx='130' cy='190' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='170' cy='185' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='210' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='260' cy='205' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='140' cy='185' r='3' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='160' cy='180' r='3' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='215' r='3' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='210' r='3' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: a day and night scene split diagonally
description: Divide the canvas from top-left to bottom-right. One half is a sunny sky with a yellow sun, the other is a dark sky with a white moon and stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='250' height='300' fill='skyblue'/>
  <circle cx='125' cy='75' r='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='250' y='0' width='250' height='300' fill='midnightblue'/>
  <circle cx='375' cy='75' r='30' fill='white'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='350' cy='200' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='400' cy='100' r='2'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a wizard’s library with floating books
description: Sketch tall shelves of books in background. Show a few open books in midair with wavy lines or sparkles, as if levitating by magic.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='250' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='100,100 130,80 160,100 130,120' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='130' y1='80' x2='130' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='130' cy='70' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a black cat silhouette walking across a piano keyboard
description: Use a row of white rectangles with smaller black rectangles for keys. Place a sleek black cat shape stepping along the top of the keys.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Row of keys: white rectangles with small black details -->
  <rect x='50' y='200' width='40' height='60' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='200' width='40' height='60' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='40' height='60' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='200' y='200' width='40' height='60' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='250' y='200' width='40' height='60' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='300' y='200' width='40' height='60' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Key details: small black rectangles -->
  <rect x='60' y='220' width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='110' y='220' width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='160' y='220' width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='210' y='220' width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='260' y='220' width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='310' y='220' width='10' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Sleek black cat silhouette stepping along the top -->
  <path d='M70,190 Q90,170 110,190 T150,190' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a wrought iron gate with ornate curls
description: Draw a tall rectangular gate. Inside, fill it with symmetrical curling lines and spirals reminiscent of decorative ironwork.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall rectangular gate -->
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='200' height='200' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Decorative ironwork: symmetrical curling lines -->
  <path d='M170,70 C180,90 190,90 200,70' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M170,100 C180,120 190,120 200,100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M170,130 C180,150 190,150 200,130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M230,70 C240,90 250,90 260,70' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M230,100 C240,120 250,120 260,100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M230,130 C240,150 250,150 260,130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a small submarine porthole showing underwater life
description: Use a circular frame with rivets. Inside, depict fish silhouettes and seaweed in blues and greens, as if viewed through thick glass.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Circular frame with rivets -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='100' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Rivets -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Fish silhouettes inside frame -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q210,140 220,150 Q210,160 200,150 Z' fill='blue'/>
  <path d='M280,150 Q290,140 300,150 Q290,160 280,150 Z' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Seaweed in blues and greens -->
  <path d='M240,220 Q250,200 260,220' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M230,230 Q250,210 270,230' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a labyrinth pattern seen from above
description: Create a square or circular maze with winding passages. Outline the walls in black, ensuring a small entrance and an unreachable center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Maze outer boundary -->
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='300' height='200' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Winding passages -->
  <path d='M100,100 H250 V150 H150 V200 H300' stroke='black' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Small entrance -->
  <rect x='100' y='120' width='20' height='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: an origami crane with patterned paper
description: Form sharp angular folds resembling a crane silhouette. Overlay a repeated floral or geometric pattern on the crane’s surfaces.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Crane silhouette with sharp angular folds -->
  <path d='M250,50 L230,150 L250,150 L270,250 L260,250 L240,150 L250,150 L270,50 Z' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Overlaid geometric pattern -->
  <line x1='240' y1='100' x2='260' y2='100' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='120' x2='260' y2='120' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='140' x2='260' y2='140' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a city bus with large tinted windows
description: Draw a long rectangular vehicle with a roof curve. Use dark rectangles for the windows, leaving a vibrant color (yellow or green) for the body.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Vehicle body -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='300' height='80' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Curved roof -->
  <path d='M120,150 Q250,100 380,150' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Dark windows -->
  <rect x='150' y='160' width='60' height='40' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='290' y='160' width='60' height='40' fill='darkgray'/>
</svg>

concept: a pixel art styled heart beating
description: Place a blocky red heart made of square cells. Next to it, show a minimal repeating symbol or lines to suggest a rhythmic beat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Blocky red heart made of square cells -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='20' height='20' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='20' height='20' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='20' height='20' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='220' y='120' width='20' height='20' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='200,100 240,100 220,140' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Minimal beat symbols -->
  <line x1='260' y1='110' x2='260' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='110' x2='270' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='110' x2='280' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a circle in blues and greens for the Earth. Nearby, draw a small rectangular satellite body with two solar panel wings, curving around in orbit.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Earth circle with gradient in blues and greens -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='earthGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='blue'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='green'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='url(#earthGradient)' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Small satellite with solar panels -->
  <rect x='320' y='120' width='30' height='15' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='320' y1='127.5' x2='350' y2='127.5' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='320' y1='125' x2='350' y2='115' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a hungry caterpillar munching a leaf
description: Draw a green leaf shape with a bite missing. Near it, form a segmented caterpillar body in shades of green, head angled toward the leaf.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Leaf with bite missing -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q200,100 250,150 Q220,140 200,150 Q180,160 150,150 Z' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bite removed -->
  <path d='M200,150 A10,10 0 0,1 210,155' fill='white' stroke='none'/>
  <!-- Segmented caterpillar -->
  <circle cx='300' cy='200' r='15' fill='darkgreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='200' r='15' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='340' cy='200' r='15' fill='limegreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Caterpillar head -->
  <circle cx='360' cy='200' r='10' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='200' x2='360' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a fortune cookie cracked open with a small paper note
description: Use a light brown folded crescent shape broken into two. Between the halves, show a thin white slip of paper partially visible.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Left half of folded crescent -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q180,130 200,110 L220,130 Q210,150 200,150 Z' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Right half of folded crescent -->
  <path d='M220,150 Q240,130 220,110 L200,130 Q210,150 220,150 Z' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Thin white slip of paper -->
  <rect x='205' y='120' width='10' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a stethoscope forming a heart shape at the tube
description: Draw the earpieces and circular chest piece. Make the tube curve into a heart outline in the middle, before connecting the ends.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Earpieces -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='150' r='15' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='150' r='15' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Chest piece -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='20' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tube curved as a heart -->
  <path d='M220,150 Q250,180 280,150 Q250,200 220,150' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a Viking longship with a striped sail
description: Sketch a wooden hull with curved ends. Above it, hoist a large rectangular sail in alternating red and white stripes, and add small shield shapes on the hull sides.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wooden hull with curved ends -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q250,250 350,200 Q340,210 250,230 Q160,210 150,200 Z' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Shield shapes on hull -->
  <rect x='180' y='210' width='20' height='10' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='300' y='210' width='20' height='10' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Rectangular sail with red and white stripes -->
  <rect x='250' y='50' width='80' height='150' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='330' y2='80' stroke='white' stroke-width='10'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='110' x2='330' y2='110' stroke='white' stroke-width='10'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='140' x2='330' y2='140' stroke='white' stroke-width='10'/>
</svg>

concept: a sunflower field with a scarecrow in the center
description: Use repeated tall flower shapes with large yellow petals. In the middle, place a simple scarecrow figure with outstretched arms and a straw hat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Repeated tall flower shapes -->
  <g fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'>
    <circle cx='100' cy='200' r='15'/>
    <circle cx='140' cy='200' r='15'/>
    <circle cx='180' cy='200' r='15'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Scarecrow figure -->
  <path d='M250,150 L240,200 L260,200 Z' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='10' fill='tan'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='230' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='270' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='220' x2='230' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='220' x2='270' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a labyrinth of colorful arrows pointing in many directions
description: Fill the scene with overlapping arrow shapes in bold primary colors. Angle them in various directions to create a sense of confusion or complexity.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Overlapping arrow shapes -->
  <polygon points='100,100 120,80 140,100 120,90' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='150,150 170,130 190,150 170,140' fill='blue' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='200,200 220,180 240,200 220,190' fill='yellow' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='250,250 270,230 290,250 270,240' fill='green' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='300,100 320,80 340,100 320,90' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='350,150 370,130 390,150 370,140' fill='blue' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a tray of sushi rolls with chopsticks
description: Draw a rectangular tray with several circular sushi pieces in rows. Position two slim rectangles for chopsticks, angled across one corner.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rectangular tray -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='300' height='80' fill='#F5DEB3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Circular sushi pieces -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='190' r='10' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='190' r='10' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='10' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='190' r='10' fill='lightgreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Chopsticks -->
  <rect x='380' y='140' width='10' height='80' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(-20 385 180)'/>
  <rect x='390' y='140' width='10' height='80' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(-20 395 180)'/>
</svg>

concept: a roaring fireplace with a mantel above it
description: Use a rectangular shape for the fireplace opening, inside which stacked orange-yellow shapes mimic flames. Draw a mantel shelf on top with minimal décor.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Fireplace opening -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='120' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Stacked flames -->
  <path d='M200,200 Q220,170 240,200 Q260,170 280,200' fill='orange' stroke='red' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Mantel shelf -->
  <rect x='170' y='90' width='160' height='10' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a lotus pond with large lily pads
description: Fill a blue background for water. Place several wide green circular pads, some with a pink or white lotus flower on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Blue water background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Green circular pads -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='220' r='30' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='220' r='30' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Lotus flowers -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='220' r='10' fill='pink' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='220' r='10' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a helium balloon shaped like a star drifting skyward
description: Draw a five-pointed star shape in gold or silver. Add a thin vertical string below it, disappearing off the bottom edge to suggest it’s floating away.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Five-pointed star in gold -->
  <polygon points='250,100 260,140 300,140 265,165 275,205 250,180 225,205 235,165 200,140 240,140' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Vertical string -->
  <line x1='250' y1='205' x2='250' y2='300' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a chartreuse flamingo balancing on one leg
description: Create a tall flamingo silhouette in #7FFF00 for the body. Show it standing on a single leg, with a small ellipse for the head and a short curved shape for the beak.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Flamingo silhouette -->
  <path d='M250,100 Q260,150 250,200 Q240,150 250,100 Z' fill='#7FFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Single leg -->
  <line x1='250' y1='200' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='80' rx='10' ry='8' fill='#7FFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Short curved beak -->
  <path d='M260,80 Q270,85 260,90' fill='#7FFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a top hat decorated with periwinkle stripes
description: Draw a tall hat shape in basic black (#000000). Add horizontal stripes in #CCCCFF around the brim and near the crown.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall hat shape in black -->
  <path d='M200,100 Q250,50 300,100 L280,110 Q250,80 220,110 Z' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Horizontal stripes in light purple -->
  <line x1='210' y1='95' x2='290' y2='95' stroke='#CCCCFF' stroke-width='5'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='110' x2='290' y2='110' stroke='#CCCCFF' stroke-width='5'/>
</svg>

concept: a coffee cup patterned with peach-colored polka dots
description: Sketch a simple mug silhouette in white. Scatter small circles in #FFDAB9 across the surface, leaving the handle blank.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Simple mug silhouette -->
  <rect x='180' y='80' width='140' height='180' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Scattered decorative circles -->
  <circle cx='210' cy='120' r='5' fill='#FFDAB9'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='5' fill='#FFDAB9'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='200' r='5' fill='#FFDAB9'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='180' r='5' fill='#FFDAB9'/>
</svg>

concept: a stylized eagle with teal wing tips
description: Use a large brown body (#654321) for the main shape. At each wing tip, transition to a teal shade (#008080), ensuring a blended gradient near the edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='wingGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='#654321'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='#008080'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Main shape (simplified polygon) -->
  <path d='M200,150 L250,100 L300,150 L250,200 Z' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Simulated gradient at wing tips -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='20' fill='url(#wingGradient)' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='20' fill='url(#wingGradient)' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: an art deco poster featuring a woman in a lavender gown
description: Place a tall figure outline wearing a long dress filled with #E6E6FA. Surround her with geometric, gold-accented (#FFD700) shapes in an art deco style.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tall figure outline in a long dress -->
  <path d='M240,50 L260,50 L280,150 L260,250 L240,250 L220,150 Z' fill='#E6E6FA' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Art deco geometric accents -->
  <rect x='230' y='60' width='10' height='10' fill='#FFD700'/>
  <rect x='260' y='60' width='10' height='10' fill='#FFD700'/>
  <rect x='245' y='200' width='10' height='10' fill='#FFD700'/>
</svg>

concept: a midnight-blue cloak draped over a wooden chair
description: Draw the chair using rectangles in a light brown (#C19A6B). Place a wavy cloth in #191970 over the back, partly covering the seat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Chair structure -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='50' fill='#C19A6B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='50' fill='#C19A6B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Wavy cloth overlay -->
  <path d='M200,100 Q250,80 300,100 Q250,90 200,100 Z' fill='#191970' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a mosaic of triangles in different olive shades
description: Fill the canvas with multiple overlapping triangles. Assign each one a distinct olive-tone hex like #556B2F or #6B8E23, ensuring variation across the pattern.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Overlapping triangles in olive tones -->
  <polygon points='50,50 150,50 100,150' fill='#556B2F' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='100,80 200,80 150,180' fill='#6B8E23' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='150,60 250,60 200,160' fill='#556B2F' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='200,90 300,90 250,190' fill='#6B8E23' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a futuristic hoverboard in neon magenta
description: Form a slim plank shape in #FF00FF with two circular pads at the ends. Add faint, translucent arcs beneath to suggest hovering.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Slim plank shape -->
  <rect x='150' y='140' width='200' height='20' fill='#FF00FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Circular pads -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='10' fill='#FF00FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='10' fill='#FF00FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Translucent arc beneath -->
  <path d='M150,160 Q250,180 350,160' stroke='#FF00FF' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a little robot dog with a golden collar
description: Use metallic gray (#A9A9A9) rectangles and circles for the body parts. Around its neck, place a narrow band in #FFD700 as a collar.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Metallic body parts -->
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='100' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='15' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Collar -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='110' rx='30' ry='5' fill='#FFD700'/>
</svg>

concept: a polka-dot suitcase in pastel lime
description: Draw a simple rectangular luggage shape with a handle. Fill it with a soft lime color (#BFFF00) and scatter white circles evenly across.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rectangular luggage -->
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='140' height='100' fill='#BFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Handle -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='20' fill='#BFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- White circles decoration -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='160' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='160' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a winter scene with burgundy scarves on snowmen
description: Use white circles to build two or three snowmen. Wrap each neck with a #800020 scarf, layering them on top to ensure they’re clearly visible.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Snowman 1 -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='200' r='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='120' r='15' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='140' y='135' width='20' height='5' fill='#800020'/>
  <!-- Snowman 2 -->
  <circle cx='350' cy='200' r='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='120' r='15' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='340' y='135' width='20' height='5' fill='#800020'/>
</svg>

concept: an orange rose with maroon edges on each petal
description: Create a layered rose shape in #FFA500. At the petal tips, blend gradually into #800000, emphasizing the contrast with each overlap.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Layered rose petals -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#FF8C00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.8'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='#800000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of sneakers with bold fuchsia laces
description: Draw two shoe shapes in neutral gray (#808080). Add lines along the top for the laces and fill them in #FF00FF for a striking look.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two shoe shapes -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q160,180 180,180 Q200,180 210,200 Q200,210 150,210 Z' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='160' y1='190' x2='170' y2='190' stroke='#FF00FF' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='190' x2='190' y2='190' stroke='#FF00FF' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,200 Q260,180 280,180 Q300,180 310,200 Q300,210 250,210 Z' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='190' x2='270' y2='190' stroke='#FF00FF' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='190' x2='290' y2='190' stroke='#FF00FF' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a teal sports car with diagonal racing stripes
description: Outline a low, sleek car shape in #008B8B. Place two wide stripes in white (#FFFFFF) from the hood to the trunk, slightly angled.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sleek car shape -->
  <path d='M150,180 L350,180 L330,230 L170,230 Z' fill='#008B8B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- White stripes -->
  <line x1='170' y1='190' x2='330' y2='190' stroke='white' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.8'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='210' x2='320' y2='210' stroke='white' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a set of ceramic bowls in dusty pink
description: Arrange three nested bowl shapes in #E5989B. Use thin, darker outlines for each bowl’s rim to distinguish the layers.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Three nested bowl shapes -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='40' fill='#E5989B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='30' fill='#E5989B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.8'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='20' fill='#E5989B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

concept: a small barn owl with soft peach highlights
description: Use an off-white oval for the body and wings. Subtly blend #FFDAB9 around the face and wingtips to add warmth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Off-white oval for body and wings -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='70' ry='40' fill='#F8F8F8' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Blended accents at face and wingtips -->
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='150' rx='15' ry='10' fill='#FFDAB9' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.7'/>
  <ellipse cx='280' cy='150' rx='15' ry='10' fill='#FFDAB9' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a fisherman’s hat in light khaki with pinned badges
description: Draw a broad-brimmed hat in #F0E68C. Overlay small circular or oval shapes along one side, each a different bright color, to mimic badges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Broad-brimmed hat shape -->
  <path d='M150,100 Q250,20 350,100 L350,130 L150,130 Z' fill='#F0E68C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Overlaid badges -->
  <circle cx='170' cy='90' r='8' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='190' cy='80' r='8' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='90' r='8' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a keyboard keycap set in pastel cyan
description: Form a grid of small squares with slight shadows. Fill each with #E0FFFF, leaving the letters or symbols uncolored in the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <filter id='shadow'>
      <feDropShadow dx='2' dy='2' stdDeviation='2' flood-color='gray'/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  <g filter='url(#shadow)'>
    <rect x='50' y='50' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <rect x='120' y='50' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <rect x='190' y='50' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <rect x='50' y='120' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <rect x='120' y='120' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <rect x='190' y='120' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <rect x='50' y='190' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <rect x='120' y='190' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
    <rect x='190' y='190' width='60' height='60' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Placeholder letters (uncolored inside) -->
  <text x='80' y='90' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>A</text>
  <text x='150' y='90' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>B</text>
  <text x='220' y='90' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>C</text>
  <text x='80' y='160' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>D</text>
  <text x='150' y='160' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>E</text>
  <text x='220' y='160' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>F</text>
  <text x='80' y='230' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>G</text>
  <text x='150' y='230' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>H</text>
  <text x='220' y='230' font-size='20' fill='none' stroke='black'>I</text>
</svg>

concept: an elephant statue made of bronze
description: Use a sturdy elephant silhouette, filling it with #CD7F32. Add slight variations in shading to suggest a metallic statue surface.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='elephantGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='#CD7F32'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='#B87333'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d='M150,200 Q130,150 180,130 Q220,110 260,130 Q300,150 280,200 Q260,240 220,250 Q180,240 150,200 Z' fill='url(#elephantGradient)' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a pink flamingo float wearing turquoise sunglasses
description: Create a round float ring in pink (#FFC0CB) with a flamingo neck and head. Add small rectangular sunglasses in #40E0D0 atop the beak area.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Float ring -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='60' fill='none' stroke='#FFC0CB' stroke-width='10'/>
  <!-- Flamingo neck and head -->
  <path d='M310,180 Q330,150 310,120' stroke='#FFC0CB' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='110' r='15' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Rectangular sunglasses on head -->
  <rect x='305' y='105' width='10' height='5' fill='#40E0D0'/>
</svg>

concept: a peacock with shimmering silver tail feathers
description: Draw the peacock body in dark blue (#00008B). For the tail, use elongated ovals in #C0C0C0, each layered to create a fanned-out look.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Peacock body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='40' fill='#00008B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Fanned tail ovals -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='20' fill='#C0C0C0' opacity='0.7' transform='rotate(0 250 150)'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='20' fill='#C0C0C0' opacity='0.5' transform='rotate(20 250 150)'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='20' fill='#C0C0C0' opacity='0.5' transform='rotate(-20 250 150)'/>
</svg>

concept: a city skyline at dusk with violet highlights
description: Silhouette several building blocks in black (#000000). Behind them, fill the sky with a gradient from orange (#FFA500) to violet (#8A2BE2).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='skyGradient403' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFA500'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='#8A2BE2'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#skyGradient403)'/>
  <!-- Building blocks -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='50' height='100' fill='#000000'/>
  <rect x='170' y='130' width='60' height='120' fill='#000000'/>
  <rect x='250' y='160' width='40' height='90' fill='#000000'/>
  <rect x='320' y='140' width='50' height='110' fill='#000000'/>
</svg>

concept: a stack of books wrapped in pastel lilac covers
description: Arrange several rectangular shapes stacked. Fill each cover with #C8A2C8, adding thin lines for spines and pages in white.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stacked rectangle (book cover) -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='150' fill='#C8A2C8' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Page lines -->
  <line x1='200' y1='120' x2='300' y2='120' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='140' x2='300' y2='140' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='160' x2='300' y2='160' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a cactus-shaped neon sign in lime green
description: Form a cactus outline with rounded arms. Color it #32CD32, giving it a bright glow effect against a neutral background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#F0E68C'/>
  <path d='M250,200 L250,100 Q240,90 230,100 L230,200 Q240,210 250,200 Z
           M230,130 Q210,120 200,130 Q210,140 230,130 Z
           M250,130 Q270,120 280,130 Q270,140 250,130 Z' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <defs>
    <filter id='glow' x='-50%' y='-50%' width='200%' height='200%'>
