      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='3' result='coloredBlur'/>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/>
        <feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/>
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
  </defs>
</svg>

concept: a butterfly with gradient wings from lavender to pink
description: Draw the butterfly’s wings as large polygons. Fill each wing with a fade from #E6E6FA near the body to #FFB6C1 at the edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='butterflyLeft' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='#E6E6FA'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFB6C1'/>
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id='butterflyRight' x1='1' y1='0' x2='0' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='#E6E6FA'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFB6C1'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <polygon points='250,150 180,100 180,200' fill='url(#butterflyLeft)' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 320,100 320,200' fill='url(#butterflyRight)' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='120' width='10' height='60' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: an antique globe with forest green oceans
description: Use a sphere shape, dividing continents in tan (#D2B48C). Fill the seas in a deep forest green (#228B22) for an old-world look.

concept: a ginger cat sleeping on a bright cyan rug
description: Place a cat silhouette in orange (#FFA07A), curled up. Underneath, draw a circular rug in #00FFFF, slightly larger than the cat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='50' fill='#00FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,180 Q250,160 270,180 Q265,190 250,195 Q235,190 230,180 Z' fill='#FFA07A' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a graceful crane with tail feathers in navy blue
description: Use a tall white bird shape. Add elongated tail feathers in #000080, layering them behind the main body for depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M240,100 Q250,80 260,100 Q255,120 245,120 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M245,120 L230,150' stroke='#000080' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,120 L235,150' stroke='#000080' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M255,120 L240,150' stroke='#000080' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

concept: a wizard hat in deep plum with silvery runes
description: Draw a pointed cone shape in #DDA0DD. Overlay small mystic symbols in #C0C0C0 around the brim and sides.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='250,80 230,160 270,160' fill='#DDA0DD' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='3' fill='#C0C0C0'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='130' r='3' fill='#C0C0C0'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='130' r='3' fill='#C0C0C0'/>
</svg>

concept: a storefront awning with coral and white stripes
description: Create a curved awning rectangle. Alternate stripes in coral (#FF7F50) and white (#FFFFFF), angled slightly downwards.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='300' height='80' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='50' x2='400' y2='50' stroke='#FF7F50' stroke-width='20'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='70' x2='400' y2='70' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='20'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='90' x2='400' y2='90' stroke='#FF7F50' stroke-width='20'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of shutters painted in pale turquoise
description: Draw two tall, narrow rectangles side by side. Fill them with #AFEEEE, adding thin horizontal slats to suggest shutters.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='40' height='120' fill='#AFEEEE' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='100' width='40' height='120' fill='#AFEEEE' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='130' x2='190' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='160' x2='190' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='190' x2='190' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='130' x2='250' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='160' x2='250' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='190' x2='250' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a fantasy sword with a rose gold blade
description: Use a long, tapered blade shape in #B76E79. The hilt can be in a contrasting dark gray (#696969), with minimal ornamentation.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='250,50 260,200 240,200' fill='#B76E79' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='200' width='10' height='20' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a flaming meteor with a trailing cobalt tail
description: Place a circular rock shape in #8B4513 for the core. Surround it with flame-like shapes in #FF4500, extending back with a cobalt (#0047AB) streak.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,120 L240,80 L260,80 Z' fill='#FF4500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,180 L240,220 L260,220 Z' fill='#FF4500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='300' y2='100' stroke='#0047AB' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

concept: a tandem bicycle in pastel yellow
description: Sketch a two-seated bike with two sets of wheels. Fill the frame in #FAFAD2, and color the tires a simple black (#000000).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='180' cy='220' r='30' fill='none' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='220' r='30' fill='none' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M180,220 L250,170 L320,220 L290,220 L250,200 L210,220 Z' fill='#FAFAD2' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a carnival mask with swirling mint green designs
description: Draw a half-face mask shape in white. Add decorative lines and curls in #98FF98 across the surface, focusing near the edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M200,100 Q250,50 300,100 Q280,150 220,150 Q200,130 200,100 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,110 Q250,90 290,110' stroke='#98FF98' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>

  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='80' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='170' y='160' width='160' height='60' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='190' cy='180' r='5' fill='#EE82EE'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='190' r='5' fill='#EE82EE'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='180' r='5' fill='#EE82EE'/>
</svg>

concept: a medieval shield bearing a teal griffin crest
description: Form a shield outline in light gray (#D3D3D3). Center a griffin silhouette in #008080, ensuring the wings and tail stand out.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M220,100 L280,100 Q300,150 250,180 Q200,150 220,100 Z' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,120 L260,140 L250,160 L240,140 Z' fill='#008080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a chain of paper dolls in pastel lime
description: Draw multiple connected stick-figure silhouettes in #BFFF00, arms interlocked. Ensure they form a single paper chain across the page.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <line x1='100' y1='150' x2='120' y2='180' stroke='#BFFF00' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='120' y1='180' x2='140' y2='150' stroke='#BFFF00' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='140' y1='150' x2='160' y2='180' stroke='#BFFF00' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='160' y1='180' x2='180' y2='150' stroke='#BFFF00' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='100' cy='150' r='5' fill='#BFFF00'/>
  <circle cx='140' cy='150' r='5' fill='#BFFF00'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='150' r='5' fill='#BFFF00'/>
</svg>

concept: a safari hat with camouflage patterns
description: Shape a broad hat in khaki (#F0E68C). Over the crown, add irregular patches in #808000 and #556B2F for a camo style.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='100' rx='60' ry='20' fill='#F0E68C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='190' y='80' width='120' height='20' fill='#F0E68C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='90' r='10' fill='#808000'/>
  <rect x='270' y='85' width='15' height='10' fill='#556B2F'/>
</svg>

concept: a penguin carrying a polka-dot umbrella
description: Create a black-and-white penguin body with an orange (#FFA500) beak. Above its wing, position a closed umbrella in bright yellow (#FFFF00) dotted with small white circles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='30' ry='50' fill='black' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='190' rx='20' ry='40' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='280,180 300,175 280,185' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M300,180 Q310,170 300,160' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,150 Q220,130 210,150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a stylized stiletto shoe in neon green
description: Draw a tall-heeled shoe outline. Fill the entire shape with #39FF14, leaving a thin black (#000000) line around the edges.

concept: a farmland scene with pastel pink piglets
description: Use a green rectangle at the bottom for fields. Place small pig silhouettes in #FFC0CB around the foreground, each with a tiny curly tail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='245' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='245' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='245' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M160,245 Q165,240 170,245' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M210,245 Q215,240 220,245' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M260,245 Q265,240 270,245' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: an open book with pages turning in a breeze
description: Sketch the book in white (#FFFFFF) pages and a #BDB76B cover. Slightly tilt or arc several page shapes to suggest movement.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='150' fill='#BDB76B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(-5 250 175)'/>
  <rect x='205' y='105' width='90' height='140' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' transform='rotate(-5 250 175)'/>
</svg>

concept: a large raven perched on a bronze helmet
description: Form a #CD7F32 helmet shape with an arched top. Place a black bird silhouette (#000000) on its crest, wings partially folded.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M230,100 Q250,50 270,100 L270,130 Q250,140 230,130 Z' fill='#CD7F32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,60 Q245,70 250,80 Q255,70 250,60 Z' fill='black' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a modern skyscraper with tinted mauve windows
description: Draw a tall rectangular building outline in gray (#696969). For each window, use #E0B0FF, arranged in neat vertical grids.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='200' height='200' fill='none' stroke='#696969' stroke-width='3'/>
  <rect x='170' y='70' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
  <rect x='210' y='70' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
  <rect x='250' y='70' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
  <rect x='170' y='120' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
  <rect x='210' y='120' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
  <rect x='250' y='120' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
  <rect x='170' y='170' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
  <rect x='210' y='170' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
  <rect x='250' y='170' width='30' height='40' fill='#E0B0FF'/>
</svg>

concept: a grand piano in deep indigo
description: Shape the curved piano body in #4B0082. Add white (#FFFFFF) and black (#000000) key rectangles along one side.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M150,100 Q250,50 350,100 L350,200 Q250,250 150,200 Z' fill='#4B0082' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='110' width='30' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='180' y='110' width='30' height='80' fill='black' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='210' y='110' width='30' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='30' height='80' fill='black' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='270' y='110' width='30' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirling galaxy made of confetti-like shards
description: Use a spiral layout of small irregular shapes in various neon colors (#FF00FF, #00FFFF, #00FF00, #FFFF00). Concentrate them around a dark center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='birdGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FF00FF'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='#00FFFF'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='140' r='8' fill='#FF00FF'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='130' r='8' fill='#00FFFF'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='125' r='8' fill='#00FF00'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='120' r='8' fill='#FFFF00'/>
</svg>

concept: a pipe organ with pipes in matte silver
description: Sketch an array of vertical cylinders in #C0C0C0, with a wooden console (#8B4513) at the base. Arrange the tallest pipes in the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='200' y='220' width='100' height='20' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='20' height='70' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='260' y='140' width='20' height='80' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='300' y='150' width='20' height='70' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a kingfisher with electric blue feathers
description: Use a small bird silhouette in #7DF9FF, with a bit of orange (#FFA500) on the belly. Extend a sharp beak in black (#000000).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M240,150 Q250,140 260,150 Q255,155 245,155 Q240,150 240,150 Z' fill='#7DF9FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='5' ry='3' fill='#FFA500'/>
  <polygon points='260,150 275,145 260,155' fill='#000000'/>
</svg>

concept: a spaceship interior with glowing teal panels
description: Form a corridor with angled walls in dark gray (#2F4F4F). Insert rectangular panels along each side in #008080, emitting a soft glow.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='150,50 350,50 300,250 200,250' fill='#2F4F4F'/>
  <rect x='160' y='80' width='30' height='100' fill='#008080' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='310' y='80' width='30' height='100' fill='#008080' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirl of rose petals in different pink hues
description: Place multiple curved petal shapes in #FFC0CB, #FFB6C1, and #FF69B4. Arrange them in a circular motion, overlapping near the center.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <g transform='translate(250,150)'>
    <ellipse cx='0' cy='-40' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFC0CB'/>
    <ellipse cx='20' cy='-30' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFB6C1' transform='rotate(30)'/>
    <ellipse cx='30' cy='-10' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FF69B4' transform='rotate(60)'/>
    <ellipse cx='20' cy='10' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFC0CB' transform='rotate(90)'/>
    <ellipse cx='0' cy='20' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFB6C1' transform='rotate(120)'/>
    <ellipse cx='-20' cy='10' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FF69B4' transform='rotate(150)'/>
    <ellipse cx='-30' cy='-10' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFC0CB' transform='rotate(180)'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a stylized scorpion with a carapace in olive green
description: Use segmented shapes to form the body. Fill each segment with #808000, curving the tail forward, and place small pincers at the front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M150,150 L200,140 L250,150 L300,160 L350,155' fill='none' stroke='#808000' stroke-width='10'/>
  <path d='M350,155 Q370,150 390,160' fill='none' stroke='#808000' stroke-width='10'/>
  <polygon points='150,150 140,140 150,130' fill='#808000'/>
</svg>

concept: a cheerleader’s megaphone in pastel lilac
description: Draw a cone shape in #C8A2C8. Add a small handle on one side, plus a blocky outline for a bold letter or logo near the middle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='250,80 220,200 280,200' fill='#C8A2C8' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='280' y='130' width='10' height='20' fill='#C8A2C8' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='250' y='150' font-size='40' fill='black' text-anchor='middle' font-family='Arial' font-weight='bold'>A</text>
</svg>

concept: a half-submerged submarine in pale yellow
description: Use a soft yellow (#FFFFCC) elliptical hull peeking above the water. Below, shape gentle waves in navy (#000080) for contrast.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='30' fill='#FFFFCC' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M170,200 Q250,180 330,200' stroke='#000080' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a cameo brooch with a rose silhouette in cream
description: Draw an oval frame in gold (#FFD700). Inside, place a rose outline in #FFFDD0 against a darker background, highlighting the cameo effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='40' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='30' fill='#333333' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M230,150 Q250,130 270,150 Q250,170 230,150 Z' fill='#FFFDD0' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a row of small colorful hot air balloons
description: Arrange multiple balloon shapes, each in a different pastel (#FFB6C1, #87CEFA, #98FB98). Attach tiny baskets underneath in brown (#8B4513).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <g>
    <circle cx='150' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FFB6C1' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <rect x='140' y='120' width='20' height='15' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <g>
    <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='20' fill='#87CEFA' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='15' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
  <g>
    <circle cx='350' cy='100' r='20' fill='#98FB98' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <rect x='340' y='120' width='20' height='15' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a tall giraffe wearing a pastel teal bow tie
description: Use a pale yellow (#F0E68C) elongated body with brown (#8B4513) patches. At the neck, add a neat bow tie in #AFEEEE.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='30' fill='#F0E68C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='230' cy='150' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <ellipse cx='270' cy='150' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <polygon points='250,130 240,140 250,150 260,140' fill='#AFEEEE' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a rainy window with droplets in silvery gray
description: Draw a rectangular pane in lighter gray (#D3D3D3). On top, scatter small oval or teardrop shapes in #A9A9A9 to form raindrops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='180' cy='130' rx='5' ry='8' fill='#A9A9A9'/>
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='140' rx='5' ry='8' fill='#A9A9A9'/>
  <ellipse cx='260' cy='120' rx='5' ry='8' fill='#A9A9A9'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='150' rx='5' ry='8' fill='#A9A9A9'/>
</svg>

concept: a black cat’s face peeking through an orange jack-o’-lantern
description: Carve a large pumpkin shape in #FFA500. Within one cutout, place the cat’s eyes and nose in black (#000000), hinting it’s inside.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='60' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M230,140 L250,160 L270,140 L260,150 L250,145 L240,150 Z' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a koi fish pond ringed by fuchsia lotus flowers
description: Use a circular water region in #87CEFA. Around the edge, place large lotus shapes in #FF00FF, and small orange fish silhouettes scattered.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='80' fill='#87CEFA' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='180' rx='15' ry='7' fill='#FF00FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='220' rx='15' ry='7' fill='#FF00FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M240,210 Q250,205 260,210 Q250,215 240,210 Z' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a sporty motorcycle helmet with a lime-green visor
description: Sketch a round helmet silhouette in black (#000000). Over the front, add a semi-transparent shield in #32CD32, angled outward.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L270,140 L290,160 L270,170 Z' fill='#32CD32' opacity='0.5' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a ring box with a silver band displayed
description: Draw a small hinged box in red (#FF0000). Inside, place a circle for the ring in #C0C0C0, with a tiny diamond shape on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='60' height='40' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='220,150 280,150 260,130 240,130' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='10' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='245,165 250,160 255,165 250,170' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a mechanical gear arrangement in rose gold
description: Use multiple interlocking gear shapes. Fill them in #B76E79, varying sizes and aligning teeth so they appear interconnected.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='30' fill='#B76E79' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='20' fill='#B76E79' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='150' r='25' fill='#B76E79' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='120' x2='200' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='120' x2='240' y2='105' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='125' x2='280' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a carousel horse with a violet saddle
description: Form a horse silhouette mounted on a vertical pole. Color the saddle area #8A2BE2, adding small gold (#FFD700) accents along the edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='250' y='50' width='10' height='200' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M245,150 Q250,130 255,150 Q260,170 250,180 Q240,170 245,150 Z' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='155' width='10' height='10' fill='#8A2BE2' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='2' fill='#FFD700'/>
</svg>

concept: a jade bracelet resting on a velvet cushion
description: Use a rectangular cushion in deep navy (#000080). On top, place a circular band in #00A86B, partially reflecting highlights.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='60' fill='#000080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='30' fill='none' stroke='#00A86B' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a reindeer silhouette with shimmering gold antlers
description: Draw the deer’s body in dark brown (#654321). For the antlers, use #FFD700, tapering them to fine points near the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='20' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='15' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='140' x2='220' y2='110' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='140' x2='280' y2='110' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a hot sauce bottle labeled in neon orange
description: Shape a small bottle outline in clear glass. Place a rectangular label with #FF4500 text, making sure it stands out boldly.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='80' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='243' y='120' width='14' height='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='250' y='140' font-size='10' fill='#FF4500' text-anchor='middle'>Label</text>
</svg>

concept: a plum-colored cat eye gem set in a silver ring
description: Draw a ring band in #C0C0C0. Embed an oval gem in #DDA0DD at the center, with a narrow slit shape to mimic a cat’s eye effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='10' ry='6' fill='#DDA0DD' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='247' y='145' width='6' height='12' fill='black' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: an origami crane with gradient from white to pastel lime
description: Fold an angular crane form. Start at the head in white (#FFFFFF) and gradually shift to #BFFF00 toward the tail edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='craneGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='#BFFF00'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d='M250,50 L260,100 L255,150 L240,200 L230,250 L220,230 L230,180 L240,130 L250,50 Z' fill='url(#craneGradient)' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a stylized hourglass with dripping azure sand
description: Use two stacked triangles connected in the center. Fill the lower triangle partly with #007FFF, and show a thin stream from top to bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='250,50 220,100 280,100' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='220,100 280,100 250,150' fill='#007FFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a watercolor hummingbird in shades of pastel pink and gray
description: Shape the bird in a blend of #FFC0CB for the wings, fading into #A9A9A9 near the tail. Add a thin black (#000000) beak.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='birdGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFC0CB'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='#A9A9A9'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 Q280,170 220,170 Q200,160 200,150 Z' fill='url(#birdGradient)' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='300,150 320,145 300,155' fill='#000000'/>
</svg>

concept: a polaroid photo capturing a teal ocean wave
description: Draw a small square border in white (#FFFFFF). Inside, fill with #008B8B for the water, cresting with white (#FFFFFF) foam lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='100' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='205' y='105' width='90' height='90' fill='#008B8B' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M205,130 L295,130' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M205,160 L295,160' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a pastel lilac jacket with a wide collar
description: Outline a short jacket shape. Fill it with #C8A2C8, adding two wide lapels in a slightly darker shade of lilac to show dimension.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='200' y='80' width='100' height='140' fill='#CD7F32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='90' width='80' height='120' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='100' x2='260' y2='140' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: an old leather-bound book with gilded edges
description: Form a thick rectangular volume in brown (#8B4513). Color the page edges with #FFD700, using thin lines to indicate page layers.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='#8B4513' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='170' y1='100' x2='170' y2='250' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='190' y1='100' x2='190' y2='250' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='100' x2='210' y2='250' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a vertical rod with two serpents coiled around it and wings at the top. Fill the entire shape with #E5E4E2, shining slightly.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='245' y='80' width='10' height='140' fill='#E5E4E2' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M245,100 Q230,110 245,120' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M255,100 Q270,110 255,120' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M245,80 L220,60 L250,70 L280,60 L255,80 Z' fill='#E5E4E2' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a stained glass window featuring teal and magenta arcs
description: Use an arched top. Inside, place alternating arcs in #008080 and #FF00FF, divided by thin black (#000000) lines to mimic lead framing.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M210,150 Q250,110 290,150' fill='none' stroke='#008080' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,150 Q250,120 290,150' fill='none' stroke='#FF00FF' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a harp seal pup with off-white fur on ice
description: Shape a small seal in #F8F8FF, large dark eyes in black (#000000). Below it, form an icy patch in light blue (#ADD8E6).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#F8F8FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='145' r='2' fill='#000000'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='145' r='2' fill='#000000'/>
  <rect x='220' y='160' width='60' height='20' fill='#ADD8E6' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a periwinkle swirl of ribbon tied in a bow
description: Sketch a flowing ribbon in #CCCCFF, looping into a neat bow shape at the center. Add slight overlaps for a layered look.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <path d='M250,150 C230,130 210,130 210,150 C210,170 230,170 250,150' fill='#CCCCFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C270,130 290,130 290,150 C290,170 270,170 250,150' fill='#CCCCFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a pair of oars crossed over a canoe in warm brown
description: Form a narrow boat shape in #A0522D. Above it, position two long oars in #8B4513, crossing diagonally at the midpoint.
Draw an oval for the wolf's head in #808080 with two sharp triangles for ears. Use a curved path for the open mouth and place a small luminous circle in #FFFFE0 behind to represent a full moon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='230,130 240,110 250,130' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='270,130 260,110 250,130' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,160 Q250,170 260,160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='#FFFFE0'/>
</svg>

description: Use a circle for the head and ovals for the torso and limbs in #000000. Add several thin, diagonal lines in #1E90FF around the figure to indicate falling rain, and a tilted rectangle for an umbrella if desired.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='15' fill='#000000'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='30' fill='#000000'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='190' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='190' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='80' x2='230' y2='100' stroke='#1E90FF' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='80' x2='270' y2='100' stroke='#1E90FF' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='220' y='60' width='10' height='30' fill='red' transform='rotate(-20 225 75)'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the apple filled in #FF0000. Attach a short, curved line for the stem in #8B4513 and a small ellipse for a leaf in #228B22, positioned along a horizontal branch.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,120 Q245,110 240,115' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='240' cy='115' rx='5' ry='3' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a curved, elongated ellipse for the banana in yellow (#FFFF00) with tapered ends. Add a thin curved line in #D2691E to suggest peel details and place it on a rectangular countertop in #D3D3D3.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='200' height='50' fill='#D3D3D3'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='60' ry='20' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M190,180 Q250,160 310,180' stroke='#D2691E' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Layer overlapping petal shapes as polygons in #FF0000 to form the rose. Place the flower inside a tall, curved vase drawn with an ellipse base in #FFFFFF and add small green ovals for leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='500' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rose petals -->
  <polygon points='250,150 230,200 250,250 270,200' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 220,200 250,250 280,200' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 240,190 250,230 260,190' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.9'/>
  <!-- Vase -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='400' rx='80' ry='20' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M170,400 Q250,300 330,400 L330,450 Q250,470 170,450 Z' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Leaves -->
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='380' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='380' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Create a small bird using a circle for the head and an oval for the body in #1E90FF. Position it on a thin, horizontal brown line (branch) and add a tiny triangle for the beak.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Branch -->
  <line x1='50' y1='200' x2='450' y2='200' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Bird body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='20' ry='12' fill='#1E90FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Bird head -->
  <circle cx='270' cy='160' r='10' fill='#1E90FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Beak -->
  <polygon points='280,160 290,155 280,165' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large, curved leaf outline using a green shape in #228B22. Overlay small circles in #ADD8E6 along its surface to represent dewdrops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Leaf outline -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,50 400,150 Q250,250 100,150 Z' fill='none' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Dewdrops -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='130' r='5' fill='#ADD8E6' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='5' fill='#ADD8E6' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='130' r='5' fill='#ADD8E6' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use a large circle in #FFD700 for the sunflower’s center and surround it with elongated ovals in #FFA500 as petals. Add a green rectangle as the stem and a long, narrow leaf as an accent.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='500' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sunflower center -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Petals -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='90' rx='10' ry='30' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='210' rx='10' ry='30' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='190' cy='150' rx='30' ry='10' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='310' cy='150' rx='30' ry='10' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='210' cy='110' rx='10' ry='30' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='290' cy='110' rx='10' ry='30' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Stem -->
  <rect x='245' y='180' width='10' height='100' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Leaf -->
  <path d='M255,220 Q300,200 280,250' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Arrange several small circles filled with #800080 grouped together to form a cluster. Connect them with thin green lines in #228B22 to mimic the vine.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cluster of circles -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='150' r='8' fill='#800080'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='140' r='8' fill='#800080'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='8' fill='#800080'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='160' r='8' fill='#800080'/>
  <!-- Connecting vine lines -->
  <line x1='220' y1='150' x2='240' y2='140' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='140' x2='260' y2='150' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='150' x2='240' y2='160' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='160' x2='220' y2='150' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rounded polygon for the pumpkin in #FFA500 and add a curved stem in #8B4513 at the top. Position it over a simple rectangular porch drawn in #D2B48C.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='500' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pumpkin shape -->
  <polygon points='200,300 250,250 300,300 280,350 220,350' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Stem -->
  <path d='M245,250 Q250,230 255,250' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Porch -->
  <rect x='150' y='350' width='200' height='50' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use an elongated oval for the body in #A0522D and a circle for the head. Add four thin rectangles for legs in motion and a curved line for the tail to indicate running.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='30' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='130' r='20' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <rect x='210' y='170' width='10' height='30' fill='#A0522D'/>
  <rect x='230' y='170' width='10' height='30' fill='#A0522D'/>
  <rect x='270' y='170' width='10' height='30' fill='#A0522D'/>
  <rect x='290' y='170' width='10' height='30' fill='#A0522D'/>
  <!-- Tail -->
  <path d='M190,140 Q170,130 160,140' fill='none' stroke='#A0522D' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Form a cat using a circular head and an oval body in #808080 with two pointed triangles for ears. Place the figure atop a horizontal rectangle representing the windowsill in #D3D3D3.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Windowsill -->
  <rect x='50' y='200' width='400' height='30' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Cat body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='20' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Cat head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='20' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <polygon points='240,95 245,75 250,95' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='260,95 255,75 250,95' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create an oval for the fish body filled with #1E90FF and a small circle for the eye. Add a triangular tail and encase the fish in a circular outline for the bowl in #87CEFA.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Fish bowl -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='none' stroke='#87CEFA' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Fish body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='#1E90FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Eye -->
  <circle cx='265' cy='145' r='3' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Triangular tail -->
  <polygon points='220,150 200,140 200,160' fill='#1E90FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a bird with two curved lines forming wings in #000000 over a light blue rectangular background (#87CEEB). Use a small circle for the head to complete the design.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#87CEEB'/>
  <!-- Bird head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Wings -->
  <path d='M230,120 Q250,80 270,120' stroke='black' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a vertical brown rectangle for the trunk in #8B4513 and extend several branching lines from it. Overlay green ellipses in #228B22 to form the foliage.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Trunk -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='150' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Branches -->
  <line x1='250' y1='130' x2='220' y2='110' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='160' x2='280' y2='140' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Foliage -->
  <ellipse cx='210' cy='100' rx='30' ry='15' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='290' cy='100' rx='30' ry='15' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use a large triangle in #A9A9A9 for the mountain and layer a smaller white triangle at the top to depict snow. Add thin horizontal lines on the mountain for texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Mountain -->
  <polygon points='150,250 250,100 350,250' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Snow cap -->
  <polygon points='200,180 250,120 300,180' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Texture lines -->
  <line x1='180' y1='220' x2='220' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='190' x2='320' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a winding blue path in #1E90FF that meanders across a large green rectangle representing the valley in #32CD32. Use smooth curves to depict flowing water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Valley background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#32CD32'/>
  <!-- Winding water path -->
  <path d='M50,250 Q150,200 250,250 T450,250' fill='none' stroke='#1E90FF' stroke-width='10' stroke-linecap='round'/>
</svg>

description: Fill the background with a light gray rectangle in #D3D3D3, overlay white ovals for clouds, and add small blue ellipses in #1E90FF descending from the clouds as raindrops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#D3D3D3'/>
  <!-- Clouds -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='80' rx='40' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='100' rx='40' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Raindrops -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='110' rx='5' ry='8' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='130' rx='5' ry='8' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='90' rx='5' ry='8' fill='#1E90FF'/>
</svg>

description: Create a central yellow circle in #FFD700 for the sun and surround it with thin lines radiating outward. Optionally, add a larger, semi-transparent glow using a light yellow overlay.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sun -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Radiating lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='120' x2='250' y2='80' stroke='orange' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='250' y2='220' stroke='orange' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='150' x2='180' y2='150' stroke='orange' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='150' x2='320' y2='150' stroke='orange' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Optional glow -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='yellow' opacity='0.2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a pale gray circle in #C0C0C0 for the moon and layer smaller dark gray circles as craters. Use a slightly blurred effect to suggest depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Moon -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Craters -->
  <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='5' fill='darkgray'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='160' r='7' fill='darkgray'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='4' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Blurred look (using opacity) -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='darkgray' opacity='0.1'/>
</svg>

description: Form a five-point star using a polygon filled with #FFD700. Scatter tiny white circles around it to mimic twinkling sparkles in the night sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Five-point star -->
  <polygon points='250,100 260,140 300,140 265,165 275,205 250,180 225,205 235,165 200,140 240,140' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Sparkles -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='60' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='90' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='90' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a square for the main house in #FFA07A with a triangular roof in #8B0000. Add a narrow rectangle for the chimney and a small square at the top to represent smoke.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- House body -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='80' fill='#FFA07A' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Roof -->
  <polygon points='200,150 250,100 300,150' fill='#8B0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Chimney -->
  <rect x='270' y='110' width='10' height='20' fill='#8B0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Smoke -->
  <rect x='272' y='90' width='6' height='10' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangular car body in #FF0000 with two circles for wheels in #000000. Position it on a long gray rectangle for the road and add a thin white line to indicate lane markings.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Road -->
  <rect x='0' y='220' width='500' height='50' fill='gray'/>
  <line x1='0' y1='245' x2='500' y2='245' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='10,10'/>
  <!-- Car body -->
  <rect x='150' y='180' width='200' height='40' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Wheels -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='230' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='230' r='20' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Use two small circles in #000000 for wheels and a thin blue (#1E90FF) frame connecting them. Next to the bicycle, create a vertical fence with repeating narrow brown rectangles in #8B4513.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bicycle wheels -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='200' r='20' fill='#000000'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='20' fill='#000000'/>
  <!-- Bicycle frame (thin blue line) -->
  <line x1='150' y1='200' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='#1E90FF' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Vertical fence next to bicycle -->
  <rect x='270' y='150' width='20' height='100' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='295' y='150' width='20' height='100' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a curved boat shape using a brown path in #8B4513 and attach a triangular sail in white (#FFFFFF). Place the boat on a blue rectangular background in #1E90FF representing the lake.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Lake background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <!-- Boat hull -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q250,250 350,200 Q330,220 250,230 Q170,220 150,200 Z' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Sail -->
  <polygon points='250,230 270,130 250,230' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form an elongated oval for the airplane's body in silver (#C0C0C0) with attached triangular wings and a thin tail fin in dark gray. Position it against a light blue sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Airplane body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='20' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Wings -->
  <polygon points='250,150 200,170 250,170' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 300,170 250,170' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tail fin -->
  <polygon points='310,150 330,140 330,160' fill='darkgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw several connected rectangles for train cars in #000080 and place small circles along the bottom for wheels in #808080. Add two parallel lines beneath to represent tracks.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Train cars -->
  <rect x='50' y='100' width='80' height='60' fill='#000080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='140' y='100' width='80' height='60' fill='#000080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='100' width='80' height='60' fill='#000080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Wheels -->
  <circle cx='90' cy='170' r='10' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='130' cy='170' r='10' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='170' r='10' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='170' r='10' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='170' r='10' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='170' r='10' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tracks -->
  <line x1='40' y1='180' x2='380' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='40' y1='190' x2='380' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='10,10'/>
</svg>

description: Create a white circular clock face in #FFFFFF with a thin black border. Place two narrow lines for the hour and minute hands in #000000, and mark the 12 o’clock position with a small red dot (#FF0000).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Clock hands -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- 12 o'clock marker -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='3' fill='#FF0000'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rounded cup shape in #8B4513 and fill the interior with a darker brown. Above the cup, sketch several wavy lines in #D3D3D3 to represent rising steam.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cup -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 L300,250 Q250,260 200,250 Z' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Interior fill -->
  <path d='M210,160 Q250,120 290,160 L290,240 Q250,245 210,240 Z' fill='#5C3317' stroke='none'/>
  <!-- Steam -->
  <path d='M240,90 Q250,70 260,90' stroke='#D3D3D3' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M260,90 Q270,70 280,90' stroke='#D3D3D3' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M280,90 Q290,70 300,90' stroke='#D3D3D3' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Use a white circular plate in #FFFFFF as the base. Inside, layer overlapping ovals in tan (#F5DEB3) for bread, green (#32CD32) for lettuce, and red (#FF6347) for tomato slices.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Plate -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bread oval -->
  <ellipse cx='230' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='#F5DEB3' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Lettuce -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='25' ry='10' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Tomato slices -->
  <ellipse cx='270' cy='150' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FF6347' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

description: Form a triangular cone in #D2B48C and top it with a circular scoop in pastel pink (#FFC0CB). Add small dots in a contrasting color to represent sprinkles on the scoop.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cone -->
  <polygon points='240,200 260,200 250,250' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Scoop -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='20' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Sprinkles -->
  <circle cx='245' cy='175' r='2' fill='purple'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='175' r='2' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='185' r='2' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw layered rectangular shapes for the cake in #FF69B4 with a white top layer for frosting. Place thin, vertical rectangles as candles in #FFFF00 and add small flame shapes in #FFA500 at their tips.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cake base layers -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='80' fill='#FF69B4' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='130' width='200' height='20' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Candles -->
  <rect x='170' y='100' width='10' height='30' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='10' height='30' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='270' y='100' width='10' height='30' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Candle flames -->
  <polygon points='175,100 180,90 185,100' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='225,100 230,90 235,100' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='275,100 280,90 285,100' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use a triangular shape with a curved crust in #FFD700 for the pizza slice. Inside, distribute small irregular circles in red (#FF0000), green (#32CD32), and brown (#8B4513) to represent various toppings.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pizza slice -->
  <path d='M150,50 L350,150 L150,250 Z' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Toppings -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='130' r='5' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='5' fill='#32CD32'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='200' r='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='140' r='5' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='180' r='5' fill='#32CD32'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a rounded bun using overlapping semi-circles in #F4A460, with a central ellipse for the patty in #8B4513. Add wavy green lines (#32CD32) for lettuce and a thin yellow rectangle (#FFD700) for cheese.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bun: overlapping semi-circles -->
  <path d='M180,150 A20,20 0 0,1 220,150' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M220,150 A20,20 0 0,1 260,150' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Patty -->
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='150' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Lettuce -->
  <path d='M200,140 Q220,130 240,140' fill='none' stroke='#32CD32' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Cheese -->
  <rect x='210' y='155' width='20' height='5' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a torus shape with a large circle in #FFB6C1 and a smaller circular hole. Overlay it with tiny multi-colored circles representing sprinkles, using a variety of bright hex colors.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Torus outer circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFB6C1' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Inner circle (hole) -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Sprinkles -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='140' r='3' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='140' r='3' fill='#00FF00'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='3' fill='#0000FF'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='150' r='3' fill='#FFFF00'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='150' r='3' fill='#FF00FF'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circular candy shape in #FF69B4 attached to a thin brown rectangle stick in #8B4513. Add a smaller white circle on the candy to suggest a glossy highlight.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Candy -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#FF69B4' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Highlight -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='140' r='5' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Stick -->
  <rect x='245' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a semi-circular slice with a curved edge in #FF6347 for the flesh, and add small black dots to indicate seeds. Outline the outer rim with a thin green line (#32CD32) for the rind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Semi-circular slice -->
  <path d='M150,100 A50,50 0 1,1 150,200' fill='#FF6347' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Seeds -->
  <circle cx='160' cy='130' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='170' cy='160' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='155' cy='180' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Green rind outline -->
  <path d='M150,100 A50,50 0 1,1 150,200' fill='none' stroke='#32CD32' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a heart-like shape in #FF0000 for the strawberry with a tiny green triangle on top for the leaf. Place it within a simple brown rectangle basket outlined in #8B4513.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Strawberry -->
  <path d='M240,140 Q250,120 260,140 Q250,160 240,140 Z' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='245,120 250,110 255,120' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Basket -->
  <rect x='220' y='160' width='60' height='40' fill='none' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch an oval body in #FFD700 with a rough texture indicated by small irregular shapes. Add a crown of spiky green leaves (#228B22) at the top using narrow triangles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Oval body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='25' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Rough texture: small irregular dots -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='175' r='2' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='185' r='2' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='2' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Crown of spiky leaves -->
  <polygon points='230,160 240,130 250,160' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='250,160 260,130 270,160' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long, narrow ellipse for the cucumber in #32CD32 and outline it with a slightly darker green. Position it on a rectangular cutting board in #D3D3D3 with soft shadows.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cutting board -->
  <rect x='100' y='180' width='300' height='50' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Cucumber -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='20' fill='#32CD32' stroke='#2E8B57' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Form a red circle in #FF0000 for the tomato with a small green stem on top. Set it inside an oval bowl outlined in #FFFFFF with subtle shading in light gray.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Oval bowl -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='80' ry='40' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Tomato -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Stem -->
  <rect x='245' y='120' width='10' height='15' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a rough oval in #D2B48C for the potato and mark several small circles on its surface in #8B4513 to represent 'eyes.'
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='3' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='155' r='3' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='145' r='3' fill='#8B4513'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tapered elongated triangle for the carrot body in #FFA500, and attach a cluster of thin green ovals (#228B22) at the top for the leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Carrot body -->
  <polygon points='250,100 230,200 270,200' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Leaves -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='90' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='240' cy='85' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='260' cy='85' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use several overlapping small circles in dark green (#006400) to form the broccoli head and a thicker stem in light green (#8FBC8F).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Broccoli head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='20' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='120' r='15' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.8'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='120' r='15' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Stem -->
  <rect x='245' y='150' width='10' height='40' fill='#8FBC8F' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long oval for the cob in #FFD700 with small, evenly spaced rectangles for kernels. Surround it with a loosely wrapped green husk in #228B22.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cob -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='20' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Kernels -->
  <rect x='220' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='#D2691E'/>
  <rect x='230' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='#D2691E'/>
  <rect x='240' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='#D2691E'/>
  <rect x='250' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='#D2691E'/>
  <rect x='260' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='#D2691E'/>
  <rect x='270' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='#D2691E'/>
  <!-- Husk -->
  <path d='M190,150 Q250,100 310,150 Q250,200 190,150 Z' fill='none' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

description: Create an egg shape in #FFFFFF with a pointed bottom and encase it within a nest outlined by curved brown lines (#8B4513) representing twigs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Egg -->
  <path d='M250,80 Q270,140 250,220 Q230,140 250,80 Z' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Nest twigs -->
  <path d='M200,220 Q250,260 300,220' fill='none' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M210,210 Q250,250 290,210' fill='none' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a symmetrical butterfly with two large wing shapes filled with alternating curves in #800080 and #FFC0CB. Add a slender black line for the body and small circles for wing patterns.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Left wing -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q200,100 220,180 Q240,160 250,150' fill='#800080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Right wing -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q300,100 280,180 Q260,160 250,150' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Body -->
  <line x1='250' y1='140' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Wing patterns -->
  <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='140' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small oval for the ladybug’s body in #FF0000 with two distinct black spots. Place it on a green curved ellipse leaf drawn in #228B22 and add a tiny head circle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Leaf -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q250,150 350,200 Q250,250 150,200 Z' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ladybug body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='15' ry='10' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Spots -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='175' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='175' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='165' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Construct the ant using a series of small connected circles in #000000 for its body segments. Attach a tiny irregular shape at one end to represent food, and indicate movement with a slight curved line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ant body segments -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='5' fill='#000000'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='150' r='5' fill='#000000'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='150' r='5' fill='#000000'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='150' r='5' fill='#000000'/>
  <!-- Food at one end -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='3' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <!-- Movement line -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q195,140 190,150' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small circle for the spider’s body in #000000 with eight thin leg lines extending outward. Overlay a delicate web pattern using intersecting lines in #D3D3D3 around it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Spider body -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='220' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='280' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Web pattern -->
  <line x1='200' y1='100' x2='300' y2='200' stroke='#D3D3D3' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='100' x2='200' y2='200' stroke='#D3D3D3' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='#D3D3D3' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Form an oval for the bee’s body in #FFD700 with alternating black stripes drawn as thin rectangles. Add a small circular head and position it near a flower with a circular center in #FF4500 and white petals.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bee body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='142' width='10' height='16' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='250' y='142' width='10' height='16' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Bee head -->
  <circle cx='280' cy='150' r='10' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Flower -->
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='15' fill='#FF4500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='7' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use an elongated oval in #ADD8E6 for the body with two pairs of thin, extended wings drawn as white curved shapes. Add small circular eyes on the head for detail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='20' fill='#ADD8E6' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Wings -->
  <path d='M210,150 Q180,120 210,110' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M290,150 Q320,120 290,110' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,150 Q180,180 210,190' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M290,150 Q320,180 290,190' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Eyes -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='140' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Assemble the caterpillar from a series of overlapping green circles in #32CD32 connected by a smooth curved line for the branch in #8B4513. Add tiny dots along its body for legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Branch -->
  <path d='M100,200 Q250,100 400,200' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Caterpillar body -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='200' r='15' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='200' r='15' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='200' r='15' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='200' r='15' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Legs dots -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='220' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='220' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='220' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='220' r='2' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval for the frog’s body in #228B22 with a smaller circle for the head, and position both atop a larger circular lily pad in #ADFF2F. Add two small dots for eyes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Lily pad -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='60' fill='#ADFF2F' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Frog body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='190' rx='30' ry='15' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Frog head -->
  <circle cx='280' cy='180' r='10' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Eyes -->
  <circle cx='285' cy='175' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='275' cy='175' r='2' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rounded shell using an ellipse in dark green (#006400) with an inner pattern in light green. Attach a smaller oval for the head and four short rectangles for legs, placing it on a blue base (#1E90FF).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Blue base -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <!-- Shell -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Inner pattern -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='#90EE90' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='150' rx='15' ry='10' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <rect x='240' y='180' width='10' height='20' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='20' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='260' y='180' width='10' height='20' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='270' y='180' width='10' height='20' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small rounded body in #FF6347 with several thin lines for legs. Position it on a sandy rectangle in #F4A460 and add tiny circular eyes on short stalks.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sandy background -->
  <rect y='220' width='500' height='80' fill='#F4A460'/>
  <!-- Rounded body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='20' ry='15' fill='#FF6347' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <line x1='240' y1='215' x2='230' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='215' x2='270' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Eyes on stalks -->
  <line x1='245' y1='190' x2='245' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='175' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='255' y1='190' x2='255' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='175' r='2' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an elongated spiral body for the seahorse in #FF4500 and add a curled tail. Use small circular eyes and place it against a blue backdrop in #1E90FF.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Blue backdrop -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <!-- Seahorse spiral body -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q230,130 250,110 Q270,90 250,70' fill='none' stroke='#FF4500' stroke-width='5'/>
  <!-- Tail curl -->
  <path d='M250,70 Q240,60 230,70 Q220,80 230,90' fill='none' stroke='#FF4500' stroke-width='5'/>
  <!-- Eye -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Form a large oval for the whale’s body in dark blue (#00008B) with a smaller circle for the head. At the top, add a curved spout shape in white (#FFFFFF) to depict water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Whale body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='100' ry='50' fill='#00008B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Whale head -->
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='40' fill='#00008B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Spout -->
  <path d='M350,110 Q360,90 370,110' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch an elongated, streamlined dolphin body in #808080 with a pointed tail. Use a curved line for the dorsal fin and position the figure above a blue wave line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wave line -->
  <path d='M100,250 Q250,230 400,250' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Dolphin body -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q250,150 350,200 Q330,210 250,190 Q170,210 150,200 Z' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Dorsal fin -->
  <path d='M250,160 Q260,140 270,160' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a streamlined shark shape using a dark gray polygon (#696969) with a pointed snout and triangular dorsal fin. Place it on a deep blue background (#000080) for contrast.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deep blue background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#000080'/>
  <!-- Shark shape -->
  <polygon points='150,150 250,100 350,150 300,180 250,170 200,180' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Dorsal fin -->
  <polygon points='250,100 260,70 270,100' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a central circle for the head in #800080 and attach eight elongated, curved arms as thin rectangles. Use a lighter shade for the underside to add dimensionality.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#800080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Arms (tentacles) -->
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#D8BFD8' transform='rotate(20 250 180)' />
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#D8BFD8' transform='rotate(60 250 180)' />
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#D8BFD8' transform='rotate(100 250 180)' />
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#D8BFD8' transform='rotate(140 250 180)' />
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#D8BFD8' transform='rotate(180 250 180)' />
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#D8BFD8' transform='rotate(220 250 180)' />
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#D8BFD8' transform='rotate(260 250 180)' />
  <rect x='250' y='180' width='10' height='50' fill='#D8BFD8' transform='rotate(300 250 180)' />
</svg>

description: Form a five-pointed star using a polygon filled with #FFA500. Place it on an irregular rock shape drawn in #A9A9A9, ensuring a natural overlapping edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rock shape -->
  <polygon points='220,180 280,180 300,210 250,240 200,210' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Star -->
  <polygon points='250,150 260,190 300,190 265,210 275,250 250,220 225,250 235,210 200,190 240,190' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a branching coral pattern using multiple thin, curved lines in #FF69B4. Overlay several tiny oval fish in bright colors, positioning them among the branches.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Coral branches -->
  <path d='M250,150 C240,130 230,130 220,150' stroke='#FF69B4' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C260,130 270,130 280,150' stroke='#FF69B4' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C240,170 230,170 220,150' stroke='#FF69B4' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C260,170 270,170 280,150' stroke='#FF69B4' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Tiny fish -->
  <ellipse cx='210' cy='140' rx='5' ry='3' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='290' cy='140' rx='5' ry='3' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='5' ry='3' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Create a small squirrel using a circle for the head and an elongated oval for the body in #A0522D. Add a bushy tail as a curved path and position it on a brown branch in #8B4513.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Brown branch -->
  <line x1='100' y1='150' x2='400' y2='150' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='8'/>
  <!-- Squirrel body -->
