  <ellipse cx='300' cy='140' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Squirrel head -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='130' r='10' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bushy tail -->
  <path d='M280,140 Q250,100 220,120' fill='none' stroke='#A0522D' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rabbit using a small circle for the head and a rounded oval for the body in #FFFFFF. Add long, narrow ovals for ears and position the figure on a green rectangular field in #32CD32.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Field -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#32CD32'/>
  <!-- Rabbit body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Rabbit head -->
  <circle cx='280' cy='150' r='15' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <ellipse cx='290' cy='130' rx='5' ry='15' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='270' cy='130' rx='5' ry='15' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a deer with an elongated oval for the body in #8B4513 and a smaller circle for the head. Add slender, pointed ears and a pair of branching antlers using thin lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deer body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='50' ry='30' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Deer head -->
  <circle cx='310' cy='150' r='15' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <polygon points='320,140 330,130 340,140' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='300,140 290,130 280,140' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Antlers -->
  <line x1='315' y1='135' x2='330' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='305' y1='135' x2='290' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large, rounded bear shape using an oval in dark brown (#654321) with a smaller circle for the head. Place it inside an irregular cave outline in gray (#808080) for depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cave -->
  <path d='M150,250 Q250,100 350,250 L150,250 Z' fill='#808080' opacity='0.3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bear body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='60' ry='40' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bear head -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='170' r='30' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a fox using a triangular face and a bushy tail, all in orange (#FF8C00). Use smaller triangles for the ears and position it against a backdrop of green rectangles in #228B22 representing trees.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Trees background -->
  <rect x='50' y='100' width='50' height='150' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='120' y='100' width='50' height='150' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='190' y='100' width='50' height='150' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Fox face -->
  <polygon points='300,150 330,100 360,150' fill='#FF8C00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <polygon points='320,100 315,80 325,80' fill='#FF8C00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='340,100 335,80 345,80' fill='#FF8C00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bushy tail -->
  <path d='M360,150 Q400,170 380,200 Q360,180 360,150 Z' fill='#FF8C00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use an oval for the wolf's head in #808080 with two sharp triangles for ears. Add small contrasting circles for eyes in #FFFFE0 and a curved snout drawn with a dark line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Wolf head -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='30' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <polygon points='230,120 240,90 250,120' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='270,120 260,90 250,120' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Eyes -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='5' fill='#FFFFE0'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='5' fill='#FFFFE0'/>
  <!-- Snout -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q245,160 250,170 Q255,160 250,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large oval for the moose's body in #8B4513 and a smaller circle for the head. Attach branching antlers using thin, curved lines in a darker brown (#5C4033).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Moose body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='60' ry='30' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Moose head -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='150' r='25' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Antlers -->
  <path d='M335,140 Q350,110 360,130' stroke='#5C4033' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M305,140 Q290,110 280,130' stroke='#5C4033' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large rounded body in #A9A9A9 with a long, curved trunk drawn as an elongated oval. Add two large semi-circular ears and small circular eyes for detail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='70' ry='40' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Trunk -->
  <path d='M250,180 Q300,200 290,250' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <path d='M210,150 A15,15 0 1,1 210,180' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M290,150 A15,15 0 1,1 290,180' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Eyes -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='170' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='170' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a tall, narrow rectangle for the neck in tan (#F4A460) attached to a small circle for the head. Add irregular patch shapes on the body as small ovals in #8B4513.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Neck -->
  <rect x='240' y='130' width='20' height='50' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='15' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Body with patches -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='50' ry='30' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='230' cy='200' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <ellipse cx='270' cy='200' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='10' ry='5' fill='#8B4513'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a horse-like shape in white (#FFFFFF) and overlay it with multiple thin, parallel black stripes (#000000) as repeated narrow rectangles across the body.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Horse body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Stripes -->
  <rect x='210' y='140' width='5' height='20' fill='#000000'/>
  <rect x='230' y='140' width='5' height='20' fill='#000000'/>
  <rect x='250' y='140' width='5' height='20' fill='#000000'/>
  <rect x='270' y='140' width='5' height='20' fill='#000000'/>
  <rect x='290' y='140' width='5' height='20' fill='#000000'/>
</svg>

description: Form a lion's head using a circle in tan (#F4A460) and surround it with overlapping ovals for the mane in dark brown (#654321). Include small pointed ears and a triangular nose.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Lion head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Mane -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='35' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <polygon points='235,130 245,110 255,130' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='265,130 275,110 285,130' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Nose -->
  <polygon points='245,160 250,165 255,160' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Use an oval for the tiger's body in orange (#FFA500) and add irregular black stripes and small circular spots along the legs and face. Include a narrow face with pointed ears.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Tiger body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='70' ry='40' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Stripes -->
  <line x1='220' y1='140' x2='230' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='140' x2='260' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Spots on legs -->
  <circle cx='230' cy='180' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='180' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Tiger head -->
  <ellipse cx='320' cy='130' rx='20' ry='15' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <polygon points='330,120 335,100 340,120' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='310,120 305,100 300,120' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small monkey using a circle for the head and an oval for the body in brown (#8B4513). Extend curved lines for arms grasping a thin vine drawn in green (#228B22).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Monkey body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Monkey head -->
  <circle cx='280' cy='160' r='15' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Arms -->
  <path d='M270,160 Q250,140 230,160' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M290,160 Q270,140 250,160' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Vine -->
  <path d='M230,160 Q210,150 190,160' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a bulky gorilla using a wide oval for the body in dark gray (#696969) and a smaller circle for the head. Use simple lines to depict arms and legs in a seated posture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gorilla body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='50' ry='30' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Gorilla head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='20' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Arms -->
  <line x1='230' y1='180' x2='210' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='180' x2='290' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <line x1='240' y1='210' x2='240' y2='240' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='210' x2='260' y2='240' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Form a penguin using an oval body in black (#000000) with a smaller overlapping oval in white (#FFFFFF) for the belly. Place it on a pale blue rectangular block representing ice (#ADD8E6).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ice block -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#ADD8E6'/>
  <!-- Penguin body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='60' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Belly -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='25' ry='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a koala with a round head in gray (#A9A9A9) and large circular ears. Attach it to a brown branch drawn as a thin rectangle and add a small nose detail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Branch -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='300' height='20' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Koala head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='30' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='80' r='10' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='80' r='10' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Nose -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a kangaroo with a large oval body in tan (#F4A460) and a smaller circle for the head. Add a curved line for the pouch and long rectangular shapes for the legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Kangaroo body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='25' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='15' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Pouch -->
  <path d='M260,180 Q250,190 240,180' stroke='#F4A460' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <rect x='220' y='200' width='15' height='40' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='265' y='200' width='15' height='40' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a camel using overlapping ovals in sandy brown (#EDC9AF) to form its humped body and long legs. Add a small circle for the head with minimal detail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Camel body (humps) -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='50' ry='25' fill='#EDC9AF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='180' rx='50' ry='25' fill='#EDC9AF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Camel legs -->
  <rect x='220' y='200' width='10' height='40' fill='#EDC9AF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='270' y='200' width='10' height='40' fill='#EDC9AF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='330' cy='160' r='10' fill='#EDC9AF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a large oval for the ostrich's body in dark gray (#696969) and a smaller circle for the head. Extend long, thin rectangles for legs and a curved beak shape.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ostrich body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='60' ry='30' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='140' r='20' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <rect x='240' y='210' width='10' height='40' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='260' y='210' width='10' height='40' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Beak -->
  <path d='M330,140 Q350,130 340,145' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a peacock with a small circular head in blue (#0000CD) and an elongated body. For the tail, add multiple fan-like triangles in green (#228B22), gold (#FFD700), and blue.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Peacock head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='10' fill='#0000CD' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Peacock body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='40' fill='#0000CD' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tail fan -->
  <polygon points='250,150 200,250 250,230' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 250,230 300,250' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 220,250 270,250' fill='#0000CD' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a parrot using a small circle for the head and an oval for the body in bright green (#32CD32). Draw a curved red beak (#FF0000) and place it on a thin horizontal branch.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Branch -->
  <line x1='50' y1='200' x2='450' y2='200' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Parrot body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='25' ry='15' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Parrot head -->
  <circle cx='280' cy='140' r='10' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Curved red beak -->
  <path d='M290,140 Q300,135 290,130' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an eagle using a wide, pointed oval for the body in dark brown (#654321) and extend large triangular wings. Add a small, sharp beak in #FFD700 for contrast.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Eagle body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='30' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Wings -->
  <polygon points='250,150 180,100 200,150' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 320,100 300,150' fill='#654321' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Beak -->
  <polygon points='320,150 330,145 320,140' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create an owl using a circular head in #808080 with large white eyes (#FFFFFF) and black pupils. Attach it to a thin brown branch using a straight line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Branch -->
  <line x1='50' y1='200' x2='450' y2='200' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Owl head -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#808080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Eyes -->
  <circle cx='235' cy='140' r='10' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='265' cy='140' r='10' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='235' cy='140' r='4' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='265' cy='140' r='4' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a bat with a small curved oval body in black (#000000) and extend thin, membranous wings as curved paths. Add tiny triangular ears on top of the head.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bat body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Wings -->
  <path d='M230,150 Q200,100 250,130' fill='none' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M270,150 Q300,100 250,130' fill='none' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <polygon points='245,140 250,125 255,140' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a dove using a rounded body in white (#FFFFFF) with a small beak. In its talons, place a thin olive branch in #228B22 with small leaf shapes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dove body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Beak -->
  <polygon points='280,150 295,145 280,155' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Talons holding branch -->
  <line x1='240' y1='160' x2='230' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,180 Q220,175 225,170' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='225' cy='170' r='2' fill='#228B22'/>
</svg>

description: Form a swan using an elongated oval for the body in white (#FFFFFF) and a curved neck as a smooth line. Place it on a blue rectangle representing a calm lake in #1E90FF.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Lake -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <!-- Swan body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='50' ry='20' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Swan neck -->
  <path d='M300,150 Q320,120 310,100' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Swan head -->
  <circle cx='310' cy='90' r='8' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Beak -->
  <polygon points='318,90 328,85 318,80' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a flamingo using a slender oval for the body in pink (#FFC0CB) and a long, thin leg as a narrow rectangle in #FF69B4. Add a small circle for the head and a curved beak.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Flamingo body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='30' ry='15' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Flamingo head -->
  <circle cx='280' cy='150' r='10' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Leg -->
  <rect x='245' y='190' width='5' height='40' fill='#FF69B4' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Beak -->
  <path d='M290,150 Q300,145 290,140' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small, irregular oval in gray (#A9A9A9) to represent a pebble. Position it on a narrow rectangular path in brown (#8B4513) with subtle texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Path -->
  <rect x='50' y='250' width='400' height='20' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <!-- Pebble -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='240' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#A9A9A9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw several overlapping irregular polygons in tan (#EDC9AF) to represent scattered rocks. Arrange them on a larger rectangular background in sandy color (#F4A460).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sandy background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#F4A460'/>
  <!-- Rocks -->
  <polygon points='100,250 140,230 130,260' fill='#EDC9AF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='200,260 230,240 250,260' fill='#EDC9AF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='300,250 330,230 350,250' fill='#EDC9AF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a tall, narrow rectangle in light blue (#ADD8E6) for the water stream. Layer overlapping curved white shapes (#FFFFFF) at the base to simulate frothy water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Water stream -->
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='50' height='200' fill='#ADD8E6'/>
  <!-- Froth -->
  <path d='M100,250 Q125,240 150,250' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M100,260 Q125,250 150,260' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a large triangular mountain in dark gray (#696969) with a small crater at the top. From the crater, add wavy red and orange shapes (#FF4500, #FFA500) to depict flowing lava.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Mountain -->
  <polygon points='150,250 250,100 350,250' fill='#696969' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Crater -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Flowing lava -->
  <path d='M245,150 Q250,160 255,150 Q250,170 245,150 Z' fill='#FF4500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,150 Q250,155 260,150 Q250,165 240,150 Z' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create several curved arcs in sequence using red (#FF0000), orange (#FFA500), yellow (#FFD700), green (#32CD32), blue (#1E90FF), and violet (#8A2BE2) over a green hilly background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Hilly background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#32CD32'/>
  <!-- Curved arcs -->
  <path d='M100,250 Q250,150 400,250' fill='none' stroke='#FF0000' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M110,260 Q250,160 390,260' fill='none' stroke='#FFA500' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M120,270 Q250,170 380,270' fill='none' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M130,280 Q250,180 370,280' fill='none' stroke='#32CD32' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M140,290 Q250,190 360,290' fill='none' stroke='#1E90FF' stroke-width='5'/>
  <path d='M150,300 Q250,200 350,300' fill='none' stroke='#8A2BE2' stroke-width='5'/>
</svg>

description: Draw multiple vertical, slender shapes for tulip stems in green (#228B22) and top each with a teardrop petal shape in red, pink, or yellow. Arrange them evenly on a light green base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Light green base -->
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='#32CD32'/>
  <!-- Tulip stems and petals -->
  <line x1='100' y1='250' x2='100' y2='200' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polygon points='90,200 100,180 110,200' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <line x1='200' y1='250' x2='200' y2='200' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polygon points='190,200 200,180 210,200' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <line x1='300' y1='250' x2='300' y2='200' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polygon points='290,200 300,180 310,200' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <line x1='400' y1='250' x2='400' y2='200' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polygon points='390,200 400,180 410,200' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch an orchid flower using soft ovals for petals in pink (#FFC0CB) and white (#FFFFFF). Attach a slender stem in green (#32CD32) beneath the bloom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stem -->
  <line x1='250' y1='200' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='#32CD32' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Flower petals -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='90' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='230' cy='90' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='270' cy='90' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='70' rx='20' ry='10' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall rectangle with rounded corners in green (#228B22) to form the cactus, adding smaller circular pads and short, spiky lines in dark green (#006400) as spines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='150' rx='20' ry='20' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='10' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='140' x2='250' y2='130' stroke='#006400' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='150' x2='230' y2='145' stroke='#006400' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='150' x2='270' y2='145' stroke='#006400' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large triangular shape for the pine foliage in dark green (#006400) and attach a narrow brown rectangle for the trunk (#8B4513). Layer smaller triangles along the sides to add depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <polygon points='250,50 150,150 350,150' fill='#006400' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='150' width='20' height='50' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,70 170,150 330,150' fill='#006400' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a rounded, irregular shape in green (#228B22) for the bush. Scatter small circles in red (#FF0000) over its surface to represent berries.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='40' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='4' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='160' r='4' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='4' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='140' r='4' fill='#FF0000'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle in #FF0000 for the apple, add a short brown rectangle for the stem, and a small green ellipse for the leaf.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='247' y='110' width='6' height='15' fill='brown'/>
  <ellipse cx='260' cy='110' rx='8' ry='4' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Form a rounded rectangle in #0000FF for the car body, place two black circles for wheels, and add a thin white rectangle for windows.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='60' rx='10' ry='10' fill='#0000FF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='220' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='220' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='170' y='160' width='60' height='30' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='260' y='160' width='60' height='30' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Use a tall brown rectangle in #8B4513 for the trunk, and overlay a large circle in #228B22 for the leafy canopy.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect x='240' y='150' width='20' height='100' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='50' fill='#228B22' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a medium circle in #000000 for the head, add two small triangles for ears, and an oval for the body with minimal details.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='30' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='235,80 250,60 265,80' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='30' fill='#000000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a square in #FFFFFF for the main building, add a triangular roof in #D3D3D3, and a small rectangle for the door in brown.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='500' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Main building -->
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='200' height='200' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Roof -->
  <polygon points='150,200 250,100 350,200' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Door -->
  <rect x='235' y='300' width='30' height='100' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Place a large circle in #FFD700 for the sun and radiate thin lines around it in a lighter yellow for sunbeams.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='500' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sun -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='50' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Sunbeams -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='#FFFFE0' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='350' x2='250' y2='450' stroke='#FFFFE0' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='250' x2='50' y2='250' stroke='#FFFFE0' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='250' x2='450' y2='250' stroke='#FFFFE0' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='200' x2='140' y2='140' stroke='#FFFFE0' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='200' x2='360' y2='140' stroke='#FFFFE0' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='300' x2='140' y2='360' stroke='#FFFFE0' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='300' x2='360' y2='360' stroke='#FFFFE0' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a small central circle in #800080 and arrange multiple petal shapes around it in a lighter purple (#D8BFD8).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='500' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='20' fill='#800080' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Petals -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='210' rx='15' ry='8' fill='#D8BFD8' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='290' cy='250' rx='15' ry='8' fill='#D8BFD8' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' transform='rotate(45 250 250)'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='290' rx='15' ry='8' fill='#D8BFD8' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='210' cy='250' rx='15' ry='8' fill='#D8BFD8' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' transform='rotate(-45 250 250)'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch an oval in #A0522D for the body, attach a smaller circle for the head, and add four thin rectangles for legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='60' ry='30' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='160' r='20' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <rect x='220' y='210' width='10' height='40' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='210' width='10' height='40' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='280' y='210' width='10' height='40' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='300' y='210' width='10' height='40' fill='#A0522D' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use overlapping ovals in #B0C4DE to form a fluffy cloud shape, arranged on a light background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#87CEEB'/>
  <!-- Cloud ovals -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='#B0C4DE' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.8'/>
  <ellipse cx='280' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='#B0C4DE' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.8'/>
  <ellipse cx='265' cy='130' rx='40' ry='25' fill='#B0C4DE' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a heart shape using two overlapping circles in #FF69B4 with a pointed bottom, filled in a soft pink.
svg:

  <circle cx='230' cy='200' r='30' fill='#FF69B4' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='200' r='30' fill='#FF69B4' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

  <polygon points='200,210 250,260 300,210' fill='#FFB6C1' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a small circle in #FFD700 for the coin, adding a thin dark outline for definition.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form an elongated oval in #C0C0C0 for the spoon bowl, and attach a narrow rectangle as the handle with a darker silver stroke.
svg:

  <!-- Handle -->
  <rect x='280' y='140' width='60' height='10' fill='none' stroke='#696969' stroke-width='4' transform='rotate(10 280 140)'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a curved hull shape in #000080 and add a small white sail using a triangle, layering the sail on top of the hull.
svg:

  <!-- Sail -->
  <polygon points='250,230 270,150 230,150' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a simple curved rectangle in #008080 for the cup body and a smaller half-oval for the handle, both outlined in a darker teal.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cup body -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='150' rx='20' ry='20' fill='#008080' stroke='#006666' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Handle -->
  <path d='M300,130 Q330,150 300,170' fill='none' stroke='#006666' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a T–shirt shape using a rectangle in #800000, with short sleeves and a neckline detailed by thin lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <rect x='200' y='80' width='100' height='140' fill='#800000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

  <rect x='160' y='100' width='40' height='30' fill='#800000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='300' y='100' width='40' height='30' fill='#800000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

  <line x1='200' y1='80' x2='300' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a curved semi–circle in #EE82EE for the hat’s crown, and a thin, wider band below in a slightly darker violet.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <path d='M200,150 A50,50 0 0,1 300,150' fill='#EE82EE' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

  <rect x='220' y='145' width='60' height='10' fill='#9400D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

description: Create a small circle for the head and an oval for the body in #00FFFF, with a tiny triangle for the beak in a darker cyan.
svg:

  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='15' fill='#00FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Beak -->
  <polygon points='315,150 330,145 315,140' fill='#008B8B' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a circle in #BFFF00 for a lemon shape and add a thin green stem with a small leaf using #32CD32.
svg:

description: Draw a thin, curved line in #808000 for the branch and attach several small oval leaves in a slightly lighter olive tone.
svg:

description: Form an irregular shape in #FF7F50 for the reef base, then overlay several small polygon shapes in various coral shades.
svg:

  <path d='M100,250 Q250,200 400,250 L400,300 L100,300 Z' fill='#FF7F50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

description: Depict a wine glass by drawing a slender, curved rectangle for the stem in #8B0000 and a circular bowl filled with #800000.
svg:

  <!-- Base -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='230' rx='30' ry='10' fill='#8B0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

description: Sketch a long, thin rectangle in #4B0082 for the pen’s body and a small triangle at one end for the tip, all outlined in dark indigo.
svg:

description: Use overlapping petal shapes as curved polygons in #FF00FF to form the rose, with a small green ellipse for the stem.
svg:

description: Draw a rounded polygon in #FFA500 for the pumpkin with a short, curved stem in #8B4513 at the top.

description: Create a star using a five–point polygon in #0000CD, filled with a deep blue and outlined in a slightly lighter blue.
Draw a circle in #9966CC for the orb and add a soft inner gradient with lighter purple tones for a glowing effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#9966CC;stop-opacity:1'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#D8BFD8;stop-opacity:1'/>

  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='url(#grad1)' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>
