  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='150' r='5' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='150' r='5' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Form a circular pie shape in blue with a textured top to represent blueberries, and add a simple crust edge in a darker blue.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Blue pie for blueberries -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='blue' stroke='#00008B' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M210,150 A40,40 0 0,1 290,150' fill='none' stroke='#00008B' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small irregular shape in pink to represent candy, with a glossy highlight drawn as a thin curved line on one side.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Candy -->
  <path d='M240,140 Q250,120 260,140 Q250,150 240,140 Z' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M245,135 Q250,125 255,135' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch an angular shape in yellow for sour candy, with a rough outline and a small accent drop to suggest tartness.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sour candy -->
  <polygon points='240,140 260,120 280,140 260,160' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='3' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangular bar in dark brown for the chocolate, divided into small squares by thin lines to mimic segments.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Chocolate bar -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='60' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='120' x2='220' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='120' x2='240' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='120' x2='260' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='120' x2='280' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='140' x2='300' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='160' x2='300' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a soft, wavy shape in white for the yogurt with a smooth outline and a few subtle curves to indicate its texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Yogurt -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q250,180 350,200 Q300,220 250,210 Q200,220 150,200 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a chunky, irregular shape in red for the salsa, with small circular shapes inside to represent chopped ingredients.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Salsa -->
  <path d='M200,150 L250,130 L300,150 L280,180 L220,180 Z' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='3' fill='darkred'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='3' fill='darkred'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='165' r='3' fill='darkred'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a twisted loop in light brown for the pretzel, with small dots scattered along its surface to mimic salt crystals.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pretzel -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 Q250,200 200,150 Z' fill='none' stroke='#D2B48C' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='2' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a layered burger using overlapping horizontal rectangles for the bun, patty, and toppings in brown and green, with a circular tomato slice.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Burger layers -->
  <rect x='180' y='140' width='140' height='20' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='160' width='140' height='20' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='180' width='140' height='20' fill='#32CD32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='10' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form several long, thin rectangles in yellow to represent fries, arranged in a neat row on a darker background to indicate a container.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Fries container -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='100' fill='darkgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Fries -->
  <rect x='170' y='120' width='10' height='60' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='190' y='120' width='10' height='60' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='210' y='120' width='10' height='60' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='10' height='60' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='250' y='120' width='10' height='60' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a tall bottle shape in clear blue for the soda, with a curved outline and several small circles inside to suggest bubbles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Soda bottle -->
  <rect x='230' y='80' width='40' height='150' fill='#ADD8E6' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <!-- Bubbles -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a simple coffee cup using a rounded rectangle in white for the cup and a semi-circle for the top, with wavy lines above it to indicate steam.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Coffee cup -->
  <rect x='210' y='130' width='80' height='100' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <path d='M210,130 Q250,100 290,130' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Steam -->
  <path d='M230,100 Q250,90 270,100' fill='none' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirling cosmic nebula of light
description: Fill the background with a deep blue rectangle, then overlay a large, amorphous cloud shape drawn in soft purple and blue curves. Scatter small white circles across the cloud for stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deep blue background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <!-- Amorphous cloud -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,50 400,150 Q350,100 150,150 Z' fill='purple' opacity='0.5'/>
  <path d='M120,160 Q250,70 380,160 Q340,110 120,160 Z' fill='blue' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Stars -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='120' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='100' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: an ancient star cluster in deep space
description: Draw a dark background and arrange many small white circles closely together in a random pattern to represent a dense cluster of ancient stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dense star cluster -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='70' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='90' cy='60' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='120' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a pulsating supernova explosion in the void
description: Sketch a bright central circle in white, surrounded by several radiating triangular shapes in red and orange layered behind it, all on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Central white circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Radiating triangles -->
  <polygon points='250,50 270,150 230,150' fill='red' opacity='0.7'/>
  <polygon points='250,250 270,150 230,150' fill='orange' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a mysterious black hole with swirling accretion disk
description: Create a large black circle at the center, then add a series of curved, layered rings in dark gray and blue around it to simulate a swirling accretion disk. Place a few small white dots nearby for distant stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Black center circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Layered rings -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='60' fill='none' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Distant stars -->
  <circle cx='300' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant galaxy with spiral arms unfolding
description: Draw a bright central core in white and overlay multiple curved spiral arms in blue that extend outward. Scatter tiny white circles along the arms to represent stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bright central core and curved spiral arms -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='white'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C270,100 230,100 250,150 C270,200 230,200 250,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='160' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='140' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: an interstellar cloud of gaseous wonders
description: Fill the canvas with a soft blend of purple and blue cloud-like shapes using smooth, overlapping curves. Add sparse small white circles within the cloud to indicate embedded stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Soft blend of purple and blue cloud-like shapes -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='150' ry='70' fill='url(#gradCloud)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='gradCloud' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:purple;stop-opacity:0.6' />
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:blue;stop-opacity:0.6' />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Sparse white stars -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a shimmering cosmic dust field across space
description: Cover a dark background with many small, irregular gray shapes lightly layered to simulate cosmic dust. Add a few gentle white specks between them for subtle highlights.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark background with irregular gray shapes representing cosmic dust -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='120' r='5' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='300' y='200' width='10' height='15' fill='dimgray'/>
  <polygon points='250,50 260,70 240,70' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='100' r='4' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='100' cy='250' r='3' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='250' r='3' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Subtle white specks -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='180' r='1' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='140' r='1' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a colossal planetary ring surrounding a giant world
description: Draw a large circle for the planet in a muted color, then create an elliptical ring around it in light gray. Place small circles along the ring to represent orbiting debris.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large circle planet and elliptical ring -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='60' fill='#888888'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='90' ry='30' fill='none' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Orbiting debris -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='3' fill='lightgray'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='150' r='3' fill='lightgray'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='150' r='3' fill='lightgray'/>
</svg>

concept: an ethereal cosmic bridge between two galaxies
description: Sketch two distant galaxy shapes in contrasting colors, then draw a long, thin curved line in light blue linking them as a bridge. Add small star shapes along the line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two distant galaxy shapes -->
  <ellipse cx='170' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='purple' opacity='0.7'/>
  <ellipse cx='330' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='orange' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Bridge linking them -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,130 300,150' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Small stars along the bridge -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='135' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a luminous quasar beaming through the darkness
description: Create a central bright white circle to represent the quasar, and radiate several thin, straight lines in light blue outward over a dark background. Scatter tiny white dots to enhance the effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central bright white quasar -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='15' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Thin straight light blue lines radiating out -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='80' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='220' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='180' y2='150' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='320' y2='150' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tiny white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant nebula bursting with newborn stars
description: Fill the scene with a large, irregular cloud shape in bright pink and blue, and layer several small white circles inside it to represent newly formed stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large irregular cloud shape in bright pink and blue -->
  <path d='M150,130 Q250,70 350,130 Q320,100 250,110 Q180,100 150,130 Z' fill='pink' opacity='0.7'/>
  <path d='M160,140 Q250,80 340,140 Q310,110 250,120 Q190,110 160,140 Z' fill='blue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Small white stars inside -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a gravitational lens bending starlight elegantly
description: Draw a central dark circular shape to represent a massive object, then add concentric curved lines in light blue that bend around it. Place tiny white circles along these curves for star images.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central dark circular massive object -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Concentric curved lines in light blue -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='45' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='60' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Tiny white stars along curves -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='105' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='195' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a dynamic cosmic storm raging in space
description: Form an area of swirling, jagged lines in dark gray and blue over a deep background, with intermittent bursts of white dots to simulate turbulent starlight.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Swirling jagged lines -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q250,80 350,150' fill='none' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M150,160 Q250,90 350,160' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Intermittent white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: an orbiting cluster of sparkling star systems
description: Draw a central dark circle and arrange several small white circles in elliptical orbits around it. Connect the orbits with thin curved lines to suggest gravitational paths.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central dark circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='25' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Elliptical orbits with white circles -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='30' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='40' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Connecting curved lines -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q310,130 310,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q190,170 190,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a mysterious dark matter structure in orbit
description: Depict a large, semi-transparent shape in dark gray as the dark matter halo, with a few scattered white stars overlaid. Use gentle overlapping curves to hint at a complex structure.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Semi-transparent dark gray shape for dark matter halo -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='40' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Scattered white stars -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic ribbon of interstellar plasma
description: Draw a long, flowing curved shape across the canvas in light blue and purple, layered on a dark background. Add a few small white dots along its length for star accents.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Flowing curved shape -->
  <path d='M50,200 Q250,100 450,200' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M50,210 Q250,110 450,210' fill='none' stroke='purple' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Small white dots along the path -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirling vortex of galactic energy
description: Sketch a central circular void in black, surrounded by multiple curved, concentric rings in blue and white that swirl outward to indicate energetic flow.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central void -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Concentric rings -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='45' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='60' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant starfield with endless horizons
description: Fill a wide rectangular background with deep blue and sprinkle numerous small white circles randomly to create a vast, radiant field of stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deep blue background with scattered white stars -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <circle cx='100' cy='50' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a majestic spiral galaxy in full bloom
description: Create a large, bright central circle for the galactic core and layer several wide, curved spiral arms in blue that extend outward. Dot the arms with tiny white stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Galactic core -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='25' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Curved spiral arms -->
  <path d='M250,150 C280,100 220,100 250,150 C280,200 220,200 250,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C260,90 240,90 250,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Tiny white stars along arms -->
  <circle cx='260' cy='110' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='190' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a celestial body with orbiting comet trails
description: Draw a large circular planet in a muted tone and add several narrow, curved lines in white trailing away from it to represent comets passing by.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large muted planet -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='#777777' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Narrow white trailing lines for comets -->
  <path d='M300,150 Q320,140 340,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M200,150 Q180,160 160,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a nebula illuminated by nearby supernova remnants
description: Overlay a soft cloud shape in pink and blue on a dark background, then place several bright, overlapping bursts of red and orange shapes near the cloud to represent supernova remnants.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Soft cloud shape in pink and blue -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='50' fill='pink' opacity='0.6'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='40' fill='blue' opacity='0.6'/>
  <!-- Bright bursts for supernova remnants -->
  <polygon points='250,100 260,130 240,130' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='250,200 260,170 240,170' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic ballet of orbiting planetary bodies
description: Arrange a series of small circles in various colors around a larger central circle on a dark backdrop. Connect them with thin curved lines to indicate orbital paths.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central circle with orbiting small circles -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='5' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Connecting orbital lines -->
  <path d='M250,150 L200,150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L300,150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,100' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: an expansive universe with clustered galaxies
description: Fill the scene with multiple large and small circular shapes in different hues to represent galaxies, arranged in loose clusters over a deep dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Multiple circular galaxy shapes -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='100' r='30' fill='purple' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='80' r='40' fill='blue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='35' fill='red' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='100' cy='220' r='25' fill='green' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Additional scattered small circles for stars -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a luminous stellar wind shaping cosmic clouds
description: Draw a bright central star and extend several thin, wavy lines in light blue outward. Overlay these lines onto a softly colored cloud shape in purple to simulate wind effects.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bright central star -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='25' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Thin wavy lines in light blue -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q260,120 270,150' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q240,180 230,150' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Purple cloud overlay -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='70' ry='30' fill='purple' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

concept: a dramatic collision of two spiral galaxies
description: Sketch two spiral galaxy shapes in contrasting colors (such as blue and red) overlapping on a dark background, with their arms intermingling and small white stars scattered between them.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two spiral galaxy shapes -->
  <g opacity='0.8'>
    <path d='M150,150 C170,100 190,100 210,150 C230,200 250,200 270,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
    <path d='M350,150 C330,100 310,100 290,150 C270,200 250,200 230,150' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Small white stars -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a distant pulsar emitting rhythmic light beams
description: Create a small, bright circle for the pulsar at the center, and radiate multiple short, straight white lines outward in a circular pattern over a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pulsar at center -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Radiating short white lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='130' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a galactic merger forming chaotic star streams
description: Depict two overlapping galaxy shapes in different colors merging together, and draw several irregular, curved white lines emanating from the merger area to represent chaotic streams.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Overlapping galaxy shapes -->
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='purple' opacity='0.7'/>
  <ellipse cx='280' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='blue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Irregular white streams -->
  <path d='M220,150 Q250,130 280,150 Q250,170 220,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a nebula shrouded in mystic cosmic fog
description: Layer a large, soft-edged cloud in light purple over a dark background, and scatter faint white dots within it to evoke a mysterious, foggy nebula.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Soft-edged cloud in light purple -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='60' fill='lightpurple' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Faint white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: an intergalactic journey through star-lined lanes
description: Draw a long, winding pathway using a thin white line across a dark canvas, flanked by small white circles to represent stars along the journey.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Winding pathway -->
  <path d='M100,250 Q250,150 400,250' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Small white stars along the path -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='230' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='230' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant supercluster spanning deep space
description: Form a vast area filled with clusters of small circular galaxy shapes in various colors on a deep dark background, with subtle overlapping to show density.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Clustered galaxy shapes -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='100' r='20' fill='purple' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='140' r='15' fill='blue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='18' fill='red' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='160' r='20' fill='green' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='130' r='15' fill='orange' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Overlap hints -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic dance of planets and asteroids
description: Arrange several small circles and irregular shapes in different colors around a larger central body on a dark background, connected by thin orbital lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Larger central body -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='25' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Surrounding small circles in various colors -->
  <circle cx='210' cy='150' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='150' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='5' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Thin orbital connecting lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a glowing accretion disk around a black hole
description: Depict a central black circle with multiple concentric, curved rings in white and light blue surrounding it, giving the impression of an illuminated disk.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central black circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Concentric rings -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='70' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a starburst galaxy with explosive energy
description: Create a central burst of white light with several thick, radiating lines in red and orange extending outward over a dark field, interspersed with small star dots.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central burst -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='15' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Thick radiating lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='80' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='220' stroke='orange' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='180' y2='150' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='320' y2='150' stroke='orange' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Tiny star dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic fountain ejecting streams of light
description: Draw a vertical burst with several overlapping triangular shapes in red, orange, and yellow, emanating from a narrow base on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Vertical burst with overlapping triangles -->
  <polygon points='245,200 255,200 250,150' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='245,150 255,150 250,100' fill='orange' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Base -->
  <rect x='247' y='200' width='6' height='20' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: an orbiting moon casting dramatic shadows
description: Form a large circular moon in pale gray and add a smaller dark circle partially overlapping it to create a shadow effect. Surround the moon with a few tiny star shapes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large circular moon -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='lightgray'/>
  <!-- Overlapping dark circle to create shadow -->
  <circle cx='270' cy='150' r='25' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Tiny star shapes -->
  <circle cx='230' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='180' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant constellation mapped across the cosmos
description: Scatter several small white circles in a deliberate pattern across a dark blue background, and connect select circles with thin straight lines to form a constellation.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Constellation: several small white circles connected -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='110' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='140' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='100' x2='240' y2='130' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='130' x2='280' y2='110' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='110' x2='320' y2='140' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant comet trailing ice and dust
description: Draw a small, bright circular comet head in white with a long, tapered tail formed by a curved shape in light blue, scattered with small dots to represent dust.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Comet head and tapered tail -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='8' fill='white'/>
  <path d='M158,150 Q200,140 250,150' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Dust dots -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='145' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='148' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a deep space region with swirling nebular shapes
description: Layer multiple amorphous, overlapping cloud shapes in soft purple and blue on a dark background, interspersed with tiny white stars for contrast.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Amorphous cloud shapes in soft purple and blue -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='60' fill='purple' opacity='0.5'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='50' fill='blue' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Tiny white stars -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic mosaic of interstellar particles
description: Fill the scene with numerous small, irregular shapes in light gray scattered across a dark canvas, arranged to form a subtle mosaic pattern.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Subtle mosaic of irregular light gray shapes -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='50' height='30' fill='lightgray' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='220' y='120' width='40' height='25' fill='lightgray' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='280' y='90' width='60' height='35' fill='lightgray' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='350' y='130' width='50' height='30' fill='lightgray' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a bright star cluster nestled in darkness
description: Draw a dense grouping of small white circles closely packed together on a pitch-black background, with slight overlaps to indicate depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dense grouping of small white circles -->
  <circle cx='230' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='235' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='265' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirling cosmic storm of electric light
description: Depict a turbulent area using multiple jagged, curved lines in white and blue radiating from a central point on a dark background, interspersed with star shapes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Turbulent area with jagged, curved lines -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q200,100 250,150 Q300,200 350,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M150,160 Q200,110 250,160 Q300,210 350,160' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Star shapes -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a mysterious void with scattered luminous stars
description: Fill a large dark rectangle with a near-black color and randomly place small white circles to represent distant, scattered stars in the void.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Near-black background with scattered white circles -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#111111'/>
  <circle cx='100' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='220' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: an expansive nebula with layered color gradients
description: Create a large cloud shape using soft, overlapping curves in varying shades of purple and blue, with gradual transitions between colors and a few white stars peeking through.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large cloud shape in soft purple and blue -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q250,80 350,150 Q300,120 250,130 Q200,120 150,150 Z' fill='purple' opacity='0.6'/>
  <path d='M170,160 Q250,90 330,160 Q290,130 250,140 Q210,130 170,160 Z' fill='blue' opacity='0.6'/>
  <!-- White stars peeking through -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic tide of colliding gas and stars
description: Sketch a dynamic scene with overlapping curved shapes in red, orange, and blue representing gas collisions, interlaced with small white star dots on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dynamic gas collision scene -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,50 400,150' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.8'/>
  <path d='M100,160 Q250,60 400,160' fill='none' stroke='orange' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.8'/>
  <path d='M100,170 Q250,70 400,170' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Small white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a starry canvas of swirling cosmic hues
description: Fill the background with a mix of deep blues and purples and overlay swirling curves in lighter shades. Add scattered white circles to depict a starry sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Background with deep blues and purples -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#gradSky)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='gradSky' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:darkblue;stop-opacity:1' />
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:purple;stop-opacity:1' />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Swirling lighter curves -->
  <path d='M50,150 Q250,100 450,150' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.5'/>
  <path d='M50,160 Q250,110 450,160' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Scattered white circles -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='180' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a colossal interstellar cloud of vibrant gases
description: Draw a massive, amorphous cloud using bold strokes of purple, blue, and red on a dark background, with soft edges and occasional white star specks.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Massive amorphous cloud -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,20 400,150 Q350,100 150,150 Z' fill='purple' opacity='0.7' stroke='none'/>
  <path d='M120,160 Q250,30 380,160 Q340,110 120,160 Z' fill='blue' opacity='0.7' stroke='none'/>
  <!-- Occasional white star specks -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant beam of starlight piercing darkness
description: Create a thin, straight white line that cuts across a dark blue background, ending in a small burst of light to suggest a focused beam.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Thin focused beam -->
  <line x1='50' y1='150' x2='450' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Burst at the end -->
  <circle cx='450' cy='150' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a nebula of shimmering cosmic colors unfurling
description: Depict a large, gently curved shape with overlapping layers of purple, blue, and pink, fading into the dark background with scattered white highlights.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Overlapping layered shape -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,80 400,150 Q250,220 100,150 Z' fill='purple' opacity='0.6'/>
  <path d='M120,160 Q250,90 380,160 Q250,230 120,160 Z' fill='blue' opacity='0.6'/>
  <path d='M140,170 Q250,100 360,170 Q250,240 140,170 Z' fill='pink' opacity='0.6'/>
  <!-- Scattered highlights -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a dynamic cluster of orbiting dwarf galaxies
description: Arrange several small circular galaxy shapes in different colors around a central area on a dark background, connecting them with faint orbital lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Multiple galaxy circles arranged around center -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='20' fill='purple' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='20' fill='blue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='20' fill='red' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='20' fill='green' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Faint orbital lines -->
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='120' x2='300' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='150' x2='250' y2='180' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='200' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a luminous pathway through a dense star field
description: Draw a long, thin curved line in white cutting across a dark background filled with numerous small white circles, representing a path among the stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pumpkin with curved stem -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='40' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='100' width='10' height='20' fill='#8B4513'/>
</svg>

concept: a celestial spiral of stardust and light
description: Form a large spiral pattern with multiple curved arms in blue and white that wind outward from a bright central point on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Simplified bicycle -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='250' r='30' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='250' r='30' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M200,250 L250,200 L300,250' fill='none' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <rect x='240' y='200' width='20' height='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic cradle for forming new stars
description: Create a soft, rounded cloud shape in light purple on a dark backdrop, and sprinkle numerous tiny white circles within it to depict star formation.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Curved boat shape -->
  <path d='M150,200 Q250,150 350,200 L350,220 Q250,190 150,220 Z' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Triangular sail -->
  <polygon points='250,150 270,200 230,200' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Lake background -->
  <rect y='220' width='500' height='80' fill='#1E90FF'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant burst of cosmic energy and color
description: Depict an explosion with a bright white center surrounded by overlapping, irregular shapes in red, orange, and yellow, layered over a dark field.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Layered cake -->
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='60' height='20' fill='#FF69B4' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='170' width='60' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='190' width='60' height='20' fill='#FF69B4' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Candles -->
  <rect x='240' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='255' y='140' width='5' height='10' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: an ancient galaxy with fading spiral arms
description: Draw a large, dim central circle in gray with several loosely curved spiral arms in muted blue extending outward, lightly dotted with white stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dim central circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='gray' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Loosely curved spiral arms -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q270,110 290,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.5'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q230,190 210,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Tiny stars -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a mysterious shadow of dark cosmic matter
description: Fill a large area with a deep dark shade and overlay a few vague, irregular shapes in dark gray to imply the presence of unseen matter.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deep dark background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#000000'/>
  <!-- Vague dark gray shapes -->
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='150' rx='40' ry='20' fill='darkgray' opacity='0.3'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='180' rx='30' ry='15' fill='darkgray' opacity='0.3'/>
  <!-- Faint white specks -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='1' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='1' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a glowing rim of a distant exoplanet
