svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Muted planet with illuminated rim -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='#666666' stroke='white' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic bridge linking two ancient galaxies
description: Form two distant galaxy shapes in different colors and connect them with a long, thin curved line in light blue that represents a gravitational bridge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two distant galaxies -->
  <ellipse cx='180' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='purple' opacity='0.7'/>
  <ellipse cx='320' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='orange' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Gravitational bridge -->
  <path d='M210,150 Q250,130 290,150' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirling maelstrom of cosmic gas and dust
description: Draw an irregular, turbulent cloud using overlapping curves in dark gray and blue on a black background, interspersed with scattered white dots.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Turbulent cloud -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,80 400,150 Q350,110 150,150 Z' fill='darkgray' opacity='0.8'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='140' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant field of twinkling distant stars
description: Fill the background with a deep navy hue and randomly place numerous small white circles to represent a field of distant stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deep navy background with random white stars -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#000033'/>
  <circle cx='80' cy='60' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a majestic universe filled with celestial wonders
description: Create a layered scene with multiple large and small circular shapes representing galaxies, arranged on a dark background with scattered white stars for depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Layered galaxies -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='120' r='30' fill='purple' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='20' fill='blue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='130' r='25' fill='red' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Scattered stars -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic panorama of intertwined starlight and gas
description: Depict an expansive scene with smooth, overlapping cloud shapes in blue and purple, interlaced with thin white lines and dots to represent starlight.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Expansive overlapping cloud shapes -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='130' rx='120' ry='40' fill='blue' opacity='0.5'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='120' ry='40' fill='purple' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Thin white lines for starlight -->
  <line x1='100' y1='130' x2='150' y2='130' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='170' x2='400' y2='170' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant supernova remnant spreading its light
description: Draw a central bright burst in white with radiating, jagged lines in red and orange, layered over a dark background to represent the remnant.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central bright burst -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Radiating jagged lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='90' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='210' stroke='orange' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='190' y2='150' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='310' y2='150' stroke='orange' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

concept: a mysterious nebula with pulsating energy cores
description: Form an amorphous cloud shape using soft curves in purple and blue on a dark backdrop, and add a few bright white circles in the center to represent energy cores.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Amorphous cloud shape representing supernova remnant -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='70' ry='40' fill='purple' opacity='0.7'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='blue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: an ethereal cosmic veil draped across space
description: Sketch a large, semi-transparent, flowing shape in light purple that spans the canvas, with subtle edges blending into a dark background and a few small star dots.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Semi-transparent flowing shape -->
  <path d='M50,180 Q250,130 450,180' fill='none' stroke='lightpurple' stroke-width='8' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Small star dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='160' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a brilliant star flanked by orbiting planets
description: Draw a bright white central star and arrange several smaller colored circles in circular orbits around it, each connected by thin curved lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bright white central star -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Colored circles in circular orbits -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='5' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Orbital lines -->
  <path d='M250,150 L250,100' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L300,150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,200' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L200,150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a dazzling array of constellations in motion
description: Arrange multiple groups of small white circles on a deep blue background, connecting them with thin straight lines to form various constellations that appear to shift.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Constellation groups -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='130' x2='230' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='150' x2='240' y2='170' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Additional group -->
  <circle cx='300' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='140' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='160' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='120' x2='310' y2='140' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='140' x2='320' y2='160' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a deep space mirror reflecting ancient starlight
description: Create a large reflective circular shape in silver at the center of a dark background, with tiny white dots scattered along its edge to suggest reflected stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Reflective circular shape in silver -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='silver' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Tiny white dots along the edge -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic swirl of vibrant nebular patterns
description: Form a spiral pattern using broad, curved arms in shades of blue and purple that radiate from a bright center, dotted with small white star shapes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Spiral pattern -->
  <path d='M250,150 
           m-40,0 
           a40,40 0 1,0 80,0 
           a40,40 0 1,0 -80,0' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.8'/>
  <path d='M250,150 
           m-50,0 
           a50,50 0 1,0 100,0 
           a50,50 0 1,0 -100,0' fill='none' stroke='purple' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Small star shapes on spiral arms -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cluster of exploding stars in deep space
description: Draw several bright bursts using overlapping white and red shapes on a dark background, each burst interlaced with small white dots to represent fragmented stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bright bursts -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='15' fill='white'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='90' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='210' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='190' y2='150' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='310' y2='150' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Additional white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a dynamic interplay of dark and bright matter
description: Depict an abstract scene with large dark shapes in black and gray layered behind sporadic bright white star clusters, creating a contrast between dark matter and luminous bodies.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Abstract dark shapes -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='80' height='120' fill='black' opacity='0.7'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='gray' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Bright white star clusters -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a celestial tapestry woven with star clusters
description: Fill the background with overlapping clusters of small white circles arranged in flowing patterns across a deep navy canvas, suggesting an intricate tapestry of stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Overlapping clusters of white circles -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Repeat in another cluster -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='330' cy='205' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='340' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant supercluster of shimmering galaxies
description: Arrange several large circular shapes in various muted colors to represent galaxies, all grouped together on a dark background with scattered white stars for added texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Grouped circular galaxy shapes -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='120' r='30' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='lavender' opacity='0.7'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='120' r='30' fill='lightgreen' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Scattered white stars -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic explosion igniting a stellar nursery
description: Sketch a bright central burst with overlapping red and orange shapes, surrounded by a soft, diffuse cloud in purple that contains many small white dots to represent newborn stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bright central burst with overlapping red and orange shapes -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='240,150 250,80 260,150' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='240,150 250,220 260,150' fill='orange' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Soft diffuse purple cloud -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='40' fill='purple' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

concept: a spiral galaxy with luminous outer rings
description: Draw a central bright circle surrounded by multiple curved spiral arms in blue and white, with a thin outer ring around the entire shape to emphasize luminosity.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central bright circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='25' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Curved spiral arms -->
  <path d='M250,150 C270,100 230,100 250,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C230,200 270,200 250,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Outer thin ring -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a star-flecked void illuminated by distant suns
description: Fill a large dark rectangle with sporadic small white circles placed sparsely to indicate distant suns shining into the void.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark rectangle background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Sporadic small white circles -->
  <circle cx='50' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='180' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='450' cy='140' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a celestial ocean of countless twinkling stars
description: Create a broad, dark background filled with innumerable tiny white dots uniformly scattered to evoke the vastness of a starry ocean.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Broad dark background with uniform tiny white dots -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Generate many dots (for brevity, only a few shown) -->
  <circle cx='100' cy='50' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='100' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='200' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic wind stirring interstellar gas clouds
description: Draw several thin, curving white lines moving across a background of soft, overlapping blue and purple cloud shapes, indicating the force of a cosmic wind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Soft overlapping blue and purple clouds -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='50' fill='blue' opacity='0.3'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='40' fill='purple' opacity='0.3'/>
  <!-- Thin, curving white lines -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q150,130 200,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M300,150 Q350,130 400,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a luminous nebula cradling new star formations
description: Sketch a large, softly blurred cloud in light blue and purple on a dark background, with numerous small white circles inside to represent forming stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Soft blurred cloud -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='60' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.4'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='50' fill='purple' opacity='0.4'/>
  <!-- Many small white circles inside -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='160' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a pulsating core of an active galactic nucleus
description: Create a bright central circle surrounded by several thin, radiating lines in white and light blue, set against a dark background to simulate pulsation.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bright central circle with thin radiating lines -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='white'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a mysterious cluster of ancient, dying stars
description: Arrange several small, dim white circles on a deep gray background to represent an old cluster, with subtle overlapping to suggest aging and decay.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Old star cluster -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='140' r='2' fill='white' opacity='0.5'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='145' r='2' fill='white' opacity='0.5'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='140' r='2' fill='white' opacity='0.5'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='155' r='2' fill='white' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant arc of starlight over deep space
description: Draw a broad, curved white line spanning across a dark background and add scattered small white dots above and below it to mimic starlight arcing across space.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Broad curved white line -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,100 400,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Scattered small white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='105' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='145' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirling cosmos of interlocking light and dark
description: Create a complex pattern using overlapping curves in white and dark gray that interlock across a deep background, with tiny star shapes placed within the design.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Overlapping curves pattern -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q250,110 350,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M150,160 Q250,120 350,160' fill='none' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Tiny star dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic cascade of exploding star fragments
description: Depict an explosion by layering multiple irregular shapes in red, orange, and yellow that cascade downward over a dark backdrop, interspersed with small white dots representing fragments.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Explosion of irregular shapes -->
  <polygon points='240,150 250,100 260,150' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='240,150 250,200 260,150' fill='orange' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='230,150 250,80 270,150' fill='yellow' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Fine white lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='80' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant halo surrounding a distant supermassive black hole
description: Draw a central black circle for the black hole and add a wide, soft halo in light blue around it. Scatter small white star dots along the halo to enhance its glow.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Black hole central circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Soft halo -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='none' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='6' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Scattered star dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a majestic interplay of galaxies in cosmic collision
description: Sketch two large overlapping spiral shapes in contrasting colors such as blue and red on a dark background, with their arms intermingling and small white star dots accentuating the collision.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Two overlapping spiral galaxies -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q200,80 250,150 Q300,220 350,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M350,150 Q300,80 250,150 Q200,220 150,150' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Small white stars -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant trail left by a speeding comet
description: Create a small bright circle for the comet head in white and attach a long, tapering trailing shape in light blue behind it, dotted with tiny white circles along its length.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Comet pulsar -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Straight white lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='280' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='220' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic explosion with an intricate light pattern
description: Depict a central burst of white light with overlapping, angular shapes in red and orange radiating outward over a dark background, with fine white lines adding detail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central burst of white light -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Angular overlapping shapes -->
  <polygon points='240,150 250,80 260,150' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='240,150 250,220 260,150' fill='orange' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Fine white lines for detail -->
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='250' y2='70' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a dense field of nebular clusters and star dust
description: Fill the canvas with many small, irregular cloud shapes in soft purple and blue layered over a dark background, interspersed with countless tiny white dots to suggest dust.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Many small irregular cloud shapes -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='purple' opacity='0.4'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='blue' opacity='0.4'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='150' rx='30' ry='15' fill='purple' opacity='0.4'/>
  <!-- Tiny white dots scattered -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='140' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='160' r='1.5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a luminous arch of interstellar energy waves
description: Draw a broad, curved white line arching across a dark background, with several thin, wavy lines layered inside it to simulate pulsing energy.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Broad curved white line -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,100 400,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Thin wavy inner lines -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,110 400,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a celestial fountain of radiant cosmic particles
description: Sketch a vertical burst from a small base using several thin, curved lines in white and light blue, with small dots along the lines to represent particles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Vertical burst from a small base -->
  <path d='M250,200 Q250,150 250,100' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Small particles -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='2' fill='lightblue'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='2' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a swirling mosaic of starlight and cosmic clouds
description: Form a complex, overlapping pattern using soft cloud shapes in purple and blue combined with scattered small white circles, arranged in a swirling mosaic across a dark field.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Complex overlapping cloud pattern -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='50' fill='purple' opacity='0.5'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='40' fill='blue' opacity='0.5'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='30' fill='purple' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Scattered small white circles -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a mysterious pathway through a stellar labyrinth
description: Create a winding, narrow line in white across a dark background and dot it with small white circles to suggest a hidden path among complex star formations.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Winding narrow white line -->
  <path d='M100,200 Q250,180 400,200' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Dots along the path -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='190' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='190' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant burst of light from a distant quasar
description: Draw a small, bright central circle for the quasar and layer several short, straight lines in white radiating from it over a dark canvas to depict an intense burst.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small quasar circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Short white radiating lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='135' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='265' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='235' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic spiral unfolding in vibrant hues
description: Sketch a large spiral shape with wide, curved arms in a mix of blue, purple, and red that gradually fade into the dark background, with small white dots along the edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Large spiral shape -->
  <path d='M250,150 
           m-40,0 
           a40,40 0 1,0 80,0 
           a40,40 0 1,0 -80,0' fill='none' stroke='purple' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Small white dots on edge -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a stellar nursery glowing with newborn brilliance
description: Depict a large, soft cloud in light purple with a subtle gradient on a dark background, sprinkled with many small white dots to represent newly formed stars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Soft cloud with subtle gradient -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='60' fill='lightpurple' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Many tiny white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a dazzling intergalactic field of swirling stars
description: Fill a wide area with multiple overlapping curved lines in various shades of blue that swirl around a central dark point, dotted with small white star shapes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Overlapping curved lines in shades of blue -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q250,100 350,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M150,160 Q250,110 350,160' fill='none' stroke='skyblue' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Small white star shapes -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='210' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a cosmic vortex drawing in surrounding stardust
description: Create a central dark spiral shape that tapers inward, and scatter numerous tiny white dots around it to simulate stardust being drawn into the vortex.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Central dark spiral tapering inward -->
  <path d='M250,150 
           m-30,0 
           a30,30 0 1,0 60,0 
           a30,30 0 1,0 -60,0' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Scattered tiny white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='140' r='1' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='160' r='1' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a radiant emission from a pulsating star cluster
description: Draw a cluster of small white circles arranged closely together on a dark background, with several thin, bright lines emanating from the center to simulate pulsation.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cluster of small white circles -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='155' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='155' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Radiating thin bright lines -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='130' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a brilliant arc of light encircling a dark void
description: Form a broad, curved white line that encircles a central dark area on a deep background, with a few small white star dots along the arc.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Broad curved white line encircling a dark area -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q250,80 350,150 Q250,220 150,150 Z' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Few star dots along the arc -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a celestial symphony of cosmic light
description: Depict a harmonious blend of swirling shapes in blue, purple, and red layered over a dark background with scattered white star dots to evoke a cosmic symphony.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Swirling shapes in blue, purple and red -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q250,100 350,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M150,160 Q250,110 350,160' fill='none' stroke='purple' stroke-width='3'/>
  <path d='M150,170 Q250,120 350,170' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Scattered small white dots -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a vintage bicycle on cobblestone street
description: Draw two large circles for the wheels in black, a thin curved rectangle for the frame in brown, and small square shapes arranged in a grid for the cobblestones in gray, layered beneath the bicycle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bicycle wheels -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='250' r='30' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='250' r='30' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Frame -->
  <path d='M180,250 L250,200 L320,250' fill='none' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Cobblestone grid beneath -->
  <rect x='150' y='260' width='200' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='270' x2='350' y2='270' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='260' x2='200' y2='280' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='260' x2='250' y2='280' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='260' x2='300' y2='280' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a bustling carnival parade under neon lights
description: Sketch multiple abstract shapes to represent floats and performers, using vibrant colors like red, blue, and yellow, with thin curved lines for streamers and layered neon outlines on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Abstract floats and performers -->
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='80' height='50' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='80' height='50' fill='blue' opacity='0.8'/>
  <rect x='300' y='100' width='80' height='50' fill='yellow' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Streamers -->
  <line x1='140' y1='100' x2='140' y2='50' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='120' x2='240' y2='70' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='340' y1='100' x2='340' y2='50' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a futuristic cityscape with hovering cars
description: Create a skyline using tall rectangles in dark gray for buildings, add smaller ellipses for hovering cars in bright blue and red, and layer a light gradient rectangle in the background to suggest a twilight sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Skyline -->
  <rect x='50' y='100' width='50' height='150' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='120' y='80' width='40' height='170' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='180' y='90' width='60' height='160' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='260' y='70' width='50' height='180' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='330' y='80' width='40' height='170' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Hovering cars -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='250' rx='8' ry='4' fill='blue'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='250' rx='8' ry='4' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Twilight gradient background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#twilight)' opacity='0.5'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='twilight' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:orange;stop-opacity:1' />
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:violet;stop-opacity:1' />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

concept: an enchanted forest with glowing mushrooms
description: Draw a background of overlapping green tree shapes using irregular polygons, then add small rounded rectangles for tree trunks and several circular shapes in white and light blue to represent glowing mushrooms on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Background with overlapping green tree shapes -->
  <polygon points='100,200 150,100 200,200' fill='green' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='220,200 270,120 320,200' fill='green' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='340,200 390,130 440,200' fill='green' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Tree trunks -->
  <rect x='140' y='200' width='10' height='50' fill='brown'/>
  <rect x='260' y='200' width='10' height='50' fill='brown'/>
  <rect x='380' y='200' width='10' height='50' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Glowing mushrooms -->
  <circle cx='120' cy='90' r='10' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='80' r='10' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a serene lakeside cabin at dawn
description: Sketch a small cabin using a rectangle for the building in brown with a triangular roof in dark red, place it near a horizontal ellipse for the lake in blue, and add a soft gradient in the sky using light pink and orange.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Background with soft gradient sky -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='gradSky901' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:lightpink;stop-opacity:1' />
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:orange;stop-opacity:1' />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#gradSky901)'/>
  <!-- Cabin building -->
  <rect x='150' y='140' width='80' height='80' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Triangular roof -->
  <polygon points='150,140 190,100 230,140' fill='darkred'/>
  <!-- Lake -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='280' rx='150' ry='30' fill='#1E90FF'/>
</svg>

concept: a busy urban marketplace with colorful stalls
description: Draw several small rectangles and squares in bright colors like red, yellow, and blue to represent market stalls, arranged on a gray background for pavement, with thin lines for tent outlines and overhead string lights.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gray pavement -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Market stalls (small colored rectangles and squares) -->
  <rect x='50' y='200' width='40' height='40' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='110' y='210' width='35' height='35' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='170' y='205' width='40' height='40' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Tent outlines -->
  <line x1='50' y1='200' x2='90' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='110' y1='210' x2='145' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Overhead string lights -->
  <line x1='50' y1='150' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='70' cy='150' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='100' cy='150' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='130' cy='150' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='160' cy='150' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='190' cy='150' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a rustic farmhouse with a red barn
description: Create a farmhouse using a simple square for the main building in cream, a triangular roof in brown, and a larger rectangle in red for the barn placed behind it, with small details like windows represented by smaller squares.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Farmhouse main building -->
  <rect x='150' y='140' width='80' height='80' fill='cream' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Triangular roof -->
  <polygon points='150,140 190,100 230,140' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Barn behind the farmhouse -->
  <rect x='240' y='130' width='100' height='100' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Windows on barn -->
  <rect x='260' y='150' width='20' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='310' y='150' width='20' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a snowy mountain peak with a winding road
description: Form a large triangle for the mountain in light gray with a white cap at the top to show snow, then draw a thin, curved path in dark gray winding down the slope.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Mountain shape -->
  <polygon points='100,250 250,100 400,250' fill='lightgray'/>
  <!-- Snow cap -->
  <polygon points='220,140 250,100 280,140' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Winding path down the mountain -->
  <path d='M250,100 Q240,160 250,220' stroke='darkgray' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a tropical beach with palm trees and surfboards
description: Draw a wide horizontal rectangle for the ocean in blue, a curved yellow shape for the sandy beach below, and add tall, slender green rectangles for palm trees with small circular fronds; place a simple elongated oval for a surfboard leaning nearby.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ocean -->
  <rect width='500' height='150' y='150' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Sandy beach -->
  <path d='M0,150 Q250,220 500,150 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Palm trees -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='10' height='70' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='105' cy='80' r='10' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <rect x='400' y='90' width='10' height='60' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='405' cy='90' r='10' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <!-- Surfboard -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='140' rx='50' ry='10' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: an underwater coral reef teeming with life
description: Fill the background with a deep blue rectangle and overlay irregular, colorful shapes in orange, pink, and purple to represent coral, along with small fish shapes drawn as ellipses in various colors scattered around.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Deep blue background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <!-- Coral shapes -->
  <polygon points='100,200 120,160 140,200' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='200,220 220,180 240,220' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='300,210 320,170 340,210' fill='purple'/>
  <!-- Small fish -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='250' rx='10' ry='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='250' rx='10' ry='5' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a dramatic lightning storm over a desert
description: Create a dark, nearly black background and add jagged white zigzag lines for lightning over a horizontal rectangle in sandy brown representing the desert, with a few scattered dark shapes for distant cacti.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Nearly black desert background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#111111'/>
  <!-- Jagged lightning lines -->
  <polyline points='100,50 120,90 110,130 130,170' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polyline points='300,60 320,100 310,140 330,180' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Sandy brown desert floor -->
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='sandybrown'/>
  <!-- Distant cacti -->
  <rect x='80' y='230' width='10' height='20' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <rect x='400' y='235' width='10' height='15' fill='darkgreen'/>
</svg>

concept: a bustling train station in the rain
description: Draw a large rectangular structure for the station in gray with long horizontal windows, add several thin vertical lines for pillars, and overlay short diagonal lines in blue to represent rain falling over the scene.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Station building -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='300' height='140' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Horizontal windows -->
  <rect x='120' y='100' width='40' height='30' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='40' height='30' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='40' height='30' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='300' y='100' width='40' height='30' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Vertical pillars -->
  <line x1='110' y1='80' x2='110' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='390' y1='80' x2='390' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Diagonal rain lines -->
  <line x1='150' y1='80' x2='160' y2='110' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='260' y2='110' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='80' x2='360' y2='110' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a cozy cafe on a rainy day
description: Sketch a small rectangular building with a curved awning in warm red and brown tones, and add several thin, diagonal blue lines outside to depict falling rain, with a few small circles for puddles on the sidewalk.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small building with curved awning -->
  <rect x='180' y='130' width='100' height='80' fill='lightcoral' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M180,130 Q230,100 280,130' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <!-- Rain details -->
  <line x1='200' y1='120' x2='210' y2='100' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='120' x2='260' y2='100' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='140' r='3' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

concept: a medieval castle perched on a hilltop
description: Form a large, irregular polygon for the castle walls in gray with small rectangular towers on top, placed on a curved green hill; add a triangular roof in dark red to one of the towers for contrast.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Castle walls as irregular polygon -->
  <polygon points='150,220 200,120 250,110 300,120 350,220 300,240 250,230 200,240' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Towers -->
  <rect x='190' y='110' width='20' height='30' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='290' y='110' width='20' height='30' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- One tower roof in dark red -->
  <polygon points='190,110 200,90 210,110' fill='darkred'/>
</svg>

concept: a modern art gallery with abstract shapes
description: Draw a large white rectangle for the gallery wall and overlay several irregular colored shapes (such as polygons and circles) in bright hues like blue, red, and yellow, with thin black outlines to create an abstract composition.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gallery wall -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Abstract shapes -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='30' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='250' y='100' width='60' height='60' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='350,180 370,140 390,180' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a retro diner with glowing neon signs
description: Create a rectangular building in pastel colors with a curved roof in pink, and add a series of bright, outlined shapes to form neon signs in blue and green above the entrance.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pastel building -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Curved roof -->
  <path d='M150,100 Q250,40 350,100' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Neon signs above entrance -->
  <rect x='230' y='60' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='280' y='60' width='40' height='20' fill='none' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a series of small, overlapping green rectangles for grapevines on rolling hills in the background, and place a large horizontal rectangle in warm orange and red for the setting sun, with a silhouette of a farmhouse in front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Grape vines on hills -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <!-- Overlapping green rectangles for vines -->
  <rect x='50' y='180' width='100' height='20' fill='green' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='80' y='190' width='100' height='20' fill='green' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Setting sun -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='80' fill='url(#sunGrad913)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='sunGrad913' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:orange;stop-opacity:1' />
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:red;stop-opacity:1' />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Farmhouse silhouette -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='80' height='50' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a minimalist poster with geometric patterns
description: Use a large white background and overlay several simple geometric shapes (such as circles, squares, and triangles) in black and primary colors arranged in a balanced composition with clear negative space.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- White background with geometric shapes -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='100' cy='100' r='40' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='200' y='80' width='80' height='80' fill='blue'/>
  <polygon points='350,100 400,180 300,180' fill='yellow'/>
  <!-- Minimal black outlines -->
  <circle cx='100' cy='100' r='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill-opacity='0'/>
  <rect x='200' y='80' width='80' height='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill-opacity='0'/>
  <polygon points='350,100 400,180 300,180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill-opacity='0'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant street mural in an urban alley
description: Depict a long rectangular wall in a light color and overlay bold, abstract shapes and splatters in bright colors like red, blue, and yellow, with rough, hand-drawn outlines to mimic a painted mural.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rectangular wall as base -->
  <rect x='50' y='100' width='400' height='100' fill='lightyellow'/>
  <!-- Bold abstract splatters -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='130' r='20' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='140' r='25' fill='blue' opacity='0.8'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='15' fill='yellow' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Hand-drawn style outlines -->
  <path d='M50,100 L450,100 L450,200 L50,200 Z' stroke='black' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a serene zen garden with raked sand and stones
description: Fill the background with a light beige rectangle for sand, add several smooth, small oval shapes in dark gray to represent stones, and overlay thin, parallel curved lines to mimic raked sand patterns.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sand background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='beige'/>
  <!-- Stones -->
  <ellipse cx='100' cy='250' rx='10' ry='5' fill='darkgray'/>
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='260' rx='8' ry='4' fill='darkgray'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='255' rx='10' ry='5' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Raked sand lines -->
  <line x1='50' y1='280' x2='450' y2='280' stroke='sandybrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='290' x2='450' y2='290' stroke='sandybrown' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a starry sky over a calm lake
description: Draw a dark blue rectangle for the sky and scatter numerous small white circles to depict stars; below, add a horizontal blue ellipse for the lake with a subtle reflection effect.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark blue sky with stars -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <circle cx='100' cy='50' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='60' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='90' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Lake reflection -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='280' rx='150' ry='30' fill='blue' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

concept: a colorful kite flying on a windy day
description: Create a diamond shape in bright red for the kite with a thin black outline, attach a long thin line for the string, and add several curved lines in blue around it to simulate wind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Kite shape -->
  <polygon points='250,80 270,140 250,200 230,140' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Kite string -->
  <line x1='250' y1='200' x2='250' y2='300' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Wind simulation -->
  <path d='M240,100 Q250,90 260,100' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a rustic windmill in a golden field
description: Draw a tall, narrow rectangle for the windmill tower in gray, and a rotating cross shape for the blades in white, placed on a horizontal field in gold with small tufts of green for grass.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Windmill tower -->
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='150' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Rotating blades (cross shape) -->
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='10' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='110' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='80' x2='260' y2='80' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='120' x2='260' y2='120' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Field background -->
  <rect y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='gold'/>
  <!-- Grass tufts -->
  <rect x='50' y='190' width='10' height='15' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='400' y='190' width='10' height='15' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a bustling harbor with sailing boats
description: Sketch several small boat shapes using curved rectangles and circles in white and blue, arranged along a horizontal blue rectangle representing the water, with a few larger shapes in the background for docks.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Boats on water -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <path d='M100,220 Q150,200 200,220 L200,240 Q150,230 100,240 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M300,220 Q350,200 400,220 L400,240 Q350,230 300,240 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Docks (background) -->
  <rect x='50' y='240' width='400' height='20' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

concept: a majestic waterfall cascading in a forest
description: Depict a series of overlapping white and light blue shapes to form the falling water, placed in front of a dark green backdrop of stylized tree shapes and rocky gray forms at the base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Falling water effect -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='white'/>
  <path d='M0,150 Q250,180 500,150 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Tree shapes (foreground) -->
  <polygon points='50,150 70,100 90,150' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <polygon points='410,150 430,110 450,150' fill='darkgreen'/>
</svg>

concept: a serene countryside with rolling green hills
description: Draw a series of overlapping curved green shapes to represent rolling hills, with a light blue rectangle for the sky above and a few scattered small white circles for distant clouds.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rolling hills -->
  <rect width='500' height='150' y='150' fill='lightblue'/>
  <path d='M0,150 Q250,50 500,150 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Distant clouds -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='10' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a futuristic spaceship landing on barren terrain
description: Create a sleek, oval spaceship shape in metallic gray with angular accents, positioned above a flat, sandy rectangle representing barren terrain, with a dark sky in the background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Barren terrain -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='sandybrown'/>
  <!-- Sleek spaceship -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='30' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 270,130 230,130' fill='lightgray'/>
  <!-- Dark sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='none' stroke='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a magical library with floating books
description: Draw a large rectangular building with tall, arched windows for the library in dark brown, and illustrate several open book shapes as rectangles with curved pages, positioned as if floating in front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Library building -->
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='300' height='200' fill='darkbrown'/>
  <!-- Arched windows -->
  <rect x='130' y='80' width='50' height='70' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='220' y='80' width='50' height='70' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='310' y='80' width='50' height='70' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Floating books -->
  <rect x='180' y='10' width='30' height='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='240' y='20' width='30' height='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a neon-lit cyberpunk alley at night
description: Depict a narrow rectangular alley with dark walls, and overlay bright neon rectangular signs in blue, pink, and green, with simple outlines for windows and graffiti accents.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Alley with dark walls -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Neon signs -->
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='80' height='30' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='50' width='80' height='30' fill='none' stroke='pink' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='340' y='50' width='80' height='30' fill='none' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Windows and graffiti accents -->
  <rect x='110' y='100' width='60' height='40' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: a dreamy pastel sunset over the ocean
description: Fill the top half of the scene with a gradient of soft pink, purple, and orange, and draw a large horizontal ellipse in blue for the ocean below, with a thin white line representing the horizon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gradient sky for ocean scene -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='skyGrad926' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:lightpink;stop-opacity:1' />
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:purple;stop-opacity:1' />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='150' fill='url(#skyGrad926)'/>
  <!-- Ocean ellipse -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='250' ry='50' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Horizon line -->
  <line x1='0' y1='150' x2='500' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant graffiti wall on a city block
description: Sketch a large rectangular wall in a neutral tone, then overlay multiple abstract shapes and scribbles in bright colors like red, yellow, and blue, using rough, freeform lines to mimic graffiti art.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Neutral wall background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightgray'/>
  <!-- Abstract graffiti shapes -->
  <polygon points='100,150 150,130 130,180' fill='red' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='200,100 250,80 300,100 250,120' fill='yellow' opacity='0.8'/>
  <path d='M350,150 L370,130 L390,150 L370,170 Z' fill='blue' opacity='0.8'/>
  <!-- Hand-drawn rough outlines -->
  <path d='M50,150 L450,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a traditional Japanese temple in autumn
description: Draw a low, curved roof structure in dark gray for the temple with a series of small rectangular windows, set against a background of stylized red and orange maple leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Temple structure -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Curved roof -->
  <path d='M150,100 Q250,40 350,100' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Small windows -->
  <rect x='170' y='120' width='30' height='30' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='300' y='120' width='30' height='30' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Maple leaves background -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='50' fill='orangered' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

concept: a quaint village with cobblestone streets
description: Create several small rectangular houses in warm tones, arranged along a curved path filled with a pattern of small gray squares to represent cobblestones, with a few trees in green.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Cobblestone path -->
  <rect x='0' y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='lightgray'/>
  <!-- Small houses -->
  <rect x='50' y='200' width='60' height='50' fill='peachpuff'/>
  <rect x='150' y='210' width='60' height='50' fill='peachpuff'/>
  <rect x='250' y='205' width='60' height='50' fill='peachpuff'/>
  <rect x='350' y='210' width='60' height='50' fill='peachpuff'/>
  <!-- Trees -->
  <circle cx='80' cy='190' r='15' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='190' r='15' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='190' r='15' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='380' cy='190' r='15' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a lively music festival under summer skies
description: Sketch a stage as a large rectangle in dark gray, with abstract shapes in bright colors for speakers and lights, and add small crowd silhouettes in black in the foreground on a light blue background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stage background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Stage area -->
  <rect x='50' y='150' width='400' height='100' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Speakers and lights -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='50' height='50' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='350' y='80' width='50' height='50' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Crowd silhouettes -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='260' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='260' r='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a classic convertible cruising on a coastal highway
description: Draw a sleek car silhouette using smooth curves in red with two circular wheels in black, positioned on a horizontal road in gray that cuts through a coastal scene with a light blue ocean.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Coastal scene with road -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Road -->
  <rect x='0' y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Car silhouette -->
  <path d='M200,230 Q220,210 260,230 L260,250 Q220,270 200,250 Z' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='250' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='250' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Ocean in background -->
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='100' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a serene river flowing through a valley
description: Create a winding blue path representing the river, bordered by gently curving green shapes for the valley hills, with a light sky in the background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- River winding path -->
  <path d='M0,200 Q250,100 500,200 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Valley hills -->
  <path d='M0,200 Q250,150 500,200 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='green' opacity='0.6'/>
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='100' y='0' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a lively carnival with Ferris wheel and games
description: Depict a large circular Ferris wheel in colorful segments in bright red, blue, and yellow, with small rectangular booths in various colors arranged around a central open area on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ferris wheel -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Segments in red, blue, yellow -->
  <path d='M250,150 L250,70' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L330,150' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,230' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Booths -->
  <rect x='240' y='60' width='20' height='20' fill='orange'/>
  <rect x='320' y='140' width='20' height='20' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='240' y='220' width='20' height='20' fill='purple'/>
</svg>

concept: a dynamic skateboard park with ramps and rails
description: Sketch several angled rectangles in gray to form ramps and rails, with a few small silhouettes of skateboarders in black performing tricks on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Ramps and rails -->
  <rect x='100' y='180' width='300' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Skateboarder silhouettes -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='170' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='170' x2='160' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='170' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='170' x2='360' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a charming flower market on a busy street
description: Draw a series of small stalls using rectangles in pastel colors, each adorned with circular flower shapes in red, pink, and yellow, arranged along a light-colored pavement.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Market stalls -->
  <rect x='50' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='lightcoral'/>
  <rect x='130' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='210' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='lightyellow'/>
  <rect x='290' y='150' width='60' height='60' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <!-- Canopy lines -->
  <line x1='50' y1='150' x2='350' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Overhead string lights -->
  <line x1='50' y1='130' x2='350' y2='130' stroke='gold' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='90' cy='130' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='170' cy='130' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='330' cy='130' r='3' fill='gold'/>
</svg>

concept: a rustic bridge over a bubbling stream
description: Create a curved rectangular bridge in brown with simple arch details, spanning a wavy blue shape representing a bubbling stream, with small stones drawn as circles along the banks.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bridge -->
  <path d='M100,200 Q250,100 400,200 L400,220 Q250,150 100,220 Z' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Stones along banks -->
  <circle cx='120' cy='220' r='5' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='380' cy='220' r='5' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

concept: a grand opera house with ornate details
description: Depict a large rectangular building in cream with a triangular roof in dark red, adding thin, decorative lines for columns and arched windows, layered on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gallery wall -->
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='400' height='200' fill='cream'/>
  <!-- Decorative abstract shapes -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='250' y='80' width='80' height='80' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='350,180 370,140 390,180' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a cozy library with tall bookshelves
description: Draw a large rectangle for the library wall in warm beige, then add multiple vertical thin rectangles in dark brown for bookshelves, with small square shapes for individual books.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Library wall -->
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='400' height='200' fill='wheat'/>
  <!-- Bookshelves -->
  <rect x='70' y='60' width='30' height='180' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <rect x='120' y='60' width='30' height='180' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <rect x='170' y='60' width='30' height='180' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <!-- Books -->
  <rect x='75' y='80' width='20' height='30' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='125' y='90' width='20' height='30' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <rect x='175' y='100' width='20' height='30' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

concept: a scenic hiking trail through dense woods
description: Sketch a winding path using a thin curved line in gray, flanked by overlapping green shapes representing trees, with a light blue sky above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Winding path -->
  <path d='M50,250 Q250,150 450,250' fill='none' stroke='gray' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Trees along the path -->
  <rect x='100' y='220' width='10' height='40' fill='sienna'/>
  <circle cx='105' cy='210' r='15' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='350' y='220' width='10' height='40' fill='sienna'/>
  <circle cx='355' cy='210' r='15' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='100' y='0' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a modern office building with glass facade
description: Create a tall rectangular shape in dark gray for the building, overlay multiple smaller blue and white rectangles to represent glass windows, and add a subtle gradient for a modern look.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Modern building -->
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='200' height='200' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Glass windows -->
  <rect x='170' y='70' width='40' height='40' fill='skyblue'/>
  <rect x='230' y='70' width='40' height='40' fill='skyblue'/>
  <rect x='170' y='130' width='40' height='40' fill='skyblue'/>
  <rect x='230' y='130' width='40' height='40' fill='skyblue'/>
  <!-- Subtle gradient overlay -->
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='200' height='200' fill='url(#grad940)' opacity='0.3'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='grad940' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:darkgray;stop-opacity:1' />
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:black;stop-opacity:1' />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

concept: a picturesque harbor at dawn with fishing boats
description: Draw a horizontal blue rectangle for the water and place several small boat shapes in white and gray along the harbor, with a warm orange rectangle in the background for the rising sun.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Harbor scene -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>
  <!-- Ocean -->
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Rising sun -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='80' fill='orange'/>
  <!-- Boats -->
  <path d='M100,220 Q150,200 200,220 L200,240 Q150,230 100,240 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M300,220 Q350,200 400,220 L400,240 Q350,230 300,240 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a quiet park with blooming cherry trees
description: Sketch a wide, light green rectangle for the park lawn and overlay several small circular shapes in pink for cherry blossoms, with a few tree trunks represented by thin brown rectangles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Park lawn -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <!-- Cherry blossoms -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='200' r='10' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='210' r='10' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='205' r='10' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='210' r='10' fill='pink'/>
  <!-- Tree trunks -->
  <rect x='120' y='220' width='10' height='50' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <rect x='270' y='220' width='10' height='50' fill='saddlebrown'/>
</svg>

concept: a lively urban street with bustling pedestrians
description: Create a wide rectangle for the street in dark gray and add multiple small, simple human silhouettes in black arranged along the sidewalks, with a few colored rectangles for storefronts.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Dark gray street -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkgray'/>
  <!-- Sidewalk with human silhouettes -->
  <circle cx='100' cy='250' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='250' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='250' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Storefronts -->
  <rect x='300' y='220' width='50' height='30' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='360' y='220' width='50' height='30' fill='lightpink'/>
</svg>

concept: a quaint bakery with a display window
description: Draw a small rectangular building in pastel tones with a large clear square for the display window, and add simple line details for the storefront and door.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Small building with clear window -->
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='100' height='80' fill='lightyellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='200' y='130' width='60' height='40' fill='skyblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a serene monastery on a mountaintop
description: Sketch a small, low building in stone tones with a curved roof in dark red, placed atop a gently sloping green hill, with a clear sky in the background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Low building on hill -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='50' fill='slategray'/>
  <!-- Curved roof -->
  <polygon points='200,150 250,120 300,150' fill='darkred'/>
  <!-- Hill -->
  <path d='M0,200 Q250,150 500,200 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='lightgreen'/>
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='100' y='0' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant dance club with flashing lights
description: Depict a rectangular interior in dark colors with scattered small, bright rectangles in neon colors like blue, pink, and green to represent flashing lights on the walls and ceiling.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Interior scene -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkslategray'/>
  <!-- Neon lights on walls -->
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='80' height='30' fill='blue' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='80' height='30' fill='pink' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='250' y='50' width='80' height='30' fill='green' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Ceiling lights -->
  <circle cx='400' cy='40' r='10' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a peaceful snow-covered village in winter
description: Create several small rectangular houses in muted tones with triangular roofs in dark red, all covered by a layer of white to indicate snow, set on a light blue background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Snowy houses -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='80' height='60' fill='burlywood'/>
  <polygon points='100,150 140,120 180,150' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='80' height='60' fill='burlywood'/>
  <polygon points='220,150 260,120 300,150' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <!-- Snow overlay -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='white' opacity='0.3'/>

concept: a dynamic sports stadium filled with fans

svg:

  <circle cx='220' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>

svg:

  <rect x='210' y='70' width='60' height='80' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='290' y='70' width='60' height='80' fill='lightblue'/>

  <line x1='100' y1='50' x2='400' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a classic clock tower in a historic town

svg:

  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

</svg>

concept: a dreamy ice-skating rink under twinkling lights

svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <line x1='280' y1='150' x2='280' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='140' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='140' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a futuristic laboratory with glowing equipment

svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <rect x='250' y='120' width='40' height='40' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='80' r='15' fill='purple'/>
</svg>

concept: a lush rainforest with cascading vines
description: Create overlapping irregular green shapes to represent dense foliage and add thin, curved lines in dark green for cascading vines, layered on a deep green background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <path d='M300,150 Q350,130 400,150' fill='none' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: a charming courtyard with a central fountain
description: Draw a large square for the courtyard in light beige, place a circular shape in blue at the center to represent the fountain, and add thin curved lines for water splashes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Courtyard background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightbeige'/>
  <!-- Fountain -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Water splashes -->
  <path d='M240,150 Q250,140 260,150' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a bustling farmer's market on a sunny day
description: Depict several small stall shapes using rectangles in bright colors like red, yellow, and blue arranged in a row on a light background, with simple line details for canopies and awnings.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <rect x='50' y='180' width='60' height='60' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='130' y='180' width='60' height='60' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='210' y='180' width='60' height='60' fill='blue'/>
  <rect x='290' y='180' width='60' height='60' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Canopy outlines -->
  <line x1='50' y1='180' x2='350' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a dramatic canyon with steep rocky walls
description: Sketch large, overlapping irregular polygons in dark brown to form the canyon walls, with a narrow, winding path in gray at the bottom to suggest a trail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Canyon walls -->
  <polygon points='50,250 150,150 250,170 350,150 450,250' fill='sienna'/>
  <!-- Winding path -->
  <path d='M150,250 Q250,200 350,250' fill='none' stroke='gray' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant coral reef with diverse marine life
description: Draw a blue background for water and overlay multiple irregular, colorful shapes in orange, pink, and purple to represent coral, with small oval fish scattered among them.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <polygon points='180,230 200,190 220,230' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='280,220 300,180 320,220' fill='purple'/>
  <!-- Small fish -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='250' rx='10' ry='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='250' rx='10' ry='5' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a mystical cave with sparkling crystals
description: Create an irregular, dark shape for the cave interior and add small triangular and polygonal shapes in white and light blue to represent sparkling crystals embedded in the walls.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <polygon points='200,150 210,140 220,150 210,160' fill='lightblue'/>
  <polygon points='300,150 310,140 320,150 310,160' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a rugged desert with scattered cacti
description: Form a wide, sandy rectangle in yellow for the desert floor and place several small, vertical green rectangles with pointed tops to represent cacti, scattered across the scene.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Desert floor -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='khaki'/>
  <!-- Cacti -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='10' height='60' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <rect x='300' y='160' width='10' height='50' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <rect x='450' y='140' width='10' height='70' fill='darkgreen'/>
</svg>

concept: a playful dog park in a suburban neighborhood
description: Draw a wide green rectangle for the park and add several small circular shapes in various colors to represent playful dogs, along with a few simple tree shapes in green and brown.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Park lawn -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='green'/>
  <!-- Playful dogs (circles) -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='200' r='20' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='20' fill='tan'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='210' r='20' fill='gray'/>
  <!-- Simple tree shapes -->
  <rect x='80' y='150' width='10' height='50' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <circle cx='85' cy='140' r='20' fill='darkgreen'/>
</svg>

concept: a tranquil meditation retreat in nature
description: Create a serene background with a soft gradient of light blue and green, and overlay a simple circular or oval shape for a meditation area, with minimal line details.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Gradient background for meditation -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='medGrad961' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:lightblue;stop-opacity:1' />
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:lightgreen;stop-opacity:1' />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#medGrad961)'/>
  <!-- Meditation area -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='30' fill='white' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a classic red brick university building
description: Sketch a large rectangle with a rough texture in red to represent brick, add thin white lines to indicate mortar joints, and overlay a series of small rectangular windows in dark gray.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightcoral'/>

  <line x1='0' y1='50' x2='500' y2='50' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='0' y1='100' x2='500' y2='100' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='0' y1='150' x2='500' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Windows -->
  <rect x='100' y='60' width='50' height='40' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='200' y='60' width='50' height='40' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='300' y='60' width='50' height='40' fill='darkgray'/>
</svg>

svg:

svg:

  <circle cx='300' cy='210' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='210' r='5' fill='black'/>

  <rect x='230' y='80' width='20' height='30' fill='white'/>

svg:

  <rect x='250' y='205' width='80' height='50' fill='peachpuff'/>

svg:

description: Draw a large, dark gray rectangle for the platform and several parallel thin lines for tracks. Add small, varied shapes for commuters waiting under fluorescent lighting.
svg:

  <circle cx='220' cy='210' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='210' r='5' fill='black'/>

svg:
