  <rect x='120' y='70' width='50' height='180' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='190' y='60' width='50' height='190' fill='green'/>

  <circle cx='200' cy='260' r='8' fill='black'/>

concept: a serene mountain lake with a wooden dock
description: Sketch a large blue ellipse for the lake and add a small, simple rectangle in brown for the dock, with a few thin lines for wooden planks and a light blue sky above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <rect x='220' y='170' width='60' height='20' fill='brown'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='170' x2='220' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='170' x2='280' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='70' y='0' fill='lightblue'/>

description: Draw a large horizontal rectangle in red for the car body, add two circles at the bottom for wheels, and a smaller rectangle for the windshield layered on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <circle cx='190' cy='240' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='240' r='15' fill='black'/>

svg:

description: Form a long rectangle in black for the truck body, add a raised cabin as a smaller rectangle on one end, and place two large circles beneath for wheels.
svg:

  <circle cx='150' cy='250' r='25' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='250' r='25' fill='black'/>

svg:

description: Draw a simple van shape with a long rectangle in green, a slightly curved roof at the top, and two circles for wheels placed beneath the body.
svg:

  <circle cx='350' cy='230' r='20' fill='black'/>

description: Sketch a rectangular taxi body in gold with a small square sign on top, two circles for wheels underneath, and a narrow rectangle for the windshield layered at the front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <circle cx='310' cy='240' r='15' fill='black'/>

svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <circle cx='200' cy='250' r='12' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='250' r='12' fill='black'/>

<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Pickup truck with robust red body -->
  <rect x='150' y='220' width='200' height='30' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Open cargo bed -->
  <rect x='150' y='250' width='100' height='20' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Raised cabin -->
  <rect x='360' y='210' width='50' height='40' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Wheels -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='250' r='25' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='250' r='25' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a stylish convertible using a smooth white body with an open top, two circular wheels, and a thin curved windshield detail to evoke a sporty feel.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Stylish convertible with open top and smooth white body -->
  <path d='M160,220 Q250,200 340,220 L340,260 Q250,280 160,260 Z' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Wheels -->
  <circle cx='210' cy='260' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='260' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Curved windshield detail -->
  <path d='M180,220 Q250,210 320,220' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Form a racing bike using a slender black frame, two small circles for wheels, and minimalistic lines for the handlebars and seat to indicate speed.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Racing bike with slender black frame -->
  <path d='M170,230 Q250,210 330,230' stroke='black' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Wheels -->
  <circle cx='170' cy='250' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='330' cy='250' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <!-- Minimal seat and handlebars -->
  <line x1='250' y1='210' x2='250' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a sports car with a low, streamlined gold body, two prominent circles for wheels, and angular lines for aerodynamic accents, layered for depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Sports car with low streamlined gold body -->
  <path d='M150,220 Q250,200 350,220 L350,250 Q250,270 150,250 Z' fill='gold'/>
  <!-- Aerodynamic accents -->
  <line x1='150' y1='235' x2='350' y2='235' stroke='darkgoldenrod' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Wheels -->
  <circle cx='210' cy='250' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='250' r='20' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval for the fox's body in red, a slightly smaller circle for the head with two small triangular ears, and add a bushy tail using a curved line with a white tip, layered behind the body.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Fox with red body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='60' ry='30' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='170' r='20' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Triangular ears -->
  <polygon points='330,150 320,165 310,150' fill='red'/>
  <!-- Bushy tail -->
  <path d='M190,200 Q160,220 190,240' stroke='red' stroke-width='6' fill='none'/>
  <!-- White tip on tail -->
  <line x1='190' y1='240' x2='190' y2='245' stroke='white' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a very large horizontal ellipse in blue for the whale's body, attach a smaller circle for the head at one end, and add a triangular tail and curved dorsal fin layered on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Whale with large horizontal blue ellipse -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='100' ry='40' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx='350' cy='180' r='30' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Triangular tail -->
  <polygon points='150,180 130,170 130,190' fill='blue'/>
  <!-- Curved dorsal fin -->
  <path d='M250,140 Q260,120 270,140' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Form a large oval for the bear's body in brown, add a circle for the head with two round ears, and attach four short rectangles for legs along with a curved tail layered behind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <!-- Legs -->

  <rect x='280' y='230' width='20' height='30' fill='brown'/>
  <!-- Curved tail -->
  <path d='M170,200 Q150,220 170,240' stroke='brown' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a medium circle for the head in black, add two small triangular ears, and form an oval for the body with a curved tail and minimal whisker lines layered on top.
svg:

  <!-- Curved tail -->

</svg>

description: Create a rounded oval for the body in white, attach a smaller circle for the head with long, narrow ellipses for ears, and add a tiny circle for the nose, layered above the body.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <ellipse cx='310' cy='170' rx='5' ry='10' fill='white'/>
  <!-- Tiny nose -->
  <circle cx='320' cy='195' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small circle for the head in green, add an oval for the body in a lighter green, and include a curved triangular beak with a small circular eye, layering the beak over the head.
svg:

</svg>

description: Form an elongated oval for the body in golden brown, add a small circle for the head with pointed ears drawn as triangles, and attach large angular wings using thin polygons layered on top.
svg:

  <polygon points='250,240 230,270 270,270' fill='none' stroke='darkgoldenrod' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long, slender oval in white for the body, add a smaller circle for the head, and overlay thin irregular black stripes across both, with two small triangular ears layered on top.
svg:

  <!-- Triangular ears -->

</svg>

description: Sketch a medium oval for the leopard’s body in yellow with a brown outline, add a circle for the head, and scatter small black dots over the body to mimic spots, with triangular ears layered on top.

<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Rooster: medium red oval body, small circular head with a comb, and thin tail lines -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='50' ry='30' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='200' r='15' fill='red'/>
  <polygon points='320,185 325,175 330,185' fill='red'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='220' x2='230' y2='210' stroke='red' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='220' x2='230' y2='230' stroke='red' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a small, streamlined oval for the trout’s body in blue, attach a circle for the head, and draw a narrow triangular tail and a curved dorsal fin layered on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Trout (repeat of 1213 style): small streamlined blue oval body, circular head, narrow triangular tail, and a gracefully curved dorsal fin -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='60' ry='25' fill='skyblue' stroke='steelblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='200' r='12' fill='skyblue' stroke='steelblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='190,200 170,190 170,210' fill='skyblue' stroke='steelblue' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,175 Q260,165 270,175' stroke='steelblue' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch an elongated oval for the bass’s body in red, add a small circle for the head, and draw a small triangular tail with minimal details layered on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Bass (repeat of 1214 style): elongated red oval body with vibrant fill, small head, and a neatly drawn triangular tail -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='65' ry='30' fill='crimson' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='315' cy='200' r='12' fill='crimson' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='185,200 170,190 170,210' fill='crimson' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small oval for the frog’s body in green, attach a circle for the head, and add two short ovals for the legs with a curved tail layered appropriately.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Frog (repeat of 1215 style): small green oval body with glossy finish, circular head, two short ovals for legs, and a gently curved tail -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='30' ry='20' fill='limegreen' stroke='forestgreen' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='200' r='12' fill='limegreen' stroke='forestgreen' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='240' cy='240' rx='8' ry='4' fill='limegreen'/>
  <ellipse cx='260' cy='240' rx='8' ry='4' fill='limegreen'/>
  <path d='M220,220 Q200,230 210,240' stroke='forestgreen' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Use a circle for the head and two small circles for the eyes, add a thin curved line for a smile, and form an oval for the body with a simple dress. Layer short curved lines on top for hair.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 1: Friendly figure – circle head with two small eyes and a curved smile, an oval body wearing a simple dress with layered hair details -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FADADD' stroke='#DDA0DD' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='60' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='#FF69B4' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='90' x2='235' y2='70' stroke='#DDA0DD' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='90' x2='265' y2='70' stroke='#DDA0DD' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,100 Q250,110 260,100' stroke='#DDA0DD' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the head with two small triangles for ears and a rectangle on top for a hat. Use an oval for the body and simple lines for arms and legs, with a curved line for a beard.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 2: Character with a hat and beard – circular head with two triangular ear accents, a rectangle hat on top, an oval body, arms and legs as simple lines -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='#F0E68C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='235' y='60' width='30' height='15' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#E6E6FA' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='180' x2='200' y2='220' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='180' x2='300' y2='220' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M245,115 Q250,125 255,115' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small circle for the head and an oval for the body in a dynamic pose, with simple lines for arms and legs. Add a small circle for the ball placed in front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 3: Dynamic figure in motion – small circle head, oval body in a dynamic pose, arms and legs drawn with angled lines, and a ball depicted in front -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='90' r='18' fill='#FFDAB9' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#FFDEAD' stroke='peru' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='180' x2='200' y2='210' stroke='peru' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='180' x2='300' y2='210' stroke='peru' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='230' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='peru' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='260' r='8' fill='orange' stroke='orangered' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a circle for the head, a rectangle for the torso, and two thin rectangles for the arms. Add a narrow triangle for the tie and simple lines for the legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 4: Business-casual figure – circle head, rectangle torso, thin rectangles for arms, a narrow triangle tie, and simple legs -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FFEBCD' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='110' width='40' height='70' fill='#F5F5DC' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='110' width='8' height='40' fill='#F5F5DC'/>
  <rect x='272' y='110' width='8' height='40' fill='#F5F5DC'/>
  <polygon points='245,110 255,110 250,100' fill='crimson'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='180' x2='240' y2='220' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='180' x2='260' y2='220' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw two circles for the heads and two ovals for the bodies, positioned close together. Connect their hands with a thin curved line to suggest they are holding hands.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 5 (Couple holding hands): Two circles for heads, two ovals for bodies, with a curved line connecting their hands -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='100' r='18' fill='#FFDAB9' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='100' r='18' fill='#FFDAB9' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='180' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#FFDEAD' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='280' cy='180' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#FFDEAD' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M245,170 Q250,175 255,170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a circle for the head and a rectangle for the body in a casual outfit, with two lines for arms and legs. Add a small rectangle on the back to represent a backpack.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 6: Casual figure with a backpack – circle head, rectangle body, simple limb lines, and a small backpack on the back -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#F0E68C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='110' width='40' height='70' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='110' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='110' x2='280' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='10' height='30' fill='dimgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the head with two small circles for eyes and a curved line for a smile. Use a rectangle for the torso representing a uniform, and add a small cross on the chest using a simple plus sign shape.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 7: Uniformed figure – circle head with two small eyes and a curved smile, rectangle torso with a small cross detail -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FFFACD' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#F5F5F5' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='85' x2='240' y2='75' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='85' x2='260' y2='75' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='245' y='180' font-size='20' fill='red'>✚</text>
</svg>

description: Use a circle for the head and an elongated oval for the torso tilted forward to indicate motion. Draw angled lines for arms and legs to capture movement.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 8: Dynamic motion figure – circle head, elongated oval torso tilted forward, angled arms and legs indicating movement -->
  <circle cx='240' cy='80' r='20' fill='#FFE4C4' stroke='peru' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='35' ry='60' fill='#FFDAB9' stroke='peru' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(10 250 170)'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='170' x2='200' y2='210' stroke='peru' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='170' x2='300' y2='210' stroke='peru' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='230' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='peru' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a circle for the head with soft wavy lines for hair, and an oval for the body draped with a curved shape representing a shawl. Use simple lines for arms and legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 9: Draped figure with shawl – circle head with wavy hair, oval body with a flowing shawl, simple limb lines -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FADADD' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='60' fill='#FFEBCD' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>

  <line x1='280' y1='180' x2='300' y2='220' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small circle for the head and an oval for the seated body, with simple lines for arms holding a small rectangle as the book. Include minimal details for legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 10: Seated reader – small circle head, oval seated body, arms holding a book (small rectangle), minimal leg detail -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='18' fill='#FFE4E1' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='35' ry='50' fill='#F0FFF0' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>

  <line x1='280' y1='150' x2='300' y2='170' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle for the head, add two small circles for the eyes, and draw a thick curved line under the nose for a mustache. Use a rectangle for the body with simple limbs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 11: Mustachioed character – circle head with two small eyes and a thick curved mustache, rectangle body with simple limbs -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FFEBCD' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#F5F5F5' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>

  <line x1='260' y1='170' x2='270' y2='210' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the head and a long, curved oval for the dress to suggest flowing fabric. Add simple lines for the arms and minimal details for the face.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 12: Elegant dress figure – circle head, long curved oval dress body, and graceful arm lines -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FFFAF0' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,110 Q250,180 270,110 Q260,250 240,250 Z' fill='#FFE4E1' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='2'/>

</svg>

description: Sketch a small circle for the head and an oval for the body, with simple lines for arms and legs. Draw a smaller circle attached to one hand to represent a teddy bear.

</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the head with a thick curved line around the lower part to represent a beard. Use a rectangle for the body in casual attire and simple lines for arms and legs.
svg:

</svg>

description: Use a circle for the head and overlay multiple small, curved lines for curly hair. Form an oval for the body and add simple lines for the arms.

</svg>

description: Sketch a circle for the head and a rectangle for the body to represent a suit, with two thin rectangles for the arms. Add a small triangle for a tie and simple lines for legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 16: Formal figure in a suit – circle head, rectangle body with a narrow triangle tie, thin arm rectangles, and simple leg lines -->

</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the head with gentle wrinkles, an oval for the body in a seated position, and a small rectangle held in one hand to represent a newspaper. Use simple lines for arms and legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 17: Senior reading a newspaper – circle head with gentle wrinkles, oval seated body, and a small rectangle as a newspaper in one hand -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FFEBCD' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='35' ry='50' fill='#F5F5F5' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>

  <line x1='280' y1='170' x2='300' y2='210' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle for the head with a curved rectangle on top for a hat, two small circles for the eyes, and a curved line for a smile. Use an oval for the body and simple lines for the arms.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 18: Cheerful figure with a hat – circle head with a curved rectangle hat, two small eyes, curved smile, oval body, and simple arm lines -->

  <rect x='235' y='60' width='30' height='15' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#F5F5DC' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>

  <line x1='260' y1='170' x2='280' y2='210' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a circle for the head and an oval for the body in a dynamic skateboarding pose, with angled lines for arms and legs. Draw a small rectangle beneath to represent the skateboard.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 19: Skateboarder – circle head, elongated oval body in dynamic pose, angled arms and legs, and a small rectangle as a skateboard beneath -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='20' fill='#FFDAB9' stroke='peru' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='35' ry='60' fill='#FFE4B5' stroke='peru' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(10 250 170)'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='170' x2='200' y2='210' stroke='peru' stroke-width='3'/>

  <rect x='240' y='240' width='30' height='5' fill='dimgray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the head and an oval for the body, with simple lines for the arms. Add a small rounded shape in one hand to represent an ice cream cone.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 20: Enjoying ice cream – circle head, oval body, simple arm line holding a small rounded ice cream cone -->

description: Create a circle for the head and add a long, curved line descending from the head to represent a braid. Use an oval for the body and simple lines for the arms.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <line x1='280' y1='170' x2='300' y2='210' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>

description: Draw a circle for the head and overlay two small overlapping ellipses for sunglasses. Use a rectangle for the body and simple lines for the arms and legs.
svg:

description: Sketch multiple small circles for the heads of family members and ovals for their bodies, arranged together. Draw a large rectangle beneath as a picnic blanket with simple details.
svg:

  <circle cx='220' cy='80' r='15' fill='#FFEBCD' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>

description: Draw a circle for the head and an elongated oval for the body, then overlay a pattern of small petal-like shapes on the lower half to represent a floral dress. Use simple lines for the arms.

  <circle cx='260' cy='200' r='2' fill='pink'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='170' x2='200' y2='210' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>

  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#F5F5DC' stroke='crimson' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='110' width='40' height='70' fill='#FFFAF0' stroke='crimson' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='180' r='4' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='180' r='4' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the head with layered, stylish curves to represent a chic hairstyle, paired with an oval for the body in a minimal, modern outfit.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 53: Chic minimal style – circle head with layered stylish curves, oval body in a modern outfit -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FFF8DC' stroke='darkslategray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#F5F5F5' stroke='darkslategray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle for the head and a simple rectangle for the body representing a casual shirt and pants, with thin lines for the arms and legs in a relaxed stance.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 54: Casual shirt and pants – circle head and a simple rectangle body with thin limb lines in a relaxed stance -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#F0F8FF' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='110' width='40' height='70' fill='#E6E6FA' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='110' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='110' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small circle for the head and an oval for the body in bright, playful colors, with simple lines for the arms and legs to show a fun, energetic pose.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 55: Playful energy – small circle head in bright colors, oval body in playful hues, and dynamic limb lines -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FFD700' stroke='orangered' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#FFEC8B' stroke='orangered' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='170' x2='200' y2='210' stroke='orangered' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='170' x2='300' y2='210' stroke='orangered' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a circle for the head with two small circles for the eyes and a wide, curved line for a radiant smile, and use an oval for the body in a light outfit with minimal details.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 56: Radiant smile – circle head with two small circles for eyes and a wide curved smile, and an oval body in light attire -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FFF8DC' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='35' ry='55' fill='#F5F5DC' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='243' cy='85' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='257' cy='85' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M240,100 Q250,115 260,100' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the head and a rectangle for the body, then overlay a slightly inset rectangle to represent a rugged jacket, with simple lines for the arms and legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- Person 57: Rugged jacket look – circle head, rectangle body overlaid with a slightly inset rectangle for a rugged jacket, and simple limb lines -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#F0F8FF' stroke='dimgray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='110' width='40' height='70' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='dimgray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='235' y='115' width='30' height='60' fill='#A9A9A9'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='110' x2='210' y2='150' stroke='dimgray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='110' x2='280' y2='150' stroke='dimgray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle for the head with defined eyes and a prominent curved line for lips to indicate vibrant makeup, layered on a simple oval for the body in a stylish outfit.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1301: Head with defined eyes and prominent lips on a stylish outfit -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FFDAB9' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='244' cy='95' r='3' fill='blue'/> 
  <circle cx='256' cy='95' r='3' fill='blue'/> 
  <path d='M240,105 Q250,115 260,105' stroke='red' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='50' ry='70' fill='#E6E6FA' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a circle for the head and a rectangular body in an active, dynamic pose, with angular lines for the arms and legs to show movement and energy.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1302: Active, dynamic pose with a circle head and rectangular body -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='20' fill='#F0E8E0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='100' width='40' height='80' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='120' x2='210' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='120' x2='290' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='250' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small circle for the head with big, bright eyes and a wide, curved line for laughter, and an oval for the body with simple lines for the limbs in a joyful, exuberant pose.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1303: Joyful, exuberant pose with big bright eyes and a wide laugh -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='15' fill='#FFE4E1' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='243' cy='85' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='257' cy='85' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
  <path d='M240,100 Q250,115 260,100' stroke='orange' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='45' ry='60' fill='#FFF8DC' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='180' x2='200' y2='210' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='180' x2='300' y2='210' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle for the head with soft curves for hair, an elongated oval for the body in a flowing dress, and delicate curved lines for the arms to convey elegance.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1304: Elegant figure in a flowing dress with soft hair curves -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FADADD' stroke='darkmagenta' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,80 Q250,70 260,80' stroke='darkmagenta' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='45' ry='80' fill='#FFE4E1' stroke='lightpink' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='200' x2='200' y2='230' stroke='lightpink' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='200' x2='300' y2='230' stroke='lightpink' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a circle for the head with focused eyes indicated by two small circles, a strong rectangular body for a determined posture, and simple lines for the arms and legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1305: Determined posture with focused eyes on a strong rectangular body -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FFEBCD' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='95' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='95' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='40' height='80' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='120' x2='210' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='120' x2='290' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='200' x2='250' y2='240' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw three small circles for the heads and three ovals for the bodies, arranged in a playful group. Add simple lines for arms and legs to suggest movement and interaction.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1306: Group of three playful figures -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='80' r='15' fill='#F0E8E0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='150' rx='30' ry='45' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='15' fill='#F0E8E0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='30' ry='45' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='80' r='15' fill='#F0E8E0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='150' rx='30' ry='45' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Simple limb lines omitted for clarity -->
</svg>

description: Sketch a small oval for the cake base, add a larger oval on top for the frosting, and use thin lines to create a decorative pattern or frosting details. Add a small rectangle on top for a candle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1307: Stylized cake with frosting and a candle -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='40' ry='15' fill='#F4A460' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='50' ry='25' fill='#FFB6C1' stroke='lightcoral' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='gray' stroke-width='3'/>
  <rect x='245' y='145' width='10' height='5' fill='yellow' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small oval for the cup base, add a larger oval on top for the tea, and use thin lines to suggest steam rising from the cup. Include a small rectangle on the side for a tea bag tag.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1308: Cup of tea with rising steam -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='230' rx='30' ry='10' fill='#8B4513' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='35' ry='20' fill='#F5DEB3' stroke='peru' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,170 Q250,150 270,170' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='280' y='190' width='8' height='15' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle for the head and overlay soft, gentle lines for the face, with a slight smile and enigmatic expression. Use an oval for the body and add a simple, elegant garment.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1309: Enigmatic expression with a subtle smile and elegant garment -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FFF8DC' stroke='darkslategray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='244' cy='95' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='256' cy='95' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M240,108 Q250,118 260,108' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='45' ry='70' fill='#E0FFFF' stroke='teal' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small circle for the cat’s head and an oval for the body, then add a small box with a lid slightly open to represent the famous thought experiment. Layer the cat inside the box.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1310: Cat in a box (Schrödinger's cat) -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='15' fill='#FFA07A' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='160' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#FFA07A' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='200' y='130' width='100' height='50' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='130' x2='300' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Fill the background with a soft green rectangle for fields, then overlay diagonal blue lines across the top for the falling rain. Add a subtle lighter sky rectangle to complete the scene.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1311: Rainy fields with falling rain -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#98FB98'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='100' fill='#B0E0E6'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='100' x2='70' y2='300' stroke='#87CEEB' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='170' y2='300' stroke='#87CEEB' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='270' y2='300' stroke='#87CEEB' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='100' x2='370' y2='300' stroke='#87CEEB' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>
</svg>

description: Draw several overlapping curved shapes in green for rolling hills, then layer a broad gradient rectangle in soft pink and purple above to represent pastel skies.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1312: Pastel rolling hills with a soft gradient sky -->
  <path d='M0,220 Q250,150 500,220 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='#98FB98'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='150' fill='url(#skyGrad)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='skyGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFDAB9;stop-opacity:1'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E6E6FA;stop-opacity:1'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

description: Scatter multiple small polygonal shapes in orange and red to depict leaves, and add curved lines to suggest motion. Use a muted background for the breeze, layering leaves on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1313: Leaves in motion -->
  <polygon points='100,150 110,140 120,150 110,160' fill='orange' stroke='darkorange' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='150,160 160,150 170,160 160,170' fill='red' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='200,140 210,130 220,140 210,150' fill='red' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M0,0 Q250,100 500,0' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a bright green rectangle for the meadow and add scattered small circles in yellow, pink, and white for wildflowers. Overlay a large yellow circle in one corner for sunlight.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1314: Wildflowers meadow with a bright sun -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <circle cx='80' cy='60' r='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='250' r='5' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='260' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='255' r='5' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='265' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='250' r='5' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

description: Form a distant ridgeline using a jagged gray rectangle, then place multiple tall, triangular green shapes along it to represent pine trees. Add a lighter sky rectangle behind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1315: Distant ridgeline with pine trees -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#87CEEB'/>
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='lightgray'/>
  <polygon points='50,150 70,100 90,150' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <polygon points='150,150 170,90 190,150' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 270,80 290,150' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <polygon points='350,150 370,95 390,150' fill='darkgreen'/>
</svg>

description: Use a vertical white and light blue rectangle for the waterfall, layered over a dark green backdrop of overlapping tree shapes. Draw small white ellipses at the base for foaming water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1316: Waterfall over trees -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#2E8B57'/>
  <rect x='220' y='0' width='60' height='300' fill='url(#waterfallGrad)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='waterfallGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFFFFF;stop-opacity:0.8'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#ADD8E6;stop-opacity:0.8'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='300' rx='40' ry='10' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch bare tree branches in brown, overlay thin white lines to represent frost, and fill the background with a soft gradient rectangle in pink and orange for sunrise.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1317: Frosted bare branches at sunrise -->
  <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='130' y2='250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='100' x2='180' y2='250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='100' x2='320' y2='250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='100' x2='370' y2='250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='130' y2='250' stroke='white' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='4,4'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='100' fill='url(#sunriseGrad)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='sunriseGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFDAB9;stop-opacity:1'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFB6C1;stop-opacity:1'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide blue ellipse for the lake in the foreground, layer several overlapping triangles in gray for mountains, and add translucent white rectangles to suggest morning mist.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1318: Lake with mountains and morning mist -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='200' ry='50' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <polygon points='50,150 250,50 450,150' fill='gray' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='50' fill='white' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

description: Use a wide blue rectangle for water, place various irregular shapes in pink, orange, and purple to represent coral, and add small ovals in bright colors for tropical fish around them.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1319: Colorful coral reef with tropical fish -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <path d='M100,200 Q120,180 140,200 T180,200' fill='pink' stroke='red' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M300,220 Q320,200 340,220 T380,220' fill='purple' stroke='indigo' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='240' rx='10' ry='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <ellipse cx='270' cy='250' rx='8' ry='4' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

description: Create gently curving shapes in light brown for dunes, add a round yellow circle for the sun, and include overlapping arcs to imply ripples, layering them from front to back.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1320: Desert dunes with a sun and ripple arcs -->
  <path d='M0,220 Q250,180 500,220 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='#F5DEB3'/>
  <circle cx='80' cy='60' r='40' fill='yellow'/>
  <path d='M100,230 Q250,210 400,230' stroke='#DEB887' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Fill the background with a wide green rectangle for prairie grass, overlay dark gray cloud shapes at the top, and add thin white zigzag lines to suggest distant lightning.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1321: Prairie under stormy skies with distant lightning -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='300' rx='250' ry='50' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <g stroke='white' stroke-width='2'>
    <line x1='100' y1='50' x2='110' y2='100'/>
    <line x1='200' y1='40' x2='210' y2='90'/>
    <line x1='300' y1='60' x2='310' y2='110'/>
  </g>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='50' fill='rgba(176,224,230,0.5)'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch layers of tall brown trunks on each side, fill the middle with a bright yellow circle for sunlit grass, and add smaller green ovals for shrubs in the clearing.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1322: Forest clearing with tall trunks and sunlit grass -->
  <g>
    <rect x='50' y='80' width='20' height='150' fill='#8B4513'/>
    <rect x='100' y='80' width='20' height='150' fill='#8B4513'/>
    <rect x='150' y='80' width='20' height='150' fill='#8B4513'/>
  </g>
  <circle cx='250' cy='60' r='40' fill='yellow'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='240' rx='100' ry='30' fill='#ADFF2F'/>
  <ellipse cx='280' cy='260' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='260' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Place a soft pink rectangle as the background, then scatter small five-petal shapes in pink and white. Add thin, curved lines to indicate drifting blossoms.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1323: Drifting blossoms on a soft pink background -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#FFC0CB'/>
  <path d='M100,150 Q120,140 140,150 Q120,160 100,150' fill='white' stroke='pink' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M200,180 Q220,170 240,180 Q220,190 200,180' fill='white' stroke='pink' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M300,140 Q320,130 340,140 Q320,150 300,140' fill='white' stroke='pink' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large white polygon for a glacier, partially submerged in a blue rectangle representing water. Add small irregular shapes in lighter blue on top for melting ice.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1324: Glacier partially submerged in blue water -->
  <polygon points='50,150 250,50 450,150 450,300 50,300' fill='white' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='#1E90FF' opacity='0.5'/>
  <path d='M100,150 L120,130 L140,150' fill='#ADD8E6'/>
</svg>

description: Use tall vertical polygons in brown for cliffs, layered from front to back, and place a broad green rectangle below for the valley floor. Overlay a lighter blue sky at the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1325: Cliffs and valley -->
  <polygon points='0,150 100,100 200,150 300,90 400,150 500,80 500,300 0,300' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='80' fill='#87CEEB'/>
</svg>

description: Fill the bottom with a green rectangle for meadow, place small circles in bright colors for flowers, and add a wide blue rectangle on top for the summer sky.
svg:

  <circle cx='200' cy='110' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='5' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='115' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large rectangle in muted green for swamp water, scatter tall thin brown rectangles for reeds, and add small curved lines at the base to suggest ripples.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1327: Swamp with reeds -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#556B2F'/>

  <line x1='200' y1='200' x2='200' y2='250' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='200' x2='300' y2='250' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

description: Use a wide ellipse in light blue to form the pond, place a circular pink shape with layered pointed petals on top for the lotus, and add small green pads around it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1328: Lotus pond -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='150' ry='40' fill='#ADD8E6'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='30' fill='pink' stroke='deeppink' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='240' r='5' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='240' r='5' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Form a broad yellow rectangle for desert sand, add a tall green column shape with smaller arms for the cactus, and include tiny pink circles on top for cactus blooms.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1329: Desert cactus -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#F5DEB3'/>
  <rect x='240' y='150' width='20' height='80' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='230' y='170' width='10' height='30' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='270' y='170' width='10' height='30' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

description: Create multiple overlapping triangles in gray for alpine peaks, fill the sky with a gradient rectangle in pink and orange, and add small white patches near the peak tops for snow.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1330: Alpine peaks with snowy patches -->
  <polygon points='50,200 250,80 450,200 450,300 50,300' fill='gray'/>
  <polygon points='200,100 250,70 300,100' fill='white'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='80' fill='url(#peakSky)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='peakSky' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFDAB9;stop-opacity:1'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFB6C1;stop-opacity:1'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

description: Sketch curved green bands for hills, overlay rows of small repeating circles in darker green to represent grapevines, and place a lighter sky rectangle overhead.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1331: Grapevine hills -->
  <path d='M0,220 Q250,180 500,220 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <g fill='darkgreen'>
    <circle cx='100' cy='210' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='140' cy='215' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='180' cy='210' r='5'/>
  </g>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='100' fill='#B0E0E6'/>
</svg>

description: Fill a wide rectangle with white for the tundra, add scattered irregular polygons in light gray for icy patches, and use a soft gray-blue strip at the top for the sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

</svg>

description: Use narrow, tapering shapes in gold for tall wheat stalks, arranged in rows. Layer short curved lines at angles to show them swaying in a gentle wind.
svg:

  <!-- 1333: Wheat stalks -->

    <polygon points='100,300 105,200 110,300' />

    <polygon points='200,300 205,220 210,300' />
    <polygon points='250,300 255,210 260,300' />
    <polygon points='300,300 305,220 310,300' />
  </g>
  <path d='M95,200 L315,200' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a shallow blue ellipse for the lagoon, add tall jagged polygons in gray for rocks at one side, and place small patches of green brush around the outcrop.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='200' ry='40' fill='#87CEEB'/>

  <ellipse cx='380' cy='240' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>

description: Fill the background with a bright blue rectangle for the sky, then layer multiple white ovals, each partially overlapping, to suggest drifting cloud formations.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1335: Drifting clouds -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#87CEEB'/>

  <ellipse cx='350' cy='70' rx='50' ry='25' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>

description: Use a green rectangle for the prairie floor, add scattered small circles in pink, yellow, and white for wildflowers, and overlay subtle lines in a lighter green to indicate grass.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1336: Prairie wildflowers -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#7CFC00'/>

  <circle cx='150' cy='260' r='5' fill='yellow'/>

</svg>

concept: shallow tide pools on rocky shore
description: Draw irregular gray polygons for rocky areas, surround them with light blue elliptical shapes for tide pools, and add scattered small shell shapes in white along the edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1337: Rocky tide pools -->
  <polygon points='50,250 100,220 150,250 100,270' fill='gray' opacity='0.7'/>

  <ellipse cx='180' cy='265' rx='8' ry='4' fill='#ADD8E6'/>

</svg>

description: Place multiple triangular green shapes for pines, partially overlapped by semi-transparent gray rectangles to represent rolling fog. Use a muted background for a hazy effect.
svg:

  <polygon points='80,200 120,100 160,200' fill='darkgreen' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='200,200 240,90 280,200' fill='darkgreen' opacity='0.8'/>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='gray' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a wide white rectangle for snow, place a few slender green stems emerging from the base, and add small colorful oval blooms at the tips.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

  <circle cx='270' cy='245' r='5' fill='blue'/>

description: Form tall brown rectangles for redwood trunks, fading smaller at the top, and a narrow brown strip for the trail in the center. Layer green ellipses high above to imply treetops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

description: Draw a small ellipse in bright blues and greens for the dragonfly body with thin lines for wings, placed near a pink circular lily on a wide blue ellipse representing water.
svg:

description: Use layers of varied green polygons to represent dense foliage, each slightly overlapping. Add random broad leaves and small vines in lighter greens layered on top.
svg:

description: Fill the sky background with a soft gradient rectangle in pink and purple, then layer multiple fluffy white ovals tinted lightly with pink to represent cotton candy clouds.
svg:

      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFC0CB;stop-opacity:1'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#9370DB;stop-opacity:1'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

description: Use a horizontal ellipse in dark blue for the lake, add a large gradient rectangle in red and orange across the sky, and place a lighter mirrored strip on the water’s surface.
svg:

      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FF4500;stop-opacity:1'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:1'/>

</svg>

    <ellipse cx='110' cy='80' rx='40' ry='20'/>
    <ellipse cx='160' cy='80' rx='40' ry='20'/>

  <line x1='100' y1='0' x2='100' y2='100' stroke='gold' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='0' x2='150' y2='100' stroke='gold' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='0' x2='200' y2='100' stroke='gold' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>

  <polygon points='150,250 170,230 190,250' fill='darkgreen'/>

description: Form a turquoise oval for the lagoon and place tall gray polygons on either side to represent cliffs. Include small green patches for vegetation layered near the water’s edge.

    <rect x='200' y='200' width='5' height='40'/>

description: Place a tall brown cliff polygon at one edge, scatter small bright circles for wildflowers near the top, and add a wide blue rectangle behind to represent the ocean.
svg:

description: Use a wide rectangle in golden brown for the wheat, add small vertical lines to indicate stalks, and place a thin crescent shape in white at the top for the moon.

    <line x1='100' y1='300' x2='100' y2='250'/>
    <line x1='150' y1='300' x2='150' y2='250'/>
    <line x1='200' y1='300' x2='200' y2='250'/>
  </g>
  <path d='M400,50 Q410,30 420,50' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>

svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1362: Plateau with expansive sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#CD853F'/>
  <line x1='0' y1='150' x2='500' y2='150' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='100' fill='#B0E0E6'/>
</svg>

description: Use dark conical tree silhouettes in black at the bottom, layer swirling multicolored lines in green, pink, and purple for auroras across a dark blue sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1363: Aurora over dark sky with conical trees -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#00008B'/>
  <path d='M50,300 L80,200 L110,300 Z' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M150,300 L180,210 L210,300 Z' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M250,300 L280,190 L310,300 Z' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M0,100 Q250,10 500,100' stroke='lime' stroke-width='8' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

description: Form thin brown lines in a grid for a fence, add swirling green vines around it, and place small pink circular petals for wild roses scattered throughout.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1364: Fenced garden with wild roses -->
  <g stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='3'>
    <line x1='50' y1='100' x2='450' y2='100'/>
    <line x1='50' y1='100' x2='50' y2='250'/>
    <line x1='450' y1='100' x2='450' y2='250'/>
  </g>
  <path d='M50,125 L450,125' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='5' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

description: Create layered brown polygons for canyon walls, add a curved blue path for the river flowing in the canyon floor, and fill the top with a warm sky rectangle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1365: Canyon river -->
  <polygon points='0,100 500,50 500,300 0,300' fill='#A0522D'/>
  <path d='M0,250 Q250,230 500,250' stroke='blue' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw multiple triangular white shapes for snow-covered peaks, layer a wide green rectangle below for a meadow, and add a few small wildflower circles near the base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1366: Snowy peaks with meadow -->
  <polygon points='100,50 250,150 400,50 400,300 100,300' fill='white'/>
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='160' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='160' r='5' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

description: Use tall slender green rectangles for bamboo stalks, with short horizontal lines as segments. Add a pale circular moon in white at the top on a dark background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1367: Bamboo grove with a pale moon -->
  <g fill='darkgreen'>
    <rect x='80' y='100' width='10' height='150'/>
    <rect x='120' y='90' width='10' height='160'/>
    <rect x='160' y='110' width='10' height='140'/>
  </g>
  <circle cx='450' cy='50' r='20' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a narrow brown line winding across the scene for the path, line it with small pink petals as blossoms, and layer light green rectangles for new foliage.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1368: Path with scattered blossoms -->
  <path d='M50,250 Q250,200 450,250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='245' r='4' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='235' r='4' fill='pink'/>
  <circle cx='380' cy='245' r='4' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

description: Fill a deep navy rectangle for the sky, scatter tiny white circles for stars, and surround a circular clearing of pale green grass with tall black conical trees.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1369: Forest clearing under a starry sky -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#000080'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='270' r='50' fill='#ADFF2F' opacity='0.8'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <circle cx='100' cy='50' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='200' cy='80' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='300' cy='60' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='400' cy='90' r='2'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a winding blue path for the stream, layered across multiple overlapping green polygons for the valley. Add small white ellipses along the edges for foam or pebbles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1370: Stream in a valley with foamy edges -->
  <path d='M0,260 Q250,240 500,260' stroke='blue' stroke-width='6' fill='none'/>
  <g fill='green'>
    <polygon points='100,260 110,255 120,260 110,265'/>
    <polygon points='380,260 390,255 400,260 390,265'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Use layered curved shapes in blue to suggest overlapping waves, with a tan rectangle for the sandy shoreline. Overlay frothy white lines at the wave tops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1371: Ocean waves with foamy crests -->
  <path d='M0,220 Q100,200 200,220 T500,220' stroke='blue' stroke-width='6' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M0,220 Q100,210 200,220 T500,220' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Form a dense canopy using overlapping green ellipses, hang multiple thin, curved green lines to represent vines, and place a few large leaf shapes in brighter green for emphasis.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1372: Dense canopy with vines and highlighted leaves -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='200' ry='80' fill='darkgreen' opacity='0.8'/>
  <path d='M100,150 Q250,100 400,150' stroke='limegreen' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='120' rx='30' ry='15' fill='lime' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch slender green fronds using curved lines with small leaf segments, cluster them in partial spirals, and add a dark background for shady forest ambiance.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1373: Palm fronds arranged in a spiral -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q230,100 210,150' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q270,100 290,150' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q250,80 250,150' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide sandy rectangle in light brown for the desert floor, place a small blue ellipse in the center for water, and add multiple palm silhouettes with slender trunks around it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1374: Desert oasis with a small water pool and palm silhouettes -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#F5DEB3'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='40' ry='20' fill='#87CEEB'/>
  <rect x='220' y='140' width='20' height='60' fill='sienna'/>
  <rect x='260' y='140' width='20' height='60' fill='sienna'/>
</svg>

description: Form a wide green rectangle for prairie grass, layer towering gray cloud shapes at the top, and add subtle diagonal lines in white to suggest distant rain.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1375: Prairie rain with distant clouds and diagonal rain lines -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='80' rx='150' ry='30' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='100' x2='70' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='170' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: lotus pond enclosed by rock garden
description: Use a circular blue pond in the center, place pink lotus flowers on top, and surround it with irregular gray polygons for rocks, with a few small green leaves scattered.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1376: Lotus pond with scattered rocks -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='60' fill='#87CEEB'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='30' fill='pink' stroke='deeppink' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='200' cy='260' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='300' cy='260' rx='10' ry='5' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a narrow brown line for the path, layer multiple tall green rectangles in front to represent thick undergrowth, and add slight openings showing the path beyond.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1377: Undergrowth path showing a narrow route -->
  <path d='M50,250 Q250,220 450,250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='200' y='250' width='100' height='50' fill='#556B2F' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Form several brown tree trunks, each topped with a circular green shape, and place small red circles scattered among the foliage to represent apples in an orchard setting.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1378: Orchard with fruit on tree canopies -->
  <g fill='brown'>
    <rect x='150' y='150' width='20' height='100'/>
    <rect x='250' y='150' width='20' height='100'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='green'>
    <circle cx='160' cy='130' r='30'/>
    <circle cx='260' cy='130' r='30'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='red'>
    <circle cx='160' cy='120' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='260' cy='120' r='5'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: polar ice floes drifting in ocean
description: Use a deep blue rectangle for the ocean, draw multiple irregular white polygons floating on top for ice floes, and add subtle gray shading to show thickness.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1379: Arctic sea with floating ice floes -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <polygon points='100,200 150,170 200,200 180,220 120,220' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='300,210 350,180 400,210 380,230 320,230' fill='white'/>
  <path d='M100,210 L400,210' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a wide canopy using overlapping green ellipses, and add small elliptical bird silhouettes in various bright colors perched randomly across the top layer.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1380: Birds perched in a vibrant canopy -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='80' rx='200' ry='80' fill='darkgreen' opacity='0.8'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='60' r='8' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='8' fill='orange'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='60' r='8' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

concept: foggy moor with lone ancient tree
description: Draw a large gray rectangle with lowered opacity to depict fog, place a dark brown twisted trunk shape for the ancient tree, and add minimal ground detail in green beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1381: Foggy forest with an ancient twisted tree -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q240,250 250,300' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='8' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='280' rx='50' ry='10' fill='green' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Create tall, thin brown lines for reeds, scatter them horizontally. Add a warm orange rectangle at the top for sunset and a few diagonal golden lines for rays shining through.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1382: Sunset through reeds -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#FF8C00'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='50' x2='450' y2='50' stroke='gold' stroke-width='4'/>
  <rect x='100' y='220' width='10' height='40' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <rect x='150' y='220' width='10' height='40' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <rect x='200' y='220' width='10' height='40' fill='#8B4513'/>
</svg>

description: Use a wide blue ellipse for pond water, place oversized green circular pads on the surface, and add small pink or white oval shapes at the center for lily blossoms.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1383: Pond with lily pads and blossoms -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='180' ry='40' fill='#87CEFA'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='30' fill='#32CD32'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='10' ry='5' fill='pink'/>
</svg>

description: Draw multiple curved arcs in ROYGBIV order across the sky, layer them over faint green hills below, and add a thin white rectangle for lingering mist near the horizon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1384: Rainbow arcs over green hills with lingering mist -->
  <path d='M50,150 A200,100 0 0,1 450,150' stroke='red' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M50,160 A200,100 0 0,1 450,160' stroke='orange' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M50,170 A200,100 0 0,1 450,170' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M50,180 A200,100 0 0,1 450,180' stroke='green' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M50,190 A200,100 0 0,1 450,190' stroke='blue' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <rect y='220' width='500' height='80' fill='white' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

description: Fill the lower area with light yellow for dry grass, place a few wide-canopy trees in dark green, and overlay faint swirling lines for heat haze in the background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1385: Dry grass and heat haze -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='lightyellow'/>
  <line x1='0' y1='280' x2='500' y2='280' stroke='gold' stroke-width='5' opacity='0.5'/>
  <path d='M100,250 Q250,245 400,250' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Use angular gray polygons for coastal rocks, draw overlapping curved blue shapes with white tips to represent crashing waves, and fill the backdrop with dark gray clouds.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1386: Coastal rocks and crashing waves -->
  <polygon points='50,150 150,120 250,150 350,120 450,150 450,300 50,300' fill='gray'/>
  <path d='M0,140 Q250,100 500,140' stroke='blue' stroke-width='8' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M0,140 Q250,110 500,140' stroke='white' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small clearing using a bright green rectangle for moss, place slender brown trunks around the edges, and add a dappled light effect using soft yellow circles on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1387: Mossy clearing with dappled sunlight -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='40' fill='white' opacity='0.5'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='240' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='240' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Draw bare brown branches angled across the scene, and attach small transparent shapes along them to mimic icicles. Overlay a pale blue gradient rectangle for cold morning light.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1388: Icy morning with bare branches and icicles -->
  <line x1='100' y1='50' x2='150' y2='250' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='6'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='50' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='6'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='50' x2='350' y2='250' stroke='#8B4513' stroke-width='6'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='50' x2='150' y2='250' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='4,4'/>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#iceGrad)' opacity='0.3'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='iceGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#ADD8E6;stop-opacity:0.5'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFFFFF;stop-opacity:0.5'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

description: Form a large rounded gray arch to represent the cave entrance, overlay thin green lines along the sides for trailing vines, and place a darker shape within for the cave interior.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1389: Cave entrance with trailing vines -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='gray' opacity='0.8'/>
  <path d='M170,150 Q250,80 330,150' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='6' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='230' y='150' width='40' height='150' fill='black' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

description: Use rows of slender brown trunks, each topped with scattered pink circles for blossoms. Place a light green rectangle below for grass, and a pale sky above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1390: Blossoming pines -->
  <g fill='#8B4513'>
    <rect x='100' y='150' width='20' height='120'/>
    <rect x='150' y='150' width='20' height='120'/>
    <rect x='200' y='150' width='20' height='120'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='pink'>
    <circle cx='110' cy='140' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='160' cy='140' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='210' cy='140' r='5'/>
  </g>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='100' fill='#FFF8DC'/>
</svg>

description: Fill the lower area with a reflective blue rectangle for floodwaters, layer a small strip of brown for distant plains, and scatter gray cloud shapes overhead.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1391: Flooded plains with distant cloud shapes -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <g fill='gray'>
    <circle cx='100' cy='50' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='200' cy='70' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='300' cy='50' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='400' cy='70' r='2'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Form a wide horizontal ellipse in pale blue for the lagoon, add a subtle gradient rectangle in orange and pink at the top for sunrise, and overlay thin white rectangles for mist.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1392: Lagoon sunrise with mist -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='260' rx='200' ry='40' fill='#ADD8E6'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='80' fill='url(#sunriseGrad2)'/>
  <rect x='0' y='250' width='500' height='10' fill='white' opacity='0.5'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='sunriseGrad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFA07A;stop-opacity:1'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFB6C1;stop-opacity:1'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide blue rectangle for water, place large irregular white polygons for icebergs partially submerged, and add thin gray lines to indicate cracked surfaces.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1393: Iceberg scene -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <polygon points='100,200 150,150 200,200 190,220 110,220' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='200' x2='200' y2='200' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use multiple tall green rectangles for bamboo stalks, segment each with thin horizontal lines, and place a bright circular area behind them for a sunlit clearing.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1394: Bamboo clearing with sunlit gap -->
  <g fill='green'>
    <rect x='80' y='100' width='10' height='150'/>
    <rect x='120' y='90' width='10' height='160'/>
    <rect x='160' y='110' width='10' height='140'/>
  </g>
  <circle cx='250' cy='60' r='30' fill='yellow' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

description: Form a green field with a wide rectangle, place multiple slender green lines topped by small yellow trumpet shapes for daffodils, and angle them slightly to show wind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1395: Daffodil field in a windy day -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#7CFC00'/>
  <g fill='yellow'>
    <line x1='100' y1='250' x2='100' y2='290' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
    <polygon points='95,250 100,240 105,250' fill='yellow'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='green'>
    <line x1='200' y1='250' x2='200' y2='290' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
    <polygon points='195,250 200,240 205,250' fill='yellow'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Sketch a curved green shape for the knoll, fill the sky above with a pale blue rectangle, and layer large white ovals for the clouds that gently drift across.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1396: Drifting clouds over a knoll -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#87CEEB'/>
  <path d='M50,200 Q250,150 450,200' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='100' ry='20' fill='white' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Draw tall orange-brown canyon walls as polygons, a narrow winding path in the middle, and scattered green column shapes on each side for cacti.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1397: Canyon walls with cacti -->
  <polygon points='0,50 100,10 200,50 300,20 400,50 500,30 500,300 0,300' fill='#CD853F'/>
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='10' height='60' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='350' y='40' width='10' height='60' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Use a wide turquoise rectangle for lagoon water, place brown arching roots for mangroves near the edges, and add small oval bird silhouettes on the branches.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1398: Mangrove lagoon with mangrove roots and birds -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#40E0D0'/>
  <path d='M100,200 Q250,150 400,200' stroke='brown' stroke-width='8' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='190' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='190' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Form rows of round green treetops on brown trunks, add small red or orange circles for fruit, and overlay a soft golden gradient at the top to represent late afternoon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1399: Orchard afternoon with fruit and golden sky -->
  <g fill='brown'>
    <rect x='100' y='150' width='20' height='100'/>
    <rect x='200' y='150' width='20' height='100'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='green'>
    <circle cx='110' cy='130' r='30'/>
    <circle cx='210' cy='130' r='30'/>
  </g>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='80' fill='url(#afternoonGrad)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='afternoonGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:1'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFA500;stop-opacity:1'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

description: Fill a broad area with white for snow, scatter light gray polygons for icy patches, and add a soft gray-blue rectangle above for a pale sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1400: Snowy landscape with icy patches -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='50,250 100,240 150,250 100,260' fill='lightgray'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='50' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Depict tall gray polygons for cliffs, overlay a vertical white and light blue rectangle for the waterfall, and place foaming white ellipses at the base for churning water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1401: Cliffs with a waterfall and foaming water at the base -->
  <polygon points='50,50 150,150 250,100 350,150 450,50 450,300 50,300' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='220' y='50' width='60' height='200' fill='url(#waterfallGrad)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='waterfallGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:white;stop-opacity:0.8'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:lightblue;stop-opacity:0.8'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='50' ry='15' fill='white' opacity='0.9'/>
</svg>

description: Form a small blue curvy line for the creek, then draw multiple brown trunks topped with pink circular shapes for blossoms. Add green ground with scattered small white blooms.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1402: A curvy blue creek with brown trunks topped with pink blossoms, on green ground with scattered white blooms -->
  <path d='M100,250 C150,220 200,260 250,240' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <g fill='brown'>
    <rect x='120' y='210' width='10' height='40'/>
    <rect x='220' y='220' width='10' height='35'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='pink'>
    <circle cx='125' cy='205' r='4'/>
    <circle cx='225' cy='215' r='4'/>
  </g>
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='green'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <circle cx='150' cy='270' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='300' cy='270' r='2'/>
  </g>
