</svg>

description: Use a grid of short brown trunks, each topped by a green circle for foliage, and add small peach-colored circles among the leaves. Place a broad yellow glow behind everything.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1403: Grid of short brown trunks each topped by a green foliage circle with peach dots and a yellow glow behind -->
  <g fill='brown'>
    <rect x='80' y='150' width='10' height='50'/>
    <rect x='120' y='150' width='10' height='50'/>
    <rect x='160' y='150' width='10' height='50'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='green'>
    <circle cx='85' cy='140' r='15'/>
    <circle cx='125' cy='140' r='15'/>
    <circle cx='165' cy='140' r='15'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='peachpuff'>
    <circle cx='85' cy='130' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='125' cy='130' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='165' cy='130' r='3'/>
  </g>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='yellow' fill-opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a faint green-brown rectangle for marsh water, layer thin brown rectangles for a footbridge across the surface, and add a soft gray overlay to suggest haze.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1404: Faint green-brown marsh water with a footbridge and soft gray haze overlay -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#8B7765'/>
  <rect x='150' y='140' width='200' height='20' fill='#A0522D'/>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='gray' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

concept: dark jungle floor with overhead canopy
description: Fill the bottom with dark overlapping green polygons for dense foliage, layer a bright wave of green ellipses near the top for canopy light, and add occasional vine lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1405: Dense foliage formed by dark overlapping green polygons, with a canopy light of green ellipses and vine lines -->
  <polygon points='0,250 100,200 200,250 300,210 400,250 500,220 500,300 0,300' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <g fill='limegreen' opacity='0.7'>
    <ellipse cx='250' cy='80' rx='80' ry='20'/>
  </g>
  <path d='M100,250 Q250,230 400,250' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Use two stacked rectangles in matching orange and purple hues, one upside-down to represent the reflection. Add a small black silhouette of a distant tree line across the middle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1406: Two stacked rectangles (one inverted for reflection) with a distant tree line silhouette -->
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='300' height='100' fill='orange'/>
  <rect x='100' y='210' width='300' height='100' fill='purple' transform='scale(1,-1) translate(0,-310)'/>
  <line x1='0' y1='200' x2='500' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

concept: thin waterfall trickling down mossy wall
description: Sketch a tall, dark green rectangle for a mossy stone wall, overlay a thin white line from top to bottom for the waterfall, and add subtle translucent layers to show trickling water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1407: Tall mossy stone wall with a thin white waterfall line and translucent trickling layers -->
  <rect x='200' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='250' width='10' height='20' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

concept: tranquil cove hidden by tall cliffs
description: Form two towering brown polygons at each side, place a curving blue ellipse in the center for water, and add smaller green shapes near the base to suggest vegetation.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1408: Two towering brown side polygons with a central curving blue water ellipse and green vegetation at the base -->
  <polygon points='0,300 50,100 100,300' fill='brown'/>
  <polygon points='400,300 450,100 500,300' fill='brown'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='80' ry='40' fill='blue'/>
  <g fill='green'>
    <circle cx='250' cy='240' r='10'/>
    <circle cx='230' cy='240' r='10'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: moonlit orchard bathed in silver light
description: Use several round trees in dark green, place a large white circle in the sky for the moon, and layer subtle gray highlights on the tree edges to suggest moonlight.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1409: Several round dark-green trees with subtle gray highlights under a large white moon -->
  <g fill='darkgreen'>
    <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='30'/>
    <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='30'/>
  </g>
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='25' fill='white'/>
  <g stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'>
    <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='32'/>
    <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='32'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Sketch a wide blue rectangle for the sea, place tall narrow gray polygons emerging from it, and add small green patches for vegetation on top of those pillars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1410: Sea with tall narrow gray pillars emerging and green patches on top -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <g fill='gray'>
    <rect x='100' y='150' width='20' height='100'/>
    <rect x='200' y='150' width='20' height='100'/>
    <rect x='300' y='150' width='20' height='100'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='green'>
    <rect x='105' y='140' width='10' height='10'/>
    <rect x='205' y='140' width='10' height='10'/>
    <rect x='305' y='140' width='10' height='10'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a wavy brown line for the riverbank, add a thin blue rectangle for water, and layer overlapping brown lines at angles to show exposed roots.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1411: Wavy brown riverbank with a thin blue water strip and exposed roots -->
  <path d='M0,250 L500,250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='blue'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='250' x2='70' y2='260' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='250' x2='170' y2='260' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Use a circular turquoise shape for the lagoon, and surround it with multiple tall, slender brown rectangles topped by green palm fronds, angled outward.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1412: Lagoon with a turquoise central ellipse and slender palm fronds -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='100' ry='30' fill='turquoise'/>
  <g fill='brown'>
    <rect x='200' y='150' width='10' height='80'/>
    <rect x='290' y='150' width='10' height='80'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='green'>
    <path d='M205,150 Q210,130 215,150' stroke='green' stroke-width='2' fill='green'/>
    <path d='M295,150 Q300,130 305,150' stroke='green' stroke-width='2' fill='green'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall red rectangle for the barn, place curved white mounds at the base for snowdrifts, and add small diagonal lines on the barn for wooden texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1413: Red barn with snowy mounds at its base -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='100' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='190' y='200' width='120' height='30' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='100' x2='210' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='290' y1='100' x2='290' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: lava flow carving path through valley
description: Sketch a winding orange-red line for the lava flow, surrounded by dark gray polygons for rocky valley walls, with thin lines of black smoke above it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1414: Lava flow with dark gray rocky valley walls and a wisp of smoke -->
  <path d='M0,250 Q250,300 500,250' stroke='orange' stroke-width='8' fill='none'/>
  <polygon points='0,250 100,220 200,240 300,220 400,240 500,220 500,300 0,300' fill='darkgray'/>
  <path d='M250,240 Q250,220 250,200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Fill a slope with a curved green shape for the hillside, then scatter small bright yellow circles across to depict wild mustard blooms. Layer a warm sky rectangle above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1415: Curved green hillside with wild mustard blooms and a warm sky above -->
  <path d='M0,200 Q250,150 500,200 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='green'/>
  <g fill='yellow'>
    <circle cx='150' cy='180' r='4'/>
    <circle cx='350' cy='180' r='4'/>
  </g>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='100' fill='orange' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Create a ring of irregular sandy beige polygons for the coral atoll, and fill the middle with a bright turquoise ellipse. Add minimal lines around the atoll for waves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1416: Coral atoll: ring of sandy beige polygons with a bright turquoise center and wave outlines -->
  <polygon points='200,250 250,230 300,250 250,270' fill='beige'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='60' ry='20' fill='turquoise'/>
  <path d='M190,250 Q250,240 310,250' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a series of overlapping tan curves for dunes, place a tall green cactus shape on one side, and add a small white circle at the top for the moon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1417: Dunes with tan curves, a tall green cactus on the side, and a small white moon above -->
  <path d='M0,250 Q250,220 500,250 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='tan'/>
  <rect x='100' y='180' width='15' height='50' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='450' cy='50' r='15' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Use a thick brown rectangle for the trunk, attach large overlapping green ellipses for the canopy, and add short, thin branches spread across the canopy for fullness.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1418: Full tree with thick trunk and overlapping green canopy with branch details -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='100' fill='sienna'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='80' rx='50' ry='30' fill='green' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form repeating narrow purple rectangles for lavender rows, converging in perspective. Place a bright yellow circle overhead for the sun, and a light blue rectangle behind for sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1419: Lavender rows in perspective with a bright yellow sun and light blue sky -->
  <g fill='purple'>
    <rect x='100' y='200' width='5' height='50'/>
    <rect x='120' y='210' width='5' height='45'/>
    <rect x='140' y='220' width='5' height='40'/>
  </g>
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='100' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

description: Fill a green-brown rectangle for waterlogged soil, draw multiple tall, narrow leaves angled in one direction, and lightly overlap them with short, wavy lines to convey wind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1420: Waterlogged soil with tall, narrow leaves and a gust represented by wavy lines -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='150' x2='450' y2='150' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M60,150 Q250,130 440,150' stroke='green' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: white sand beach with palm trees
description: Draw a long strip of pale yellow or white for sand, add tall brown trunks topped with green fan-like fronds for palms, and layer a wide blue rectangle above for sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1421: Desert sand strip with palm trees and a wide blue sky above -->
  <rect width='500' height='50' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect y='50' width='500' height='200' fill='yellow'/>
  <g fill='brown'>
    <rect x='100' y='80' width='10' height='100'/>
    <rect x='300' y='80' width='10' height='100'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='green'>
    <path d='M105,80 Q110,60 115,80' stroke='green' stroke-width='2' fill='green'/>
    <path d='M305,80 Q310,60 315,80' stroke='green' stroke-width='2' fill='green'/>
  </g>
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Form a large sandy rectangle for the desert floor, place a small blue ellipse for the oasis, and add tall gray polygons behind for plateaus. A few green palm shapes near water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1422: Desert oasis with a small blue ellipse in a sandy floor and distant gray plateaus with palm shapes -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='khaki'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='250' rx='40' ry='20' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <g fill='gray'>
    <polygon points='50,150 150,120 250,150'/>
    <polygon points='250,150 350,130 450,150'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='green'>
    <path d='M230,240 Q250,220 270,240' stroke='green' stroke-width='2' fill='green'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Use multiple brown curved lines with short spines to indicate brambles, layered on a dark green rectangle for the forest floor. Add tiny red dots for berries scattered around.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1423: Forest floor with brown brambles and tiny red berries -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <path d='M100,200 Q150,180 200,200' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <g fill='red'>
    <circle cx='130' cy='190' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='170' cy='190' r='3'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Sketch horizontally angled brown branches, then overlay drooping green shapes to represent moss. Add a soft, warm gradient rectangle behind to suggest afternoon sun filtering through.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1424: Brown branches with drooping green moss against a warm gradient sky -->
  <line x1='100' y1='50' x2='150' y2='250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M150,250 Q160,260 170,250' stroke='green' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='url(#sunGrad2)'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='sunGrad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFDAB9;stop-opacity:0.8'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFB6C1;stop-opacity:0.8'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

description: Create a wide, branching blue shape that meets a larger blue rectangle at the edge, with surrounding earthy brown polygons for land areas intersected by the river delta.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1425: River delta: a branching blue shape meeting a larger blue rectangle with earthy brown land -->
  <path d='M0,200 Q250,180 500,200 L500,300 L0,300 Z' fill='brown'/>
  <path d='M0,200 Q250,170 500,200' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <rect y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='sienna' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

concept: prismatic hot springs steaming in daylight
description: Draw a circular shape in bright concentric rings of orange, yellow, and turquoise to mimic prismatic colors, add light gray steam lines, and a tan rectangle around for the ground.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1426: Concentric prismatic rings with light gray steam lines and tan ground -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='orange'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='turquoise'/>
  <path d='M250,110 L250,90' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='tan'/>
</svg>

description: Form multiple leafless brown branches with thin, angled lines, attach small transparent polygons along edges for icicles, and place a pale gray or blue background behind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1427: Leafless branches with icicles along edges on a pale background -->
  <line x1='150' y1='50' x2='150' y2='250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='50' x2='200' y2='250' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <polygon points='148,250 152,250 150,260' fill='rgba(173,216,230,0.5)'/>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#B0C4DE' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

concept: tall pampas grass in golden light
description: Sketch clusters of thin stalks with feathery tops in light beige, arrayed at different angles, and overlay a warm orange rectangle behind for golden late-afternoon light.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1428: Clusters of thin stalks with feathery tops and a warm orange glow behind -->
  <g fill='lightbeige'>
    <rect x='100' y='200' width='3' height='50'/>
    <rect x='120' y='210' width='3' height='50'/>
    <rect x='140' y='205' width='3' height='50'/>
  </g>
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='orange' opacity='0.3'/>
</svg>

description: Use tall jagged polygons in gray for cliffs rising above a blue rectangle representing the ocean, and add small white oval shapes perched on the ledges for seabirds.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1429: Jagged gray cliffs rising above a blue ocean with small white seabirds -->
  <polygon points='50,50 100,100 150,50 200,80 250,40 300,70 350,30 400,60 450,20 450,300 50,300' fill='gray'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='80' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <ellipse cx='200' cy='30' rx='5' ry='3'/>
    <ellipse cx='350' cy='50' rx='5' ry='3'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Sketch a circular web framework of thin, radiating lines in white, crisscrossed by concentric arcs. Overlay small white dots along intersections to represent dewdrops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1430: A delicate, dewy spider web with tiny dewdrops -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='70' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,80 L250,220' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M180,150 L320,150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a lighthouse on a rocky coast
description: Draw a tall, narrow rectangle for the lighthouse tower with a small rectangle on top. Use white fill with black stroke. Add a small trapezoid on the very top for the light chamber. Below, create jagged polygons in gray or brown for rocks. Use blue rectangles or polygons at the bottom for water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1431: Lighthouse on a rocky shore with a light chamber -->
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='200' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='235' y='30' width='30' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <polygon points='200,250 250,220 300,250 300,300 200,300' fill='gray'/>
  <rect y='280' width='500' height='20' fill='#1E90FF'/>
</svg>

description: Create a triangle with rounded corners for the watermelon slice. Fill with green (#76B947) for the rind edge, transitioning to red (#FF3B3F) for the flesh. Add small black ovals scattered throughout the red area to represent seeds.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1432: Watermelon slice with a green rind and red flesh with seeds -->
  <path d='M100,150 Q150,100 200,150 L200,250 Q150,300 100,250 Z' fill='#FF3B3F' stroke='#76B947' stroke-width='4'/>
  <g fill='black'>
    <circle cx='130' cy='190' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='170' cy='210' r='3'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval for the body tilted at an angle, with a smaller circle for the head. Use black for the back and white for the front. Add small triangles for the beak and feet in orange. Place the figure on a wavy line or elongated ellipse in light blue (#E0FFFF) representing ice.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1433: Icy creature on slippery ice -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='50' ry='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='180' r='15' fill='white'/>
  <path d='M220,180 L210,170 L230,170 Z' fill='orange'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='60' ry='10' fill='#E0FFFF'/>
</svg>

concept: a hot air balloon over mountains
description: Draw an inverted teardrop shape for the balloon in bright colors. Connect it with lines to a small rectangle basket below. In the background, create a series of overlapping triangles in blue-gray tones for mountains, arranged along the bottom portion.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1434: Hot air balloon over mountains -->
  <path d='M200,150 A50,50 0 1,1 300,150 A50,50 0 1,1 200,150' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='150' width='10' height='30' fill='brown'/>
  <polygon points='0,250 100,300 200,250 200,300 0,300' fill='#B0C4C4'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large circle in orange-red (#FF4500) positioned near the top for the sun. Draw a horizontal line across the middle for the horizon. Fill the top half with gradient colors from orange to purple, and the bottom half with dark blue (#00008B) for water, adding a reflection of the sun as an elongated ellipse.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1435: Sunset over water with a reflection -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='70' r='30' fill='#FF4500'/>
  <line x1='0' y1='150' x2='500' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect y='0' width='500' height='150' fill='url(#sunsetGrad2)'/>
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='#00008B'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='80' ry='20' fill='#FF4500' opacity='0.5'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='sunsetGrad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
      <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:orange'/>
      <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:purple'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

concept: a cactus in a terracotta pot
description: Draw a trapezoid with the wider part at the top in orange-brown (#CC7F32) for the pot. Add a small rectangle at the bottom in darker brown. For the cactus, create a tall rounded rectangle with two smaller rounded rectangles as arms, all in green (#2AAA8A). Add small lines for thorns.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1436: Terracotta pot with a cactus -->
  <rect x='200' y='180' width='100' height='80' fill='#CC7F32' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='260' width='40' height='10' fill='brown'/>
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='80' fill='#2AAA8A' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='120' width='20' height='30' fill='#2AAA8A' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='260' y='120' width='20' height='30' fill='#2AAA8A' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='90' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create multiple leaf shapes using polygons with 5-7 points to create star-like or maple leaf shapes. Use autumn colors: red (#C41E3A), orange (#FF7F00), yellow (#FFD700). Position them at different heights with slight rotation to suggest falling motion.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1437: Autumn leaves falling with varied rotations -->
  <polygon points='100,150 120,130 140,150 120,170' fill='#C41E3A'/>
  <polygon points='160,160 180,140 200,160 180,180' fill='#FF7F00'/>
  <polygon points='220,150 240,130 260,150 240,170' fill='#FFD700'/>
  <g transform='rotate(15 250 250)'>
    <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='3' fill='#C41E3A'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a semi-circle or rounded rectangle for the boat hull in brown or white. Add a tall thin rectangle for the mast. Create triangular shapes in white or cream for the sails. Below, draw wavy horizontal lines or a blue rectangle (#1E90FF) for water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1438: Boat with a curved hull, mast, and white sails on choppy blue water -->
  <rect width='500' height='300' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <path d='M150,200 Q250,150 350,200 L350,230 Q250,210 150,230 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='130' width='20' height='70' fill='brown'/>
  <polygon points='240,130 260,130 250,90' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rounded rectangle or use a path for a mug shape in white or beige. Add a small curved rectangle for the handle. Fill the top portion with brown (#6F4E37) for coffee. Add 2-3 curved lines above it to represent steam rising.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1439: Mug with coffee and rising steam -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='150' fill='#F5F5DC' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='300' y='120' width='20' height='60' fill='#F5F5DC' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,90 Q250,60 290,90' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M210,85 Q250,55 290,85' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a stack of pancakes with syrup
description: Draw 3-4 overlapping circles with slight offsets, each with a tan fill (#D2B48C) and thin brown stroke. Add an irregular shape on top in amber (#FFBF00) that drips down the sides to represent the syrup. Optionally add a small rectangle with yellow fill for butter.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1440: Overlapping circles representing a pancake drizzled with syrup and a dab of butter -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,150 Q250,170 290,150' fill='#FFBF00' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='110' width='20' height='10' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Create a crescent shape using two overlapping circles (one white, one matching the background) or a path with a C-shape. Fill with yellow-white (#FFFAA0). Add small star shapes using crossed lines or polygons scattered around in the same color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1441: Crescent moon shape with small star accents -->
  <path d='M250,100 A30,30 0 1,0 250,140 A20,20 0 1,1 250,100' fill='#FFFAA0'/>
  <g fill='#FFFAA0'>
    <polygon points='230,110 235,115 230,120 225,115' />
    <polygon points='270,110 275,115 270,120 265,115' />
  </g>
</svg>

description: For the butterfly, draw two rounded triangles or heart shapes side by side for wings in bright colors. Add a thin rectangle in the middle for the body. Below, create a circle with small petals around it (using overlapping circles or paths) for the flower in a contrasting color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1442: Butterfly with two rounded heart-shaped wings and a thin rectangle body, paired with a flower below -->
  <polygon points='230,150 210,180 230,210' fill='pink'/>
  <polygon points='270,150 290,180 270,210' fill='pink'/>
  <rect x='245' y='160' width='10' height='40' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='250' r='20' fill='lightblue'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='240' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='240' r='5' fill='red'/>
</svg>

concept: a palm tree on a beach
description: Draw a tall, thin rectangle in brown for the trunk, with a slight curve. At the top, add several long, thin triangles or curved paths radiating outward in green for fronds. At the bottom, create a wavy line or shape in tan (#F5DEB3) for sand, with blue (#1E90FF) below for water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1443: Tree with a curved brown trunk, green fronds radiating out, and a sandy base with a blue water patch below -->
  <rect x='220' y='50' width='60' height='200' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <path d='M250,50 Q200,10 150,50' fill='green'/>
  <path d='M250,50 Q300,10 350,50' fill='green'/>
  <path d='M220,250 Q250,260 280,250' stroke='tan' stroke-width='4' fill='tan'/>
  <rect y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='#1E90FF'/>
</svg>

description: Stack three white circles vertically, with the smallest at the top and largest at the bottom. Add small black circles for eyes and buttons. Create a carrot-shaped triangle in orange for the nose. Wrap a rectangle or wavy path in red around the junction of the top and middle circles for the scarf.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1444: Snowman with three stacked circles, carrot nose, and a red scarf -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='30' fill='white' stroke='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='230' r='40' fill='white' stroke='black'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 265,155 250,160' fill='orange'/>
  <rect x='230' y='170' width='40' height='5' fill='red'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with rounded corners for the cassette body in gray or black. Add two smaller circles inside for the reels. Place tiny rectangles for buttons along one edge. Add thin lines to suggest the tape and label areas.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1445: Cassette tape with reels and buttons -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' rx='10' ry='10' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='20' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='20' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='10' height='10' fill='lightgray'/>
  <rect x='310' y='120' width='10' height='10' fill='lightgray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a semi-circle or curved shape for the bowl in light blue or white. Inside, place overlapping circles in different colors: red (#FF0000) for apples, yellow (#FFD700) for bananas as curved shapes, purple (#800080) for grapes as clusters of small circles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1446: Bowl of mixed fruit: apples, bananas, and grapes -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='80' ry='30' fill='lightblue'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='200' r='15' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='210' r='15' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='200' r='15' fill='purple'/>
</svg>

description: Create a series of curved arcs nested inside each other, using rainbow colors (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet). Place them in the upper portion. Below, draw gentle curves or rounded shapes in green (#228B22) for hills.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1447: Nested rainbow arcs over gentle green hills -->
  <path d='M50,100 A100,50 0 0,1 450,100' stroke='red' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M50,110 A100,50 0 0,1 450,110' stroke='orange' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M50,120 A100,50 0 0,1 450,120' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M50,130 A100,50 0 0,1 450,130' stroke='green' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M50,140 A100,50 0 0,1 450,140' stroke='blue' stroke-width='10' fill='none'/>
  <rect y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='lightblue'/>
  <line x1='0' y1='150' x2='500' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle with a thin black stroke for the clock face, with a white fill. Add a smaller circle in the center. From this center, draw a short line pointing to 3, and a longer line pointing to the 3. Optionally add small lines or circles around the perimeter for hour markers.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1448: Clock face with minute markers -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='50' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g fill='black'>
    <rect x='245' y='100' width='10' height='5'/>
    <rect x='245' y='195' width='10' height='5'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Create two elongated ovals that intersect at one end, with pointed ends at the other for the blades. Add small circles where they intersect for the pivot point. Add two oval shapes at the non-pointed ends for finger holes. Use silver-gray (#C0C0C0) fill.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1449: Wind-up clock mechanism with intersecting ovals and a tape -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='40' ry='20' fill='#C0C0C0'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='240' y='170' width='20' height='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle for the base in wood-brown (#8B4513). Add a circle on top in black for the turntable. Place a thin rectangle extending from one side with a tiny circle at the end for the tone arm. Add a small rectangle on top of the base for the control panel.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1450: Turntable setup with wooden base, turntable, and tonearm -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='20' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='250' y='110' width='5' height='40' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='140' y='170' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Create a heart-shaped or rounded triangle for the strawberry in red (#FF0000). Add small circles or dots across the surface in yellow for seeds. At the top, add small pointed triangles or a star-like shape in green (#00FF00) for the leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1451: Strawberry with red rind, yellow seeds, and a green leafy crown -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 Q250,200 200,150 Z' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g fill='yellow'>
    <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='270' cy='140' r='2'/>
  </g>
  <polygon points='245,100 255,100 250,90' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw 3-5 rectangles stacked slightly offset from each other. Use different colors for each. Add thin lines along the sides to represent pages. Vary the width and height slightly for each rectangle to show different book sizes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1452: Stacked books in different colors with page details -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='30' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='160' y='150' width='190' height='30' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='170' y='180' width='180' height='30' fill='lightgreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle with rounded corners for the camera body in black. Add a smaller circle or rectangle on the front for the lens. Place a small rectangle on top for the viewfinder. Add a tiny rectangle in the upper corner with yellow fill (#FFFF00) for the flash.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1453: Camera body with lens, viewfinder, and flash detail -->
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='140' height='80' fill='black' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='30' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='230' y='110' width='40' height='20' fill='#FFFF00'/>
</svg>

description: Create a curved line or semi-circle for the headband. At each end, add circles or ovals for the ear cups in black. Add small rectangles or lines extending from the ear cups for the audio jacks or cable.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1454: Headphones with a curved headband and ear cups -->
  <path d='M150,100 Q250,50 350,100' stroke='black' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='150' cy='100' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='100' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='350' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a trapezoid or rectangle with slight outward curve for the base in brown (#8B4513). Add a cloud-like shape or irregular oval on top in pink or white for frosting. Add small, colorful rectangles or circles scattered on top for sprinkles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1455: Cupcake with a brown base, pink frosting, and colorful sprinkles -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='50' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150' fill='pink' stroke='lightcoral' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g>
    <circle cx='230' cy='130' r='3' fill='red'/>
    <circle cx='270' cy='130' r='3' fill='blue'/>
    <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Create a triangle with a long, pointed front for the main body. Add two smaller triangles at the back for wings, and a small rectangle or triangle for the vertical stabilizer. Use light blue or white fill with a thin gray stroke.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1456: Airplane silhouette with a triangular body and wings -->
  <polygon points='100,150 200,130 300,150 200,170' fill='lightblue' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='130' x2='200' y2='170' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a potted plant with large leaves
description: Draw a trapezoid for the pot in terracotta orange or brown. Add a thin stem line extending upward from the center. From this stem, add large oval or teardrop shapes for leaves in green (#228B22), positioning them to radiate outward in different directions.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1457: Pot with a thin stem and radiating green leaves -->
  <rect x='220' y='180' width='60' height='40' fill='#CC7F32' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='180' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='150' width='10' height='30' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Create a triangle for the pizza slice with tan fill (#D2B48C) for the crust. Add red circles or irregular shapes for pepperoni, and small green rectangles for bell peppers. Add wavy lines or irregular shapes in yellow for cheese.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1458: Pizza slice with tan crust, red pepperoni, green bell peppers, and cheesy yellow drips -->
  <polygon points='150,50 350,150 150,250' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='130' r='10' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='220' y='140' width='5' height='5' fill='green'/>
  <path d='M150,50 L150,250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle for the base and another rectangle connected at one edge that can be angled upward for the screen. Use silver or gray (#C0C0C0) for the body and black or blue for the screen. Add small circles or squares for keys on the base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1459: Keyboard with a rectangular screen above the base and keys represented by small shapes -->
  <rect x='100' y='180' width='300' height='50' fill='#C0C0C0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='60' fill='black'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <rect x='160' y='110' width='20' height='10'/>
    <rect x='190' y='110' width='20' height='10'/>
    <rect x='220' y='110' width='20' height='10'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a kite flying in the sky
description: Create a diamond shape or square rotated 45 degrees for the kite in bright colors (red, yellow, blue). Add crossed lines inside for support structures. Extend wavy lines or a curved path from the bottom point downward for the tail and string.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1460: Kite with a diamond shape and a curved tail -->
  <polygon points='250,50 230,100 250,150 270,100' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q250,180 240,200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M240,200 Q250,220 260,200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a series of triangles arranged in a circle for the crown points, connected by a band at the bottom. Use gold (#FFD700) fill. Add small circles in different colors (red, blue, green) along the band to represent jewels.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1461: Crown with triangular points and colorful jewels -->
  <polygon points='200,100 210,50 220,100' fill='#FFD700'/>
  <polygon points='230,100 240,50 250,100' fill='#FFD700'/>
  <polygon points='260,100 270,50 280,100' fill='#FFD700'/>
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='80' height='10' fill='#FFD700'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='105' r='3' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='105' r='3' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='105' r='3' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle, then place a smaller circle inside it to create a ring shape. Fill with tan or pink (#FFC0CB). Add small, colorful rectangles or circles scattered on top for sprinkles in various bright colors.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1462: Sprinkled ring candy with colorful accents -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='pink' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g>
    <circle cx='240' cy='140' r='3' fill='red'/>
    <circle cx='260' cy='140' r='3' fill='blue'/>
    <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='3' fill='green'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw an elongated oval or rounded rectangle for the submarine body in yellow (#FFFF00) or gray. Add a conning tower on top using a small rectangle with rounded top. Place small circular windows along the side. Surround with wavy blue (#1E90FF) lines or a blue background with bubble circles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1463: Submarine with a conning tower, circular windows, and bubble accents -->
  <rect x='150' y='130' width='200' height='60' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='110' width='60' height='30' fill='#D3D3D3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='160' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='160' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <path d='M150,190 Q250,220 350,190' stroke='#1E90FF' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a cat sleeping in a basket
description: Create an oval with curved lines crossing it for the basket in brown. Inside, draw a curved shape for the sleeping cat, with a circle for the head and larger oval for the body. Add small triangles for ears and a curved line for the tail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1464: Basket with a sleeping cat inside -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='80' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,150 Q250,130 290,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='10' fill='#FFA07A'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='15' ry='10' fill='#FFA07A'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle with a small rectangle at the bottom for the bulb shape. Fill with yellow (#FFFF00). Add short lines radiating outward from the circle to represent light rays. Use a darker color for the rectangular base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1465: Light bulb with radiating light rays and a dark base -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='130' x2='250' y2='110' stroke='orange' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='250' y2='190' stroke='orange' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='170' width='10' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Create a tall rectangle with a triangle on top for the rocket body in white or silver. Add small rectangles for windows. Place triangular or curved fins at the bottom sides. Add flame shapes in red and orange at the very bottom for thrust.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1466: Rocket with a silver body, triangular fins, and red flame thrust -->
  <rect x='230' y='80' width='40' height='120' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='230,200 250,220 270,200' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <rect x='240' y='70' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a semi-circle or dome shape for the umbrella top in a bright color. Add a straight line down from the center for the handle. Place short, parallel vertical lines around the umbrella to represent falling raindrops in light blue (#ADD8E6).
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1467: Umbrella with a bright top and light blue raindrops -->
  <path d='M150,100 A100,50 0 0,1 350,100' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g fill='#ADD8E6'>
    <rect x='240' y='210' width='5' height='10'/>
    <rect x='250' y='210' width='5' height='10'/>
    <rect x='260' y='210' width='5' height='10'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a pumpkin with a carved face
description: Create a circle or slightly flattened oval in orange (#FFA500). Add a small rectangle or curved shape at the top in green for the stem. Inside the orange shape, add triangles for eyes, a triangle for the nose, and a curved shape for the mouth to create a jack-o'-lantern face.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1468: Jack-o'-lantern face on an orange circle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='240,140 250,130 260,140' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='240,160 250,170 260,160' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='245' y='90' width='10' height='10' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle for the main body of the teapot with a semi-circle attached as the spout. Add a curved rectangle for the handle on the opposite side. Place a small circle or rectangle on top for the lid. Add curved lines above to represent steam.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1469: Teapot with a curved spout, handle, lid, and rising steam -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='70' ry='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,160 Q240,140 230,160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='60' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <path d='M240,140 Q250,120 260,140' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large rectangle for the main castle structure with smaller rectangles on top for battlements. Add tall, thin rectangles at corners for towers, topped with triangles. Draw a curved shape or gentle slope in green below for the hill.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1470: Castle with battlements, towers, and a green hill base -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='50' width='40' height='50' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='280' y='50' width='40' height='50' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='150,250 350,250 250,300' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle with a curved top (semi-circle) for the chest in brown. Add a rectangle for the lock in gold or yellow. Inside and slightly spilling out, place small circles in yellow (#FFD700) to represent gold coins or treasures.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1471: Treasure chest with a curved top and gold coins spilling out -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='60' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='230' y='160' width='40' height='20' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Create an oval or teardrop shape for the body in bright colors (orange, blue, yellow). Add a triangle at one end for the tail fin. Place smaller triangles along the top and bottom for dorsal and ventral fins. Add a small circle for the eye.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1472: Simple fish with overlapping fins -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='20' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='200,150 150,140 150,160' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='300,150 350,140 350,160' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a triangle with a rectangle at the bottom for the tent in blue or green. Around it, place several tall rectangles with small cloud-like shapes on top to represent trees. Use brown for trunks and green for the foliage.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1473: Tent in a forest clearing with nearby trees -->
  <polygon points='200,150 300,150 250,100' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='150' width='40' height='30' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g fill='brown'>
    <rect x='180' y='180' width='10' height='40'/>
    <rect x='310' y='180' width='10' height='40'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Create two circles for the wheels connected by lines for the frame. Add lines above for handlebars and seat. Place a small oval or rectangle shape near the handlebars for the basket in brown or white. Use thin lines for spokes inside the wheels.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1474: Bicycle with two wheels, a connecting frame, and a basket on the handlebars -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='200' r='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='200' r='30' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='200' x2='300' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='260' y='180' width='20' height='15' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

description: Draw several thin rectangles of different lengths for the brush handles in brown or yellow. At one end of each, add small oval or pointed shapes in different colors to represent the bristles, with varying shapes for different brush types.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1475: Brush set with multiple handles and colorful bristles -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='10' height='50' fill='sienna'/>
  <rect x='120' y='150' width='10' height='50' fill='sienna'/>
  <circle cx='105' cy='150' r='3' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='125' cy='150' r='3' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

description: Create an oval for the ladybug body in red (#FF0000). Add small black circles on top for spots and a small circle at one end for the head. Below, draw an oval or pointed oval in green (#00FF00) for the leaf with a thin line for the stem.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1476: Ladybug on a green leaf with stem -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='15' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='145' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='145' r='2' fill='black'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='30' ry='10' fill='#00FF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='250' y2='175' stroke='green' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a triangle in dark green (#006400) for the tree, with a small rectangle at the bottom for the trunk in brown. Add a white layer along the top of the triangle and at the base to represent snow. Optionally add more triangles stacked vertically for a fuller tree.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1477: Snow-covered conifer tree with a white snow cap -->
  <polygon points='250,50 200,150 300,150' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <rect x='240' y='150' width='20' height='50' fill='sienna'/>
  <polygon points='240,50 230,70 250,50' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
  <polygon points='250,50 270,70 260,50' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/>
</svg>

description: Create a long thin rectangle for the stand in black or gray. At the top, add a circle or oval for the microphone head. Add a small rectangle where the head meets the stand for the connector, and a wider rectangle or triangle at the bottom for the base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1478: Microphone on a stand with a circular head -->
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='20' height='100' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='60' r='15' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='180' width='10' height='20' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a picnic basket with checkered cloth
description: Draw a rectangle with rounded corners for the basket in brown (#8B4513). Add a handle with a curved line over the top. Partially draping out of one side, create a square with a pattern of smaller squares inside in red and white to represent the checkered cloth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1479: Checkered cloth basket with a handle -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='100' fill='#8B4513' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <path d='M180,100 L320,200' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='320' y='100' width='20' height='20' fill='red' stroke='white' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a glass of lemonade with straw
description: Create a trapezoid with the wider part at the top for the glass, with light blue or transparent fill. Fill the inside with yellow (#FFFF00) up to near the top. Add a thin rectangle extending upward and slightly bent for the straw. Optionally add small circles for ice or lemon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1480: Glass filled with yellow liquid and a bent straw -->
  <polygon points='200,80 300,80 280,200 220,200' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='80' width='80' height='120' fill='yellow' opacity='0.5'/>
  <path d='M240,80 Q250,60 260,80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='250' y='20' width='5' height='60' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a collection of circles or star shapes in various colors (pink, yellow, purple, red) grouped together for flower blooms. Add green lines extending downward for stems. Wrap the bottom with a curved shape or rectangle in paper-white or colorful ribbon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1481: Cluster of colorful flower blooms with green stems and a ribbon wrap -->
  <g fill='pink'>
    <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='10'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='140' r='10'/>
    <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='10'/>
  </g>
  <path d='M220,150 L220,200' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='200' width='20' height='10' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

concept: a piece of cheese with holes
description: Create a triangle or wedge shape in yellow (#FFDB58) for the cheese. Add several small circles inside with the same fill as the background to create the appearance of holes throughout the cheese.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1482: Cheese slice with holes -->
  <polygon points='200,100 300,100 350,150 300,200 200,200 150,150' fill='#FFDB58' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='160' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Draw two circles or ovals connected by a small rectangle for the bridge. Add long, thin rectangles extending from the outer edges for the temples. Fill the circle lenses with dark gray or black, and use black or brown for the frames.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1483: Bridge with temples and circular lenses -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='140' width='20' height='20' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='50' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='350' y='150' width='50' height='20' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with a curved top for the mailbox in blue or gray. Add a thin rectangle attached to one side in red for the flag. Place the entire structure on a thin rectangle or post extending downward.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1484: Mailbox with a curved top and a red flag -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='80' fill='blue' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='290' y='120' width='10' height='30' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='240' y='200' width='20' height='50' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a curved line for the bow in brown or black. Connect the ends with a thin line for the bowstring. Add a long thin line for the arrow, with a triangle at one end for the arrowhead and small triangles or lines at the other for fletching.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1485: Bow and arrow with a curved bowstring -->
  <path d='M150,150 Q200,100 250,150' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='150' x2='350' y2='150' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='350,150 360,145 360,155' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

description: Create a vertical line with a circle or semi-circle at the top. At the bottom, add two curved hooks extending in opposite directions. Add a horizontal bar through the lower part of the vertical line. Use gray or black fill with a heavier stroke.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1486: Vertical assembly with a top circle, horizontal bar, and curved hooks at the base -->
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='200' x2='270' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an irregular circle or bowl shape with a rough texture (using short lines or a jagged path) in brown for the nest. Inside, place 2-4 small ovals or circles in light blue or white to represent the eggs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1487: Rough-textured nest with light blue eggs -->
  <path d='M220,200 Q250,180 280,200 Q250,220 220,200 Z' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='195' r='5' fill='lightblue'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='205' r='5' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle in brown (#8B4513) for the chocolate bar. Add a grid of lines to divide it into smaller squares. Optionally, peel back one corner by adding a small quadrilateral in a lighter brown to show the inside texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1488: Chocolate bar with grid divisions and a peeled corner -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='80' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='160' x2='350' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='120' x2='200' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='120' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='150,120 170,120 150,140' fill='#A0522D'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a zigzag path with sharp angles, typically with 2-3 points. Fill with yellow (#FFFF00) or white. Optionally add a glow effect by placing a larger, similar shape with lower opacity behind it.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1489: Zigzag lightning bolt with a subtle glow -->
  <polyline points='200,50 220,100 200,150' fill='yellow' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

description: Create an oval or teardrop shape for the overall form. Add overlapping curved triangles or scales arranged in rows from top to bottom, with each row overlapping the one below. Use brown (#8B4513) with varying darkness for dimension.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1490: Reptile skin texture with overlapping curved scales -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='70' ry='40' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M180,150 Q250,130 320,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M180,160 Q250,140 320,160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a semi-circle or dome for the cap in red (#B22222). Add small white circles across the cap for spots. Connect the cap to a cylinder or rectangle in white or tan for the stem, slightly narrower than the cap.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1491: Mushroom with a red cap dotted with white spots and a beige stem -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 L300,180 Q250,210 200,180 Z' fill='#B22222' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g fill='white'>
    <circle cx='230' cy='160' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='270' cy='160' r='3'/>
  </g>
  <rect x='240' y='180' width='20' height='20' fill='#F5DEB3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create six lines radiating from a central point at equal 60-degree angles. Along each line, add smaller lines or branches at 60-degree angles. Ensure the pattern has six-fold symmetry. Use white or light blue (#ADD8E6) fill.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1492: Six-fold symmetric starburst made of radiating lines -->
  <g fill='#ADD8E6'>
    <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='300' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='200' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='290' y2='110' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='210' y2='190' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle with a triangle on top for the barn in red (#FF0000). Add thin rectangles for doors and windows. Next to it, place a tall, narrow rectangle with a semi-circle on top for the silo in silver or white.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1493: Barn and silo combination -->
  <rect x='180' y='150' width='140' height='100' fill='#FF0000' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='330' y='120' width='30' height='50' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='5' ry='5'/>
</svg>

description: Create several irregular triangles or flame shapes in orange (#FF4500) and yellow (#FFFF00), arranged to point upward from a common base. Below them, add small circles or irregular shapes in brown or black to represent logs or stones in a circle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1494: Flame shapes (orange and yellow) rising from a common base with logs in a circle -->
  <polygon points='200,200 220,150 240,200' fill='#FF4500'/>
  <polygon points='260,200 280,150 300,200' fill='#FFFF00'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='210' r='10' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a semi-circle for the main part of the cap with a rectangle extending from the front for the brim. Use a solid color like blue, red, or black. Optionally add a logo or initial on the front using a simple shape or letter.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1495: Baseball cap with a solid color and a simple logo -->
  <path d='M200,120 Q250,80 300,120 L300,140 Q250,160 200,140 Z' fill='blue'/>
  <text x='235' y='130' fill='white' font-size='12'>A</text>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with rounded corners for the base in black. Add a curved shape on top for the handset. Connect them with a curly line for the cord. Add small circles in the base portion to represent the rotary dial or buttons.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1496: Rotary phone with a circular dial and a central reel -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='200' fill='black' rx='20' ry='20'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='40' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval or rounded rectangle for the main body in green or metal gray. Add a handle curved over the top. On one side, extend a thin spout that curves downward at the end. Optionally add small circles coming from the spout for water droplets.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1497: Teapot with a curved spout, handle, lid, and rising steam -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='70' ry='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,160 Q240,140 230,160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='60' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <path d='M240,140 Q250,120 260,140' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large circle for the head and a larger oval below for the body. Add two small circles on top of the head for ears. Place two small circles with dots inside on the face for eyes, and a small oval for the nose. Add oval shapes at the sides for arms and at the bottom for legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1498: Mounted traffic light with three colored circles inside a tall black rectangle -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='100' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='8' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='8' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='8' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='245' y='200' width='10' height='20' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall rectangle with rounded corners in black or gray. Inside, place three circles vertically: red at top, yellow in middle, green at bottom. Optionally add a smaller rectangle on top or a post at the bottom for mounting.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1499: Modern mounted bus sign with three vertically arranged colored circles -->
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='20' height='120' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='8' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='8' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='8' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='245' y='210' width='10' height='20' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a cloud shape using overlapping circles or a rounded irregular shape in white or light gray. Below the cloud, add several short parallel vertical lines in light blue (#ADD8E6) to represent raindrops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1500: Cloud with raindrops: overlapping cloud shape with short vertical light blue lines -->
  <path d='M200,100 Q250,50 300,100 Q350,100 320,150 Q250,170 180,150 Q150,100 200,100 Z' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='150' x2='220' y2='170' stroke='#ADD8E6' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='#ADD8E6' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='150' x2='280' y2='170' stroke='#ADD8E6' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle or cylinder for the candle in white or cream. At the top center, add a small oval or line for the wick. Above that, place a teardrop or flame shape in yellow (#FFFF00) or orange (#FFA500), pointed upward.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1501: Candle with flame -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='150' fill='ivory' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='100' rx='3' ry='5' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M245,90 Q250,80 255,90 Q250,85 245,90 Z' fill='#FFA500'/>
</svg>

description: Create a square or rectangle for the box in a solid color. Add crossing lines to represent ribbon. On top, draw a bow shape using two loops (small ovals) and two hanging ribbons (wavy lines) in a contrasting color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1502: Gift box with ribbon and bow -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='175' x2='350' y2='175' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='90' rx='15' ry='7' fill='pink'/>
  <path d='M235,90 Q250,70 265,90' stroke='pink' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a popsicle with a bite taken out
description: Draw a rectangle with rounded corners for the popsicle in red, orange, or purple. Add a small rectangle extending from the bottom for the stick in tan or brown. Create an irregular semi-circle indent on one side to represent the bite mark.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1503: Popsicle with bite mark -->
  <rect x='200' y='80' width='100' height='180' rx='20' ry='20' fill='purple' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='260' width='10' height='30' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <path d='M200,140 Q150,150 200,160' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle with a smaller circle inside it to form a ring shape in green (#228B22). Add small triangles or ovals around the ring for leaves or decorations. At the bottom, place a bow shape in red with two loops and two hanging ribbons.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1504: Green ring with leaf decorations and a red bow -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='5'/>
  <ellipse cx='210' cy='150' rx='5' ry='8' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='290' cy='150' rx='5' ry='8' fill='green'/>
  <path d='M250,190 Q240,210 250,230 Q260,210 250,190 Z' fill='red'/>
  <path d='M250,190 Q245,210 250,230' stroke='red' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a spiral path that makes 2-3 loops, with one end slightly raised and pointed for the head. Add a small circle for an eye and a tiny triangle for the tongue at the head end. Use green, brown, or patterned fill with darker outlines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1505: Spiral creature with an eye and tongue -->
  <path d='M250,250 
           C200,200 300,150 250,100
           C220,80 280,50 250,30' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='30' r='4' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='248,35 250,40 252,35' fill='red'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an upside-down triangle with the top corners folded down, creating a pentagon shape with three points down and a flat top. Use white or light blue fill with a thin gray stroke. Optionally add a thin rectangle rising from the center for a mast.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1506: Upside-down boat hull with folded corners and a mast -->
  <polygon points='200,100 300,100 340,200 250,220 160,200' fill='lightblue' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='50' width='10' height='50' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Create a triangle or cone shape in gray or brown for the mountain. At the top, add a small crater using a semi-circle or depression. Add red or orange irregular shapes emerging from the top for lava, with optional gray shapes above for smoke.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1507: Mountain with crater, lava flows, and smoke -->
  <polygon points='150,250 250,100 350,250' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,120 A10,10 0 0,1 260,120' fill='darkgray'/>
  <path d='M250,100 Q260,130 240,150' fill='orange'/>
  <path d='M245,90 Q250,80 255,90' fill='gray' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long, thin triangle for the main quill. Along one side, add small curved lines to represent the feather barbs. At the narrow end, create a small split to form the writing nib. Use tan, white, or light gray fill.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1508: Quill with detailed barbs and nib -->
  <polygon points='250,50 260,250 240,250' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,50 Q255,100 250,150' stroke='white' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q245,200 250,250' stroke='white' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
  <polygon points='250,45 248,50 252,50' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle in yellow (#FFFF00). Inside, place two smaller circles for eyes, positioned in the upper half. Add a curved line in the lower half, curved upward to create a smile. Optionally add simple lines for eyebrows or details.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1509: Smiling sun face -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='235' cy='140' r='4' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='265' cy='140' r='4' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M235,160 Q250,170 265,160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

concept: a frog on a lily pad
description: Draw an irregular circle in green (#00FF00) for the lily pad. On top, create a rounded rectangle for the frog's body with a larger circle for the head, all in bright green. Add two small circles on top of the head for eyes and tiny ovals at the sides for legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1510: Frog on a lily pad -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='50' fill='#00FF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='160' width='40' height='30' fill='limegreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='15' fill='limegreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='145' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='145' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <ellipse cx='230' cy='175' rx='5' ry='3' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='270' cy='175' rx='5' ry='3' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Create a semi-circle or dome for the main helmet in silver-gray. Add two curved horns extending from either side, pointing upward and outward. Optionally add a small rectangle across the front for the nose guard.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1511: Helmet with horns -->
  <path d='M200,150 A50,50 0 0,1 300,150' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M200,150 Q180,120 200,110' stroke='silver' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M300,150 Q320,120 300,110' stroke='silver' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='245' y='140' width='10' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

concept: a jar of honey with dipper
description: Draw a rectangle with rounded corners for the jar in transparent or light yellow. Fill most of it with darker yellow (#FFD700) for honey. Add a thin stick with a circle at the end leaning against the side or partially submerged for the honey dipper.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1512: Honey jar with dipper -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='150' rx='15' ry='15' fill='lightyellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='110' width='80' height='130' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.8'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='130' x2='350' y2='180' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='180' r='5' fill='saddlebrown'/>
</svg>

description: Create a semi-circle or deep curve for the bucket of the wheelbarrow in green or red. Add a circle at the front for the wheel. Extend two parallel lines backward for handles. Around it, add small irregular shapes or circles in green to suggest plants.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1513: Wheelbarrow with bucket and wheel -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 L300,200 Q250,220 200,200 Z' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='190' r='15' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='150' x2='190' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='150' x2='310' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='230' r='5' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='230' r='5' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle in red, green, gold, or blue for the ornament. Add a small rectangle or triangle at the top for the cap. Extend a curved line from the cap for the hanging hook. Optionally add simple patterns like dots, swirls, or stripes on the ball.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1514: Ornamental ball with cap and hook -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='115' width='10' height='10' fill='lightblue'/>
  <path d='M250,115 Q250,100 260,90' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <text x='240' y='155' font-size='12' fill='white'>★</text>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle for the body in green or red. Add a smaller rectangle at the front, slightly elevated, for the engine hood. Place two large circles at the back for the main wheels and two smaller circles at the front. Add a small square for the driver's seat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1515: Simple truck illustration -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='60' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='130' y='130' width='50' height='30' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='210' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='210' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='160' y='160' width='20' height='20' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle with crossing vertical and horizontal lines to mark North, South, East, West. Add diagonal lines for intermediate directions. Make the North pointer distinctive with a larger or colored arrowhead. Use black stroke with optional color fill for different points.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1516: Compass rose -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='110' x2='250' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='130' x2='280' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='130' x2='220' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='250,110 245,125 255,125' fill='red'/>
</svg>

description: Create an oval or rectangle with rounded corners for the basket shape. Add horizontal and vertical lines crossing in a pattern to represent the weave. Use brown (#8B4513) or tan (#D2B48C) colors with varying darkness to show dimension.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1517: Woven basket -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='100' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='15' ry='15'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='300' y2='150' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a five-pointed star shape with rounded points for the starfish in orange or pink. Place it on an irregular shape or rectangle filled with tan (#F5DEB3) to represent sand. Add small circles or dots in the sand for texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1518: Starfish on sand -->
  <polygon points='250,100 260,140 300,140 270,160 280,200 250,180 220,200 230,160 200,140 240,140' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
