  <rect x='150' y='200' width='200' height='50' fill='#F5DEB3'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='220' r='3' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='220' r='3' fill='saddlebrown'/>
</svg>

concept: a group of balloons on strings
description: Create 3-5 circles or ovals in different bright colors (red, blue, yellow, green) grouped together at the top. From the bottom of each, extend thin lines converging to a single point below to represent strings being held.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1519: Balloons with strings -->
  <circle cx='220' cy='80' r='15' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='15' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='80' r='15' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='95' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='95' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='280' y1='95' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw four heart-shaped or oval leaves arranged around a central point, with each leaf pointing in a different direction (top, bottom, left, right). Fill with green (#00FF00) and add a thin line for the stem extending from the bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1520: Four leaves arranged around a center -->
  <path d='M250,150 Q240,130 230,150 Q240,140 250,150' fill='#00FF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q260,130 270,150 Q260,140 250,150' fill='#00FF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q230,140 210,150 Q230,160 250,150' fill='#00FF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M250,150 Q270,140 290,150 Q270,160 250,150' fill='#00FF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a series of horizontal shapes stacked vertically: a semi-circle in brown (#CD853F) for the bottom bun, a circle in brown for the patty, rectangles or wavy shapes in green for lettuce and red for tomato, and another semi-circle in brown for the top bun.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1521: Hamburger with layered ingredients -->
  <path d='M180,220 A40,20 0 0,1 320,220 L320,240 A40,20 0 0,0 180,240 Z' fill='#CD853F'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='210' r='20' fill='#8B4513'/>
  <rect x='200' y='190' width='100' height='15' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='210' y='175' width='80' height='10' fill='red'/>
  <path d='M180,175 A40,20 0 0,1 320,175 L320,195 A40,20 0 0,0 180,195 Z' fill='#CD853F'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an elongated oval or cylinder for the fuselage in white or silver. Add a triangle or swept shape at the back for the tail fin. Create two rectangular wings extending from the middle, and a smaller horizontal rectangle at the tail for the stabilizer.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1522: Airplane fuselage with wings and tail fin -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='40' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='350,120 400,140 350,160' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='250' y='100' width='20' height='40' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='320' y='130' width='30' height='10' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with a slightly smaller rectangle inside it for the screen. Fill the outer rectangle with black or gray and the inner one with dark blue or black. Add small circles or squares at the bottom or side for buttons or controls.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1523: Electronic screen with buttons -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='160' y='110' width='180' height='130' fill='darkblue'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='230' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='230' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='230' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle divided into 6 or 8 equal wedges, like slices of a pie. Fill each wedge alternately with different bright colors (red, yellow, blue, green, white). Optionally add a slight oval distortion to suggest a three-dimensional form.

Create a circle in yellow (#FFFF00). For the eyes, draw two heart shapes in red (#FF0000) in the upper half. Add a simple curved line in the lower half for a smile. Optionally add a slight outline or blush circles on the cheeks.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1525: Smiling face with heart eyes -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M235,140 Q250,130 265,140 Q250,150 235,140 Z' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <path d='M265,140 Q280,130 295,140 Q280,150 265,140 Z' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <path d='M235,170 Q250,180 265,170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval with a long rectangle extending from one end for the racket. Add criss-crossing lines inside the oval to represent the strings. Next to it, place a small circle in yellow-green (#ADFF2F) for the tennis ball.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1526: Tennis racket with ball -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='70' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='250' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='10' fill='#ADFF2F' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a windy day with leaves blowing
description: Create several curved, wavy lines across the image to represent wind. Add small oval or maple leaf shapes in autumn colors (red, orange, yellow) positioned along the wind lines to show them being blown about.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1527: Wind with falling autumn leaves -->
  <path d='M50,100 Q150,80 250,100 Q350,120 450,100' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='90' rx='5' ry='3' fill='red'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='110' rx='5' ry='3' fill='orange'/>
  <ellipse cx='350' cy='105' rx='5' ry='3' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle in yellow (#FFFF00) for the overall slice. Inside, create a pattern of small triangles arranged in a circle pointing inward to represent the segments. Add small oval shapes between segments to represent seeds. Optionally add a thin outline around the whole circle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1528: Citrus slice with segments and seeds -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,110 L270,150 Z' fill='orange'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,110 L230,150 Z' fill='orange'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large circle or oval with a flattened bottom for the bowl in light blue (#ADD8E6) or transparent. Inside, add 1-2 small oval shapes with triangular tails in orange or gold to represent fish. Optionally add small circles at the bottom for pebbles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1529: Fish bowl with fish and pebbles -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='80' ry='40' fill='#ADD8E6' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='220,190 230,185 240,190' fill='orange'/>
  <polygon points='280,210 290,205 300,210' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='220' r='3' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large triangle in blue or purple for the hat. Add a wide brim at the bottom using a curved rectangle. Decorate the hat with small star shapes or dots in yellow or white. Optionally add a slight curve to the point of the hat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1530: Fancy hat with brim and star decorations -->
  <polygon points='200,100 300,100 250,40' fill='purple' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='20' fill='purple' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='70' r='4' fill='yellow'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='80' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='80' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large rectangle for the main structure with two taller rectangles at the corners for towers. Add triangular shapes on top of each tower and small rectangles along the top of the main structure for battlements. Use gray or tan fill with darker outlines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1531: Castle with towers and battlements -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='100' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='140' y='70' width='40' height='50' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='320' y='70' width='40' height='50' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='110' width='200' height='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long triangle or cone shape in orange (#FFA500) with the point facing down for the carrot. At the wide top, add several small pointed oval shapes in green for the leafy carrot tops, radiating outward.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1532: Carrot with leafy top -->
  <polygon points='250,50 220,150 280,150' fill='#FFA500' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='40' rx='5' ry='10' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='240' cy='40' rx='5' ry='10' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='260' cy='40' rx='5' ry='10' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a loaf of bread with slices
description: Create an oval or rounded rectangle for the main loaf in tan or brown (#D2B48C). Add straight lines across it to show slices. Make one slice slightly separated from the loaf using the same shape and color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1533: Loaf of bread with a slice removed -->
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='140' height='60' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='150' x2='320' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='320' y='120' width='20' height='60' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a triangle or V-shape with rounded bottom for the bowl of the glass. Connect it to a small rectangle at the bottom for the base, with a thin rectangle between them for the stem. Use transparent or very light blue fill with a thin outline.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1534: Glass bowl -->
  <path d='M220,120 Q250,80 280,120 L280,150 L220,150 Z' fill='lightblue' fill-opacity='0.3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='150' width='20' height='30' fill='lightblue' fill-opacity='0.3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a small circle with eight thin lines extending outward for the spider in black. Around it, draw several concentric partial circles connected by radiating lines to form the web, using thin gray or white strokes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1535: Spider and web -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='none' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='4,2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle with a slight curve on the right side to show the book with opened cover. Add thin horizontal lines to indicate pages. Place a thin rectangle or ribbon shape extending from the top in red or blue for the bookmark.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1536: Open book with bookmark -->
  <path d='M150,100 Q250,50 350,100 L350,200 Q250,250 150,200 Z' fill='lightyellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='130' x2='330' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='320' y='90' width='10' height='30' fill='red'/>
</svg>

description: Create a tall rectangle or trapezoid for the windmill body in brown or red. At the top center, add a circle with four triangular or rectangular blades extending outward in a cross pattern. The blades should all point in a clockwise or counter-clockwise direction.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1537: Windmill with blades -->
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='120' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='10' fill='gray'/>
  <polygon points='250,90 260,70 250,80 240,70' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='250,110 260,130 250,120 240,130' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval for the shell in green or brown. Add a small circle extending from one end for the head, and small ovals at the corners for legs. Create a pattern of smaller shapes inside the shell for the pattern. Add a tiny tail at the opposite end from the head.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1538: Turtle with patterned shell -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='60' ry='30' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='170' r='10' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='290' cy='190' rx='8' ry='4' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M290,190 Q310,200 320,190' stroke='green' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='20' fill='none' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='4,2'/>
</svg>

concept: a spool of thread with needle
description: Draw a cylinder or two circles connected by parallel lines for the spool in white or colored fill. Add a thin curved line with a small oval at one end extending from the spool to represent the thread and needle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1539: Film spool with thread -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='150' x2='290' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M290,150 Q320,130 340,140' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='340' cy='140' r='4' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a diamond shape for the kite in a bright color with crossed lines inside for support. From the bottom point, extend a long line downward, with several shorter lines crossing it at angles for the tail ribbons.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1540: Kite with tail ribbons -->
  <polygon points='250,50 230,100 250,150 270,100' fill='magenta' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='250' x2='240' y2='270' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='250' x2='260' y2='270' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a curved line or gentle S-shape for the branch in brown. Along the branch, place several simple flowers using five small circles or ovals arranged around a center point, in pink or white. Add small oval leaf shapes in green between some flowers.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1541: Branch with simple flowers -->
  <path d='M100,200 Q150,150 200,200' stroke='brown' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <g fill='pink'>
    <circle cx='150' cy='180' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='155' cy='175' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='145' cy='175' r='3'/>
  </g>
  <ellipse cx='160' cy='190' rx='4' ry='2' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Create a cup-like shape or inverted bell for the flower in red, yellow, or pink. Add a long thin rectangle or line extending downward for the stem in green. Place 1-2 oval or pointed shapes along the stem for leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1542: Flower with cup shape and stem -->
  <path d='M240,120 Q250,100 260,120 L260,140 Q250,150 240,140 Z' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='140' x2='250' y2='180' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='245' cy='170' rx='3' ry='5' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='255' cy='170' rx='3' ry='5' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small figure with a triangle or cone shape for the hat in red. Below that, add a circle for the head with a beard extending downward as a triangle or curved shape in white. The body should be a small rectangle in blue or green. Add thin rectangles for arms and legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1543: Figure with hat and beard -->
  <polygon points='240,80 250,50 260,80' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='10' fill='peachpuff' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M240,100 L250,120 L260,100' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='240' y='120' width='20' height='40' fill='blue'/>
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='10' height='30' fill='blue'/>
  <rect x='270' y='120' width='10' height='30' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

description: Create a stacked oval or dome shape for the beehive in yellow or tan. Around it, place several small ovals with thin lines for wings to represent the bees. Optionally add horizontal lines on the hive for texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1544: Beehive with bees -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='30' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='180' x2='290' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <path d='M245,140 L255,135' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long thin rectangle for the handle in brown. At one end, attach an angled, flat rectangle or fan shape in yellow or tan for the bristles. Position it at an angle to suggest movement, with small lines or particles beneath it to indicate sweeping.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1545: Broom with sweeping motion -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='10' height='80' fill='sienna'/>
  <polygon points='210,230 250,240 250,220' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='240' x2='260' y2='250' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a flamingo standing on one leg
description: Create an oval for the body in pink (#FFC0CB). Add a long, thin curved line for the neck with a small oval at the top for the head. Draw one long, thin line extending downward for the standing leg. Add a small triangular shape for the beak.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1546: Bird figure with pink body -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,160 Q250,140 260,140' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='265' cy='140' r='5' fill='#FFC0CB' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='265,145 270,150 260,150' fill='orange'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='200' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle with rounded corners or a cylinder for the jar in transparent or light blue. Fill the lower portion with red, purple, or orange for the jam. Add a circle on top for the lid. Optionally add a small label rectangle on the front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1547: Jam jar with lid and label -->
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='120' rx='10' ry='10' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='160' width='60' height='60' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='90' r='10' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='235' y='130' width='30' height='10' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Create an oval or pointed oval shape in green for the leaf. Add a line down the center for the vein, with thinner lines branching out. Place several small circles in light blue or white on the surface to represent dew drops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1548: Leaf with dew drops -->
  <path d='M250,100 Q300,150 250,200 Q200,150 250,100 Z' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='140' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='160' r='3' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long thin rectangle or line in black for the wand. At one end, add a star shape or circle in white or yellow. Optionally add small stars or sparkle shapes around the tip to represent magic effects.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1549: Magic wand with star sparkles -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='400' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <polygon points='400,50 390,60 410,60' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='395' cy='45' r='2' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='405' cy='55' r='2' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Create a square in red and white with a checkered pattern. On top, place simple shapes to represent food: circles for plates, rectangles for sandwiches, triangles for chips, and other basic shapes for various foods.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1550: Checkered food collage -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='200' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='150' x2='350' y2='150' stroke='white' stroke-width='5'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='300' stroke='white' stroke-width='5'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='200' r='15' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='260' y='220' width='30' height='20' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='220,120 230,100 240,120' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a curved line with sharp ups and downs, loops, or spirals to represent the track in black or dark gray. Add small rectangle shapes along or beneath the track to represent the support structure. Optionally add a small rectangle with circles for wheels on the track to represent a car.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1551: Roller coaster track with support -->
  <path d='M50,150 Q150,100 250,150 Q350,200 450,150' stroke='black' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='240' y='160' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='175' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a T-shape using rectangles for the post and crossbar. Add a circle on top for the head with small shapes for facial features. Place rectangles or irregular shapes extending from the crossbar for arms. Surround the base with small vertical lines or shapes in green to represent crops.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1552: T-shaped scarecrow -->
  <rect x='245' y='100' width='10' height='80' fill='brown'/>
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='10' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='15' fill='peachpuff' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='230' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='270' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='245' y1='180' x2='245' y2='200' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='255' y1='180' x2='255' y2='200' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle with a smaller rectangle attached at the front for the hood, with rounded corners. Add circles below for wheels. Make the main rectangle yellow (#FFFF00) and add small rectangles along the sides for windows. Add a door line and details like headlights with small circles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1553: Simple car illustration -->
  <rect x='150' y='140' width='200' height='60' fill='#FFFF00' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='170' y='150' width='40' height='30' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='290' y='150' width='40' height='30' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='210' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='210' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='190' cy='210' r='5' fill='gray'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='210' r='5' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with rounded corners for the toaster in silver or gray. Add small rectangles for the slots on top. Place rectangular shapes with rounded tops extending from the slots in tan or light brown to represent the toast. Add small circles or rectangles on the side for controls.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1554: Toaster with toast -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='80' fill='gray' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='210' y='110' width='80' height='10' fill='darkgray'/>
  <rect x='210' y='130' width='30' height='20' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='280' y='130' width='30' height='20' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='210' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a symmetrical shape with a narrow middle for the vase in blue or transparent. From the top, add several stems as straight lines in green. At the top of each stem, place cup-like shapes or inverted bells in different colors (red, yellow, pink) to represent the tulip flowers.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1555: Vase with tulips -->
  <rect x='230' y='100' width='40' height='120' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M245,50 Q250,30 255,50' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='100' x2='240' y2='60' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M235,60 Q240,40 245,60' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='100' x2='260' y2='60' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M255,60 Q260,40 265,60' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large curved oval or arc for the whale body in blue or gray. Add a small triangle on top for the fin. At one end, place a small rectangle or triangular shape for the tail. From the top near the head, add a vertical line or spray shape in light blue for the water spout.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1556: Whale with spout -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='40' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='330,150 350,130 350,170' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='60' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle in light blue or transparent with a slight gradient or highlights. Place it on a small stand created from a triangle or short cylinder in dark wood or metal colors. Optionally add swirls or glowing shapes inside the circle to suggest magic.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1557: Magical orb on a stand -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='190' width='20' height='30' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <path d='M230,150 Q250,130 270,150' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create two vertical rectangles connected by a series of zigzag lines or elongated diamond shapes to represent the bellows. Add small circles or rectangles on both vertical ends to represent the buttons or keys. Use brown, red, or black for the main colors.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1558: Bellows -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='20' height='100' fill='brown'/>
  <rect x='280' y='100' width='20' height='100' fill='brown'/>
  <path d='M220,100 L280,100 L260,150 L280,200 L220,200 L240,150 Z' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='100' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='100' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval or egg shape for the main acorn body in brown. At the top, add a semi-circle or shallow bowl shape in darker brown with texture lines for the cap. Optionally add a small point at the bottom of the acorn.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1559: Acorn -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='20' ry='30' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M240,150 Q250,140 260,150 L260,160 Q250,155 240,160 Z' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='210' x2='250' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with a smaller rectangle on top, connected by a curved handle arching over the top. Add thin lines within the main rectangle to suggest a grid or glass panels. Use black or dark gray for the frame and yellow inside for the light.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1560: Lightbox -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='100' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='60' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M180,100 Q250,60 320,100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a pile of overlapping cylindrical shapes or rounded rectangles in brown with darker lines for the wood grain or bark. Position them in a crossed pattern or stacked horizontally to show they are piled together.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1561: Pile of logs -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='170' width='100' height='20' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(-10 270 180)'/>
  <rect x='240' y='190' width='100' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(5 290 200)'/>
</svg>

concept: an ice cream cone with sprinkles
description: Draw a triangle or cone shape for the cone in tan or light brown. On top, place one or more circles or a dome shape in white, pink, or brown for the ice cream. Add small colorful dots or short lines on the ice cream for sprinkles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1562: Ice cream cone -->
  <polygon points='250,150 220,250 280,250' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='30' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='120' r='3' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='125' r='3' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Create a dome shape in white with light blue shading. Add a small semi-circle or arch at the bottom for the entrance. Place the dome on a white or very light blue rectangle or irregular shape to represent the snowy ground.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1563: Igloo -->
  <path d='M200,150 A50,30 0 0,1 300,150 L300,180 L200,180 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,180 A20,10 0 0,0 270,180' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='200' y='180' width='100' height='20' fill='lightblue'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with irregular, rough edges in tan or light brown for the map. Add curved or straight lines to represent paths or geographical features. Place a prominent X in one area, and optionally add simple symbols for mountains, trees, or water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1564: Map with an X marking the spot -->
  <path d='M150,100 L350,100 L340,200 L160,200 Z' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='120' x2='300' y2='170' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='120' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='red' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='5' fill='green'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='5' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle in a bright color with a line through the center or a small circle in the middle to represent the yo-yo. Attach a wavy line from the center extending upward for the string. Optionally add a small rectangle at the end of the string for the finger loop.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1565: Yo-yo with string -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='magenta' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='40' width='10' height='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a tall cylindrical shape with rounded top and base for the lamp. Fill the cylinder with transparent blue or purple, and add irregular blob shapes in red, orange, or pink inside to represent the lava. Add a small circle or rectangle at the bottom for the base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1566: Lava lamp -->
  <rect x='230' y='80' width='40' height='140' fill='purple' fill-opacity='0.5' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='15' fill='orange' opacity='0.7'/>
  <rect x='240' y='220' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large heart shape or upside-down triangular shape in white or tan for the face. Add two large circles for eyes in yellow or orange with black centers. Place a small triangle between and below the eyes for the beak. Add curved lines around the eyes to define the facial disk.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1567: Owl face -->
  <path d='M230,120 Q250,80 270,120 Q250,140 230,120 Z' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='110' r='8' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='110' r='8' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='110' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='110' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='250,120 245,130 255,130' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with curved sides or an oval with straight top and bottom for the barrel in brown. Add thin horizontal lines for the barrel rings. On one side near the bottom, attach a small rectangle or circle with a tiny rectangle extending from it for the tap.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1568: Barrel with tap -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='100' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='15' ry='15'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='160' x2='300' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='280' y='200' width='15' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an elongated oval with high sides for the tub in white. Add small circles of different sizes above and inside the tub to represent soap bubbles. Optionally add short lines or rectangles for feet at the bottom corners.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1569: Bathtub with bubbles -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='100' ry='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='180' r='5' fill='lightblue'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='190' r='7' fill='lightblue'/>
  <rect x='190' y='230' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='290' y='230' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Create a semi-circle or dome shape for the hat body in a solid color. Add horizontal lines for the ribbed texture. At the top center, place a circle or furry-looking shape for the pom-pom in a contrasting color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1570: Winter hat with pom-pom -->
  <path d='M200,120 A50,20 0 0,1 300,120 L300,150 L200,150 Z' fill='navy' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='135' x2='300' y2='135' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='110' r='8' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small house shape with a triangular roof on top of a long, thin rectangle for the pole. Add a small circle in the front of the house for the entrance hole. Optionally add a tiny platform below the hole for birds to perch on.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1571: Treehouse on a pole -->
  <polygon points='230,120 270,120 250,90' fill='lightbrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='120' width='10' height='30' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='140' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a tall, vertical rectangle with arms extending out and up for the saguaro cactus in green. Add small lines for the spines. Place it on an irregular shape filled with tan or light yellow for the desert sand. Optionally add a simple sun circle in one corner.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1572: Saguaro cactus in the desert -->
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='20' height='150' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='120' x2='260' y2='110' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='140' x2='260' y2='130' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M220,230 L280,230 L250,250 Z' fill='tan'/>
  <circle cx='80' cy='50' r='20' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a J-shaped or curved rectangle with alternating diagonal stripes in red and white. Make the top curved and the bottom straight. Ensure the stripes wrap around the shape to give a three-dimensional appearance.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1573: J-shaped striped object -->
  <path d='M200,100 Q180,150 200,200 L240,200 Q220,150 240,100 Z' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='100' x2='240' y2='200' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='100' x2='200' y2='200' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a car with surfboard on roof
description: Create a simple car shape using a rectangle with a smaller rectangle on top and circles for wheels. On top of the car, place a long, thin oval or surfboard shape extending slightly beyond the car on both ends. Use bright colors for the surfboard.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1574: Car with surfboard on top -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='60' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='130' width='140' height='30' fill='skyblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='190' cy='220' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='330' cy='220' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='120' rx='80' ry='10' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large triangle on top of a rectangle for the basic tent shape. Add vertical stripes in alternating colors (red and white or other bright colors). At the top, add a small flag or pennant shape. Optionally add an opening at the front with tie-back lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1575: Tent with stripes and pennant -->
  <polygon points='200,150 300,150 250,100' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='300' y2='150' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <polygon points='245,100 250,80 255,100' fill='red'/>
  <path d='M220,150 L230,170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M280,150 L270,170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create an irregular oval or upside-down teardrop with wavy edges at the bottom for the ghost shape in white. Add two small circles for eyes and optionally a simple mouth shape. You can add a slight blue or gray tint for dimension.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1576: Ghost shape -->
  <path d='M220,100 Q250,50 280,100 Q270,120 280,140 Q250,130 220,140 Q230,120 220,100 Z' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.9'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='110' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='110' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M240,125 Q250,130 260,125' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a spiral or inverted cone shape that is wider at the top and narrows toward the bottom. Use gray or dark blue fill with swirling lines inside to show rotation. Optionally add small objects like debris being carried in the spiral.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1577: Spiral vortex -->
  <path d='M250,50 C200,100 300,150 250,200 C200,250 300,300 250,350' stroke='darkblue' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle with rounded corners or a slight curve on one side for the grater in silver or gray. Add small circles or dots in a grid pattern on one or more sides to represent the grating holes. Optionally add a handle at the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1578: Grater -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='150' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <g fill='gray'>
    <circle cx='220' cy='120' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='260' cy='120' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='150' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='3'/>
  </g>
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='20' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall cylinder or slightly puffy rectangle for the main part of the hat in white. Add a band or thin rectangle at the bottom. Make the top slightly wider than the bottom and add some curved lines for the folds in the fabric.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1579: Fancy hat -->
  <rect x='220' y='80' width='60' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='60' height='10' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M220,90 Q250,70 280,90' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a curved, elongated teardrop shape with the pointed end curved slightly. Fill with red or green. Add a small stem at the wide end in green. Optionally add a slight gradient or highlights to show the glossy surface.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1580: Fruit (apple) with stem -->
  <path d='M250,100 Q280,140 250,180 Q220,140 250,100 Z' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='80' width='10' height='10' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle in tan or light brown (#D2B48C) for the cookie. Add smaller irregular circles or dots in dark brown or black scattered throughout for the chocolate chips. Optionally add a lighter edge to show depth.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1581: Cookie with chocolate chips -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='4' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='160' r='4' fill='brown'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='3' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a horizontal line across the image for the clothesline. Along it, place various simple shapes representing clothes: rectangles for shirts, trapezoids for dresses, smaller rectangles for socks. Add small circles or rectangles where the clothes meet the line for pins.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1582: Clothesline with hanging clothes -->
  <line x1='50' y1='100' x2='450' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <rect x='80' y='120' width='40' height='30' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <polygon points='150,120 170,150 130,150' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='220' y='120' width='20' height='20' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' y='100' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='300' y='100' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a cylinder or rectangle with a curved bottom for the mug in white or a solid color. Add a half-oval attached to the side for the handle. Draw wavy lines or small cloud shapes rising from the top to represent steam. Optionally fill the top portion with brown for coffee.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1583: Mug with steaming coffee -->
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='100' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <path d='M280,120 Q300,130 280,140' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,100 Q240,80 250,100' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='240' y='100' width='20' height='10' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circle with a thin stroke for the compass body. Inside, add a small circle in the center with a thin rectangle or line extending from it, pointing in one direction (usually north) for the needle. Add simple markings around the edge for the cardinal directions.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1584: Compass with directional needle -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='110' stroke='red' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='245' y='100' font-size='10' fill='black'>N</text>
  <text x='245' y='190' font-size='10' fill='black'>S</text>
  <text x='280' y='155' font-size='10' fill='black'>E</text>
  <text x='220' y='155' font-size='10' fill='black'>W</text>
</svg>

description: Create a spiral shape that is wider at one end and narrows toward the center. Use peach, pink, or cream fill. Add curved lines following the spiral to show the ridges and texture of the shell. Optionally add slight shading for dimension.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1585: Spiral seashell -->
  <path d='M250,150 C230,130 270,110 250,90 C230,70 270,50 250,30' stroke='pink' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M250,150 C240,140 260,120 250,100' stroke='red' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall vertical rectangle for the tower with a long horizontal rectangle extending from the top for the arm. Add diagonal lines from the horizontal arm to the top of the tower for support. Place a small square or rectangle hanging from the arm for the hook. Use yellow or red fill.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1586: Tower crane -->
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='150' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='50' width='60' height='10' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='50' x2='250' y2='30' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='50' x2='250' y2='30' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='30' width='10' height='10' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Create an L-shaped form with a rectangular shaft and a slightly pointed toe box. Add a small rectangle or V-shape at the top of the shaft for the boot opening. Use brown or tan fill with optional decorative stitching lines or patterns.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1587: Boot -->
  <path d='M200,150 L250,150 L260,180 L250,210 L200,210 Z' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M220,150 L220,140 L240,140 L240,150' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangle in a bright color or with a colorful pattern for the box. Inside or partially extending from the top, place several thin rectangles with pointed tips in different colors (red, blue, green, yellow, etc.) to represent the crayons.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1588: Crayon box -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' fill='purple' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='160' y='90' width='20' height='40' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='190' y='90' width='20' height='40' fill='blue'/>
  <rect x='220' y='90' width='20' height='40' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='250' y='90' width='20' height='40' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Create a curved triangle or crescent shape in golden tan (#FFDEAD) for the roll. Add slight texture with curved lines on the surface. Optionally add a slight shadow or darker edge for dimension and to show the layers of the pastry.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1589: Cinnamon roll -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 Q250,180 200,150 Z' fill='#FFDEAD' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,150 Q250,130 290,150' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long rectangle with a shorter, wider rectangle at one end for the bat in tan or light brown. Next to it, place a small circle in red for the cricket ball. Optionally add a line down the middle of the bat to show the splice.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1590: Bat and cricket ball -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='100' height='20' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='100' height='5' fill='brown' opacity='0.5'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='160' r='8' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a curved, crescent shape with pointed ends for the croissant in golden yellow or light brown. Add curved lines along the shape to represent the layers of the pastry. Optionally add a slightly darker edge for dimension.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1591: Croissant -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 Q250,130 200,150 Z' fill='#FFD700' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,150 Q250,120 290,150' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a spiral or tightly curved S-shape with varying width for the curled ribbon. Add slight widening at the curves to show the ribbon twisting. Use a bright color like red, blue, or gold, with optional white highlights along edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1592: Curled ribbon -->
  <path d='M150,150 C180,100 220,200 250,150 C280,100 320,200 350,150' stroke='red' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle divided into wedge sections, with alternating colors or shades. Add smaller concentric circles inside. Place a small thin rectangle with a triangle at one end to represent a dart, positioned with the point touching the circle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1593: Dartboard with a dart -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,110 L270,150 Z' fill='blue'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,190 L230,150 Z' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='300' y='140' width='20' height='5' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='320,142 330,140 320,138' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an octagon or multi-faceted polygon for the top view of a cut diamond. Use light blue or transparent fill with some facet lines inside. Optionally add small white highlights to suggest sparkle and reflection.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1594: Cut diamond top view -->
  <polygon points='250,100 280,120 280,150 250,170 220,150 220,120' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='170' stroke='white' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Create a square with slightly rounded corners for the die. Add six small circles arranged in two vertical columns of three each, evenly spaced within the square. Use white for the main die and black for the dots.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1595: Die -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='100' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='170' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='190' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='150' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='170' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='190' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw two connected circles or ovals for the eye pieces, joined by a curved shape for the nose cover. Add a thick band extending from the sides to represent the strap. Use black or bright colors for the mask frame and transparent or light blue for the lenses.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1596: Face mask -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='50' fill='black' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <circle cx='230' cy='145' r='8' fill='lightblue'/>
  <circle cx='270' cy='145' r='8' fill='lightblue'/>
  <path d='M230,145 Q250,160 270,145' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='20' height='50' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='300' y='120' width='20' height='50' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle with a smaller circle inside to form a ring shape. Fill the ring with tan or light brown (#D2B48C). Cover the top half with brown (#8B4513) for the chocolate frosting, allowing it to drip slightly down the sides. Optionally add small colorful circles for sprinkles.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1597: Chocolate-frosted donut -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#D2B48C' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,150 A40,40 0 0,1 290,150 L290,170 A40,40 0 0,0 210,170 Z' fill='#8B4513' opacity='0.8'/>
  <g>
    <circle cx='230' cy='140' r='3' fill='pink'/>
    <circle cx='270' cy='160' r='3' fill='lightblue'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Create two rectangle sections at an angle to each other, with a gap between them for the raised bridge. Place them over a blue rectangle or wavy shape for water. Add support towers on either side using tall rectangles. Use gray or brown for the bridge sections.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1598: Raised bridge over water -->
  <rect x='150' y='140' width='80' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(-5 190 150)'/>
  <rect x='270' y='140' width='80' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(5 310 150)'/>
  <rect y='160' width='500' height='40' fill='#1E90FF'/>
  <rect x='140' y='140' width='20' height='60' fill='brown'/>
  <rect x='340' y='140' width='20' height='60' fill='brown'/>
</svg>

description: Draw several circles of different sizes arranged in a group for the drum tops. Add rectangles or thin cylinders beneath each circle to show the drum bodies. Include crossed lines or thin rectangles for stands and optionally add circular shapes on stands for cymbals.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1599: Drum set -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='20' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='190' y='170' width='20' height='40' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='150' r='20' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='290' y='170' width='20' height='40' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='300' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a rectangle for the cab at the front, with a larger rectangle behind it at an angle for the dump bed. Add circles below for wheels, with larger wheels at the back. Use yellow for the body and black for the wheels and details.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1600: Dump truck -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='150' height='60' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='300' y='110' width='150' height='70' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(-5 375 145)'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='200' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='200' r='25' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='430' cy='200' r='25' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small stick figure or simple body shape with a circle for the head. Add two large oval or butterfly-shaped forms extending from the back for wings in translucent blue or pink. Optionally add a star shape at one hand for a magic wand.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1601: Stick figure with butterfly‐wings and magic star -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='20' fill='peachpuff' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='70' x2='250' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Arms -->
  <line x1='250' y1='90' x2='220' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='90' x2='280' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='230' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='270' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Wings (translucent ovals) -->
  <ellipse cx='210' cy='130' rx='35' ry='18' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.5' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='290' cy='130' rx='35' ry='18' fill='pink' opacity='0.5' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Magic star at right hand -->
  <polygon points='270,220 275,210 285,210 278,204 283,194 270,200 257,194 262,204 255,210 265,210' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Create a cylinder or rectangle with a dome top for the main body in red. Add small circles or rectangles on the sides for the outlets. Place a small cap shape on top. Optionally add a thin rectangle at the bottom to show where it connects to the ground.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1602: Red appliance with dome top and side outlets -->
  <rect x='200' y='140' width='100' height='100' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='140' rx='50' ry='10' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='215' y='160' width='20' height='20' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='265' y='160' width='20' height='20' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='130' rx='30' ry='10' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='240' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long, thin rectangle or line for the fishing rod. Add a curved line extending from one end for the fishing line. At the end of the line, place a small fish shape in blue or silver, or a circle for a bobber in red and white.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1603: Fishing rod with line and fish/bobber -->
  <line x1='100' y1='250' x2='400' y2='100' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='400' y1='100' x2='420' y2='120' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Bobber at end -->
  <circle cx='420' cy='120' r='6' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Optional fish silhouette -->
  <path d='M410,110 Q415,105 420,110 Q415,115 410,110 Z' fill='steelblue'/>
</svg>

description: Create an oval or foot shape for the sole in brown or bright colors. Add a Y-shaped form on top for the straps, with the bottom of the Y at the front between the toes and the two arms going to the sides of the foot.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1604: Foot with sole and Y-shaped straps -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='50' ry='20' fill='#F4A460' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,190 L250,170 L270,190' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='250' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an inverted trapezoid or a cylinder with the top wider than the bottom for the pot in terracotta orange or brown. Fill the top portion with dark brown for soil. Optionally add a small green shoot or simple flower shape emerging from the soil.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1605: Terracotta pot with soil and shoot -->
  <polygon points='220,150 280,150 260,230 240,230' fill='#CC7F32' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='150' width='20' height='20' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,130' stroke='green' stroke-width='3'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='125' r='3' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Create a cylinder or slightly tapered rectangle with a handle on the side for the mug. Fill the lower portion with amber or gold (#FFD700) for the beer. Add an irregular wavy shape in white at the top for foam that slightly overflows the edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1606: Beer mug with foam -->
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='120' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <rect x='220' y='160' width='60' height='20' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M220,100 Q250,80 280,100' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval or dome shape for the main helmet in team colors. Add a small rectangle at the front extending downward for the face mask. Place a horizontal line across the middle and optional team logo or stripes for decoration.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1607: Team helmet with face mask -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='60' fill='navy' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='150' width='40' height='20' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='160' x2='270' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Optional logo stripe -->
  <rect x='245' y='130' width='10' height='10' fill='gold'/>
</svg>

description: Create a curved semi-circle or taco-like shape for the fortune cookie in tan or light brown. Add a small white rectangle partially extending from one side to represent the fortune paper. Optionally add slight texture lines on the surface.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1608: Fortune cookie with fortune paper -->
  <path d='M200,150 Q250,100 300,150 L280,180 Q250,170 220,180 Z' fill='#F5DEB3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='290' y='160' width='20' height='10' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M210,160 Q250,140 290,160' stroke='brown' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a long, thin cylinder that tapers to a point at one end for the pen body. Add a small triangle at the pointed end for the nib. Use black, blue, or dark colors with gold or silver accents. Optionally add a cap or clip detail at the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1609: Pen with nib -->
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='20' height='140' fill='darkslategray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='240,80 250,60 260,80' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='30' width='10' height='20' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Create a curved, circular tube shape that spirals inward with a flared bell at one end. Use gold or brass yellow (#D4AF37) fill. Add three small circles along the tubes to represent the valves. Make the tube thinner near the mouthpiece and wider at the bell.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1610: Spiraling tube with flared bell and valves -->
  <path d='M250,250 C230,220 270,200 250,170 C230,140 270,120 250,90' fill='none' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='6'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='90' rx='15' ry='8' fill='#D4AF37' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='150' r='4' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='4' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='110' r='4' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large irregular circle in white for the egg white. In the center, place a smaller circle in yellow or orange for the yolk. Optionally add a slight shadow or darker edge around the white to show it cooking in the pan.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1611: Fried egg -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large circle in yellow-white (#FFFAA0) for the moon. Partially overlay cloud shapes using overlapping circles or curved forms in light gray or white that cover portions of the moon while allowing parts to shine through.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1612: Moon with partial clouds -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFFAA0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='230' cy='140' rx='20' ry='10' fill='lightgray' opacity='0.7'/>
  <ellipse cx='270' cy='160' rx='20' ry='10' fill='lightgray' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a symmetric human-like shape with a circle for the head and a wider body with arms and legs extending outward. Use brown (#8B4513) fill. Add small circles for eyes and buttons, and a curved line for the smile, all in white or contrasting colors.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1613: Human-like figure with detailed features -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='60' r='20' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='80' width='40' height='100' fill='#8B4513' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='70' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='70' r='3' fill='white'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='120' x2='260' y2='120' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a circle with simple continent shapes drawn inside for the globe in blue and green. Place it on a small vertical rectangle or pillar for the stand in brown or black, with an optional base at the bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1614: Globe on stand -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Simplified continents -->
  <path d='M230,140 Q240,130 250,140 T270,140' fill='green'/>
  <rect x='245' y='190' width='10' height='30' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a half-circle base with triangular points extending upward around the top edge for the crown. Use gold (#FFD700) fill. Add small circles in different colors (red, blue, green) along the base to represent jewels.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1615: Crown with jewels -->
  <path d='M200,150 L220,100 L240,150 L260,90 L280,150 L300,100 L320,150 L200,150' fill='#FFD700' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='135' r='5' fill='red'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='115' r='5' fill='blue'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='135' r='5' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Create a tall rectangle with a slightly curved top for the golf bag in a solid color. From the top, extend several thin lines or rectangles at angles to represent the various golf clubs. Add a strap or handle on the side of the bag.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1616: Golf bag with clubs -->
  <rect x='230' y='80' width='40' height='150' fill='darkblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='220' y2='30' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='280' y2='20' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='235' y='30' width='10' height='20' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='255' y='20' width='10' height='20' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Draw several rectangles of varying heights clustered together. Make them tall and narrow, with the tops at different levels. Add small rectangles for windows in a grid pattern. Use gray, blue, or black fills with lighter windows.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1617: Cluster of tall, narrow buildings -->
  <rect x='180' y='120' width='30' height='100' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='30' height='120' fill='dimgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='260' y='140' width='30' height='80' fill='black' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='300' y='110' width='30' height='110' fill='slategray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Windows as small yellow rectangles -->
  <rect x='225' y='120' width='5' height='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='225' y='135' width='5' height='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='265' y='150' width='5' height='5' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

description: Create an hourglass shape for the body with a long, thin rectangle extending from it for the neck. Add a small rectangle at the end of the neck for the headstock. Place thin horizontal lines across the neck for frets and vertical lines on the body for strings.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1618: Guitar with frets and strings -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='170' y1='120' x2='330' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='170' y1='140' x2='330' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='170' y1='160' x2='330' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an oval or circle for the head. Add wavy lines or curved shapes around the top and sides for loose hair. At the back or side, gather several curved lines to form a bunch or ponytail shape extending outward. Use brown, black, blonde, or other hair colors.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1619: Head with loose, flowing hair -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='20' fill='peachpuff' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M230,70 Q250,40 270,70' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M230,80 Q250,50 270,80' stroke='brown' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
  <path d='M260,80 Q270,90 280,80' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a T-shape for the hammer with a rectangle for the head and a longer rectangle for the handle. Next to it, place a thin, vertical line with a small circle or polygon at the top for the nail. Use gray or silver for the metal parts and brown for the handle.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1620: Hammer with nail -->
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='40' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='140' width='10' height='70' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='290' y1='120' x2='290' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='95' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a large circle in orange-yellow near the top for the moon. Below it, draw a horizontal line for the horizon with simple shapes like rectangles or triangles to suggest crops or harvest elements in the field. Use dark blue or purple for the night sky background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1621: Moon over a harvest horizon -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='40' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='0' y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='darkblue'/>
  <polygon points='50,150 80,130 110,150 80,170' fill='green'/>
  <polygon points='390,150 420,130 450,150 420,170' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw five oval petals arranged in a circular pattern, with one side slightly more open than the other. Make the petals wide at the ends and narrow at the center. Add a long, thin protrusion from the center for the pistil. Use red, pink, or orange for the petals.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1622: Flower with five petals -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5' fill='yellow'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,110 Q270,130 250,150' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L290,150 Q270,170 250,150' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L250,190 Q230,170 250,150' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,150 L210,150 Q230,130 250,150' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='160' stroke='green' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a long, thin rectangle with an angled, shorter rectangle at one end for the hockey stick. Next to it, place a small black circle for the puck. Use wood colors for the stick handle and black for the blade end.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1623: Hockey stick and puck -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='120' height='10' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='155' x2='380' y2='100' stroke='saddlebrown' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='380' cy='100' r='8' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw an elongated oval or rounded rectangle in tan or light brown for the bun. Inside, place a slightly longer, thin oval in brown or pink for the sausage. Add a wavy or zigzag line in yellow on top to represent mustard.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1624: Hot dog with bun, sausage, and mustard -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='60' ry='20' fill='#F5DEB3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='160' width='80' height='20' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M210,160 Q250,150 290,160' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a vertical oval or cylinder with slightly curved sides for the lantern body in red or white. Add horizontal lines across it to show the ribbed structure. Place small rectangles at the top and bottom for the caps. Optionally add Japanese characters or simple designs on the surface.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1625: Lantern with ribbed structure -->
  <rect x='230' y='100' width='40' height='120' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='130' x2='270' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='160' x2='270' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='190' x2='270' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='20' height='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: two balls next to three cups
description: Draw two circles for the balls in bright colors, and arrange three tall rectangles nearby to represent cups. Position the balls in front and the cups behind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1626: Two colored balls with nearby cups -->
  <circle cx='200' cy='150' r='15' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='150' r='15' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='170' width='20' height='40' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='240' y='170' width='20' height='40' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='300' y='170' width='20' height='40' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use a flat rectangle for the book and overlay four thin rectangles above it to represent pencils, each angled slightly to avoid overlap.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1627: Book with pencils overhead -->
  <rect x='150' y='130' width='200' height='120' fill='lightyellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='160' x2='350' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='190' x2='350' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <g fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'>
    <rect x='180' y='100' width='10' height='30'/>
    <rect x='200' y='90' width='10' height='30' transform='rotate(-10 205 105)'/>
    <rect x='220' y='95' width='10' height='30' transform='rotate(10 225 110)'/>
    <rect x='240' y='90' width='10' height='30' transform='rotate(-5 245 105)'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Place five equal squares in a row at the bottom, and arrange three equilateral triangles directly above them, each centered above a pair of squares.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1628: Row of squares with triangles above -->
  <g fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <rect x='150' y='220' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='210' y='220' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='270' y='220' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='330' y='220' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='390' y='220' width='50' height='50'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='tomato' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <polygon points='185,200 210,220 160,220'/>
    <polygon points='245,200 270,220 220,220'/>
    <polygon points='305,200 330,220 280,220'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a circular basket in the center, then place six small ovals around it representing apples, each with a tiny rectangle for a stem.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1629: Basket with apples -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='60' ry='30' fill='#F5DEB3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='220' cy='190' r='8' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='8' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='280' cy='190' r='8' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='247' y='175' width='6' height='10' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Form two elongated shapes for the shoes and arrange six tall, narrow rectangles for socks. Position socks slightly behind the shoes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1630: Shoes with socks -->
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='240' rx='30' ry='15' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='280' cy='240' rx='30' ry='15' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='205' y='250' width='30' height='50' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='265' y='250' width='30' height='50' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: one chair flanked by three stools
description: Use a tall rectangle with a smaller top bar for the chair, then place three shorter rectangles with circles on top for the stools, arranged on each side.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1631: Chair with stools -->
  <rect x='220' y='150' width='60' height='80' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='230' width='40' height='30' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='280' y='230' width='40' height='30' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='230' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='300' cy='230' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>
