description: Draw two large circles for plates, positioned near the top. Below them, create four slender rectangles with small oval bowls for spoons.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1632: Table setting with plates and spoons -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='160' width='20' height='40' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='260' y='160' width='20' height='40' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='220' cy='150' rx='5' ry='3' fill='black'/>
  <ellipse cx='260' cy='150' rx='5' ry='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Use seven overlapping rectangles for the papers, and draw three thin rectangles with a triangular tip to represent pencils layered above.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1633: Papers and pencils -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='100' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.7'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='170' x2='350' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='190' x2='350' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <g fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'>
    <rect x='180' y='130' width='10' height='30' transform='rotate(-10 185 145)'/>
    <rect x='210' y='125' width='10' height='30' transform='rotate(5 215 140)'/>
    <rect x='240' y='130' width='10' height='30' transform='rotate(-5 245 145)'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Sketch two horizontal rectangles stacked to form shelves, then line up eight smaller rectangles along them for books, each angled slightly.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1634: Bookshelf -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='300' height='160' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='120' x2='400' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='160' x2='400' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <g fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'>
    <rect x='120' y='90' width='40' height='20'/>
    <rect x='170' y='90' width='40' height='20'/>
    <rect x='220' y='90' width='40' height='20'/>
    <rect x='270' y='90' width='40' height='20'/>
  </g>

<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1743: Kiwi half -->
  <path d='M250,150 A50,50 0 0,1 300,150 L250,150 Z' fill='lightgreen' stroke='brown' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g fill='black'>
    <circle cx='275' cy='150' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='265' cy='155' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='285' cy='145' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='270' cy='140' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='280' cy='160' r='2'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a long, thin rectangle or line for the knitting needle. At one end, place a circle or oval in a bright color for the ball of yarn. From the yarn ball, create a wavy line connecting to the needle to show the yarn being used for knitting.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1744: Knitting needle with yarn -->
  <line x1='100' y1='150' x2='400' y2='150' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='4'/>
  <circle cx='400' cy='150' r='10' fill='magenta'/>
  <path d='M400,150 Q350,170 300,160 Q250,150 200,155' stroke='magenta' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
</svg>

description: Create a gray circle for the head with two small circles on top for ears. Add a larger oval below for the body. Place this figure on brown rectangles or curved shapes representing tree branches. Add green oval shapes around for eucalyptus leaves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1745: Koala on branch -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='40' height='60' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='200' y='180' width='100' height='20' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'>
    <ellipse cx='210' cy='170' rx='5' ry='3'/>
    <ellipse cx='250' cy='170' rx='5' ry='3'/>
    <ellipse cx='290' cy='170' rx='5' ry='3'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a triangle or cone shape with the point facing down and a cylinder or rectangle at the top for the neck. Add a small circle or oval for the opening. Use transparent or light blue fill with possibly some bright colored liquid at the bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1746: Funnel -->
  <polygon points='240,80 260,80 280,150 220,150' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='80' r='5' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create two long, parallel vertical lines for the ladder sides. Connect them with several horizontal lines for the rungs. Position the ladder at a slight angle, with the bottom further out than the top. Add a vertical line or rectangle behind the top to represent the wall.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1747: Ladder against wall -->
  <line x1='100' y1='50' x2='100' y2='250' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='140' y1='50' x2='140' y2='250' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='90' x2='140' y2='90' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='130' x2='140' y2='130' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='170' x2='140' y2='170' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='210' x2='140' y2='210' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='90' y='30' width='60' height='20' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide rectangle with a thinner rectangle attached at an angle for the laptop. Next to it, place a cylinder or cup shape with a small curved handle for the coffee cup. Add steam lines rising from the cup. Use gray or silver for the laptop and a solid color for the cup.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1748: Laptop and coffee cup -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='200' height='120' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='320' y='100' width='40' height='60' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <path d='M320,100 Q340,80 360,100' fill='none' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M340,80 Q345,70 350,80' fill='none' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Create a quarter-circle or triangular segment with rounded outer edge for the lemon wedge in yellow. Add small oval or circular shapes inside to represent the pulp sections. Optionally add a thin white rind layer along the curved edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1749: Lemon wedge -->
  <path d='M250,150 A40,40 0 0,1 290,150 L250,150 Z' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <g fill='lightyellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'>
    <circle cx='265' cy='150' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='275' cy='150' r='2'/>
    <circle cx='285' cy='150' r='2'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide rectangle in brown for the tabletop, attach four narrow rectangular legs at each corner, and layer them behind the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1750: Tabletop -->
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='300' height='30' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='130' width='10' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='390' y='130' width='10' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a long curved rectangle in blue for the main seat, add a tall backrest with rounded corners, and attach two short rectangular armrests on each side.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1751: Chair with backrest and armrests -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='100' height='30' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='180' width='100' height='70' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='140' y='150' width='10' height='30' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='250' y='150' width='10' height='30' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a tall rectangular back with carved edges, a rounded seat in brown, and four slim legs beneath, each slightly curved to suggest antique style.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1752: Antique chair -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='80' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='140' width='60' height='40' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='210' y1='180' x2='210' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='180' x2='270' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a sleek rectangular surface in gray for the desktop, layer two thin rectangular supports on the sides, and add a narrow drawer outline underneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1753: Desktop with drawer -->
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='300' height='150' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='230' width='300' height='20' fill='darkgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a tall, narrow rectangle in wood tones for the frame, then add multiple evenly spaced horizontal lines inside for shelves.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1754: Bookcase -->
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='90' x2='200' y2='90' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='130' x2='200' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='170' x2='200' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='210' x2='200' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide rectangular outline in white, divide it into segments with thin horizontal lines for drawers, and add small circles for handles in front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1755: Dresser -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='140' x2='350' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='180' x2='350' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <g fill='black'>
    <circle cx='180' cy='130' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='130' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='260' cy='130' r='3'/>
    <circle cx='300' cy='130' r='3'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Use a rounded rectangle in black for the seat and backrest, attach a short column beneath, and draw several thin lines radiating to small circles for rolling wheels.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1756: Swivel chair -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='50' fill='black' rx='10' ry='10' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='200' width='20' height='10' fill='black' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='210' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a low, wide ellipse in a translucent light blue to mimic glass, and place four thin legs underneath, layered behind the table’s edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1757: Glass coffee table -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='150' ry='50' fill='lightblue' opacity='0.3' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='200' x2='350' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='210' x2='350' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw two intersecting rectangular frames in gray, one for the backrest and one for the seat, with a hinge at their intersection, and thin lines as legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1758: Folding chair -->
  <g fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='30'/>
    <rect x='200' y='180' width='100' height='30' transform='rotate(-10 250 195)'/>
    <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='200' y2='210'/>
    <line x1='300' y1='150' x2='300' y2='210'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Use a long rectangular seat in a warm brown tone, add two thick rectangular end supports, and a small horizontal bar near the base for stability.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1759: Simple bench seat -->
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='200' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='230' width='200' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='230' x2='150' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='230' x2='350' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a soft, irregular oval shape in red for the beanbag body, adding gentle curved edges at the top to suggest plushness, with minimal detail lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1760: Beanbag -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='80' ry='50' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide rectangle for the mattress in white, add a tall rectangular headboard in a contrasting brown, and attach four short legs at each corner.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1761: Bed -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='80' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='20' height='20' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='330' y='200' width='20' height='20' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a rounded rectangle for the backrest in a woven pattern, add a curved seat, and draw two long curved lines beneath for the rocking supports.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1762: Rocking chair -->
  <rect x='180' y='150' width='140' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M180,150 Q250,130 320,150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='180' x2='320' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a short, thick rectangle in a neutral tone for the padded top, and attach four stubby legs underneath, spaced at each corner.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1763: Stool -->
  <rect x='220' y='200' width='60' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='220' width='20' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='260' y='220' width='20' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='240' width='60' height='10' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circular seat in dark wood, then add four long, narrow legs beneath, connecting them with thin horizontal bars for footrests.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1764: Round dining chair -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='30' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='230' y1='210' x2='230' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='270' y1='210' x2='270' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form an L-shaped arrangement using two rectangular seats in a neutral color, add high backrests along each segment, and short rectangular armrests at the ends.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1765: L-shaped sofa -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='150' height='60' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='250' y='150' width='150' height='60' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='210' width='150' height='60' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a small square top in light wood, add one or two thin horizontal lines for drawers on the front, and attach four short legs, layered behind the table edges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1766: Small side table -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='80' height='80' fill='wheat' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='160' x2='280' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='200' x2='280' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='240' x2='280' y2='240' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use a long rectangular shape in brown for the top, and add two cabinets or open shelves beneath, each indicated by simple rectangles or a dividing line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1767: Desk cabinet -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='140' x2='350' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='180' x2='350' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a curved seat in a bright color, attached to a slightly reclined backrest, and place a single central pedestal or four angled legs underneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1768: Armchair -->
  <rect x='180' y='150' width='140' height='60' fill='coral' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='210' width='140' height='20' fill='coral' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='130' width='20' height='20' fill='coral' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw multiple identical curved chair outlines in bright plastic color, each nested slightly into one another at the seat and back.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1769: Stacked plastic chairs -->
  <g fill='limegreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <rect x='100' y='150' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='110' y='160' width='50' height='50'/>
    <rect x='120' y='170' width='50' height='50'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Form a rectangular backrest with thin slats, a matching seat, and two extended curved strips beneath as the rocking base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1770: Rocking bench -->
  <rect x='150' y='180' width='200' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M150,180 Q250,150 350,180' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a small rectangular top, add one or two narrow drawers indicated by thin horizontal lines, and attach four short angled legs at the bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1771: Small chest -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='60' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='170' x2='300' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='190' x2='300' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='210' x2='300' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use two hinged rectangular frames connected at the top, each segment with a small horizontal plank to represent steps. Indicate the fold by an overlapping pivot line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1772: Folding staircase -->
  <polygon points='150,200 200,150 250,200' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='200' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='170' y1='190' x2='230' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a narrow tabletop in wood tones with a short shelf beneath, plus tall slender legs. Include a small curved shape at one corner to suggest an attached phone rest.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1773: Desk with phone rest -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='300' height='100' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='250' width='300' height='20' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M380,150 Q400,140 420,150' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangular surface in neutral color, add a lower shelf indicated by another rectangle, and attach four small circles for wheels at the base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1774: Rolling cart -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='300' height='100' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='200' width='300' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='170' cy='220' r='10' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='330' cy='220' r='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create two stacked rectangles for mattresses, each supported by a simple rectangular frame at the ends, and draw a narrow ladder on one side.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1775: Bunk bed -->
  <rect x='150' y='80' width='200' height='40' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='130' width='200' height='40' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='80' x2='150' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='80' x2='350' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='130' x2='350' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a raised rectangular frame for the mattress, add a ladder drawn as two vertical bars with rungs, and keep open space underneath to represent the loft.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1776: Loft bed -->
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='200' height='30' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='80' width='200' height='40' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='50' x2='150' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='50' x2='350' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='50' x2='130' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='70' x2='130' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='90' x2='130' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch an L-shaped desktop fitting into a corner, with two angled rectangular surfaces. Add slender legs at the corners, layered behind.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1777: Corner desk -->
  <polygon points='50,50 300,50 300,150 200,150 200,250 50,250' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a thin rectangular tabletop in a light color, attach four very slender legs, two at each end, with no visible drawers or extra detailing.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1778: Minimalist table -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='20' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='170' x2='150' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='170' x2='350' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a tall, curved rectangle for the mirror frame in a decorative style, with small embellishments at top. Add a horizontal base or short legs for the stand.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1779: Decorative mirror -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='70' ry='90' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <rect x='240' y='240' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Form a tall rectangular box in brown, split vertically into two doors with a slight overlap. Add small handles near the center and short feet underneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1780: Cabinet -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='150' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='245' cy='180' r='5' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='255' cy='180' r='5' fill='gold'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide circle in wood tone for the tabletop, add a single thick cylindrical pedestal or four curved legs underneath for support.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1781: Round table -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='80' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='10' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Create a cube-like shape in a soft fabric color, with a slightly indented top to suggest padding, and short, barely visible feet beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1782: Cushion/ottoman -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='60' fill='lightpink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a tall, narrow shelving unit with an arched top, adding multiple horizontal shelves inside and a small base or feet at the bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1783: Bookshelf -->
  <rect x='100' y='50' width='80' height='200' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='90' x2='180' y2='90' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='130' x2='180' y2='130' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='170' x2='180' y2='170' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='210' x2='180' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Use a slumped, elongated oval shape in a cushioned material color, with a slight dip in the middle to imply a seat and a raised section for a backrest.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1784: Lounge chair -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='80' ry='40' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='140' width='80' height='40' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a simple rectangular seat and backrest arrangement in a bright color, connected along one edge. Show minimal lines to indicate it can fold into a bed.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1785: Futon -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='190' width='200' height='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a sturdy rectangular top in a warm wood color, supported by four thick, turned legs, each slightly tapered with decorative ridges.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1786: Dining table -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='150' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='100' x2='350' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a small square or rectangular tabletop in a bright color, add four short cylindrical legs, and possibly a few small shapes or patterns on top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1787: Accent table -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='60' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='180' r='5' fill='white'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangular surface in neutral color, indicate a telescoping or mechanical section along the sides for height adjustment, and add stable, wide feet at the corners.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1788: Adjustable desk -->
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='300' height='80' fill='wheat' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='180' width='300' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='180' x2='400' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a suspended bench seat in brown, with slatted back and seat. Attach two vertical lines from the top corners representing chains or ropes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1789: Hanging bench -->
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='30' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='200' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='150' x2='300' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='100' x2='300' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a wide, low rectangle for the console body, add small compartments indicated by vertical lines, and short, minimal legs at each corner.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1790: Media console -->
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='300' height='50' fill='darkgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='200' width='300' height='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a padded seat and curved backrest in a dark brown hue, attach short angled legs beneath, and include subtle seam lines for the leather detail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1791: Leather armchair -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M150,100 Q250,70 350,100' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='200' x2='350' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a rectangular box with a slightly domed top, add horizontal lines for planks, and a small latch at the front to indicate closure.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1792: Chest/trunk -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='80' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='140' x2='300' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='160' x2='300' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='180' x2='300' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='200' x2='300' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='240' y='120' width='20' height='10' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a rectangular bench with a cushioned top in a soft color, add a faint line where the seat lifts, and attach four short legs. Optionally place a handle or knob on the front.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1793: Bench -->
  <rect x='150' y='180' width='200' height='30' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='210' width='200' height='20' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='160' cy='230' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='340' cy='230' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a low rectangular frame in light wood color, add closely spaced vertical slats along each side, and ensure the interior rectangle is clearly visible for the mattress.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1794: Bed frame -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='20' fill='lightwood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='170' width='200' height='80' fill='lightwood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a long rectangular tabletop in a neutral tone, include a keyboard tray or additional shelf beneath, and attach four supportive legs or side panels.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1795: Office desk -->
  <rect x='100' y='100' width='300' height='50' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='300' height='20' fill='darkgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='150' x2='400' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a tall, ornate horizontal board with curved edges, adding decorative carved lines near the top. No full bed needed, just highlight the headboard shape.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1796: Headboard -->
  <rect x='150' y='50' width='200' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M150,50 Q250,20 350,50' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a vertically oriented oval or rectangle in a frame, add two angled back supports or a single pivot stand, and keep the mirror surface slightly reflective or tinted.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1797: Standing mirror -->
  <rect x='200' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='50' x2='300' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a short, wide rectangular frame with two or three thin shelves, each indicated by horizontal lines, ensuring enough space for shoes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1798: Shoe rack -->
  <rect x='100' y='200' width='300' height='40' fill='tan' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='210' x2='400' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='220' x2='400' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch multiple tall stool shapes in a minimal style, each with a circular seat and four thin legs. Overlap them slightly to show they can be stacked.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1799: Stacked stools -->
  <g fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <circle cx='100' cy='150' r='20'/>
    <circle cx='120' cy='160' r='20'/>
    <circle cx='140' cy='170' r='20'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw two crisscrossed rectangular frames at the sides, a short rectangular seat, and a matching narrow rectangle at the top for the backrest, hinged at intersection points.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1800: Folding chair -->
  <g fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <rect x='200' y='150' width='100' height='30'/>
    <rect x='200' y='180' width='100' height='30'/>
    <line x1='200' y1='150' x2='200' y2='210'/>
    <line x1='300' y1='150' x2='300' y2='210'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Use a softly rounded seat and backrest in a bright fabric color, add four angled wooden legs, and a subtle seam line to highlight the padding.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1801: Softly rounded seat and backrest with angled wooden legs -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='300' height='80' fill='hotpink' rx='20' ry='20' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='160' width='300' height='20' fill='hotpink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Four angled wooden legs -->
  <line x1='120' y1='260' x2='100' y2='160' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6' transform='rotate(-5 120 260)'/>
  <line x1='380' y1='260' x2='400' y2='160' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6' transform='rotate(5 380 260)'/>
  <line x1='140' y1='260' x2='130' y2='160' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6' transform='rotate(-3 140 260)'/>
  <line x1='360' y1='260' x2='370' y2='160' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6' transform='rotate(3 360 260)'/>
  <!-- Subtle seam line -->
  <line x1='100' y1='120' x2='400' y2='120' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

description: Form a small rectangular box with a hinged lid, possibly curved, in bright or pastel hues. Indicate a slight gap for the lid opening at the top edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1802: Rectangular box with a hinged lid in pastel hues -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='lavender' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Hinged lid with a slight gap -->
  <path d='M150,100 Q250,60 350,100 L350,110 Q250,70 150,110 Z' fill='plum' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a plush seat with a separate circular base, add a footrest or extended section, and a slight pivot line at the connection to show swivel capability.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1803: Plush seat with a separate circular base and footrest -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='140' rx='130' ry='50' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='240' r='40' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='170' y1='240' x2='330' y2='240' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.7'/>
  <!-- Pivot line showing swivel -->
  <line x1='250' y1='140' x2='250' y2='240' stroke='gray' stroke-dasharray='5,5' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a circular seat in brown, attach three or four straight legs beneath, spaced evenly, with minimal detail lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1804: Circular seat in brown with 4 evenly spaced straight legs -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='130' r='80' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='190' y1='210' x2='190' y2='250' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='210' x2='250' y2='250' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='210' x2='310' y2='250' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='210' x2='210' y2='250' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6' transform='rotate(10 250 210)'/>
</svg>

description: Arrange a small round table in the center, with two or more curved-back chairs around it. Emphasize weatherproof materials by using a metal or plastic color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1805: Round table with curved-back chairs -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='60' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Two curved-back chairs -->
  <path d='M100,200 Q150,170 200,200 L200,230 Q150,210 100,230 Z' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M300,200 Q350,170 400,200 L400,230 Q350,210 300,230 Z' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a compact rectangular top with one or two shallow drawers, indicated by thin lines, and slender legs at each corner. A subtle handle on each drawer is optional.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1806: Compact rectangular top with shallow drawers -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='120' fill='lightyellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Two shallow drawers indicated by thin lines -->
  <line x1='160' y1='160' x2='340' y2='160' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='160' y1='190' x2='340' y2='190' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Slender legs -->
  <rect x='160' y='220' width='15' height='40' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='325' y='220' width='15' height='40' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a large rectangular table with thick, sturdy legs, each connected by a horizontal support. The surface can be segmented with a faint line to indicate separate reading areas.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1807: Large rectangular table with thick legs and horizontal support -->
  <rect x='80' y='80' width='340' height='150' fill='wheat' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Thick legs -->
  <rect x='80' y='230' width='30' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='390' y='230' width='30' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Horizontal support -->
  <line x1='80' y1='230' x2='420' y2='230' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='4'/>
  <!-- Faint segmentation on table surface -->
  <line x1='80' y1='155' x2='420' y2='155' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Create a broad rectangular base with multiple compartments, and a taller shelving unit rising behind it, forming an all-in-one structure for TV and electronics.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1808: Broad rectangular base with compartments and shelving unit for TV -->
  <rect x='50' y='150' width='400' height='80' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Compartments indicated by vertical dividing lines -->
  <line x1='150' y1='150' x2='150' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='150' x2='350' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Taller shelving unit behind -->
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='400' height='80' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='50' y1='90' x2='450' y2='90' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a triangular or pentagonal top to fit snugly in a corner, add shelving layers beneath for devices, each indicated by thin horizontal lines.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1809: Triangular/pentagonal top for corner unit with shelving layers -->
  <polygon points='50,250 250,50 450,250' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Shelving layers -->
  <line x1='100' y1='220' x2='400' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='120' y1='200' x2='380' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='140' y1='180' x2='360' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a semicircular wrap-around backrest in a wood or neutral color, with a curved seat cushion, and short legs or a full circular base beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1810: Semicircular wrap-around backrest with curved seat cushion -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='40' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M130,150 A120,40 0 0,1 370,150 L370,180 L130,180 Z' fill='wheat' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Short legs as simple rectangles -->
  <rect x='180' y='180' width='20' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='300' y='180' width='20' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use slender vertical poles for the sides and two or three horizontal slats as shelves, each indicated by thin rectangular bars with a bamboo-like texture.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1811: Bamboo-like shelving with slender vertical poles -->
  <rect x='100' y='80' width='300' height='120' fill='lightgreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Vertical poles -->
  <line x1='140' y1='80' x2='140' y2='200' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='220' y1='80' x2='220' y2='200' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='80' x2='300' y2='200' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Horizontal slats -->
  <line x1='100' y1='110' x2='400' y2='110' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='100' y1='140' x2='400' y2='140' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a low bench in front of an implied window, with a thick rectangular cushion on top and a short backrest or decorative pillows along the rear edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1812: Low bench with thick cushion and short backrest -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='40' fill='lavender' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='160' width='200' height='20' fill='plum' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Optionally, add decorative pillows -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='150' r='5' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='150' r='5' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a wide rectangular surface with adjustable angle, supported by two sets of intersecting lines or a small pivot. Possibly show a gear or knob for telescoping.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1813: Adjustable angled surface with pivot -->
  <g>
    <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='40' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='150' y1='140' x2='350' y2='140' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/>
    <circle cx='350' cy='140' r='5' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Create a tall A-frame ladder shape in wood, with multiple horizontal shelves between the rungs, each shelf layered from top to bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1814: Tall A-frame ladder with multiple shelves -->
  <polygon points='250,50 150,250 350,250' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='200' x2='320' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='190' y1='220' x2='310' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='240' x2='300' y2='240' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a sturdy rectangular tabletop in deep brown, supported by thick turned legs or angled supports. Add a subtle wood grain line or two on the surface.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1815: Sturdy rectangular tabletop with turned legs -->
  <rect x='120' y='80' width='260' height='100' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Turned legs -->
  <ellipse cx='140' cy='200' rx='10' ry='5' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='360' cy='200' rx='10' ry='5' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Subtle wood grain line -->
  <line x1='120' y1='130' x2='380' y2='130' stroke='peru' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.6'/>
</svg>

description: Use two stacked rectangular frames in gray for mattresses, connected by vertical and horizontal bars at the corners. Attach a thin ladder on one side.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1816: Two stacked mattress frames with a side ladder -->
  <g fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <rect x='180' y='80' width='140' height='60'/>
    <rect x='180' y='150' width='140' height='60'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Thin ladder on the right -->
  <line x1='320' y1='80' x2='320' y2='210' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='100' x2='320' y2='100' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='130' x2='320' y2='130' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='160' x2='320' y2='160' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='190' x2='320' y2='190' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a vertical backrest featuring multiple slender spindles, a flat seat in wood color, and two curved rockers beneath. Indicate slight arcs for the spindles in perspective.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1817: Vertical backrest with slender spindles and rockers -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='20' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='120' x2='320' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Slender spindles -->
  <g stroke='black' stroke-width='1' fill='burlywood'>
    <rect x='190' y='100' width='5' height='40'/>
    <rect x='210' y='100' width='5' height='40'/>
    <rect x='230' y='100' width='5' height='40'/>
    <rect x='250' y='100' width='5' height='40'/>
    <rect x='270' y='100' width='5' height='40'/>
    <rect x='290' y='100' width='5' height='40'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Curved rockers -->
  <path d='M180,140 Q250,180 320,140' fill='none' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch two crisscrossed metal frames in bright color for the sides, a rectangular seat and backrest in fabric, and small pivot points at intersections.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1818: Crisscrossed metal frames with fabric seat/back -->
  <g fill='teal' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='40'/>
    <rect x='150' y='140' width='200' height='40'/>
  </g>
  <!-- Crisscross metal supports -->
  <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='350' y2='140' stroke='silver' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='140' x2='350' y2='100' stroke='silver' stroke-width='3'/>
  <!-- Pivot points as small circles -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='100' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='140' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Form a rectangular center top with two hinged leaf sections on each side, suggested by thin dividing lines, and attach four sturdy legs beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1819: Rectangular center top with hinged leaf sections -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Dividing lines indicating hinged leaves -->
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='140' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Four sturdy legs -->
  <rect x='190' y='140' width='10' height='40' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='280' y='140' width='10' height='40' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='190' y='180' width='10' height='40' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='280' y='180' width='10' height='40' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall, narrow seat shape, often a small circular top or square pad, supported by four long legs. Add footrest bars around each side at mid-level.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1820: Tall, narrow seat shape with long legs and footrests -->
  <rect x='230' y='80' width='40' height='40' fill='lightcoral' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Four long legs -->
  <rect x='230' y='120' width='8' height='60' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='262' y='120' width='8' height='60' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='180' width='8' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='262' y='180' width='8' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Footrest bars -->
  <line x1='230' y1='180' x2='270' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Create a tall rectangular outline for the headboard, add a grid of small circles or diamond shapes to represent tufting, and a thick border along the edge.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1821: Tall headboard with tufting -->
  <rect x='200' y='50' width='100' height='200' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tufting grid -->
  <g fill='white'>
    <circle cx='220' cy='80' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='280' cy='80' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='120' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='280' cy='120' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='160' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='280' cy='160' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='220' cy='200' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='280' cy='200' r='5'/>
  </g>
  <rect x='200' y='50' width='100' height='5' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='200' y='245' width='100' height='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Use a slatted seat and back in brown with multiple narrow horizontal boards, add two curved side arms, and short legs layered behind the seat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1822: Slatted seat/back with curved side arms -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='140' width='200' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Curved side arms -->
  <path d='M150,100 Q130,120 150,140' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M350,100 Q370,120 350,140' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Short legs -->
  <rect x='150' y='180' width='20' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='330' y='180' width='20' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a thin rectangular top in a neutral color, supported by four slim legs, each angled slightly for a modern silhouette, leaving ample open space beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1823: Thin modern table with open space underneath -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='30' fill='whitesmoke' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Slim angled legs -->
  <line x1='150' y1='130' x2='140' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='130' x2='360' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall vertical pole in brown, attach multiple short hooks branching out near the top, and add a round or cross-shaped base at the bottom.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1824: Tall vertical pole with hooks -->
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='200' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Hooks branching near top -->
  <line x1='250' y1='70' x2='280' y2='90' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='70' x2='220' y2='90' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='90' x2='280' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='90' x2='220' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Base -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='260' r='15' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Depict a low circular or rectangular tabletop in white with subtle gray vein lines for marble. Attach short angled legs beneath in a contrasting color.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1825: Marble tabletop with subtle vein lines -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Vein lines -->
  <path d='M160,155 Q250,140 340,155' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.6' fill='none'/>
  <!-- Short angled legs -->
  <rect x='150' y='170' width='15' height='30' fill='darkgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='335' y='170' width='15' height='30' fill='darkgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a softly rounded seat and backrest in a pastel hue, add slender tapered wooden legs, and a slight gap between seat and back for that mid-century style.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1826: Softly rounded mid-century style seat -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='50' fill='peachpuff' rx='15' ry='15' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='180' y='150' width='140' height='10' fill='peachpuff' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='150' x2='320' y2='150' stroke='gray' stroke-dasharray='4,2' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Tapered wooden legs -->
  <line x1='190' y1='160' x2='180' y2='220' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='4'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='160' x2='320' y2='220' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a narrow horizontal seat with plush upholstery indicated by soft arcs or button tufts, attach four short legs, and keep the design minimal.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1827: Narrow horizontal plush seat -->
  <rect x='150' y='140' width='200' height='30' fill='lightpink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Indicated button tufts -->
  <circle cx='180' cy='155' r='3' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='155' r='3' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='155' r='3' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Four short legs -->
  <rect x='150' y='170' width='15' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='335' y='170' width='15' height='20' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch two rectangular shelves connected by upright handles at each end, and add four small circles for wheels, typically with a stopper detail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1828: Shelves with wheels -->
  <rect x='150' y='120' width='200' height='30' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='160' width='200' height='30' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Upright handles at each end -->
  <rect x='140' y='120' width='10' height='70' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='360' y='120' width='10' height='70' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Four small wheels -->
  <circle cx='155' cy='210' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='345' cy='210' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='155' cy='230' r='5' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='345' cy='230' r='5' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Form a low, wide rectangle with one or two internal compartments, indicated by dividing lines. Attach slim legs near the corners, leaving open space underneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1829: Low wide table with internal compartments -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='40' fill='whitesmoke' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='170' x2='350' y2='170' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='190' stroke='gray' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Slim legs -->
  <rect x='160' y='190' width='10' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='330' y='190' width='10' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw multiple circular or rectangular platforms stacked vertically, each offset or smaller than the one below, with slender central supports.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1830: Stacked platforms -->
  <rect x='200' y='80' width='100' height='20' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='110' width='80' height='20' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='220' y='140' width='60' height='20' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Central support -->
  <line x1='250' y1='80' x2='250' y2='160' stroke='gray' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

description: Use a large irregular oval shape in a cushioned color, bulging slightly on the sides, with a small depression at the top for where a person might sit.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1831: Large irregular cushioned oval seat -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='120' ry='60' fill='lightcoral' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='130' rx='40' ry='15' fill='white' stroke='none' opacity='0.7'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small rectangular tabletop with built-in benches on either side, each bench formed by a narrow rectangle connected via angled supports.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1832: Rectangular tabletop with built-in benches -->
  <rect x='100' y='120' width='300' height='30' fill='beige' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='100' height='30' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='300' y='150' width='100' height='30' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Angled supports -->
  <line x1='100' y1='150' x2='100' y2='180' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='400' y1='150' x2='400' y2='180' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw two stacked rectangular frames in silver or gray, connected at corners by thin vertical rods, and a side ladder formed by short horizontal bars.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1833: Stacked rectangular frames with side ladder -->
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='100' height='40' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='140' width='80' height='40' fill='silver' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Vertical rods connecting corners -->
  <line x1='200' y1='100' x2='200' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='100' x2='300' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Side ladder -->
  <line x1='310' y1='140' x2='330' y2='160' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='310' y1='160' x2='330' y2='180' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a long rectangular seat in a rustic wood color, attach two thick legs at the ends, and add a simple crossbar or horizontal support near the base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1834: Rustic rectangular seat with crossbar support -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='40' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='190' width='200' height='20' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='190' x2='350' y2='190' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall, narrow rectangular tabletop with four matching high stools, each featuring a small seat and elongated legs. Group them closely together.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1835: Tall rectangular tabletop with high stools -->
  <rect x='150' y='80' width='200' height='30' fill='whitesmoke' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Four high stools -->
  <g fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <rect x='160' y='120' width='30' height='40'/>
    <rect x='220' y='120' width='30' height='40'/>
    <rect x='280' y='120' width='30' height='40'/>
    <rect x='340' y='120' width='30' height='40'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Form a compact rectangular cabinet in a dark wood color, add two small doors with thin handles, and possibly a short back rail for bottles at the top.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1836: Compact rectangular cabinet with small doors -->
  <rect x='180' y='100' width='140' height='100' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='140' x2='320' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='180' y1='180' x2='320' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='210' y='120' width='20' height='20' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='270' y='120' width='20' height='20' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Depict a wide rectangular frame, split horizontally into two sliding panels with a slight overlap. Add small rectangular rails top and bottom for sliding.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1837: Sliding panel frame with rails -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='100' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='140' x2='350' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='180' x2='350' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='5' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='150' y='195' width='200' height='5' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

description: Use two connected rectangular cushions, one for the seat and one for the back, with a pivot line at the joint to show it can fold flat.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1838: Cushioned seat/back that folds flat -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='40' fill='mediumpurple' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='200' y='160' width='100' height='40' fill='mediumpurple' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='160' x2='300' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='4,2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a long, slightly angled rectangular seat in wood color, add a raised backrest with multiple slats, and attach four short legs beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1839: Angled rectangular seat with raised slatted backrest -->
  <rect x='170' y='140' width='160' height='40' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='170' y='180' width='160' height='30' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Slatted backrest -->
  <line x1='170' y1='180' x2='330' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='170' y1='195' x2='330' y2='195' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a narrow rectangular top in a light color, attach four tall, slender legs, and keep a shallow drawer or an open shelf indicated by a thin horizontal line.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1840: Narrow rectangular top with tall slender legs and shallow drawer -->
  <rect x='150' y='130' width='200' height='30' fill='whitesmoke' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='165' width='200' height='15' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='130' x2='140' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='130' x2='360' y2='210' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall leaning frame in a dark color, with multiple shelves stepping upward. Each shelf is a thin rectangle, angled slightly for perspective.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1841: Tall leaning shelf unit -->
  <polygon points='150,250 350,200 350,280 150,280' fill='burlywood' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='250' x2='350' y2='250' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='265' x2='350' y2='265' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='280' x2='350' y2='280' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Create a wide, ornate rectangular body with curved edges, add three or four horizontal drawers with small handles, and shape the legs in a decorative style.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1842: Ornate rectangular cabinet with horizontal drawers -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='mistyrose' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='140' x2='350' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='180' x2='350' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='220' x2='350' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='190' y='100' width='20' height='10' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='290' y='100' width='20' height='10' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Depict a wooden frame in brown with circular or semicircular cutouts arranged in rows, sized to hold bottles. Add short legs or a simple base.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1843: Wooden frame for bottles -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='150' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Circular cutouts for bottles -->
  <circle cx='190' cy='150' r='15' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='15' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='310' cy='150' r='15' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Use a large circular bowl shape in wicker texture, add a round cushion inside, and place a short, circular base underneath to support the bowl.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1844: Wicker bowl with cushion -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='100' ry='60' fill='wheat' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='30' fill='lightyellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='210' width='20' height='10' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Sketch a small seat and backrest in a single bright color, formed by smooth lines, and attach four stubby legs. Emphasize the molded plastic shape.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1845: Molded plastic seat in a bright color -->
  <rect x='200' y='120' width='100' height='40' fill='deepskyblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' rx='10' ry='10'/>
  <!-- Stubby legs -->
  <rect x='200' y='160' width='15' height='20' fill='deepskyblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='285' y='160' width='15' height='20' fill='deepskyblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

description: Form a rectangular frame with multiple horizontal shelf bars, all in gray or silver lines. Place cross-braces on the sides or back for stability.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1846: Rectangular frame with horizontal shelf bars and cross-braces -->
  <rect x='150' y='100' width='200' height='120' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='140' x2='350' y2='140' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='180' x2='350' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='150' y1='220' x2='350' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Cross-braces -->
  <line x1='150' y1='100' x2='350' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='350' y1='100' x2='150' y2='220' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a vertical rectangle in wood color, divide into multiple horizontal sections for drawers, and add small round knobs or rectangular pulls on each.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1847: Vertical drawer unit -->
  <rect x='200' y='80' width='100' height='200' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Dividing horizontal lines for drawers -->
  <line x1='200' y1='120' x2='300' y2='120' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='160' x2='300' y2='160' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='200' y1='200' x2='300' y2='200' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <!-- Knobs -->
  <circle cx='290' cy='100' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='140' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='180' r='3' fill='gold'/>
  <circle cx='290' cy='220' r='3' fill='gold'/>
</svg>

description: Create a squat cube or cylinder in a soft material color, add subtle seam lines or tufting, and place four short hidden legs slightly beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1848: Squat padded cube/cylinder -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='80' ry='40' fill='lightsalmon' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Subtle seam lines for tufting -->
  <line x1='170' y1='180' x2='330' y2='180' stroke='gray' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/>
  <!-- Hidden legs (not drawn) -->
</svg>

description: Sketch a low rectangular table top in a simple wood grain, add four very short blocky legs at each corner, leaving minimal space beneath.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1849: Low rectangular table top with short blocky legs -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='30' fill='sandybrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='180' width='200' height='20' fill='sandybrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='150' y='200' width='30' height='20' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='320' y='200' width='30' height='20' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a vibrant sunset over a calm ocean
description: Draw a large rectangle in gradient shades of orange and pink for the sky. Add a semi-circle in yellow for the setting sun near the horizon. Below, draw a blue rectangle for the ocean and add a wavy line in white for the horizon.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1850: Sunset sky and ocean horizon -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='150' fill='url(#sunsetGradient)'/>
  <rect x='0' y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='blue' />
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='80' ry='20' fill='white' opacity='0.6'/>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id='sunsetGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='150'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='orange'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='pink'/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>

concept: a cat wearing a tiny top hat
description: Use an ellipse for the cat’s body, a circle for the head, and triangles for ears. Draw a small black rectangle for the top hat on the head, with a thin rectangle for the brim.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1851: Cat with top hat -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='30' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='30' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='235,70 250,40 265,70' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='220' y='95' width='60' height='5' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='240,120 250,110 260,120' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Fill the background with a green rectangle for the field. Add multiple circles in yellow for the sunflowers, with smaller brown circles in the center of each.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1852: Field of sunflowers -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='green' />
  <g fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'>
    <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='20'/>
    <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='20'/>
    <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='20'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='brown'>
    <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5'/>
    <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='5'/>
  </g>
</svg>

description: Draw multiple tall rectangles in shades of gray and blue for buildings. Add small rectangles and lines in various colors for windows and lights. Use a dark blue rectangle for the night sky background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1853: Buildings at night -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='darkblue'/>
  <g fill='gray'>
    <rect x='50' y='100' width='60' height='150'/>
    <rect x='150' y='80' width='60' height='170'/>
    <rect x='250' y='120' width='60' height='130'/>
    <rect x='350' y='90' width='60' height='160'/>
  </g>
  <g fill='yellow'>
    <rect x='60' y='140' width='10' height='10'/>
    <rect x='170' y='120' width='10' height='10'/>
    <rect x='260' y='160' width='10' height='10'/>
    <rect x='360' y='110' width='10' height='10'/>
  </g>
</svg>

concept: a rainbow over a green meadow
description: Draw a large green rectangle for the meadow. Add a semi-circle divided into multiple arcs in red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet for the rainbow.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1854: Meadow with rainbow -->
  <rect x='0' y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='green'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A100,50 0 1,1 249,150' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A90,45 0 1,1 249,150' fill='none' stroke='orange' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A80,40 0 1,1 249,150' fill='none' stroke='yellow' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A70,35 0 1,1 249,150' fill='none' stroke='green' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A60,30 0 1,1 249,150' fill='none' stroke='blue' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A50,25 0 1,1 249,150' fill='none' stroke='indigo' stroke-width='4'/>
  <path d='M250,150 A40,20 0 1,1 249,150' fill='none' stroke='violet' stroke-width='4'/>
</svg>

concept: a hot air balloon in the sky
description: Draw a large circle in bright colors for the balloon. Below it, add a rectangle for the basket. Use lines for the ropes connecting the basket to the balloon. Place it over a light blue rectangle for the sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1855: Balloon with basket -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='100' r='50' fill='magenta' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='150' width='40' height='30' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='100' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a cozy cabin in the woods
description: Draw a brown rectangle for the cabin. Add a triangle for the roof and smaller rectangles for windows and doors. Place it over a green rectangle for the woods background.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1856: Cabin in the woods -->
  <rect x='180' y='150' width='140' height='100' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='180,150 250,100 320,150' fill='brown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='210' y='180' width='40' height='40' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='0' y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='green'/>
</svg>

concept: a flock of birds in flight
description: Draw multiple small triangles or paths in black for the birds. Arrange them in a V-formation over a light blue rectangle for the sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1857: Birds in V-formation -->
  <line x1='50' y1='80' x2='450' y2='80' stroke='lightblue' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='100,60 110,50 120,60' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='150,60 160,50 170,60' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='200,60 210,50 220,60' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='250,60 260,50 270,60' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='300,60 310,50 320,60' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='350,60 360,50 370,60' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall, thin rectangle in white for the lighthouse. Add a smaller rectangle on top for the light room and a triangle for the roof. Place it over a blue rectangle for the sea.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1858: Lighthouse on the sea -->
  <rect x='240' y='50' width='20' height='150' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='235' y='30' width='30' height='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='230,30 250,10 270,30' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='230' y='200' width='60' height='20' fill='blue'/>
</svg>

concept: a colorful butterfly on a leaf
description: Draw a green ellipse for the leaf. Add two symmetrical wings using polygons in various colors for the butterfly. Place the butterfly on the leaf.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1859: Butterfly on a leaf -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='60' ry='30' fill='lightgreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Butterfly body and wings -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='10' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='230,140 250,120 270,140' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='230,160 250,180 270,160' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a snowman with a carrot nose
description: Draw three circles in white, stacked vertically, for the snowman’s body. Add a small triangle in orange for the carrot nose and circles in black for the eyes and buttons.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1860: Snowman -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='200' r='25' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='240' r='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='245,150 255,150 250,140' fill='orange'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='145' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='145' r='3' fill='black'/>
