  <line x1='250' y1='210' x2='250' y2='230' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a windmill in a tulip field
description: Draw a brown rectangle for the windmill tower. Add a cross shape with four blades for the windmill. Place it over a field of red and yellow circles for the tulips.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1861: Windmill over tulip field -->
  <rect x='220' y='100' width='60' height='150' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='230' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='100' x2='270' y2='80' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Tulips -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='270' r='8' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='270' r='8' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='210' cy='270' r='8' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='270' r='8' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a whale breaching the ocean surface
description: Draw a large blue rectangle for the ocean. Add a gray ellipse for the whale’s body, partially above the water line. Use a smaller ellipse for the tail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1862: Whale partly above ocean -->
  <rect x='0' y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='blue'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='130' rx='100' ry='50' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='130' rx='40' ry='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a vintage car on a country road
description: Draw a rectangle in red or blue for the car body. Add circles for the wheels and smaller rectangles for the windows. Place it over a winding line for the road and a green rectangle for the countryside.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1863: Car on a winding road -->
  <rect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='60' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='180' cy='210' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='320' cy='210' r='20' fill='black'/>
  <path d='M0,250 Q250,300 500,250' fill='none' stroke='gray' stroke-width='3'/>
  <rect x='0' y='250' width='500' height='50' fill='green' opacity='0.5'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a dark blue rectangle for the night sky. Add small white circles for stars. Near the bottom, draw a triangle in orange for the campfire and a few lines in yellow for the flames.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1864: Campfire under night sky -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='midnightblue'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='50' r='5' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='240,250 250,220 260,250' fill='orange' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M250,220 L245,210 L250,205 L255,210 Z' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a flamingo standing in shallow water
description: Draw a pink ellipse for the flamingo’s body. Add a thin rectangle for the neck and a small circle for the head. Place it over a light blue rectangle for the water.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1865: Flamingo in water -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='80' ry='30' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='20' ry='10' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='245' y='160' width='10' height='30' fill='pink' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a waterfall cascading down a cliff
description: Draw a gray rectangle for the cliff. Add a series of wavy lines in blue for the waterfall. Place it over a green rectangle for the landscape.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1866: Cliff with waterfall -->
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='400' height='200' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <path d='M150,50 Q250,0 350,50' fill='blue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='50' y='250' width='400' height='50' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a tall, thin rectangle in yellow for the giraffe’s body. Add a small circle for the head and thin rectangles for the neck and legs. Place it over a green rectangle for the trees.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1867: Giraffe over trees -->
  <rect x='0' y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='green' />
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='250' y2='200' stroke='goldenrod' stroke-width='10'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='40' r='15' fill='goldenrod' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='200' x2='230' y2='250' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='200' x2='270' y2='250' stroke='sienna' stroke-width='6'/>
</svg>

concept: a sailboat on a calm lake
description: Draw a blue rectangle for the lake. Add a white triangle for the sail and a rectangle for the boat’s body. Use lines for the mast and ropes.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1868: Boat on a lake -->
  <rect x='0' y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='blue'/>
  <polygon points='200,150 300,150 270,200 230,200' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='50' x2='270' y2='70' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a dragonfly hovering over a pond
description: Draw a blue ellipse for the pond. Add a small ellipse for the dragonfly’s body and thin rectangles for the wings. Place the dragonfly over the pond.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1869: Dragonfly over pond -->
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='100' ry='40' fill='lightblue' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='5' ry='3' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <line x1='245' y1='190' x2='235' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <line x1='255' y1='190' x2='265' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
</svg>

concept: a polar bear on an ice floe
description: Draw a white rectangle for the ice floe. Add a large white ellipse for the polar bear’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use circles in black for the eyes and nose.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1870: Polar bear on ice floe -->
  <rect x='0' y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='lightblue'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='100' ry='30' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='175' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='175' r='3' fill='black'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a large yellow rectangle for the desert. Add green rectangles with small circles for the cacti. Place them randomly across the desert.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1871: Desert with cacti -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='khaki'/>
  <rect x='100' y='150' width='20' height='80' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <rect x='200' y='170' width='20' height='60' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <rect x='300' y='160' width='20' height='70' fill='darkgreen'/>
  <rect x='400' y='180' width='20' height='50' fill='darkgreen'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a white rectangle for the ice. Add a black ellipse for the penguin’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use a white ellipse for the belly and a triangle for the beak.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1872: Penguin on ice -->
  <rect x='0' y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='40' ry='60' fill='black'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='20' ry='30' fill='white'/>
  <circle cx='240' cy='190' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='260' cy='190' r='3' fill='black'/>
  <polygon points='250,220 245,230 255,230' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

concept: a tropical beach with palm trees
description: Draw a yellow rectangle for the sand. Add a blue rectangle for the ocean and brown rectangles with green circles for the palm trees. Place them along the beach.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1873: Beach with palm trees -->
  <rect x='0' y='150' width='500' height='150' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='150' fill='blue'/>
  <rect x='80' y='100' width='20' height='50' fill='brown'/>
  <polygon points='90,100 70,60 110,60' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='380' y='100' width='20' height='50' fill='brown'/>
  <polygon points='390,100 370,60 410,60' fill='green' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a deer grazing in a forest
description: Draw a green rectangle for the forest. Add a brown ellipse for the deer’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use thin rectangles for the legs and antlers.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1874: Forest with deer -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='50' ry='30' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='20' fill='peru' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='240' y1='200' x2='240' y2='240' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='260' y1='200' x2='260' y2='240' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='230' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='170' x2='270' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a kite flying in the sky
description: Draw a light blue rectangle for the sky. Add a diamond shape in bright colors for the kite and a line for the string. Place the kite high in the sky.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1875: Kite in the sky -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='lightblue'/>
  <polygon points='250,50 270,100 250,150 230,100' fill='magenta' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='250' y1='150' x2='250' y2='300' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a hedgehog curled up in a ball
description: Draw a brown circle for the hedgehog’s body. Add small triangles in brown for the spikes. Place it over a green rectangle for the grass.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1876: Hedgehog on grass -->
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30' fill='saddlebrown' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <!-- Spikes -->
  <path d='M250,120 L245,100 L250,120' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M260,120 L255,100 L260,120' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <path d='M240,120 L235,100 L240,120' fill='sienna' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='0' y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='green'/>
</svg>

description: Draw a gray triangle for the volcano. Add a red triangle for the lava flowing down the sides. Place it over a dark gray rectangle for the landscape.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1877: Volcano with lava -->
  <polygon points='200,150 300,50 400,150' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,150 300,100 350,150' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='200' y='150' width='200' height='100' fill='darkgray'/>
</svg>

concept: a parrot perched on a branch
description: Draw a brown rectangle for the branch. Add a colorful ellipse for the parrot’s body and a small circle for the head. Use a triangle for the beak and thin rectangles for the tail feathers.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 1878: Parrot on a branch -->
  <rect x='100' y='200' width='300' height='20' fill='sienna'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='30' ry='20' fill='limegreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='170' r='8' fill='limegreen' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <polygon points='250,170 260,160 270,170' fill='orange'/>
  <line x1='265' y1='170' x2='265' y2='180' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a tractor in a farm field
description: Draw a green rectangle for the field. Add a red rectangle for the tractor body and circles for the wheels. Use thin rectangles for the plow attachment.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

description: Draw a yellow rectangle for the desert. Add a brown ellipse for the camel’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use thin rectangles for the legs and humps.

description: Draw a brown rectangle for the ground. Add a red-brown ellipse for the squirrel’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use small circles for the acorns and thin rectangles for the tail.

concept: a lighthouse guiding ships in a storm

      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='pink'/>

  <line x1='400' y1='90' x2='400' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

  <rect x='390' y='150' width='20' height='15' fill='saddlebrown'/>
</svg>

  <rect x='290' y='140' width='10' height='20' fill='saddlebrown'/>
</svg>

concept: a hot air balloon festival at dusk
description: Draw a gradient rectangle in orange and pink for the dusk sky. Add multiple circles in bright colors for the balloons. Use lines for the ropes connecting the balloons to the baskets.

    <linearGradient id='grad2025' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='300'>
      <stop offset='0%' stop-color='orange'/>
      <stop offset='100%' stop-color='pink'/>

  </defs>

  <circle cx='100' cy='80' r='20' fill='red' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='200' cy='60' r='20' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>

  <line x1='200' y1='80' x2='200' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='300' y1='110' x2='300' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='400' y1='90' x2='400' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='90' y='150' width='20' height='15' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <rect x='190' y='150' width='20' height='15' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <rect x='290' y='150' width='20' height='15' fill='saddlebrown'/>
  <rect x='390' y='150' width='20' height='15' fill='saddlebrown'/>
</svg>

concept: a fox hunting a mouse in a field
description: Draw a green rectangle for the field. Add an orange ellipse for the fox’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use a triangle for the nose and thin rectangles for the legs and tail. Add a small gray ellipse for the mouse’s body and a smaller circle for the head.

    <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='20' ry='10'/>
    <ellipse cx='350' cy='200' rx='20' ry='10'/>
  </g>
  <circle cx='150' cy='190' r='8' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='190' r='8' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <circle cx='350' cy='190' r='8' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='140' y='210' width='5' height='20' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='245' y='210' width='5' height='20' fill='black'/>
  <rect x='345' y='210' width='5' height='20' fill='black'/>
</svg>

concept: a penguin sliding on its belly on ice
description: Draw a white rectangle for the ice. Add a black ellipse for the penguin’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use a white ellipse for the belly and a triangle for the beak.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 2165: Ice with penguin -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='white'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='20' fill='black'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='150' r='15' fill='black'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='30' ry='15' fill='white'/>
  <polygon points='245,150 250,140 255,150' fill='orange'/>
</svg>

concept: a giraffe drinking water from a river
description: Draw a blue rectangle for the river. Add a tall, thin rectangle in yellow for the giraffe’s body. Use a small circle for the head and thin rectangles for the neck and legs. Place the giraffe’s head near the river.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 2166: River with giraffe -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='blue'/>
  <rect x='200' y='80' width='15' height='140' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='207' cy='60' r='12' fill='yellow' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='203' y='220' width='4' height='30' fill='yellow'/>
  <rect x='213' y='220' width='4' height='30' fill='yellow'/>
</svg>

concept: a dolphin leaping out of the ocean waves
description: Draw a blue rectangle for the ocean. Add a gray ellipse for the dolphin’s body, partially above the water line. Use a smaller ellipse for the tail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 2167: Ocean with dolphin -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='blue'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='150' rx='50' ry='20' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <ellipse cx='305' cy='150' rx='20' ry='10' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>

concept: a unicorn grazing in an enchanted meadow
description: Draw a green rectangle for the meadow. Add a white ellipse for the unicorn’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use a thin rectangle for the horn and thin rectangles for the legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 2168: Meadow with unicorn -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='500' height='300' fill='green'/>
  <ellipse cx='250' cy='180' rx='40' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='160' r='15' fill='white' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='247' y='140' width='6' height='20' fill='gold' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='240' y='200' width='5' height='30' fill='white'/>
  <rect x='255' y='200' width='5' height='30' fill='white'/>
</svg>

concept: a robot walking with glowing eyes
description: Draw a gray rectangle for the robot’s body. Add a smaller rectangle for the head and circles in red for the glowing eyes. Use thin rectangles for the arms and legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <!-- 2169: Robot -->
  <rect x='150' y='80' width='200' height='140' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <rect x='200' y='40' width='100' height='40' fill='gray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <circle cx='250' cy='120' r='10' fill='red'/>
  <rect x='140' y='220' width='20' height='40' fill='gray'/>
  <rect x='340' y='220' width='20' height='40' fill='gray'/>
</svg>

concept: a mermaid sitting on a rock by the sea
description: Draw a gray ellipse for the rock. Add a half-circle in green for the mermaid’s tail and a smaller circle for the head. Use thin rectangles for the arms and hair. Place the rock by a blue rectangle for the sea.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
<!-- Sea background --> <rect x='0' y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='blue' /> <!-- Rock --> <ellipse cx='250' cy='220' rx='80' ry='40' fill='gray' /> <!-- Mermaid's tail (half-circle) attached to the rock --> <path d='M250,220 A40,40 0 0,0 210,220 L250,220 Z' fill='green' /> <!-- Mermaid's head --> <circle cx='265' cy='185' r='15' fill='peachpuff' /> <!-- Arms (thin rectangles extending from the head/body junction) --> <rect x='270' y='195' width='25' height='4' fill='peachpuff' /> <rect x='230' y='195' width='25' height='4' fill='peachpuff' /> <!-- Hair details (thin, short rectangles above the head) --> <rect x='260' y='170' width='8' height='8' fill='saddlebrown' /> <rect x='268' y='170' width='8' height='8' fill='saddlebrown' /> </svg>

concept: a spaceship flying through a meteor shower
description: Draw a black rectangle for space. Add a gray triangle for the spaceship and a smaller rectangle for the body. Use lines for the engines and small circles for the meteors.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
<!-- Space background --> <rect width='500' height='300' fill='black' /> <!-- Spaceship: a gray triangle --> <polygon points='250,80 300,180 200,180' fill='gray' /> <!-- Spaceship body: a smaller rectangle inside the triangle --> <rect x='235' y='150' width='30' height='20' fill='lightgray' /> <!-- Engines: thin lines from the bottom corners of the triangle --> <line x1='240' y1='170' x2='220' y2='190' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='2' /> <line x1='260' y1='170' x2='280' y2='190' stroke='lightgray' stroke-width='2' /> <!-- Meteors: small white circles scattered in space --> <circle cx='100' cy='50' r='5' fill='white' /> <circle cx='400' cy='80' r='3' fill='white' /> <circle cx='350' cy='150' r='4' fill='white' /> </svg>

concept: a turtle swimming in a calm pond
description: Draw a blue ellipse for the pond. Add a green ellipse for the turtle’s shell and a smaller circle for the head. Use thin rectangles for the legs and tail.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
<!-- Pond --> <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='150' ry='60' fill='blue' /> <!-- Turtle shell --> <ellipse cx='250' cy='200' rx='50' ry='30' fill='green' /> <!-- Turtle head (extending to the right) --> <circle cx='310' cy='200' r='15' fill='olive' /> <!-- Turtle legs (four thin rectangles) --> <rect x='230' y='230' width='10' height='20' fill='olive' /> <rect x='260' y='230' width='10' height='20' fill='olive' /> <rect x='240' y='180' width='10' height='20' fill='olive' /> <rect x='270' y='180' width='10' height='20' fill='olive' /> <!-- Turtle tail --> <rect x='245' y='220' width='5' height='15' fill='olive' /> </svg>

concept: a lion roaring on a rocky hill
description: Draw a gray rectangle for the hill. Add a golden ellipse for the lion’s body and a smaller circle for the head. Use a triangle for the mane and thin rectangles for the legs.
svg:
<svg width='500' height='300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
<!-- Hill --> <rect x='0' y='200' width='500' height='100' fill='gray' /> <!-- Lion's body --> <ellipse cx='250' cy='230' rx='50' ry='30' fill='gold' /> <!-- Lion's head --> <circle cx='300' cy='210' r='15' fill='gold' /> <!-- Lion's mane (triangle behind the head) --> <polygon points='285,200 315,200 300,180' fill='orange' /> <!-- Lion's legs (thin rectangles) --> <rect x='230' y='250' width='10' height='30' fill='goldenrod' /> <rect x='270' y='250' width='10' height='30' fill='goldenrod' /> </svg>
